87b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i lam thob pa'i phyir ro/ /bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med par yang 'gyur pa ni dri ma med pa'i ye shes rab dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /mkhas pa la sogs par 'gyur ba ni/ sgyu ma lta bu'i
88a1(rgyud 'grel): ting nge 'dzin rtogs pas brtson 'grus thob pa'i phyir ro/ /mchog tu yid brtan pa la sogs par 'gyur ba ni/ yid brtan pa'i gnas kyi don dang lam so sor rtog pa'i chos nyid thob pa'i phyir ro/ /
88a2(rgyud 'grel): legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni yon tan rnams kyis shin tu 'dus byas pas nges par 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/ mthong ba'i lam mngon du byas pa'i phyir ro/ /byin gyis brlabs rgyun ma chad pa nyid kyis phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga? po
88a3(rgyud 'grel): che gang yin pa de lta bu'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes pa ste/ chos kyi rgyal srid chen po'i mnga' bdag tu gyur ro zhes 'brel lo/ /oM sarbba d+harmA b+hA ba swa b+hA ba bi shu da badzra a A(rgyud 'grel): AM A?(rgyud 'grel): pra kri ti ba ri shud+d+ha(rgyud 'grel): sarbba d+harmmA?  ya tu ta
88a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ sarbba ta tha ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya many+tsu sh+rI pa ri shud+d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ti/ A:sarbba ta thA ga ta h+ri da ya ha ra ha ra bar? sngags chos thams cad dang ngos rang? bzhin gyis rnam par dag di? rdo rje oM hUM h+rAM(rgyud 'grel): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yong su dag pa b+ha ga gA na dz+nyA na
88a5(rgyud 'grel): mUrt+ti wA gI shwa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyiye shes kyi skus 'jam dpal yongs su dag pa nyid du bzung bar bya'o zhes so/ /ra mahA bA tsa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sarbba d+harmmA ga ga nA ma la su pa ri shud+d+ha d+harmmA d+hA tudz+nyA na garb+ha A(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni thog ma dang dpus dang
88a6(rgyud 'grel): ? bcom ldan 'das ye shes sku can gsung gi dbang phyug mthar phyin gyis rlob pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po'o/ /de yang smra ba chen po byang chub kyi sems ni chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar dri ma med cing shin tu yongs su dag pa'i chos dbyings ye shes kyi snying po/ a yig go /sa dang
88a7(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni A(rgyud 'grel): yig gi /sangs rgyas nyid mtshan pa ni oM yig go /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa ni a(rgyud 'grel): yig go /ye shes kyi sku byin gyis rlob par byed pa ni A(rgyud 'grel): yig go /sku dang
88b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs gsung byin gyis rlob pa ni rim pa bzhin oM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'o/ /chos kyi dbyings gsung gi dbang phyug gi bdag nyid can brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gyi dngos po thams cad la chos kyi skus rgyas gdab pa'i don du A:?
88b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba mthar sbyar ba'o// //ji skad gsungs pa'i phan yon gyi cho ga rgyas pa rnams kyang de kho na nyid yid la byed pas klog pa rnams la blta bar bya'i/ klog pa tsam la ni ma yin no zhes so/ /de nas zhes la ni sngags
88b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis rlabs kyis bdud la sogs pas mi phyed par byin gyis brlabs shing rgyas btab pa'i rjes thogs su'o/ /bdag gi don rdzogs na dga' ba'o/ /gzhan gyi don rdzogs nas na mgu ba'o/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po gsang ba'i
88b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag po lag na rdo rje rnams dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas tshig 'di gsol zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ gang gi phyir zhe na legs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ de'i phyir nges pa kho nang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub thob par byed pa nyid do/ /don 'di la ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid tshad mar gyur pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /ces bya'o/ /mtshan yang dag
88b6(rgyud 'grel): par brjod pa'i rgyas 'grel slob dpon dbu ma la dga' bas mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// //'di'i rgya dpe dpal sne gdong rtse'i gtsug lag khang na bzhugs pa sngar sa mo glang gi lo la mkhan chen gzhon nu
88b7(rgyud 'grel): dpal ba la bsgyur gsung ba'i bka' gnad na'ang ma grub/ lcags mo yos lo la yang rgyab tu chos rje byams pa gling pa la bsgyur gsung ba'i bka' gnang na'ang ma grub ba las/ slad kyis kun ldan zhes bya ba lcags pho byi ba'i la
89a1(rgyud 'grel): sa ga zla ba'i chos bco lnga la/ dpal ldan bla ma chos kyi rje rin po che kun dga' legs pa'i 'byung gnas rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal bzang po'i bka' lung bzhin/ zha lu ba dge slong chos skyong bzang
89a2(rgyud 'grel): po skad gnyis smra bas rgya dpe las tshig don khong du chud par byas te/ bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// //*/ /'jam dbyangs smra ba'i seng+ge'i sgrub thabs dam pa rgya gar gyis mdzad pa zha ma seng rgyal gyi 'gyur bzhugs so// //
89a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab 'phel bar 'dod pa yis/ /spang rgyan/ gla ba/ mtshal dkar/ gsum/ yud pa tsan dan a ka ru/ spang rgyan spos/ dbang lag /shu dag gsum/ gser mdog rgya skyegs/
89a4(rgyud 'grel): shing mngar gsum/ dpa' bo bcu gnyis bsdus nas ni/ /zhib par brtags te sprang rtsi dang/ /ba dmar 'o mas ri lu bya/ /brgya dang brtsa brgyad byas nas ni/ /ri lu rnams la h+ri dang d+hi/ /bri ba'i gnag tsha gur gum dang/ rgya skyegs
89a5(rgyud 'grel): g+hing? ba sres pas bri/ /rin chen snod du blugs byas nas/ /pad+ma seng po 'dab brgyad dbus/ /gong gi ri lu bzhag byas nas/ /dmar ser dar gyi chur yang dbub/ /shar du kha ltas stong nyid bsgom/ /stong pa'i dang las seng ge'i gdan/ /
89a6(rgyud 'grel): de stengs pad+ma zla ba'i dbus/ /yi ge d+hI:dmar tsheg drag can/ /'od zer dmar po 'phro ba yi/ /de las bdag nyid 'jam dpal ni/ /sku mdog dmar po rgyan dang ldan/ /'od zer dmar po 'phro ba can/ /g.yas pa ral gri g.yon
89a7(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ /spu ti rnams shes rgyan dang ldan/ /ral ba'i thor tshugs gyen du 'greng/ /de ltar bdag nyid bsams nas ni/ /thugs kar b+h+ruM las 'khor lo bsam/ /lte bar ral gri sor bzhi pa/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bskor bar bsam/ /'od
89b1(rgyud 'grel): zer dmar pos 'phros nas ni/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bzhug /bdun gyi lhung bzed dbus su ni/ /yi ge h+ri(rgyud 'grel): las dbyangs can ma/ /sku mdog sngon mo gzi brjid can/ /g.yas na ral gri g.yon spu ti/ /bsnams shing rgyan
89b2(rgyud 'grel): dang yang dag ldan/ /thugs kar ral gri sngags kyis bskor/ /'od kyis ye shes spyan drang gzhug /mdun du sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang bsam/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi blo yi mun
89b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bsal bar bsam/ /de ltar bsams nas dang po ni/ /bdag ni thugs kar ral gri dang/ /sa bon d+hi(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa las/ /'od zer dmar po 'phros pa yis/ /bdag gi sna bug g.yas nas byung/ /dbyangs can ma yi g.yon du
89b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /thugs ka'i sngags dang h+ri:la thim/ /thugs ka'i gnas nas tshur la byung/ /bdag gi thugs kar zhugs pa las/ /A li kA li'i sngags su gyur/ /khong pa'i nang dang ba spu'i gseb/ /dpag tu med pas khengs par bsaM//
89b5(rgyud 'grel): par gyi sngags kyi phreng ba las/ /'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /dus gsum bla ma yi dam dang/ /dpa' bo dpa' mo la sogs pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs bsdus/ /bdag dang
89b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo'i spyi bor bstim/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi/ /blo yi mun pa bsal bar bsam/ /yang cig 'phros pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ /sde snod gsum dang rgyud sde bzhi/ /dge bshes rnams kyi nus mthu dang/ /mdza' yi nor
89b7(rgyud 'grel): bu'i 'od zer dang/ /rtsi shing nags tshal bcud rnams bsdus/ /bdag dang lha mo'i spyi bor bstim/ /lus la ye shes bdud rtsis gang/ /des ni shes rab 'phel bar bsam/ /bzlas pa byed pa'i dus dag tu/ /mdun du ri lu la dmigs
90a1(rgyud 'grel): shing/ /sngags ni stong phrag bzhi ru bzlas/ /oM h+ri Di ma me Di pa many+dzu sh+rI muM/ /pradz+nyA d+hA tu:h+ri:swAhA/ /brgya rtsas mi brjed gzungs thob 'gyur/ /stong gis smra skad kun la mkhas/ /khri phrag gcig
90a2(rgyud 'grel): ni bzlas gyur pa/ /nyi ma re re dag la yang/ /shlo ka ni lnga stong re/ /'dzin 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mngon par shes pa 'char ba dang/ /gzhan gyi sems ni shes pa dang/ /yi ge'i rigs ni thams cad kyang/ /thogs
90a3(rgyud 'grel): pa med par shes par 'gyur/ /smra dang bstan bcos thams cad kyang/ /bka' bzhin rtsom par nus pa yin/ /phyis ni sa'i dbang phyug 'thob/ /ri lu rgyal chen bzhir mthong na/ /shes rab 'jam pa'i rdo rje dang/ /sangs
90a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /ri lu dbyangs can mar mthong na/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur/ /ri lu nyi zlar mthong gyur na/ /sngon gyi skye pa dran par 'gyur/ /ri lu 'od du mthong gyur na/ /smra bzhi dag la mkhas pa dang
90a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od dang dud dang rnga smra dang/ /rlung dang nyi ma me tog dang/ /yi ge 'dri klog mthong ba dang/ /gnag tsha 'thungs dang nyams dga' dang/ /me tog 'dzugs dang zhing rmo ba/ /shes rab 'phel ba'i rtags su 'dod/ /de nas mdun gyi
90a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dang/ /dbyangs can mdang? bcas ba rnams/ /'od du zhu nas ril bur thim/ /na ma nyi shu rtsa gcig la/ /ril bu re re zos gyur na/ /shes rab 'phel bar the tshom med/ /dang por rjes gnang thob nas ni//skar ma
90a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal la bsgrub par bya/ /gcig dang brgyad dang bco lnga la/ /bsgrubs na shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur/ /brdzun dang sha chang sgog pa dang/ /rdo ngad? la sogs sgog pa dang/ /'khon dang zhe sdang drag po dang/ /grogs ngan mya ngan
90b1(rgyud 'grel): smre sngags dang/ /sems la gnod pa'i las rnams spang/ /bza' ba bdog ba thams cad kyi/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje mchod nas ni/ /rtag tu lha la gsol ba gdab/ /sems can rnams la snying rje bsgom/ /gal te las 'phro yod
90b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad kun/ /nyi ma gcig gis grol bar 'gyur/ /'bring gis gnyis kyis rtogs pa ste/ /nyi ma gsum du bsgrubs gyur na/ /las 'phro med kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi brtsod pa bzlog pa
90b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /dpral bar d+hI(rgyud 'grel): yig dmar po bsam/ /d+hI:las 'od zer 'phros nas ni/ /kho yi shes pa bkug nas kyang/ /srin lag bzhi la bstim nas ni/ /oM h+ri:Di che ge mo nan hUM phaT/ /brtsod pa kun las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /
90b4(rgyud 'grel): gcan zan rgyal po seng ge'i sgra sgrags pas/ /dur khrod wa tshogs thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /nyon mongs du ga rnams 'joms pa'i shes rab mchog /bdag gis 'jam pa'i dpal la rab zhus pas/ /'gro rnams shes
90b5(rgyud 'grel): rab gru yis 'don par shog /rje btsun dam pa rgya gar gyi gdams pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ bA d+hi rA dzA many+dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnal 'byor mas gsungs pa'o/ /'jam dpal ngag gi rgyal
90b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam pa'i mgon po la phyag 'tshal/ /gur kum bzang po ltar dmar gzhon nu'i sku la dpal gyis mtshan/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyis rmongs pa'i dra ba bcom pa bzhin/ /dbang phyug yongs bcings
90b7(rgyud 'grel): ? gis chos 'chad pa yi tshul mdzad pa/ /rol pa'i stabs bzhugs 'dod sbyin dag gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snga bar langs nas dang por ni/ /paM yig snying gar sna tshogs pa/ /a las zla pa'i dkyil 'khor steng/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig
91a1(rgyud 'grel): gur gum lta bur dmar/ /bltas nas zhal bsang la sogs bya/ /bsam gtan khang pa gtsang ma ru/ /bde ba'i stan la yang dag gnas/ /sngags dang sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/ /byams pas 'gro la
91a2(rgyud 'grel): bu sdug bzhin/ /dga' bas yon tan stong ldan ltar/ /sdug bsngal rgyur gyur sdug bsngal las/ /'don par 'dod pas snying rje yi/ /rtag tu rab dga' de bzhin du/ /yon tan dam par rab sbyor 'dod/ /rang gi don la mi
91a3(rgyud 'grel): lta par/ /btang snyoms gzhan gyi don byed pa/ /sngags pas sgom bya 'od zer tshogs/ /spros nas rgyal rnams gdam drangs te/ /de yis nam mkha' gang bar blta/ /yid kyis rang bzhin las byung mchod/ /byug pa dril phyi
91a4(rgyud 'grel): khrus rnams dang/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ /mchod pa'i sprin tshogs 'phro ba yis/ /khams gsum yang dag lnga ru sbro/ /so so so sor grangs med pa'i/ /lus sbrul nas ni phyag bya'o/ /'dod chags zhe sdang
91a5(rgyud 'grel): gti mug dang/ /rnam gsum lus ngag yid dbang gis/ /byas pa'i sdig dang byas pa la/ /rjes su yi rang de rnams bshags/ /sems can don byed dang bcas pa'i/ /sdom pa yang nas yang du bzung/ /rdzogs pa'i
91a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'jam dbyangs sogs/ /sbyin pa la sogs dge las skyes/ /yang dag tshogs la gsol 'debs shing/ /yun ring dam chos gsung bar bskul/ /dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing/ /byang chub sems
91a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi lam mchog bsten/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko haM/ /de nas sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas/ /oM yig las skyes zla steng gnas/ /yi ge'i tshogs 'phros lta byas nas/ /'gro pa rnams la 'jam dbyangs mchog /
91b1(rgyud 'grel): dgug gzhug byas nas sngags pa yis/ /ngag gi rgyal po sgom par bya/ /gur gum lta bur mdzes pa'i sku/ /sgyu ma 'dod lha las rgyal ba/ /ha ri seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'khrul pa med par rol pa'i stabs/ khyag g.yon sdong
91b2(rgyud 'grel): bu dang bcas pa'i/ /utpal sngon po yongs bsnams pa/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs/ /rin chen gyis rgyan rab mdzes pa/ /'od zer 'phro zhing thon gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas tshogs kyi phreng ba blta/ /chos kyi
91b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i phyag rgya che/ /phyag gi pad+ma nges bar sbyar/ /de bzhin utpal dang 'dra ba'i/ /h+ri yig 'od zer sna tshogs kyis/ /gzhan gyi mgon byed gdan drangs te/ /gzhal yas khang pa dang mtshungs par/ /de dang mtshungs nyid
91b4(rgyud 'grel): gdan drangs te/ /dam tshig rnam gsum snyam bar bya/ /de nas yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dgug gzhug dbang du bya ba rnams/ /oM badzra satwa sa ma ya tri sh+ya ho:sa ma ya stwaM sa ma yo haM sa ma ya stwaM/ a hi dza hUM paM ho:aoM
91b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis sku byin gyis brlab/ /A yis gsung byin gyis brlab/ /hUM gyis thugs byin gyis brlabs nas/ /utpa la'i phyag rgya dang yi ge'i tshogs kyis ye shes byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag par bskul nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
91b6(rgyud 'grel): sku las thon te b+ha'i? rnam par bkug nas bum pa'i ye shes kyi chu dang rdo rje sbyin par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mchor/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dpung gnyen gyis/ /slar yang srid par 'gyur ba yi/ /srid
91b7(rgyud 'grel): pa 'grub cing dag par 'gyur/ /slar yang bsgom bya las thob pas/ /lus dang sems ni shin tu sbyangs/ /do shal phreng ba'i rim pa yis/ /de nas sngags bzlas yang dag brtsam/ /khams gsum ma lus yon tan gyi rgya mtshor
92a1(rgyud 'grel): byas nas gzhug pa la sogs pa bya ste rnam par bsgoms nas/ /oM A hUM zhes pas bkug nas bzod par gsol ba bya ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /bdag nyid 'jam dpal mchog tu gyur/ /'gro ?
92a2(rgyud 'grel): de yis rang bzhin blta/ /gad dang yang dag sbyor rnams la/ /sems can don la de bzhin dgong/ /dkon mchog gsum la rab dang ba'i/ /slob ma rnams kyis shes byas la/ /'jig rten dngos grub nges pa ni/ ngag gi
92a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i sgrub thabs yin/ /bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang yi dam gyi lha thams cad nang du bsgoms nas de'i maN+Dal mdor bsdus pa brtsam par bya'o/ /oM h+ri:swAhA zhes pa ni lag pa bkru ba dang/
92a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsang ba'i sngags so/ /oM hUM stan byin gyis brlab ba'i sngags so/ /oM badzra b+hu mi hUM sa yongs su bzung ba'i sngags so/ /oM sarba bi g+hA nut pa ra ya hUM swAhA/ ba'i lci ba la sogs pa len pa'i sngags so/ /de nas legs par byugs
92a5(rgyud 'grel): nas/ oM badzra re khe hUM zhes pa ni re kha byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so/ /yang me tog cig maN+Dal la phul nas/ oM su re khe sarba ta thA ga ta d+hi tiSh+Tha na tu swAhA/ /zhes brjod nas lag pa bkru bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su me tog
92a6(rgyud 'grel): cig gzung nas/ oM ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni mahA pra ti sA re rak+Sha rak+Sha maM hUM swAhA/ /zhes pa rang gi sbyi bor me tog bzhag nas bdag nyid bsrung bar bya'o/ /yang oM A:hUM zhes pa ni bdag nyid bsrung ba'i sngags so/ /maN+Dal de
92a7(rgyud 'grel): la sna tshogs pad+ma'i gzugs su dmigs nas/ de'i steng du zla ba de'i steng du gur gum ltar dmar ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis thog ma med pa nas yang dag par grub pa'i bcom ldan 'das rab tu 'bar
92b1(rgyud 'grel): ba gdan drangs te/ rim pa bzhin du byon nas/ de la de bzhin du rab tu zhugs shing bcom ldan 'das bskyed nas/ oM many+dzu g+ho shA ya badzra puShpe hUM oM ak+Sh+yo b+hya badzra puShpe hUM oM bai ro tsa nA ya badzra puShpe hUM/ ratna saM b+ha ba dang/ a mi
92b2(rgyud 'grel): tA b+ha ba dang/ a mo g+ha sid+hi dang/ lo tsan dang/ mA ma kI dang/ pAN+Da? tA ra rnams sngon ma bzhen du me tog dang/ spos dang mar me dang zhal zas dang/ dri bzang dang/ gos 'phyang ba la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs nas dbul bar
92b3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang sdig pa bshags pa dang bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba rnams byas nas/ sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /de nas gshegs pa ni/ oM badzra mu:zhes so/ /oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NAM a byA nutpa ? ta/
92b4(rgyud 'grel): oM A hUM phaT swAhA zhes pa ni 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM ha rI tyi mahA yak+Shi n+yi ha ra ha ra sarba pA ba ni me k+Shi sarba ya ? Ni pra be shA ni swAhA/ 'phrog ma'i sngags so/ /oM a gra pi Na DA sha ni b+hyA swAhA?/ /phud? kyi
92b5(rgyud 'grel): chang bu'i sngags so/ /oM uts+tshiSh+Ta ? Da sha ne b+hya:swAhA/ lhag ma'i chang bu'i sngags so/ /oM A:sarba ta thA ga tA a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM hUM/ zhes pa ni sku gzugs la sogs pa sku khrus gsol ba'i sngags so/ /rdo rje
92b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor mas gsungs pa'i 'jam dpal ngag gi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// //*/ /'jam dbyangs dkar po'i bstong pa paN+Di ta mi tas mdzad pa kha che paN chen dang gro? phul lo ? 'gyur bzhugs so// //
92b7(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ Arya many+dzu sh+rI stat+tra? na ma:/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bstod pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /don zab sngags kyi stobs kyi rab sbyangs pa'i/ /stong 
93a1(rgyud 'grel): gsal nam mkha' dri med dang mtshungs las/ /baM yig las grub dkar dangs bdud rtsi'i mtsho/ /gting zab yangs pa can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtsho mdza' glang chen thal kar gyis bskor zhing/ /mnyen
93a2(rgyud 'grel): lcags 'khril ldem pad zlum dra bas khyab/ /lo ma'i gur steng dkar mdzes me tog las/ /yid 'phrog dri bsung ldan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mtsho chen dbus na baM yig las byung ba'i/ /pad sdong yag ga lo ma phun tshogs
93a3(rgyud 'grel): ser/ /'dab rgyas dkar gsal ge sar dmar ser can/ /lte ba ljang ser mtho la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de steng yi ge mchog rab yongs gyur las/ /rab zlum 'khor lo rnam dag phun tshogs mdzes/ /shin tu mdog
93a4(rgyud 'grel): dkar yid 'ong 'dzin gzugs can/ /bsil zer phyogs bcur 'gyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /der bzhugs a dkar las grub dpa' bo'i sku/ /zung bzhi'i na tshong? rdo rje skyil krung bstan/ /chu shel dri med ji bzhin rab dkar
93a5(rgyud 'grel): dangs/ /mtshan mchog dpe byad 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thor tshugs rtse na rin chen me tog spung/ /rtse mo lnga ldan zur phud shin tu gsal/ /snyan gong utpal dri ldan dang dbyangs 'phur/ /snyan shal nor bu 'phyang la
93a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin mgul rgyan dpung rgyan phyag gdub dang/ /zhabs gdub ska rags do shal bzang po dang/ /sna tshogs na bza' rin chen rgyan gyi spras/ /sil sil sgra snyan 'khrol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag yas
93a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog sbyin legs par brkyang mdzad nas/ /g.yon pas utpal sngon po thugs kar 'dzin/ /srab 'jam dung mdog na bzas rab brgyan cing/ /mu med 'od zer 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal mchog sku yi rnam
93b1(rgyud 'grel): par dran gyur nas/ /rig sngags cng zad bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang/ /dus nges dar dkar ma sha'i sbyor ba yis/ /phun tshogs blo gros spel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu dpa' bos legs bstan pa'i/ /ting
93b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin sngags dad ci rigs rjes sbyor gyis/ /gnas skabs mthar thug yon tan ma lus kun/ /bslu med nges par 'grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngo bo ma nor chos nyid rab mkhyen cing/ /rnam pa ma lus chos can lha der gzig/
93b3(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje che dang thabs tshul dpag med kyis/ /srid mtsho mdza' yas skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dbyangs mgon khyod gus pas rjes dran zhing/ /sgom bzlas legs mchod mngon par bstod pa yis/ /blo dman mun nag thib
93b4(rgyud 'grel): bo'i tshogs rnams kun/ /sprin med nyi shar ji bzhin dangs par mdzod/ /dpal ldan mkhas pa rnams kyi nang nas rgyan nges mo ltar shin tu mtho zhing gsal bar gyur pa'i paN+Ti ta chen po ma tis 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi sgrub thabs
93b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bstun te/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i gsal 'debs bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bstod pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta shAkya shI b+ha dra dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba khro phu ba/ gnubs byams pa'i dpal gyis srin po rir bsgyur
93b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// //*/ /rab gnas bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu sh+ri na ma siM g+hi? ti tsak+Shu man ti bi ti/ /bod skad du/ 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga zhes
93b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can/ /'jam dbyangs de la gus btud nas/ /lha khang sku
94a1(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mchod rten dang/ /glegs bam la sogs rten rnams la/ /rab gnas bya ba'i cho ga ni/ /bzang zhing dge ba bshad par bya/ /rab tu gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ /blo yi rim pas rab phye bas//
94a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga dgos dang mi dgos pa/ /rim pa gnyis su yang dag bshad/ /don la mkhas pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /yang dag don la sbyad gyur pas/ /gang gis gang la rab gnas bya/ /gdod nas ni? zhing ma skyes pa'i/ /
94a3(rgyud 'grel): chos dbyings mnyam nyid dgag sgrub bral/ /de rtogs rab gnas bya mi dgos/ /yang na sku gzugs mchod rten la sogs/ /sangs rgyas sprul par nges shes skyes/ /dag snang ngang ba brtan pa thob/ /de la rab gnas mi dgos so/
94a4(rgyud 'grel): da ni rab gnas dgos pa yi/ /mtshan nyid bshad rab tu gnas pa'i rgyud las/ sangs rgyas kun la rab tu bzhugS /rab tu gnas pa gang yang med/ /'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas/ /rab tu gnas pa rab tu brtags/ /dang po'i las can sems can rnams/ /rtog pa'i rgyu du mdzad par bshad/ /
94a5(rgyud 'grel): ces gsungs/ /kyis nyan bar byos/ /dang po'i las can dang pa can/ /'jig rten tha snyad la gnas pa/ /dgag sgrub lam la zhugs gyur pa'i/ /don du rgyas bsdus gsum du bshad/ dang po rab gnas zhu ba des/ /gsol
94a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum btab la bsnyen pa tsam/ /gza' skar tshes grangs 'dzom gyur pas/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs bshams pa ni/ /lha khang rnying pa rdo leb dang/ /yang thog dang ni sngar sbyangs par/ /sa yi cho ga mi dgos so/ /so ma'i
94a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas su cho ga ni/ /gzhung nas gsung bzhin rgyas par bya/ /sngar sbyangs pa la nub gnyis ste/ /de la legs bsham thig btab nas/ /lha? rigs bsdus kyi grangs mthun pa'i me tog dgod/ gi tshom bu/ de nas mchod dang pa dang gtor ma
94b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas bshams nas/ /bdag bskyed byas la bzlas pa bya/ /sa yi lha mo lha dang ni/ /bum pa slob ma sta gon bya/ /dgongs mo rten rnams spyan drangs la/ /de ni rten gyi sta gon no/ /de nas nang par rigs bsdus kyi/ /dal legs
94b2(rgyud 'grel): par bris nas su/ /mchod gtor la sogs rgyas par bsham/ /de nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus/ /bdag bskyed mdun bskyed sgrub mchod dang/ /bdag 'dug byas la dbang rnams skur/ /rten gyi sta gon legs par bya/ /de nas bun? la
94b3(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid ldan/ /lha yi grangs dang mnyam pa'am/ /yang na drug gam gnyis la bya/ /rang rang rigs lnga'i phyag mtshan bri/ /las bum la ni rgya gram mo/ /slob ma yod na gu gul de nas bdug cing bsngags bzlas nas/ /lnga khrag
94b4(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang chu snas dgang/ /rigs lnga mgul chings kha rgyan rnam rgyal dang las bum ldan par bya/ /khrus kyi bum pa bcu gsum mam/ /yang na bum pa gcig la bya/ /'dag chal lnga dang rnam lnga dang/ /? b+ha ni spos lnga dri lnga
94b5(rgyud 'grel): chu lnga dang/ /dri dang mngar gsum zho dang ni/ /'bras bu sna tshogs 'bru sna tshogs/ /'bras yos sman dang rin chen dang/ /chu sna sna tshogs blug par bya/ /phyag mtshan bri bar ba'i mi bya'o/ /da la'i bum dgod gzhung
94b6(rgyud 'grel): yung/ sug pa/ nye shing pa/ bu la tog bag phye dang/ shug pa spang spos/ brag spos/ spos dkar dang/ sna tshogs bu ram kar sbrang/ bzhin sna tshogs no/ /de nas khrus khang bsham pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor lho byang gang bder bya/ /rnam lnga byungs la pad 'dab bzhi/ /
94b7(rgyud 'grel): de la phyag mtshan lnga po dgod/ /de yi phyi rims pad 'dab brgyad/ /bkra shis rtags brgyad bri bar bya/ /de steng bum pa rgyas par byed na bcu gsum dgod/ /yang na lte bar ras kyi steng/ /bsdu na/ bum cig me long tshom bu lnga/ /rigs
95a1(rgyud 'grel): lngar bskyed dang ring srel gyi/ /brgyan pa'i rten dang rten 'brel gyi/ /snying po gser gyis bris la bzhugs/ /de nas nyi ma phyed kyi dus/ /slob dpon khrus byas gos bzang dang/ /dbu rgyan la ?
95a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan ldan pas/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung byas nas/ /stan la 'dug nas sngags zlos shing/ /spos dang rol mos gnas byin dbab/ /de rnams bshams pa'i rim pa'i/ /de nas bum pa sta gon ni/ /rang nyid dkyil 'khor
95a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dang bsdus/ /rdzogs par bsgom la mchod pa dang/ /bzlas pa byas la ngal? bsdu/ /dang po'i nga rgyal gnas par bya/ /de nas lha'i bum par ni/ /bdag bskyed bzhin bsam mchod pa dbul/ /rang rang sngags ni
95a4(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya/ las bum rdo rje gnod sbyin bskyed/ /a'oM badzra yak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nyid bsam zhing bzlas par bya/ /dri ma khrus kyi bum par ni/ /dbus kyi lnga ru sngags lnga dang/ /brgyad du rang rang brgyad bsams nas/ /mchod
95a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod lha rnams zhu par bsam/ /de nas bgegs bskrad sgrib sbyang bshad/ /phyi rol gtor ma rgya chen btang/ /nang du gtor ma ci 'byor bsham/ /rten la lan gsum bskor byas nas/ /a'oM big nan/ nam sarba ta thA ga
95a6(rgyud 'grel): te b+hyo/ bi sha mu khe b+hya/ sarba ta da khaM ud khi te/ pa ra na hi maM g+ha g+ha na khaM/ g+h+rih+na i daM b+ha laM te swAhA/ /ces pas bgegs la sbyin bar bya/ ting? lo? dang /'bras kyi chang bus phyi skor gsum/ /byas la sngags bzlas phyir dor ro/ /
95a7(rgyud 'grel): gu gul bdug cing nyung dkar brab/ /rang nyid me ltar 'bar bar bskyed/ /mdun du bskyed cing spyan drangs te/ /hUM ye shes bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /ma rig 'dod pa'i mun gsum? b+ha ni khang thams cad sreg /
95b1(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang gshin rje 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms/ /dpa' bo chen po dpa' mtshan stag wags can/ /log 'dren srin po mdza' yi dgra 'dul ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo bzhugs so 'tshal/ /log 'dren 'dul ba'i slad du spyan
95b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dren na/ /'gro pa'i don phyir mchod kyis gshegs su gsol/ /de brjod khro bo dpag med pa/ /bgegs rnams bsrung zhing bzhugs par bsam/ /de la mchod stong bya ba ni/ /dri chab me tog bdug spos mar me dang/ /zhal zas
95b3(rgyud 'grel): mchod sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bgegs rnams 'dul phyir 'di dag bzhes nas kyang/ /phrin las sgrub phyir brtan par bzhugs su gsol/ /de rjes bstod pa'i tshogs kyis bstod/ /de nas rang dang mon bdag gi don du
95b4(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa sbyang ba ni/ /g.yas g.yon me chu mdun du tim/ /bzhag la snying ga'i hUM las ni/ /sdig sgrub sdig pa'i gzugs don nas/ /til la thim pas gnyis med bsam/ /a'oM badzra d+ha ka la kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba pa paM da ha na
95b5(rgyud 'grel): b+ha smi ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas me la bsregs byas nas/ /rgya mtsho chen por dor bar bsam/ /yang na lcags sam rdo leb steng/ /me chu zho zan bzhag byas nas/ /nyungs kar dag la sngags bzlas gdab/ /med bsreg chur blug zhe zan
95b6(rgyud 'grel): bsil/ /mig tsang de dag bzhi mdor dor ro/ /de nas khrus kyi las byas te/ /lha bzo yon tan la sogs kyi/ /mi gtsang dri ma sbyangs pa'i phyir/ /dngos su ku sha'i sbir gyis bskru/ /yang na me long ngos la bya/ /dri zhim sran dkar dur ba ni/ /
95b7(rgyud 'grel): khrus rnams kun gyi sngon du 'gro /dri yi bum pa thogs nas ni/ /hUM ji ltar dam pa tog dkar dga' ldan nas/ /lha mdzes lhums zhugs lham pas khrus gsol ltar/ /sku gdung ring srel yi chun po dri ma med
96a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bcas/ /sprul sku yid 'od rnams la sku khrus gsol/ /phyogs bcur bdud rtsi dam pa'i char 'bebs pa'i/ /rgyal ba'i dam chos rnams la sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni ram ka ya
96a2(rgyud 'grel): a bi she ka ta sa ma ye hUM/ /de rjes ras dkar dri zhim chus/ /a'oM hUM tra h+ri a:ces brjod thig le lnga byas la/ /chu'i rdul rnams bsal ba'i phyir/ /hUM rgyal ba'i sku la dpe dang tshad med kyang/ /'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku
96a3(rgyud 'grel): cir yang sprul/ /gser gyi dbyings ltar nyes pa'i skyon bral kyang/ /'gro ba'i bag chags ma lus bsal ba'i phyir/ /sdig med rgyal po rnams kyis rab mdags pa'i/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis sku byis pas/ /nyon
96a4(rgyud 'grel): mongs dug gsum dri ma kun bral nas/ /'bras bu sku gsum myur du thob par shog /oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma ka ya shud d+ho haM/ zhes pas sku ni phyi bar bya/ /sngon 'gro gsum dang sku phyi ba/ /khrus rnams kun la shes par bya//
96a5(rgyud 'grel): mngar gsum bum pa thogs nas ni/ /ji ltar ltam pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /de bzhin bdag gis sku khrus gsol/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma ka ya a b+he she ka sa
96a6(rgyud 'grel): ma ye hU/ zho'i bum pas khrus bya ba/ /'di ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chu/ /ser sna'i dri ma sbyong bar byed/ /sbyin pa'i chu yi legs bkrus pas/ /khrus legs mdzad kyis khrus gsol 'o// /oM sarba ta thA ga ta na ma a bi she ka sa
96a7(rgyud 'grel): ma ya hUM/ 'bras bu sna tshogs dum pa yis/ /'di ni tshul khrims rang bzhin chu/ /'tshal pa'i dri ma sbyong bar byed/ /tshul khrims chu yis legs bkrus pas/ /khrus legs mdzad kyis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga
96b1(rgyud 'grel): ta pha la sna a be she ka sa ma ye hUM/ 'bru sna'i bum pa thogs nas ni/ /'di ni bzod pa'i rang bzhin chu/ /khong khro'i dri ma sbyong bar byed/ /bzod pa'i chu yi legs bkrus pas/ /khrus legs mdzad kyis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta
96b2(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta g+hu hi na a pi she ka sa ma ye hUM/ 'bras yos bum pa thogs nas ni/ /'dir ni brtson 'grus rang bzhin chu/ /le lo'i dri ma sbyong bar byed/ /brtson 'grus chu yi legs bkrus pas/ /khrus legs mdzad kyi sku khrus gsol//
96b3(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sho d+ha na a bi she ka sa ma ye hUM/ sman sna dag gi bum pa 'dzin/ /'di ni bsam gtan rang bzhin chu/ /g.yeng ba'i dri ma sbyor bar byed/ /bsam gtan chu yis legs bkrus pas/ /khrus legs mdzad kyis su
96b4(rgyud 'grel): khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ardza na a bi she ka sa ma ye hUM/ rin chen sna tshogs bum thogs nas/ /'di ni shes rab rang bzhin chu/ /rmongs pa'i dri ma sbyor bar byed/ /shes rab chu yis legs bkrus pas/ /khrus legs
96b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad kyis khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma Ni a bi she ka sa ma ye hUM/ rdzas gsum bum chu sku phyi ba/ /brgyad brgyad dag tu shes par bya/ /de nas rigs lnga'i khrus byas te/ /sngon 'gro gong bzhin sngon song bas/ /'dag
96b6(rgyud 'grel): chal lnga yi bum thogs nas/ /gzugs kyi phung po rnam par dag /gti mug ma lus sbyong mdzad pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyis ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan sku yi khrus gsol lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud d+ha a bi she ka sa ma ye hUM/ ba yi
96b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams? lnga'i bum thogs nas/ /tshor ba'i phung po rnam par dag /nga rgyal dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan yon tan sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ratna a bi she ka sa ma ye hUM/ spos lnga'i buM pa 
97a1(rgyud 'grel): thogs nas ni/ /'du shes phung po rnam par dag /'dod chags dri ma sbyong mdzad pa'i/ /so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan gsung gi khrus gsol lo /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad ma a bi she/
97a2(rgyud 'grel): sa ma ye hUM/ dri lnga dag gi bum pa yis/ /'du byed phung po rnam par dag /phrag dog dri ma spyang mdzad pa'i/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan 'phrin las sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma a ba she ka sa
97a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ye hUM/ chu sna dag gi bum thogs nas/ /rnam shes phung po rnam par dag /zhe sdang dri ma spyod mdzad pa'i/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi sku khrus gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a be she ka sa ma ye
97a4(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ khrus kyi rjes la sku phyi ba/ /gong bzhin du ni shes bar bya/ /de nas rten rnams bskyed pa na/ /sngags kyi dag pas mi dmigs bya/ /de yi dang las seng ge dang/ /glang chen rta mchog 'dab chags kyi/ /steng du gdan na lnga bsam
97a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /de yi steng du sa bon las/ /rang rang sku ru bskyed par bya/ /yang na byang sems rdo rje 'am/ /rigs bsdus nga lar bskyed par bya/ /lha khang mchod rten snang mdzad bskyed/ /de yang sngags kyis rang na pad+ma ? zla dang sbyangs pa las/
97a6(rgyud 'grel): lha la mchod rten ji bzhin bsam/ /yang na de nang gdan stengs su/ /a'oM hUM traM h+ri a:/ de las rigs lnga bskyed bar bya/ /po ta dril bu gsung gi rigs/ /yum chen dang ni 'od dpag med/ /rdo rje la sogs mi bskyod pa/ /khal
97a7(rgyud 'grel): bzangs ljon shing rdo rje chu mig gron pa skyed mos tshal la sogs/ /snang mdzad chen par bskyed par bya/ /de dag sbral sogs pa ma drin pa snying ga gnas gsum du/ /yi ge gsum ni dgod par bya/ /de la dgug gzhug bya ba ni/ /dang po'i
97b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis/ /sangs rgyas dpag med spyan drangs pa/ /ji ltar chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug gtso/ /rnam dag gtso ? gser kyi mdog 'dra ba/ /nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi brjid ldan pa po/ /dad bas sems can don phyir
97b2(rgyud 'grel): spran 'dren na/ /rab tu zhi zhing thugs rje che ldan pas/ /ting nge 'dzin/ /lag pa bsnam te dpung pa'i thang kar se gol gdab cing rdo rje dril du 'dzin pa'i sngags pas dbyangs dang bcas pas zhi ba mchog la rab tu zhugs/ /ye shes ra bzab chags bral ldan pa po/ /kun tu mi zad
97b3(rgyud 'grel): yon tan tshogs mnga' ba/ /tshur sbyin tshur sbyon zhi ba mchog gi lha/ /rgyal ba skyes mchog thams cad mkhyen nyid dpal/ /shin tu legs byas gzugs brnyan mchog 'di dag /mchod phyir 'di nyid du ni gshegs su gsol/ /gzugS
97b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'di dang lhan cig nyid du ni/ /'khor ba gnas srid bar du bzhugs nas kyang/ /nang med tshe dang dbang phyug dpal dang grags/ /mchog rnams ma lus sbyin pa'i mdzad du gsol/ /a'oM badzra sa ma ya dza/ /dza hUM ba hos sman drangs la/
97b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod la sogs dbul bar bya/ /a'oM badzra A g+hu sha ya dza/ a'oM badzra ba sha hUM/ a'oM badzra pho ta baM/ a'oM badzra nan ta ho/ /dgug gzhug bsres la dgyes par bsam/ /de nas yang ni sgyan drangs la/ /spus btsugs thal sbyar
97b6(rgyud 'grel): sbos thogs la/ /hUM ji ltar dga' lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug ldan rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgyas/ bzhug gnas rdo rje rtsegs sgrog gi phyag rgyas bsre/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgyas mnyes par bsam mchog gnas/ /bde bar gshegs pa bzhugs pa de/ /sgyu 'phrul lho ma'i
97b7(rgyud 'grel): lhums? zhugs ltar/ /de ring bde gshegs thams cad ni/ /de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'di nyid la/ /'jug pa nyid du mdzad du gsol/ /'di la rtag tu sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed ba dang/ /yon bdag
98a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag gis sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ /ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams/ /me tog la sogs pa zhes su gsol/ /bdag dang yon bdag bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas
98a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /kun gyi 'di la byin brlabs shing/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs/ /sangs rgyas dpag med bzhugs bar bsam/ /rten de'i ye shes ldan bya'i phyir/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab bya/ /yang na gsum gyi yi ge
98a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum/ /'khor lo pad ma rdo rjer gyur/ /yi ges mtsh+n pas rgyas gdab nas/ /oM sa ma ya sti ? lhan zhes brjod mchod pa bstod pa bya/ /gtor phyag mtshan 'dzin tshul lals kyi phyag rgya lags pa dpral ba thugs ka mgrin pa ma rgyas oM A hUM
98a4(rgyud 'grel): pa gtang/ yongs su gyur pa las bar bya/ /de nas snyan gsan dbab pa ni/ /lha rnams lhag par gnas pa de/ /nang bar mnyam nyid mi g.yo dngos yi dam chos skyong la cha gsum la gzhi'i dus su ni/ /rten rnams byin gyis rlob pa'i
98a5(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /byon bar zhu zhes snyan gsan dbab/ /rnam bar snang mdzad bcom ldan das/ /rigs sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid spyan dbye ba'i/ /kun gyis byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /bdag
98a6(rgyud 'grel): ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod ba'i phyir/ /ci 'byor ba la yo byad kyis/ /dab gnas nad par bgyid par 'tshal/ /tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas pa/ /
98a7(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /sbos thogs lan gsum brjod bar bya/ /de nas mchod bstod bsdus pa bya/ /de rjes se gol gdab bya zhing/ /badzra mu:zhes brjod pa yis/ /rten gyi ye shes sems pa ni/ /nam mkhar
98b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs su gsol ba la/ /mchod dang bstod pa ci rigs bya/ /de nas na bza' gsol ba ni/ /sprul sku la ni ser po ste/ /longs spyod rdzogs la gos sna tshogs/ /khro bo rnams la sdo dmar te/ /glegs bam yin bza' dmar dang ldan?
98b2(rgyud 'grel): phul la 'di skad brjod/ /'gro ba sems can ma lus bskyab ba'i phyir/ /lha yin bza' pa na ci la ki 'di/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsha'i tshogs la gus 'bul na/ /bzhes nas bla med grub mchog bdag la gsol/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta
98b3(rgyud 'grel): nir ma ka ya d+he ba ta na ye swAhA/ /longs sku rnams la rgyan dbul ste/ /byang chub yan lag mchog gi rgyan gyur cing/ /'gro kun ma lus bsod nams thob bya'i phyir/ /bde gshegs sras bcas rnams la brgyan mchog 'phul/ /
98b4(rgyud 'grel): cing der bzhes nas dngos grub rtsal du gsol/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ka ra ni b+ha sha ya swAhA/ de nas rten de gdan la bzhugs/ nam mkha' ba/ /ba la/ a'oM hUM traM h+ri a(rgyud 'grel): de dag rten gyi gnas lngar dgod/ /gshin rje gshed kyis bsrung bar bya//
98b5(rgyud 'grel): de nas bdag nyid bsrung ba ni/ /phyag rgya bkrol la ye shes gshegs/ /bzod bar gsol zhing dngos grub rgyal po rgyal sar ma zon pa rgyal srid la mi dbang ltar/ rab gnas ma zin pa de/ mchod 'os ma yin pas so/ /blad/ /gnas gsum yi ge gsum bkod la//
98b6(rgyud 'grel): sa phyogs rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam/ /da la'i shar phyogs ku sha'i steng/ /mi 'jigs seng ge lta bu yis/ /chos kyi dbings su nyal nas ni/ /bde ba'i gnyid ni log par bya/ /sta gon gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas rab gnas dngos
98b7(rgyud 'grel): steng 'og phyogs 'tshams thams cad gzhi ni/ /nang bar skya rengs shar dus su/ /khrus bya brgyan gdags stan la 'dug /mchod gtor rgya chen bshams byas nas/ /bdag bskyed lha ni gsal gtab nas/ /rten sbyang bkru dang phyi ba dang/ /rten bskyed
99a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan drangs mchod pa dang/ /dbug gzhug dang ni rgyas gdab rnams/ /rgyas par gong bzhin shes par bya/ /de nas rig pa'i dbang lnga dang/ /rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur nas/ /rigs kyi bdag pos rgyas
99a2(rgyud 'grel): gdab bya/ /de la mchod rtod bzlas pa dang/ /rten 'brel snying po brjod bgegs bskrad nas kyang/ /brtan phyir yig brgya pa bzlas/ /de nas shag thub rnam snang dang/ /sgrol ma la sogs rten rnams la/ /gong du dkyil
99a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lhar bar 'di bcom ldan 'das la sogs pas gsol ba gdab bskyed pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan gang yin de dag kyang/ /rang rang sngags dang phyag rgya dang/ /se gol gsum gyis gdul bya'i ngor/ /gang yin sku der bsgyur bar bya/ /oM
99a4(rgyud 'grel): na mo b+ha ga sba te shAkya mu ne yi/ ta thA ga ta yA/ arha te b+hya/ ha da ya thA/ oM mu ne mu ne mahA mu ne ye scAhA zhes pas shAkya thub par bsgyur/ /de ltar ngo mtshar chen po zhes so ces pa nas mdzad du gsol zhes pa'i bar brjod la bsgyur ba'i lha
99a5(rgyud 'grel): de la/ /dngos su bshams dang yid sprul ba'i/ /bkra shes mchod pa'i lha mo lnga/ /nam mkha' khengs pa bsam byas nas/ /me tog thogs la 'di skad brjod/ /hUM/ lta bas mi ngo mas bkra shis lha mo ni/ /mkha' la me
99a6(rgyud 'grel): tog mar 'bebs glu dbyangs len/ /rgyal ba'i chogs rnams mchod pas mnyes gyur nas/ /phyogs bcur bsod nams rgya mtshos khyab par shog /lta bas legs 'dre/ mkha' la bdug spos sprin stings glu dbyangs
99a7(rgyud 'grel): len/ /snang gsal 'od 'bar glu dbyangs len/ /zhal zas char 'bebs mkha' la sil snyan sgra sgrogs glu dbyangs len/ /rgyal bar phyogs bcur/ de nas nyi ma 'char ka'i tshe/ /rnam snang chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /
99b1(rgyud 'grel): spyan la sogs pa dbye ba ni/ /gser thur thogs la 'di skad brjod/ /hUM rgyal ba mkha' la byon pa'i thugs rje can/ /sangs rgyas can la sgrib pa mi mrda'? yang/ /sems can rnams kyi bag chags spyad spangs du/ /bde gshegs
99b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi spyan ni dbye bar bgyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma ka ya tsakru gser gyi thur mas dag kyi dbus nas rdul tshon phra mo blangs na/ spyan kyi zad du thogs nas dbye ba ltar byed cing/ b+hA? sho d+ha na yi swAhA/ gser gyi sna 'bru thogs nas ni/ /rgyal ba'i snyan
99b3(rgyud 'grel): la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang/ /sems can chos kyis 'khor pa la/ /rgyal bas chos kyi rnga brdungs ltar/ /bde gshegs snyan ni dbye bar bgyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ti nar ma ka ya lo b+hya pa na ye swAhA/ gser gyi tsher
99b4(rgyud 'grel): gzung shangs phyi la/ /rgyal ba'i shangs la 'gag pa mi mnga' yang/ /dri 'dzin rnam dag tshul khrims las 'khrungs pa/ /mos pas 'dzin spyad mchog 'di phul ba yis/ /'gro kun zag med ye shes thob par shog /
99b5(rgyud 'grel): oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma ka ya i daM g+ha te ye swAhA/ dngul gyi tshems shing thogs nas ni/ /tshems dkar thags bzang bzhi bcu ldan pa la/ /bskur sti dngul gyi tshems shing phul ba yis/ /bde gshegs gsung gis
99b6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub thob gyur nas/ /'gro ba rnams kyi chos kyi don rtogs shog/ a'oM sarba ta thA ga ti nang ma ka ya ki sha b+ha d+ha ni swAhA/ rin chen thur mas zhal phye ste/ /zab zhi spros bral dam chos sgra dbyangs kyis/ /skye 'gro thams cad
99b7(rgyud 'grel): tshim par bya ba'i phyir/ /ro mchog brgya ldan zhal zas dam pa 'di/ /'bul phyir rgyal ba'i zhal ni dbye bar bgyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga thA ga ta nir ma ka ya id ni mu kha ta ya swAhA/ gser gyi spu gri thogs nas ni/ /rgyal ba'i
100a1(rgyud 'grel): gtsug phud lha bas mi ngoms kyang/ /gzhan don sgrub cing khyim pa'i rtags spang phyir/ /dad pas gser gyi spu gri phul ba yis/ /'gro kun sdug bsngal kun las grol bar shog /a'oM sarba ta thA ga tA sho
100a2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha b+ha ri ka ya swAhA/ sen mo 'breg pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /zangs mdog ltar mdzes yid 'od skyon bral yang/ /bdag cag dang pas phyag dang zhabs sor gyi/ /sen mo 'breg spyang phul bas 'gro kun gyis/ /sangs rgyas dpe byad
100a3(rgyud 'grel): bzang po thob par shog /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra na ga tshe da ya swAhA/ /longs sku byang chub sems rnams la/ /dud gi mangs skra bshad de/ /dbu skra mthon mthing g.yas 'khyil rin chen brgyan/ /lha mi kun gyis lta bas
100a4(rgyud 'grel): mi doms pa'i/ /dbu skra dud gi so mangs legs bshad pas/ /bdag dang yon bdag sgrib pa byang gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+ho d+he nir ma ka ya karma li da ra ni hUM/ sprul sku rab byung cha lugs la/ /na bza' rnam gsum
100a5(rgyud 'grel): dbul pa ni/ /dri med mtshan la sgrib bsal mi mnga' yang/ /dad pas dur smrig rgyal mtshan phul ba yis/ /nam mkha' i mdza' mnyam 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas brtul zhugs mchog la spyod par shog/ a'oM sarba ta
100a6(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta ni ma ka ya badzra wa tra ye swAhA/ longs sku dang ni khro bo la/ /sna tshogs na bza' dbul ba ni/ /hUM ji ltar sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis/ /rgyal ba'i sku la na gza' gsol ba ltar/ /de bzhin sems can rnams la
100a7(rgyud 'grel): pan gdags phyir/ /sna tshogs mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol bar gyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta nir ma ka ya pra na d+he ya swAhA/ rin chen rgyan rnams dbul ba ni/ /bde gshegs sku la mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/ /rin chen 'od
100b1(rgyud 'grel): chags 'bar bas sku brgyan cing/ /byang chub mchog gis rgyan gyis rab mdzes kyang/ /srid zhu bkur sti rim go phun sum tshul gyis ni/ /rin chen do shal som de la sogs/ /rgyan kyi dam pa khyad 'phags mchog phul bas/ /byang
100b2(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' i brgyan dang ldan gyur nas/ /bla na med thar lam mchog la gnas par shog /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta na ma ka ya ratna a na ka la hUM/ thugs kar rdo rjes thig le bya/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan bsams nas/ /hUM mtshan
100b3(rgyud 'grel): bzang dpe byad rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir/ /dud dang dpal be'u g.yung drur 'khyil pa dang/ /bkra shis rtags brgyad dag gis rib brgyan pas/ /rgyal ba'i thugs la rnam par brgyan gyur cig /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ni ra ma ka ya
100b4(rgyud 'grel): h+ri shu d+hA a nud rdza ye swAhA/ spyan sogs rab phye rgyan ldan zhing/ /na bza' la sogs rab mdzes pa'i/ /rten de gzi brjid ldan bsams nas/ /de dag brtan par bzhugs pa ni/ /hUM ji srid mkha' mnyam sems can rnams//
100b5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bdag la dgongs su gsol ji srid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la ma bzhag gi bar du mya ngan las mi 'da' bar bzhugs so gsol lo bye brag tu sku gzugs 'di la 'byung gzhi'i gnod bsam zhi gi bar du sems can kyi don dpag tu med pa mdzad cing bzhugs su sol//
100b6(rgyud 'grel): sa la mi gnas par/ /'gro ba rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /mya ngan mi 'da' brtan par bzhugs/ khyad par sku gzugs 'di nyid la/ /'byung bzhi'i gnod pas ma zhig par/ /sems can dpag med don mdzad phyir/ /brtan
100b7(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid du bzhugs su gsol/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+ho te sa ma hi sta hUM/ brtan bar bzhugs pa'i rten rnams la/ /mkho ba'i yo byad dbul ba ni/ /gling bzhi legs par rgyan phul te/ /sa gzhi spos kyis byugs shing me tog
101a1(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /ri rab gling bzhi legs par brgyan gyur te/ /zhing khams dag par dmigs te phul ba yis/ /'gro kun rnam dag zhing la spyod par shog /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra re khye a hUM/ /dri zhim chu yis
101a2(rgyud 'grel): bkru zhing gtor/ /stong gsum kun tu dri mchog 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /tshim byed spos mchog thub dbang rnams kyi sku/ /gser bzang btsom byi dor byas pa ltar/ /dod chags 'bar ba'i sku la byug par bya/ /a'oM sarba ta thA
101a3(rgyud 'grel): ga ta na ri ma ka ya g+ha d+he a hUM/ gser gdugs bla re chun 'phyad dang/ /ba dan rgyal mtshan dbul ba ni/ /theg mchog gdugs dang bla re ba dan dang/ /bdud bcom rgyal mtshan lhab lhub ting 'dzin 'phan/ /lha dang lha
101a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod yon dngul ba 'og na chan bris 'di blang mo mchod pa'i 'dir ma zin kyang 'dod yon lnga dbul ba ni/ hUM 'di ni 'dod yon khyad bar can/ /gzugs kyi lha mo me long sta/ /rgyal ba'i spyan la 'di bstim pas/ /phyogs bcur bsod nams khyab gyur cig/ dus ba bu tsa me ka sa mud tra ba ra na sa ma ye hUM la sogs pa sngar rnams 'dres shes par ?
101a5(rgyud 'grel): sgra dbyangs kyi/ /bla re rgyal mtshan rol mos mchod byas pas/ /bdag dang 'gro ba'i dbang po rab tshim te/ /gnod pa'i dgra bcom bla med go 'phang dang/ /theg pa mchog la nges par 'god par shog /a'oM sarba ta thA ga
101a6(rgyud 'grel): ta ma ha ratna bu tsa a hUM/ sprul sku chu tshags lhung bzad dang/ /longs sku ral gri lab dbul ba/ /'gro ba sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir/ /rig pa'i gnas lnga dag la slab bya ces/ /ji ltar thugs kyang rgya chen bzhes
101a7(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin/ /mkho ba'i yo byed rnams kyang dbul bar bgyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta o ba su ka sa ba ri ye swAhA/ rin chen sna bdun dbul ba ni/ /ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor lo sgyur pa yis/ /maN+Dal las rin chen bdun dang tsa ka li bsdus la/
101b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sna bdun dag gis mchod pa ltar/ /rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ /rin chen sna bdun tshogs rnams dbul bar bgyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ta ma ha ratna pu tsa me ka a hUM/ snod bzad rdzas brgyad
101b2(rgyud 'grel): dbul ba ni/ /lha yi rgyal po lha min g.yul rgyal nas/ /bkra shis lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa ltar/ /rgyal ba rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' la/ /bkra shis rdzas brgyad dag gis mchod par bgyi/ /a'oM sarba ta thA ga ta sata
101b3(rgyud 'grel): ma ha pu tsa a hUM/ bil pa ltar dkar bum bzang mchod pa ni/ /'jig rten khyim bdag dag gis dpal brten nas/ /bil ba ltar dkar bum pa bzang dang bcas/ /mdun du bdar nas bkra shis byed pa ltar/ /rgyal ba sras
101b4(rgyud 'grel): bcas rnams la dbul bar bgyi/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ar tha b+ha ba ratna pu tsa mo ka a hUM/ de nas bkra shis rdzas brgyad dang/ /rtags brgyad bkra shis bya ba ni/ /rin chen gter dang dar zab steng/ /rin chen 'bar ba legs byas
101b5(rgyud 'grel): ? 'bul na/ sman lnga 'dru lnga rad na lnga/ dri lnga snying po lnga/ /rin po chi'o snod du blugs la btegs nas/ hUM rgyal ba mgon po dpal gyi lha mer bzhugs/ /bsod nams des? sku mnga' bsnyems pa la lnga phrag lnga ldan snying po nam pa 'bul/ 'gro bas bde gshegs snying po rtogs par shog/ oM badzra ban tsa ban tsa b+hi ma la pu ci ma ga a hUM swAhA ces so/ /bzhag/ de yi
101b6(rgyud 'grel): mdza' skor rdzas brgyad ni/ /me long gi haM zho dang ni/ /dur ba bil ba drung ras dmar/ /nyungs dkar rnams kyis khengs par bya/ /de rnams dbul zhing shis pa brjod/ /me long ye shes rgya mtsho chen po yis/ /ye shes rgya mtsho
101b7(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dag bkra shis pa'i gyur te/ /rnam dag chos la thogs med longs spyod pa'i/ /bkra shis des kyang sgrib las thams cad pa'i bum pas yon bdag bkrus la/ ltar bsgoms me tog gi phreng ba thogs /slo dpon la phyag byed du bcug la/ slob dpon gyi bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sngags saM/ suM b+ha nis bgegs gsal la
102a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dag par shog /gi waM dug gsum 'joms pa nad kyi sman/ /sman mchog chos nyid rab tu rtogs gyur nas/ /nyon mongs zug du med par gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang sdug bsngal zhi bar
102a2(rgyud 'grel): shog /zho ni kun gyi snying por gyur pa ste/ /snying po rnams dang ye shes kun rtogs nas/ /yon tan kun ldan dbyings su gyur ba yis/ /bkra shis des kyang dug gsum zhi bar shog /dur ba tshe ni 'phel bar byed pa ste/ /rdo
102a3(rgyud 'grel): rje sems dpa' i tshe ni rab bsgrubs nas/ /nyon mongs skye shi rgyun chad gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des ni tshe yang 'phel bar shog /bil ba rgyu rkyen 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod pa kun/ /byang
102a4(rgyud 'grel): chub snying po mchog tu gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang don rnams 'grub par shog /dung ni chos kyi sgra rnams sgrogs pa'i tshul/ /ye shes rgya mtsho nyid du dag gyur pa'i/ /chos rnams ma nor yongs su ston par byed/ /bkra shis
102a5(rgyud 'grel): des kyang tshig dbang thob par shog /li khri dmar po dbang gi rang bzhin te/ /chos rnams ma nor dbang du bsdus nas kyang/ /chos kyi rgyal srid rab tu brtan gyur pas/ /bkra shis des kyang khyod srid brtan gyur shog /nyung dkar
102a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs ste thams cad du/ /bgegs rnams ma lus rab tu 'joms byed cing/ /mthu stobs yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yi/ /bkra shis nges kyang bgegs rnams zhi bar shog /yang na rdzas dang bkra shis tshig /re re spel zhing
102a7(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya/ /lha bshos bzang zhing brgyan pa la/ /rtags brgyad bkod la shis pa brjod/ /de nas bza' ba dang btung ba'i tshogs kyis bskor la nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs la hUM zhal zas ro brgya ldan pa yid 'brog ba/ leg? sbyar 'di ni rgyal ba sras bcas la/ dad bas legs 'bul 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ 'byor ldan
102b1(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin zas la spyod par shog/ oM 'di b+hya a ne sa la b+he ? na bra na ne hA hA zhes dbul bo/ /nam mkha' i mthar thug thugs rje'i skyabs/ /dbu yi gtsug tor dkyil du gsal/ /gdugs kyi bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur cig/ sku mdog
102b2(rgyud 'grel): nya ltar dangs pa'i tshul/ /phyag zhabs sor mo nya ltar bkra shis brjod pa gsal/ /gser mig bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur cig /dbyangs rab dung chen sgra sgrogs pa/ /tshigs dang rus pa'i ?
102b3(rgyud 'grel): su gsal/ /dung gi bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur cig /ma chags shes rab pad+ma'i dbyings/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor sgros su gsal/ /pad+ma'i bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur
102b4(rgyud 'grel): cig/ shes rab bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang/ /dbu skra 'gur dang bum par gsal/ /bum pa'i bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur cig /'jam dpal dud mdog dal be'u/ /thugs kyi gsang ba'i mdzod du gsal
102b5(rgyud 'grel): dpal be'i bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur cig /mkhyen rab dkar po rgyal mtshan 'dzin/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem sku la gsal/ /rgyal mtshan bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis
102b6(rgyud 'grel): thob gyur cig /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bskor/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil du gsal/ /'khor lo'i bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /yon bdag bkra shis thob gyur cig /bsod nams stobs las legs grub
102b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /rtags brgyad bkra shis 'di brjod pas/ /bdag dang yon bdag 'khor bcas rnams/ /deng 'dir bkra shis phun tshogs shog /de nas mchod rten rab gnas la/ /bgegs bskrad khrus gsol gong bzhin no/ /mdun du da
103a1(rgyud 'grel): la bzhengs nas ni/ /mchod rten lha tshogs de ru bskyed/ /yang na snang mdzad chen por bsam/ /ye shes bcug la dbang yang bskur/ /rgyas gdab spyan dbye la sogs bya/ /oM da du sarba mA ha
103a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ho te swAhA/ ces pa'i sngags kyis lha bzhu nas/ /gdul bya'i ngo la rang byung gi /mchod rten chen por gyur par bsam/ /a'oM badzra a yu she swAhA/ srog shing 'bul bar bsams nas ni/ /dam pa'i chos kyi srog shing
103a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /'gro kun shes bcur rab ldan nas/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems can thams cad shes pa bcu dang ldan par gyur cig/ bde bar gshegs pa dang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas dang gyur cig/ sems can zer lhag pa'i bsaM pa rnaM pas dag pas ? tu bzang po'i smon laM la '? par gyur cig/
103a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi/ /bstan pa yun rings gnas par shog /bre ni dbul bar bsams nas su/ /tshad med bzhi las grub pa yis/ /bsod nams tshogs kyi brr khengs nas/ /bdag dang 'gro ba thams cad kun/ /ye shes tshogs kyis
103a5(rgyud 'grel): brgyan bar shog /a'oM ar bya ye swAhA/ de nas 'khor lo gzugs pa ni/ /a'oM tsakra bar ta na ye swAhA/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ /mi 'jigs bzhi dang ma
103a6(rgyud 'grel): 'dres chos/ /ye shes lhun grub thob par shog /dri med gser sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum thob par gyur cig rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ye shes lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /gdugs dbul ba ni/ /
103a7(rgyud 'grel): a'oM tsa na d+ha ye swAhA/ mkha' sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i skyabs chen po dang ldan te chos kyi rgyal po chen por gyur cig/ khyab chos sku dag pa las/ /tshogs gnyis gzugs kyi skur shar nas/ /'gro kun bla med skyabs ldan te/ /chos kyi
103b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po thob bar shog /dar sogs cod pan dbul ba ni/ /a'oM sa d+ha ga laM b+ha swAhA/ hUM sna tshogs yid 'ong rab mdzes pa'i/ /byang chub rgyan 'gyur cod pan 'di/ /bdag dang 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /yang dag mchod pa'i gnas
103b2(rgyud 'grel): thob shog /me tog oM sa b+hag laM ba swAhA/ sems can thams cad dus gsum du dar gyi cod pan dang lhab lhub la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang/ mchod pa rnam pa mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa dag de dag gi sku gzugs dang mchod rten dang gzugs sku dang gsung rab la sogs pa la mchod pa rgyun mi chad par byed par gyur cig tsanmo?
103b3(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba gdags pa ni/ /a'oM du a pa ma le ye swAhA/ yid 'ong skyon bral ku mud ta/ /'od kyi tshogs 'khrugs gsal zhing dag /'gro kun dbang po rab tshim pa'i/ /yang dag go 'phang thob par shog /g.yer ka'i dra ba dbul
103b4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /gser gyi dril bu sems can thams cad mtshan dang dpe ? dang ldan te sku lta bas chog mi shes la thob par gyur cig/ /g.yer kha las/ /theg chen chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis/ /chos rnams kun gyi don rtogs
103b5(rgyud 'grel): shog /chu srin rgyal mtshan gzugs pa ni/ /a'oM ku be ra ha dza ye swAhA/ yid kyi stobs las legs grub pa'i/ /mi 'jigs rgyal mtshan phul ba yis/ /'gro kun bdud las rgyal gyur nas/ /mi nub rgyal mtshan thob par
103b6(rgyud 'grel): shog /phun sum tshogs pa'i gdan sems can thams cad 'khor ba mi 'dzin mi gdod pa/ bdud bzhi las rgyal zhing chos mi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan du'gyur cig/ dbul ba/ /a'oM badzra ni ha ri dza ye swAhA/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis/ /stobs dang mi 'jigs la
103b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyis gdan gyi khyad par stobs bcu glang po che'i gdan dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi seng+ge'i khri dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rta'i stan dang/ /dbang bcu dang ldan pa rma bya'i gdan dang thams cad du thogs pa med pa stobs kyi shugs dang ldan pa nam mkha' lding gi gdan dang/ 'gro ba'i re 'dod skor ba ratna'i gdan dang chags pa'i skyon spang pad+ma'i gdan dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi ma zla pI gdan
104a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par myur cig/ /sogs dang/ re skod skyon bral gdan phul bas/ /mi 'gyur gdan mchog thob par shog /de nas glegs bam rab gnas ni/ /stegs la legs par bzhugs par bya/ /de nas bgegs bskrad khrus
104a2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gong bzhin du rgyas par bya/ /mchod stong byas la sngags 'di brjod/ /a'oM prad nye prad nye mahA prad nye ye swAhA/ de yis glegs bam a las ni/ /rdo rje chos su bskyed par bya/ /de yang pha rol phyin yin no/ /yum
104a3(rgyud 'grel): chen zhal gcig phyag bzhir bskyed/ /ye shes gzhug cing dbang yang bskur/ /yang na bden pa gnyis ldan pa'i/ /yi ge'i tshogs su bsgyur bar bya/ /lha dang sngags ni dbyer med bsam/ /glegs baM gzhan yang so so yi//
104a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyis yi ger bsgyur byas te/ /lha tshogs de nyid gdul bya la/ /gsung gi yi ger gyur par bsam/ /a'oM prad nye prad nye shu de rmi de ma de swAhA/ zhes pas rab tu gnas par bya/ /spyan dbye la sogs gong bzhin no//
104a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas glegs bam de nyid la/ /rin po che'i khri dbul ba/ /rin chen las grub seng ge'i khri/ /yid 'od sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras/ /spros bral gsung rab mchog la phul ba yis/ /'gro kun rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs par
104a6(rgyud 'grel): shog /a'oM a bana ye swAhA/ de nas na bza' dmul ba ni/ /sna tshogs dbang po'i gzhu bzhin rab bkra ba/ /gang la reg pas bde bar 'gyur ba yi/ /gos bzang rin chen bdag gis 'bul lags na/ bzod pa tshogs
104a7(rgyud 'grel): kos kyis brgyan par shog /a'oM d+hi d+hi bya ba pu ye swAhA/ /de rjes glegs shing dbul ba mi bzung 'jug dam chos 'dzin pa kun pral la/ /thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel gyur ba yi/ /nyi zla lta bu'i rten 'brel legs bkab ?
104b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro kun ma lus ? mjug thab par shog /a'oM badzra prad nya u b+ha ya d+he ga swAhA/ glegs thag rdo rje'i thig gus gdam/ /spros pa du ma rab tu rgyas gyur kyang/ /ye shes chen pos ro gcig gyur pa ltar/ /glegs bam cig
104b2(rgyud 'grel): gyur yo byang mchog phul bas/ /'gro kun ye shes chen po rtogs par shog / oM mu tra b+ha d+ha ya i b+hi Sh+Tha thA swAhA/ mchod steng bkra shis gong bzhin bya/ /de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin bsrag dang/ /tsa ru'i ston mo rgyas par bya/ /bza' 
104b3(rgyud 'grel): btung mang po bshams pa de/ /nam mkha' mdzod kyis spel byas te/ /zhal zas brgya ldan bde ba mchog ster ba/ /legs sbyar 'di ni rgyal ba sras bcas la/ /bdag gis gus phul 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /'byor ldan ting 'dzin mchog
104b4(rgyud 'grel): la spyad par shog /a'oM sarba di? ba bya a pra ti na ma pa ta ye swAhA/ rten la dbul zhing longs spyad nas/ /bdag dang yon bdag thams cad kyis/ /lag tu me tog rol mo dang/ /spos bzang thogs la bkra shis brjod/ /mchos bstod
104b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs ci rigs bya/ /de nas rjes kyi chos rnams ni/ /bla ma yi rten la gzungs thag btags la thams cad dam slob dpon gyi bzung ba 'am/ yang na rdo rje reg la thams cad kyis me tog gis char dpag rab gnas kyi sngags ni oM su pra tiShb+ha badzra swAhA/ oM hUM hUM bruM? badzri b+ha b+ha ba ti Da tiSh+Ta b+hu laM swAhA zhes brjod do//
104b6(rgyud 'grel): dam chos skyong dang/ /gzhi bdag gtor mas chim byas nas/ /chos skyong la ni bka' sgo ba/ /nag po chen pos rten 'di bsrungs/ /zhes brjod rdo rje'i go bkon nas/ /spyi bor haM dang ka bsams nas/ /haM rak+Sha haM ka ka ba tsi ba/ /
104b7(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i khrab dang rgyun gyur nas/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dra shul tsha/ /nus mthu phun sum tshogs par bsam/ /de nas dam la gdags pa ni/ /rdo rje rtse lnga spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje 'di ni dam tshig hi dang kaM las haM ? ki gi sgra byung ba rdo rje'i khrag te/
105a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis brlabs/ /gal te dam las 'das gyur na/ /'gems par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /a'oM badzra ma ha ka la ha na badzra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ bdag dang yon bdag 'khor bcas rnamS
105a2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung zhing skyab pa'i las mdzad nas/ /ci bsam thams cad 'grub pa dang/ /'khor dang longs spyod rgyas par mdzod/ /'gro ba sems can don slad du/ /bde gshegs rnams ni bzhugs kyi bar/ /bdag dang gzhan
105a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi don gyi phyir/ /sprul sku'i gzugs brnyan srung bar mdzod/ /bstod bskul la sogs rgyas par bya/ /de nas gshegs par bya ba ni/ /rab gnas lha ni mi gshegs par/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams gshegs bya ste/ /
105a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras/ /rigs de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs pa bdag ji ltar 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab dngos grub blang ngo/ bzod par gsol yi ge brgya pa gsum brjod la sdus dkyil 'khor lha tshogs bcas/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang/ /
105a5(rgyud 'grel): yang dag cho ga'i bya ba la/ /nongs gyur de dag bzod par rigs/ /zhi dang rgyas pa phun tshogs par/ /yon bdag rnams la rab mdzad nas/ /sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang/ /slar yang 'byon pa mdzad du gsol/
105a6(rgyud 'grel): sa dang chu dang me dang rlung/ /bskal pa brgya ru bsrung ba dang/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs la/ /mchod pa chen po mdzad du gsol/ /dgyes shing brtan par bzhugs nas ni/ /slob dpon yon bdag bcas pa yis/ /
105a7(rgyud 'grel): bu dang tsha bo srung mdzad nas/ /rang gnas dge bar gshegs su gsol/ /de nas rab gnas ye shes pa/ /brtan par bzhugs su gsol ba ni/ thugs bzang gyur pa yis/ slob dpon dang ni yon bdag gis/ /sku yi gdan khri nas bzung nas/ /ji
105b1(rgyud 'grel): srid sa chu me dang ni/ /rlung gi bskal par 'jig bar du/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bcom ldan khyod ni bzhugs par mdzod/ /de nas bkra shis glu dang gar/ /rol mo sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /bskor ba bya
105b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing brtan par bzhugs/ /yon bdag rnams la 'di skad sgo/ /snyigs ma'i dus kyi sprul pa'i sku/ /'di nyid yin gyis gus par gyis/ /mchod bstod phyag bskor rgyun du 'bad/ /'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang/ /
105b3(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa'i tshogs rnams thams cad mdzad/ /don rnams grub cing tshogs gnyis rdzogs/ /de ltar bsgo zhing zhal zas kyi / /lhag ma thams cad longs spyad nas/ /lha la mchod? bstod bshags pa dang/ /bkra shis brjod
105b4(rgyud 'grel): cing bsngo ba bya/ /de nas yon bdag slob dpon la/ /rta dang glang po ma he dang/ /gser dngul zangs sogs dpag med kyis/ /mnyes par bya ba shin tu gces/ /rab gnas rgyas pa'i cho ga'o/ /rab gnas bsdus pa bya ba ni/ /bskyen pa sa tshogs?
105b5(rgyud 'grel): sta gon dang/ /dgon? bskrad khrus dang rten bskyed dang/ /dgug gzhug rgyas gdab dbang bskur dang/ /spyan dbye la sogs thams cad kun/ /zhag cig rdzogs pas bsdus par 'dod/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i rab gnas ni/ /rdul tshon
105b6(rgyud 'grel): la yang mi rten to/ /maN+Dal steng du bum cig dgod/ /de la bsnyen sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bgegs bskrad khrus sogs bya/ /skad cig dam tshig sems dpar bskyed par bskyed/ /ye shes stim dang rgyas gdab dang/ /
105b7(rgyud 'grel): dbang lnga la sogs bskur bar bya/ /de nas rten 'brel snying po yis/ /rang rang sngags kyi sku der bsgyur/ /spyan dbye la sogs dngos su bya/ /ma grub ting nge 'dzin gyis so/ /mchod bstod rtsa ru'i ston mo dang/ /bkra shis mang du brjod par bya/ /
106a1(rgyud 'grel): kun tu dge zhing mchog thob phyir/ /rim gsum rgyud la gsungs pa yi/ /rab gnas bzang po 'di byas pas/ /'gro kun 'jam dbyangs thob par shog /'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par?
106a2(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa'i spyan dbye ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po smri ti/ rgyas pa'am shin tu bsdus pa ya dz+nya na g+hir tis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sid+d+hi e ka yi? ra many+dza g+ho Sha su bar+N+NA? mA
106a3(rgyud 'grel): la stong tra mA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs dpa' bo gcig grub ba'i bstod pa gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam dbyangs sgrib med spyan gyis gzigS
106a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad khyod kyis sems bskyed la bkod 'dras la sbyar/ /'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes legs bzung 'gron du pos nas sdug bsngal bsal zhing bde la 'god bar bzhed/ /brjod kyis mi lang yon tan ldan
106a5(rgyud 'grel): khyod bskul mi 'tshal bar mkhyen brtsegs brtag par gzhan don mdzad mod kyi/ /dad pas skra rtse gang tshum? bstod bgyi brtse bas gzhan gyi sdug bsngal spang slad rang bsam dbang gis bskul/ /dri za mi ci lha min mi dang lha
106a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang gtsor gyur zur phud lnga lnga ljon pa thags bzang ris/ /'khor los sgyur rgyal khyab 'jug dbang phyug che dang dga' rab dbang phyug bdud kyi sde dpon 'jig rten skyong/ /nor lha nye dbang brgya byin tshangs pa gnas gtsang lha
106a7(rgyud 'grel): bu gzhon nu rgyal sras mchog tu gyur rnams kyi/ /rin chen du mas nyer mdzes gtsug rgyan 'od 'phros zhabs rdul padmo'i ze'u 'bru blangs la gus phyag 'tshal/ /mgon po khyod sku gangs ri dngul dang dung gi bcag 'gro?
106b1(rgyud 'grel): 'o ma'i rgya mtsho stong phrag skar ma'i gzi/ /ston ka'i zla 'ong mu tig dri med rgya spos me tog puN Da ri ka kun d+ha 'bar ba'i mdog /zhi ba'i cha lugs gzhon nu'i gzugs 'chang brgyad gnyis na tshod shin tu mdzes ba sgeg cing 'gying
106b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshul/ /pad rtsa ltar 'jam sha rgyas lang tsho ldan pa na chung bzhin du reg bde ka tsa lin di ltar/ /g.yas g.yon mchog sbyin utpal 'dzin sku'i rked pa'i skabs phyin mchog tu yid 'phrog rdo rje skyil krung can/ /gtsug tor mi
106b3(rgyud 'grel): mngon zur phud lnga ldan 'jam mdzes dri zhim mthon mthing ma 'dzings dbu skra'i mtshams mthug pa/ /dpral ba'i dbyes che smin mtshams mchad pad ma rgyas 'dra dkar nag rab tu phyed pa'i mig dkyus ring/ /shangs kyi dbyibs thegs?
106b4(rgyud 'grel): sprin med sgra gcan las thar zla ba 'dzum zhal dkyil 'khor blta na sdug /bim pa byi ru pad mar ga leb rgan rtsi ltar 'bar ba'i mchu sgros mdzes ldan yid du 'ong/ /mchog tu 'od gsal pad ma'i rtsa lag stong gi gzi mdangs gang
106b5(rgyud 'grel): la reg pa'i dbang po chim par mdzad/ /bcom ma'i gser sbyangs las byas rin chen sna tshogs 'bur du btong ba'i 'phra bkod dpung rgyan rtse phran dang/ /snyan cha gdub kor 'od 'phros mkhur tshogs gsal ldan nor bu spel ma
106b6(rgyud 'grel): mgul rgyan sa mo do 'grig dang/ /rin chen do shal ska rags yid 'phrog phyag zhabs gdu bu sil sil khrol khrol sgra snyan rab tu sgrogs/ /khyod ni gdul bya'i dbang gis lug ru dod ka'i me tog nyi 'od gur gum 'dzam bu'i chu
106b7(rgyud 'grel): gser mdog /la las mtshal dang byi ru'i chun po li khri pa la sha dang pad mar ga'i dpung bzhin mthong/ /'ga' 'gas ku sha sman dang dur ba bsnol ba rin chen mar gad 'tsher zhing 'bar ba'i ri ltar khums/ /gzhan gyis
107a1(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' bai DUrya dang in+d+ra nI la ral gri utpal spang rgyan bzhin du rtogs/ /mos pa ji bzhin mdog zhal phyag zhabs spyan rnams sna tshogs gcig nas bye ba 'bum gyi bar du snang/ /'gro ba'i bla mas
107a2(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi gsung mchog rna bar snyan 'jebs yid 'ong ka la bid ka tshangs pa'i dbyangs/ /bud pa myos pa dang pa'i sde dpon rab mdzes rma bya rnga sgra sgril ma khyu mchog dang ba'i skad/ /dgu po rgyud mangs rgyud stong ldan dang dri za'i
107a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i gre 'gyur spel 'dra sgyur mkhas gling bu'i sgra/ /'dod pas myos pa'i na chung gzhon nu'i gru yi dbyangs ltar mnyen 'jam yid 'phrog gsal zhing zur phyin pa/ /lha 'am dri za'i bu mos rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs
107a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrags ba lta bur gdangs snyan phul du byung/ /zab cing rab brjid ring bar rgyun chas dar dar tsham tsham drag po 'brug gi nga ro brgyud ma bzhin/ /yan lag bcu phrag drug ldan mos pa ji bzhin sgra 'byung gang gis
107a5(rgyud 'grel): thos? pa'i dbang po rab tshim mdzad/ /phyogs dus 'gro kun nang na khyod kyi gsung dang mtshungs pa'ang med na lhag pa lta smos ci zhig 'tshal/ /lha mchog khyod thugs pad ma utpal ku mu ta la chu dang 'dam gyis ji bzhin
107a6(rgyud 'grel): skyon ma gos/ /dus gsum chos rnams thogs chags med par lag mthil dbang po ro ldan 'bras bu lta bur rtogs par 'gyur/ /thugs rje'i sdong chen lhun stug stobs sogs yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag me
107a7(rgyud 'grel): tog 'bar/ /ro brgya ldan pa legs smin 'bras bus 'khor ba ji srid khyab rtag gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun mkhyen ldan pa khyod la kho bo skrag pas zhu ba gsol bgyid re ba'i 'bras bu mchis par
107b1(rgyud 'grel): mdzod/ /bsten pas don grub zab lam rjes 'dzin rigs kyi lha dang sgrub gnas ting 'dzin gzungs dang mngon shes dang/ /dpag med thabs mkhas sems can kun gyi don byed yid bzhin nor ltar bsam pa sgrub byed gang
107b2(rgyud 'grel): zhig lags/ /byang chub bar du lus grib gser gyi ser po ma yis bu ltar rjes 'brar mi 'dor bskyang du gsol/ /mdza' gting med pa'i 'khor pa'i mtshor lhung las ngan dud 'gro'i tshegs kyis zos shing sdug bsngal rlabs kyis
107b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yengs/ /thogs med dus nas lus ngag yid kyis bsags pa'i sdig lhung sprin gyi sgrib ba mun stugs 'khrigs gyur pas/ /lha mchog 'od 'bar nyi ma ma mthong 'phrin las klung gzings myur sbyor thams cad mkhyen pa'i rir
107b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyal gsol/ /slar yang rtag tu sdug bsngal mi ngoms zab yangs rgya mtshor lhung gyur myur skyobs myur skyobs 'jam pa'i dbyangs/ /sems can gcig phyir phyi ma'i mu mthar spyod par ma bcos zhal bzhes thabs mkhas
107b5(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje mkhyen ldan yang/ /srid pa'i btson rar dam bcings 'dod yon dug zas nyam thag nga ros 'bod ba ci phyir yal par 'dor/ /dran pas don gnyer rnams kyi re ba dpag bsam ljon shing bum pa bzang ltar ngas kyang
107b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'o zhes/ /dam bcas bsnyel tam rgyun du khyod bsam gyis kyang ma rtogs the tshoms sdug bsngal mtsho las thar ma gyur/ /thad la nya bskur 'dre ldog chus khyer skyes bu yan lag g.yo pa bgyid rta glang bcing ba kun tu phra/ /
107b7(rgyud 'grel): dags bzang pos tshol khro shing brang rdung lhang lhang du zhing bu gcig chus khyer smre sngags chen po 'don/ /bkres skom bza' btung don gnyer gzer nang btab pa 'khun bu'i sgra 'byin tsha grang nyen pas bsil drod mdzod/ /gzhan
108a1(rgyud 'grel): sdug dran dang yon tan tshol phyir lhag par rtag gdungs kye ma myur skyobs 'jam dbyangs lha yi lha/ /de ltar phyogs 'gas bstod dang 'bras bu gsol bgyis dge ba ston ka'i zla pa'i 'od 'dra gang
108a2(rgyud 'grel): thob des/ /'gro ba kun gyis sangs rgyas rtag mthong mnyes byed theg pa mchog thob byang chub sems bskyed mi 'ral zhing/ /sdug bsngal kun spangs nag po'i phyag bcom pha rol phyin rdzogs stobs sogs yon tan
108a3(rgyud 'grel): mtshungs med legs thob ste/ /'jam dbyangs ji bzhin sangs rgyas zhing sbyor sems can smin byed 'gro mgon chos rgyal thams cad mkhyen thob shog /'jam dbyangs bstod pa 'jam dbyangs byin rlabs kyis/ /'jam
108a4(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs dran bas 'jam dbyangs bskul ba dang/ /'gro kun 'jam dbyangs dpal la dgod pa'i phyir/ /'jam dbyangs sbyis len 'jam dbyangs grags pas sbyar/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs dpa' bo gcig grub pa'i bstod pa
108a5(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ slob dpon ngag gi dbang phyug grags bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //#/ /mi tham bshes gton gyi a ra pa tsa na lha lnga'i sgrubs thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a ra ba tsa
108a6(rgyud 'grel): na sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar po ri bong 'dzin pa dang 'dra glegs bam ral gris phyag mtshan zhing/ /legs par mdzes pa'i gzhon
108a7(rgyud 'grel): nu zur phud lnga pa shin tu zhi ba can/ /dga' ba rab rgyas thar pa'i chog ste pad+ma'i 'dab ma yangs pa'i spyan/ /ngan pa'i blo gros sreg pa la mkhas 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye po gang dag rnams kyis
108b1(rgyud 'grel): a ra pa ta na yi dngos grub phyir/ /lo phyed bar du rgyun mi 'chad par sbyor ba bsgom pa gang yin pa/ /mchog gi blo dang khyad par byang chub go 'phang nges par 'thob ldan pa'i/ /'khor lo rin po che ? man ngag shin tu bsdus
108b2(rgyud 'grel): pa bgyi ba lags/ /dri zhim me tog bcal du bkra mi zhing dri ni? chu yis chad pa btab/ /mnyam zhing gtsang ma sngags rig yid du 'ong ba'i sa yi cha dag tu/ /yid 'od 'jam pa'i stan ni ci yang rung ba dag la nyer 'dug nas/ /bde
108b3(rgyud 'grel): par shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya/ /dngos don don dang bcas pa ma lus kun nas ni/ /stong par rnam par bsgom bya slar yang bdag gi lus/ /de dang de ni 'od gsal nyid du bltas byas la/ /?
108b4(rgyud 'grel): b+hA ? shu ? gsang sngags yang dag brjod par bya/ /de nas rang snying dang po'i dbyangs las bar snang du/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bzangs ldan ba bsgom bar bya/ /de nas 'dir ni d+hI yig tu brjod dkar bo ste/ /de ni lhag
108b5(rgyud 'grel): par dri med 'jam pa'i dbyangs su bsam/ /zla ba bye pa dag dang mtshungs pa'i mdangs 'dzin cing/ /kun nas 'bar pa'i rgyan rnams kyis ni spras pa ste/ /chags rang bcas par cung zad 'dzum zhing yid 'phrog pa/ /madma'i? steng na
108b6(rgyud 'grel): gcig tu bsam gtan nges pas bzhugs/ /rang gi snying gar a yig mtsheg? las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa yi gzugs/ /rnam par 'phro pa'i mnyam med 'od zer dra ba can ni yang dag bsam/ /de yi steng du zla ba'i ?
108b7(rgyud 'grel): brnyan dag la sngags pas bsgom par bya ste/ /de ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta bu'i bla ma 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid do/ /g.yas su mdzes pa'i gzugs ldan skra can ma ni rnam par 'dzum pa dang/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i nu ma zung ldan zur gyis pa 
109a1(rgyud 'grel): la blta pa ste/ /shin tu mdzes shing sgeg pa'i lus ma nye ba'i sgra can g.yon logs su/ /mdza' da g.yon tan gter du gyur ba tsan dag las bsgom par bya/ /dri med legs par dkar 'dra ba can
109a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi yod/ /re pha las byung mdun du nges bar bsam ba nyid/ /'od kyi rang bzhin yid 'phrog zla ba'i 'ong can ni/ /ba yi yi ge las skyes rgyab tu bzhag par bya/ /yang na yi ge bkod ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba yis/ /rgya cher
109a3(rgyud 'grel): rab tu snang ba nges bar rnam bsgom bya/ /des ni mi shes ri pong 'joms par 'gyur pa dang/ /yid ni rnyog pa med pa'i ye shes dam par byed/ /'og gi 'khor lo myur du 'khor bar bsam bya zhing/ /gti mug mun nag kun
109a4(rgyud 'grel): nas rnam par 'joms pa yi / /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan dang 'dra 'od zer dra ba can/ /lha rnams ni g.yo ba med pa nyid du blta/ /ri bong can lha'i 'od zer sprin ni rgya chen po/ /phyung nas phyogs bcu po rnams gsal bar gyur
109a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis/ /rang lus bzhin du sems can rnams ni brgyan byas te/ /slar yang 'ong ba snying ga'i zla ba la gzhug bya/ /sngags pas gsang sngags dam pa a ra pa tsa na ni legs bzlos shing/ /brtan pa'i blo yis man ngag
109a6(rgyud 'grel): bsgoms las blo ngan sdug bsngal rab bcom ste/ /yid kyi shes pa dri med dag dang pha rol phyin pa rnams dang yang/ /mchog du gyur pa'i sa rnams dang ni gang nges rgyal ba thob par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod gyur bla
109a7(rgyud 'grel): ma dam pa dga' mchog rdo rje yis/ /bde gshegs tshogs kyi spyan sngar cho gas gang zhig mngon par dbang bskur ba/ /blo bzang mi pham bshes gnyen nges ni skye pos blo mchog grub bya'i phyir/ /a ra pa tsa na yi 'khor lo
109b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhung du yang dag sbyar ba yin/ /'khor lo'i cho ga bzang po gzhung mchog tu sbyar bas/ /bsod nams rgya chen kun nas bdag gis thob gyur pa/ /gang yin des ni 'jig rten nyon mongs las rgyal zhing/ /nges pa'i bde ba gcig pu
109b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jam pa'i dbyangs gyur cig/ //a ra pa tsa na'i sgrub thabs slob dpon chen po mi pham bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lhag pa'i lha 'di nyid kyis mngon sum du byin gyis brlab
109b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i pandi? ta chen po sh+rI ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin las/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi cha shas rig pa dge slong rgya mtsho'i sdes 'gyur rnying las cung zad bcos shing/ rgya dpe'i rkang pa dang mthun par dpal gnod gnas
109b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur pa'o// //*/ /pad+ma rgyal po dang pad ma zab pa gnyis ka'i dbang chog sbyin sreg dza lan d+ha ra pas mdzad pa'i rgya gzhung bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI manyA ka ru Ni ka A b+hi She ka pra ka ra Na u
109b5(rgyud 'grel): de sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal thugs rje chen po'i dbang bskur pa'i man ngag rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma'i snang ba chen po rab tu rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re shig rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyag
109b6(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig /pad+ma rab tu zab pa'i dkyil 'khor ram/ pad+ma rgyal po gang yang rung ba'i dbang dang gnang ba thob pas/ rtsa ba'i sngags la bsnyen pa 'bum phrag gsum song nas/ slob ma rjes su bzung bas 'dod na/ gnas dben zhing
109b7(rgyud 'grel): nyams dga' ba'i sar/ /slob ma ni dang pa dang snying rje dang shes rab che ba/ 'khor ba la skyon du mi lta zhing mang du thos pa/ bla ma la gus shing theg pa chen po'i chos la the tshom med pa/ khyad par du nges pa'i don dang/ spyan ras gzigs
110a1(rgyud 'grel): la mos shing dbang po rno ba'i gang zag des/ bla ma la gsol ba 'debs ba ni/ sangs rgyas snang ba mdza' ys kyi/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi dam tshig dang/ /pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /pad+ma'i dbang
110a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur zhu bar bgyi/ /de nas bla mas gnang ba sbyin pa ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /mi mkhas pa ni 'ching bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa rnams ni grol bar 'gyur/ /sems can dang can smin par phyir/ /dus
110a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyang/ /srid pa'i 'dam las 'di yis brgal/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /nga yis 'bod kyi yid gnyis spongs/ /zhes brjod cing slob ma bzung bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyi
110a4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /pad ma nyi zla rab tu zab pa dang/ pad+ma rgyal po gang gi byed kyang rung ste/ de la dang por sa brtag pa dang/ sa bslang ba dang/ sa sbyar bar bya ba ni/ lto 'phya'i lto ba nas brkos te/ sa bslangs nas/ gnas
110a5(rgyud 'grel): khang dang 'tshams par sa stegs gru bzhi pa byas la/ sa yi lha mo la gtor ma phul tes byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang/ dri bzangs kyi chus byug la/ thig gi cho ga lag len bzhin du gdab bo/ /tshon gyis bri ba ni/
110a6(rgyud 'grel): tshon kha dog lnga ye shes lngar byin gyis brlabs la/ pdma zab pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbus kyi lte ba dang phyogs bzhir pad+ma 'dab bzi dmar po la/ mtshams kyi 'dab ma dang gong ras mdzes tshon/ mu khyud la pad+ma'i phreng ba bri'o//
110a7(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /lte ba dmar po la ze'u 'bru dang gong ras ci mdzes// 'dab brgyad kyi phyogs bzhi dmar po mtshams bzhi dang mu khyud rnams mdzes tshon du bya'o/ /de'i rgyab tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyogs bzhi phyogs
110b1(rgyud 'grel): tshon la/ mtshams mdzes tshon du bya'o/ /de'i phyi rol yang pad+ma 'dab ma bcu dmar po 'am ser por bya ba 'am/ lha snam dmar po 'am/ yang na 'khyams phyin chad spyi dang 'dra bal bris la/ rgyan bkram pa ni/ bla res dang/
110b2(rgyud 'grel): yol ba bre/ rten dgram ste/ mchod pa lnga dang gtor ma lnga la sogs pas mdza' ma legs par bskor la/ gzhan yang dgos pa rnams gzhung bzhin bsham mo/ /bum pa gtsang ma la bgegs bskrad pa ni/ gu gul gyis bdug
110b3(rgyud 'grel): cing gro ba'i sngags bzlas te/ nang du bcud chu gtsang ma dang/ sman dang/ dri lnga dang/ 'bru lnga dang/ snying po lnga dang/ ratna lnga/ 'o ma la sogs pa blugs la/ dar ram ras kyi mgul tshings dang gzungs thag btags te/ 'bras
110b4(rgyud 'grel): bu can gyi shing lo rlon pas brgyan pa'i bum pa gnyis la rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dang/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pa dang/ dbang gi bum pa la sogs ci 'byor bshams/ nang du lha bskyed la/ mchod pa phul nas/ dbang gi
110b5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa bya'o/ /rnam rgyal gyi bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhag go /las bum gang ba der dgong/ de nas rang stan bde ba la 'dug nas/ bris ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ bum pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor rgyas pa bsgoms/ las
110b6(rgyud 'grel): bum nang du rta mgrin bsgom pa ni/ h+rI:? las rta mgrin dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ zhal dbus dmar ba/ g.yas dkar/ g.yon sngo/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar ba/ rta mgo ljang zhur rdog? ma dmar ba/ rta skad sgrogs pa/
110b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas kha TwAM ga rtse gsum bsnams pa/ g.yon na rje'u chung 'khrol pa/ par ma gnyis kyis lha srin sde brgyad kyi tsit+ta'i phreng ba bsnams pa/ g.yas 'og mas zhing dbyug /g.yon gyi 'og mas thod pa lcang lo can lha ma srin sde
111a1(rgyud 'grel): brgyad kyi khrag gis bkang ba zhal du gsol ba/ zhas g.yas bskum/ g.yon brkyang pas bzhugs pa/ sku smar steg wags kyi sham thabs byas la/ sku stod zhing lpags kyi g.yang gzhi mnabs
111a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sprul rigs bzhis dbu dang yan lag brgyan pa/ me dpung gi dbus su bzhugs par gsam/ sngags ni/ oM h+rI:ha ya gri pa pad+ma ta krit badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI pa hu lu hu lu sarba pA peM shud+d+he shud+d+he shud+d+he ye hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes
111a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod pas khro po'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdud rtsi'i chus gang bar bsam/ de nas slob ma rnams la las bum gyi phyir khrus bya ste/ nang du btang la maN+Dal phul nas gral la rim par bzhag go /de nas gdong g.yogs bcings
111a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ lag tu me tog bzung la gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas bdag nyid dang dkyil 'khor dang bum ba gsum ka mi dmigs pa'i dang las/ bsod nams kyi sbrin kha dog lnga lnga las 'og phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams
111a5(rgyud 'grel): cad khyab/ de yi steng du rnam bar shes pa yi ge h+rI:dkar po thig le gnyis dang bcas par bsgom/ de las yig 'gru kha dog sna tshogs pa sprin gyi thog tu 'phros pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
111a6(rgyud 'grel): gsung thugs kyi/ 'od zer las grub pa'i gzhal yas khang chen po/ /shar shel dkar po/ lho be bUrya/ nub pad ma rA ga /byang inDa nI la las grub pa gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa/ ka pa dang rta babs bzhis mdzes pa/ rin
111a7(rgyud 'grel): po che'i la gu dang/ dra ba dra phyed kyi brgyan pa/ ri dags gdugs/? chos 'khor dang bcas pa mtho pa/ 'dod yon gyi snam bu dmar po la/ mchod pa'i lha mos bskor ba'i nang du/ pad+ma rim gnyis pa'i gdan gyi dbus su yi ge
