111b1(rgyud 'grel): h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las pad ma nyi ma zla ba'i gdan gyi dbus su/ rang nyid thugs rje chen po sku mdog dkar po/ zhal bcu gcig pa/ rtsa pa'i zhal dkar po/ g.yas ljang ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ de'i steng la dbus ljang khu/ g.yas dmar/
111b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dkar/ de'i steng ma dbus dmar ba/ g.yas dkar pa/ g.yon ljang khu/ zhal de rnams ni/ kun nas zhi ba bzhad pa 'dzum pa/ spyan gsum gsum zhi bas gzigs pa/ de'i steng du khro bo'i zhal nag po/ mche ba
111b3(rgyud 'grel): gtsigs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ dbu skra dmar ser me ltar 'bar ba'o/ /zhal dgu po ni/ dbu skra nag po la rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /zhal nag po'i steng na 'od dpag med kyi zhal dmar po mgrin pa yan chad byung ba/ spyan gsum
111b4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ gtsug tor dang bcas pa'o/ /phyag brgyad kyi dang po gnyis kyis yum la 'khyud pa thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /g.yas 'og mas mu tig gi phreng ba/ g.yon 'o ma ma pad ma dmar po/ /g.yas gsum pas mchog sbyin/ g.yon
111b5(rgyud 'grel): gsum pas spyi blugs/ g.yas bzhi pas chos kyi 'khor lo/ /g.yas g.yon bzhi bas pad+ma'i mda' gzhu'o/ /sku dang yan lag thams cad la rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /yum rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sku mdog dmar mo/ /zhal gcig
111b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis ma/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yas kyi zangs gri bsnams pa/ g.yon thod khrag yab la 'khyud pa/ skra grol ba rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ zhabs g.yon yab dang sbyar nas brkyang ba/ g.yas kyis yab kyi dang sham grol
111b7(rgyud 'grel): pa la 'khang pa'o/ /yab kyi phyag dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa gnyis/ mchog sbyin pa'i phyag mthil la mdzes par gzigs pa'i spyan stong mnga' ba/ sku'i phyag stong dang spyan stong las 'od zer kha dog sna lngas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus
112a1(rgyud 'grel): par khyab bar bsam mo/ /mdun gyi pad+ma la rdo rje phag mo dmar mo zhal gnyis ma'i spyi bor phag zhal g.yas gri gug /g.yon thod pa/ mchan khung na kha TwaM ga bsnams la/ rus pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o
112a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su yum chen mo ser mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma/ g.yas thugs gar rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa utpal gyi steng na po ti bsnams pa/ 'og ma gnyis mnyam bzhag 'dzad pa'o/ /rgyab phyogs su sgrol ma ljang khu/ zhal
112a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag bzhi ma/ phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas skyabs sbyin/ g.yon 'og ms utpal 'dzin pa'o/ /g.yon phyogs su yum yi ge drug ma dkar mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis thugs
112a4(rgyud 'grel): gang thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas 'og mas mu tig gi phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yon 'og mas pad+ma bsnams pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir bum pa bdud rtsis bkang ba'i steng du ka pA la re re gnas par bsam mo/ /lha mo bzhi po dang gyi
112a5(rgyud 'grel): sham thabs can rin po che'i rgyan dang bcas pa'o/ /de'i phyi'i pad+ma'i gdan la/ shar phyogs su mi bskyod pa sku mdog sngon po/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis kyis yum mA ma kI la 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar ba/
112a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas 'og mas rdo rje/ g.yon 'og mas pad ma 'dzin pa/ zhabs g.yas brkyang ba mA ma kIs 'khyud pa'o/ /lho phyogs su rin chen 'byung ldan zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ser sngon mo gra gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa po/ dang po gnyis kyi
112a7(rgyud 'grel): yum sangs rgyas spyan ma'i ser mo gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas yal? la 'khyud pa rgyab tu thal mo sbyor ba/ sngon ma gri gug dang thod ba 'dzin pa g.yas 'og mas rin po che g.yon 'og mas pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /rgyab phyogs su rnam par snang mdzad/ dkar po
112b1(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ dang po gnyis kyis yum gos dkar mo la 'khyud pas thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas 'og mas 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs su don yod grub pa ljang khu/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi'i dang po gnyis
112b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis yum dam tshig gi sgrol ma la 'khyud me tog dkar dmar gnyis bsnams pa pas thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas 'og mas ral gri bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon 'og mas pad+ma zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum pa/ dar sham dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o/ /uM
112b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni zhal gcig phyag sku mdog ljang ser utpal dang pad+ma bsnams pa gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pas g.yon utpa la yab la 'khyud pa/ rus pa'i rgyan can sku mdog yab dang mthun pa zhabs gnyis kyis yab kyi dar sham cung zad grol ba
112b4(rgyud 'grel): la 'khyud par bsgoms/ yab kyi g.yon gyi gnyis pa ni pad+ma 'dzin pa'o/ /mtshams bzhir ni/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi zhal gcig phyag dang po gnyis thugs kar thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas gri gug /g.yon thod khrag bsnams pa/ sku mdog
112b5(rgyud 'grel): ni dkar mo dang/ ser mo dang/ dmar mo dang/ ljang khu'o/ /zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa'o/ /de'i phyi'i rgyab pad 'dab bcu'i gdan la/ phyogs bcu'i pad ma rigs kyi sangs rgyas bcu po ni/ gser gyi mdog can/
112b6(rgyud 'grel): chos gos dmar ser gsol ba/ phyag na pad+ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa re re bsnams pa/ dbu reg zhabs rjen can no/ /gra bzhi la/ byang shar du 'jam dpal dmar ser/ g.yas ral gri/ g.yon utpa la'i steng du po ti bsnams pa'o/ /shar
112b7(rgyud 'grel): lhor phyag na rdo rje ljang khu/ g.yas rdo rje/ g.yon utpa la'o/ /lho nub tu byams pa dmar ser/ g.yas klu zhing/ g.yon lha rnams kyi 'tshams? bzhir/ utpa la'i steng na bum pa'o/ /nub byang du sgrib ba rnam par sel ba ser skya/ g.yas 
113a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu/ g.yon gyis utpa la'o/ /zhabs gnyis bzhengs pa/ rin po che dang dar gyis brgyan pa'o/ /shad sgor 'dod pa'i rgyal po dkar po/ zhal gcig pa/ g.yas 'khor lo/ g.yon sdigs mdzub
113a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o/ /lho sgor gshin rje bshed ser nag /zhal gcig pa/ phyag g.yas be con/ g.yon sdigs 'dzub/ nub sgor rta mgrin dmar po/ rta mgo ljang gu/ phyag g.yas pad+ma'i dbyug pa g.yon sdigs 'dzub mdzad pa'o/ /
113a3(rgyud 'grel): byang sgor bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag /zhal gcig /phyag g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdigs 'dzub mdzad ba/ dbu skra dmar ser 'bar ba/ sprul rigs pa zhes brgyan pa/ sku smad stag gi sham thabs can/ zhabs g.yas brkyang
113a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bskum gyis bzhugs pa'o/ /phyi rol du lha mo me tog ma dkar mo/ bdug spos ma ser mo/ mar me ma dmar mo/ dri chab ma ljang gu/ zhal zas ma dkar mo/ /sil snyan ma zla ba'i mdog can ma rnams kyis gtso bo
113a5(rgyud 'grel): la mchod par bsam mo/ /sgo khang du tshad med pa'i lha mo bzhi bsgom mo/ /de'i phyi rol tu rgyal po chen po bzhi ni/ byang phyogs su rnam thos sras ser po/ g.yas me tog u dum wa ra gtso bo la 'bul ba/ g.yon ne'u le'i
113a6(rgyud 'grel): byams pa tshad med pa'i lha mo dkar mo dngul kyi me long lta ba/ snying rje'i lha mo ser mo gser gyi me long lta ba/ dga' ba'i lha mo dmar mo zangs kyi me long lta ba/ btang snyoms kyi lha mo sngon mo g.yu'i me long lta ba rgyal pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar phyogs su yul 'khor bsrung dkar po/
113a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas me tog g.yon pi waM 'dzin pa'o/ /lho phyogs su 'phags skyes po sngon po/ g.yas me tog g.yon ral gri 'dzin pa/ nub phyogs su spyan mig bzang dmar po/ /g.yas me tog g.yon sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i
113b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi rol tu ye shes lnga'i 'od kha dog lnga rdo rje'i gur du bsam mo/ /'od kyi nang du yi ge drug pa'i gsung gi sgra rang bzhin gyis grag par bsam mo/ /de nas thugs ka'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las 'od kha dog lnga 'phros nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas
113b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sems dpa' rang sgom pa dang 'dra ba gcig spyan drangs la mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chang ba/ zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing ye shes pa dgug gzhug bya ste/ sku gsung thugs
113b3(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /de nas lha thams cad gsol btab la snyen pa bya ba ni/ thugs ka'i h+rI(rgyud 'grel): la/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM ma Ni pad me hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badzra bA ra hi/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye/ badzra war+Na nI ye/ badzra ba ro tsa nI ye hUM
113b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ ha ri ni sa hUM phaT hwA?hA/ zhes ba'i sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs nas bzlas pa bya ba dang/ 'od zer gyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa phul te/ de rnams kyi byin brlabs rang gi thugs ka'i
113b5(rgyud 'grel): h+rI:la bsdu'o/ /bum pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsams la/ de dag zhu bas bdud rtsi'i chur bsam zhing bsnyen pa bya'o/ /pad+ma zab pa byed na ni/ sgrub thabs las byung ba bzhin du/ bsgom zhing bzlas par bya'o
113b6(rgyud 'grel): cho ga gzhan dag rnams ni 'dra bas thun mong du shes par bya'o/ /de nas slob ma la skyabs su 'gro ba thun mod ba byin la/ sems bskyed pa ni sgrol ma'i rgyud nas gsungs pa/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa mi
113b7(rgyud 'grel): dge so sor bshags/ /'gro ba'i dag la rjes yi rang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /sems can rnams la phan slad du/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba dang sems bskyed la/ yang
114a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang sdom pa sbyin pa ni/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas pad+ma rnams rgyas dang/ /gsang sngags rgyal ba mkha' 'gro ma/ /bdag ni rtag tu
114a2(rgyud 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ /byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/ /khyad par du yang slob dpon la/ /rtag par bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /mgon po spyan ras gzigs dbang po/ /rnal 'byor ma dang snang mdzad tshogs/ /thams cad bdag
114a3(rgyud 'grel): la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ni dus 'di nas bzung ste/ /ji srid gnyis med la gnas par/ /de yi tshangs spyod gnyis med pa/ /nyi shu rtsa gnyis legs par bsrung/ /zhes khas blang ngo/ /de nas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i chos
114a4(rgyud 'grel): bshad de nges shes bskyed pa ni/ rnam snang mngon byang nas gsungs te/ 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen nyid/ /u dum wa ra'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni re 'ga' zhig 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo/ /gsang sngags
114a5(rgyud 'grel): s? ba'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste/ /gang gi sems can mnyam med don/ /mya ngan mi mda' byed par nus/ /bskal ba bye ba du ma ru/ /sngon chad sdig pa bgyis pa gang/ /de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra ba
114a6(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas byang bar 'gyur ba na/ /grags ba mtha yas sngags spyod pa'i/ /tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos/ /skyob ba'i gsang sngags bzlas nas ni/ /go 'phangs bla na med bar 'gro /gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la/ /
114a7(rgyud 'grel): blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba/ /de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyu/ /rdzu 'phrul kun 'byung rab tu bcad/ /bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis/ /rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed/ /gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa/ /bdag nyid chen po kun
114b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis ni/ /bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun/ /yongs su bzung la skye bzhin par/ /de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la/ /dbang bskur ba du skye bar 'gyur/ /theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i/ /lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan/ /byed
114b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams lam 'dir 'gro ba ni/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs pa la/ de yang 'jig rten 'dir sangs rgyas 'gyur ba shin tu dkon te/ dper na me tog u dum wa ra dang 'dra'o/ /me tog de gang du skye na/
114b3(rgyud 'grel): mtsho ma dros pa'i byang phyogs na ri rtse lnga pa ces pa yod/ /de'i phyi rol na u dum wa ra'i tshal yod pa de ni nam zhig sangs rgyas dga' ldan du byon te/ yum gyi lhums su zhugs pa'i tshe/ tshal de kha 'bus par 'gyur ro/ /'di?
114b4(rgyud 'grel): gtan pa'i tshe kha bye bar 'gyur ro/ /dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe rnying la/ sangs rgyas pa'i tshe rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /nam tshe'i 'du byed 'dor pa'i tshe rnying par 'gyur ro/ /tshad naM shing rta'i 'bang lo tsam mo/ /kha dog ni sangs rgyas
114b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyal rigs su 'byon na ni dkar po rab tu 'byung ngo/ /bram za'i rigs kyi nang du dkar por 'byung bar 'gyur ces gsungs so/ /gtan la dbab pa'i mdo las/ 'byung ba kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ u dum wa ra'i me tog ni/ sangs
114b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyas skye ba dang dus gcig tu 'byung ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing gsal ba/ 'od bzang ba/ drin dpag tshad gcig 'khor yug tu khyab par byed do/ /me tog de'i yon tan ni/ mig gi rab rib med par byed/ dran pa gsal bar byed/
114b7(rgyud 'grel): nang rab tu zhi bar byed/ dri dan pa thams cad rab tu sel par byed pa/ dri zhim po 'byin pas sems can thams cad kyi khams dangs shing lus yang bar 'gyur par byed do/ /'jig rten du gser gyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba 'byung yang
115a1(rgyud 'grel): me tog de mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so/ /de bas kyang gsang sngags 'byung ba dkon te/ bskal ba bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas stong 'byon te/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje sangs rgyas pa'i tshe ma
115a2(rgyud 'grel): yin par gsang sngags mi 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so/ /u dum wa ra'i me tog pas/ sangs rgyas stong 'byon pa dang/ gsang sngags 'byung bar dkon zhes mdo sde dang rgyud sde gnyis ka nas gsungs te/ de yang de ltar
115a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig /gser thub /'od srung 'byon pas kyang rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa min pa gsang sngags ma gsungs/ shAkya thub pa 'di nyid kyi bstan pa la/ ri bo po ta la'i shar phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi/
115a4(rgyud 'grel): ayon pad+ma 'byung gnas la dbang bskur/ des za her gtsug lag 'dzin gyi pho brang du/ dza lan d+ha ra la dbang bskur/ {ka} des tshe'i dngos grub thob nas lo nyis stong nyi shu rtsa lnga nas bram ze mai tri pa la dbang bskur/
115a5(rgyud 'grel): des rgya gar gyi rgyal rigs badzra pI Na la rdo rje gdan gyi shar phyogs su dbang bskur ro/ /des bal yul rin chen tshul gyi gtsug lag khang du bal po ye rangs pa la dbang bskur/ des bal yul yam bur ras pa
115a6(rgyud 'grel): badzra kir ti la dbang bskur/ des lo ro tshe kong gi dgon par mgos ston dbang phyug rdo rje la dbang bskur/ des yar lungs sog kar gru gu ras pa la dbang bskur/ des karma ras pa puN+ye badzra la dbang bskur/ des po ma
115a7(rgyud 'grel): rag snar d+harma bla ma la dbang bskur/ des shar phyogs spung ri'i dgon par/ bla ma mnyan ras pa la dbang bskur/ des rin po che rang byung rdo rje la dbang bskur/ {kha} zhes brjod/ de nas slob ma'i mgor rdo rje bzung la
115b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi pad+ma rgyal po dang/ pad+ma zab pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di/ smod min pa la bstan na/ dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ sngon dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba dang/ 'dilam dad pa'i snod la/ 'di lta bu 'di khyod
115b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis yang su rung rung la smra zhing brjod par mi bya'o/ /de nas ka pA la'i nang gi bdud rtsi'i chu byin la/ 'di ni rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu/ /ma gsang sreg bar byed pa'i dug /bsrungs na dngos grub thob pa ni/ bdud rtsi lnga yi chus grub
115b3(rgyud 'grel): po/ oM pany+tsa a mri ta u da ka Tha tha/ de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag ste/ spyan ras gzigs dbang rdo rje phag mo deng/ /khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur/ /gal te tshul 'di gzhan la smra mi bya/ /smras na de ma
115b4(rgyud 'grel): thag tu dral te gshegs/ /yang spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la/ de ring khyod dpa' bo dang? rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi rigs su zhugs kyi/ ngas khyod la sangs rgyas pad ma rnam rgyas spyan ras gzigs kyi ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ ye shes gang
115b5(rgyud 'grel): gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ spyan ras gzigs dang/ dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams
115b6(rgyud 'grel): kyi mdun du brjod par mi bya ste/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ yang rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi spyan ras gzigs nga yin gyis/ gang ngas pamma'i rgyal p+p spyan ris gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgoms
115b7(rgyud 'grel): shig ces bgo ba de khyod kyis bya'o/ /khyod kyis ngal brnyas par mi bya ste/ khyod mi bde ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod do/ /ye shes gzhug kyi dkyil 'khor du pa ni/ bdag nyid kyi
116a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgoms nas/ slob ma rnams spyan ras gzigs su gsal bar bskyed la/ 'og min gyi gnas gcod? ma'i gzhal yas nas/ sangs rgyas pad+ma'i rgyal po dang/ spyan ras gzigs
116a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs thams cad spyan drangs la/ bdag nyid dang slob ma rnams la gzhug go /spos la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i bye brag rnams kyang dbul/ dag tu/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas sku 'chad ba/ rdo rje mi
116a3(rgyud 'grel): phyed gsum gyi sku/ bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas/ /sku yi byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas gsung 'chang
116a4(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes tshig bsgyur la shes par bya'o/ /A(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa dang/ dpal ldan sangs rgyas thugs 'chang ba/ /hUM/ zhes pa dang/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+rI:/ oM ma Ni pad+ma hUM/ oM badzra pA rA hi/ sarba bud+d+ha Da ki nI ye/ badzra war+Na nI ye/ badzra
116a5(rgyud 'grel): bai ro tsa nI ye/ ha ri ni sa/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+dza hUM A(rgyud 'grel): zhes brjod cing ye shes pa gzhug go /ye shes pa zhugs pa'i rtags sems bde gsal mi rtog pa'i rtags la sogs pa
116a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba dang/ lha la dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab pa ni/ sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas dkyil 'khor du/ /'od dpag med pa'i rgyal sras spyan ras gzigs/ /pad+ma'i rigs kyi mchog gyur chen po yi/ /skal ldan rnams
116a7(rgyud 'grel): la dbang bzhi bskur du gsol/ /ces maN+Dal dbul la gsol ba gdab bo /de nas bum dbang bskur ba ni/ bdag dkyil 'khor gtso bor gsal ba'i thugs ka nas/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang lnga
116b1(rgyud 'grel): spros te/ bum pa thogs nas/ slob ma'i spyi bor dbang bskur bar bsam zhing/ bkra shis brjod pa dang/ yid la spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor du bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bsam zhing/ dngos su rnam rgyal
116b2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzung nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas kyi/ /'od dpag med pa'i rgyal sras spyan ras gzigs/ /chos kyi rgyal srid chen por dbang bskur ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /tsa ltar
116b3(rgyud 'grel): bltams pa tsam gyis ni/ /de bzhin gshegs la khrus gsol ltar/ /lha yi chu ni dag pa yis/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang dbang thob bo?// oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): oM ma Ni padme hUM(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra bA rA hi/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA gi nI ye/ badzra war+Na nI ye badzra
116b4(rgyud 'grel): bai ro tsa nI ye/ ha ri ni sa/ oM sarba ha thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ zhes brjod do/ slob ma mgon po pad+ma'i snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs te/ bskyed rims rgyas bar bsgoms pa la dbang ser dgos so//
116b5(rgyud 'grel): bum chu yar 'khyil pa las spyi bor 'od dpag med pas dbu brgyan bar bsgoms/ /nges lus ngag pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo/ mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa yin no/ /slob ma la mchod pa rnam
116b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i de ba dang/ bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bsam rtsis bkang ba lag du bzung la/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas pad+ma rnam rgyas yab yum gyi sbyor mtshams nas bdud rtsi bab par bsams la/ de'i 'od zer yi ge
116b7(rgyud 'grel): drug ba'i sgra dang bcas pa phyogs bcur spros pas/ phyogs bcu'i de ba dang/ bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bsam zhing/ 'od dpag med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang gsung gi mdzod/ /yi ge drug pa phyogs bcur?
117a1(rgyud 'grel): chos 'khor bskor ba'i gsung/ /rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu'i dbang thob pas/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong gsang ba'i chos kyi dbang bskur ro/ /sngags gong ma dang/ sarba ta thA ga ta a
117a2(rgyud 'grel): b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM zhes brjod do/ /des ngag gi sgrib pa dag nas/ skye ba med pa'i sku gsung chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba thob pa yin no/ /de nas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang ni/ me long g.ya' dag pa la/
117a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje phag mo'i gzugs brnyan 'char du bcug la/ de la spyan ras gzigs kyi yum mar me las mar me chad pa bzhin du chang nas de dang gnyis su med par bzhugs nas/ thugs ka nas 'od zer gyi phreng ba kha dog sna lnga
117a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum rnams bskul nas/ de dag rnal 'byor ma la thim/ de mthong ba tsam gyis zag med kyi bde ba ster nus pa'i lha mo me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu/
117a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshogs de yang/ me long nang gi gzugs brnyan lta bu/ me long nang gi lha mo lag pa g.yon pas gtad la/ dus gsum byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /shes rab rdo rje rnal 'byor
117a6(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /bde chen nyid du rnam sbyar bas/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgribs spangs/ shes rab nam mkha' lta bu yi/ /rnal 'byor ma dang 'bral mi bya/ /gong gi sngags dang/ tsit+ta pradz+nyA sarba ta thA ga ta na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ des shes
117a7(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes kyi dbang thob pa yin no/ /da ni tshig dbang rin po che bskur ba ni/ /bzhi pa'i mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba drug gi snang ba'i yul med de/ /snang med ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pas/ /chos kyi sku las longs
117b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod rdzogs sku dang/ /sprul pa'i sku ni ye shes dpag med che/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa bdag med don mdzad do zhes brjod do/ /rjes la slob ma lhar gyur pa la mchod pa lnga 'bul/ bkra shis kyi tshig rnams brjod do/ /de ni tshig dbang ngo//
117b2(rgyud 'grel): de nas tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga bzhin du bskor bar bya'o/ /gtor ma rnaMs? rgyas par bsngos la btang ba dang/ lhag ma'i gtor ma dang/ rjes kyi cho ga rnams byas la/ slob dpon la me tog dbul pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsab bsngos te/
117b3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor mi dmigs par bya'o/ /sbyin sreg bya bar 'dod na/ nang gi sbyin sreg rtsa gsum 'dus mdor/ ma las thob pa'i nyi ma byang chub kyi sems kyi me 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung gis sbar nas/ bzung 'dzin gyi rtog pa skye ba med
117b4(rgyud 'grel): par bsreg pa'i dbu ma nas snying gar phyin pas/ pha las thob pa'i zla ba byang chub kyi sems dang snying gar 'dzoms pas lus sems mi dmigs pa'i bde gsal chen po ni/ sbyin sreg rnams kyi mchog go /zhes spyan ras
117b5(rgyud 'grel): gzigs kyi rgyad nas gsungs so/ /phyi'i sbin sreg ni/ sa khru gang la 'dzub gang mar brus/ kha khyer 'dzub gang phyir bskyed/ dbus su pad+ma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dmar po bya/ mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng bas bskor/ de'i nad du tsan
117b6(rgyud 'grel): dan gyis zla gom du rtsigs/ dbang gi bsreg rdzas dang dgang blugs dang gtor ma dang/ de rnams g.yas g.yon dang mdun du bzhag la/ rgyan dang gos dang lta stangs rnams las dang mthun par byas te/ me lha bskyed la mchod
117b7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang sreg rdzas dbul/ bstod pa bya'o/ /de nas me lha mer gyur pa'i dbus su/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas bsdus gang rung bskyed/ bsreg rdzas rnams byin gyis brlabs te/ dbul ba ni rgyal po'i rim pa can nam/
118a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po'i rim pa dang/ bram ze'i rim pa med de/ gang 'thad kyis dbul lo/ /gsol ba gdab pa dang/ sngags kyi 'od zer ni zhi ba dang/ dbang rgyas dang/ drag po rnams gang byed kyang/ rtsa ba'i sngags
118a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bsham du las bzhi'i sngags btags pas dngos grub bsgrub pa'o/ /spyin sreg gi rim pa'o/ /spyan ras gzigs kyi rgyud pad ma zab pa dang/ pad+ma rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i rab tu byed pa 'di/ dpal
118a3(rgyud 'grel): dza lan d+ha ra pas mdzad pa'o/ /mnga' bdag mai tri pa'i phyag dpe las/ rgya gar phyag na'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba pradz+nyA kIr tis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //
118a4(rgyud 'grel): jo bo'i gzhung// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya ShaT k+Sha ra sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po re zhig sngags pas gdong bkrus nas
118a5(rgyud 'grel): stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa bsams la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o/ /bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ba yin no/ /zhes mos par byas la/ sems can ji snyed bsdu bas yang dag
118a6(rgyud 'grel): par bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las skyes pa 'am/ drod bsher las skyes pa 'am/ brdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du
118a7(rgyud 'grel): shes yod min med min te/ ji srid du sems can rnams kyi khams su rtogs pa de dag thams cad/ bdag gis phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su dgod par bya'o zhes bsams la/ de nas oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA wa
118b1(rgyud 'grel): shud+d+ho(rgyud 'grel): haM/ de ltar stong pa nyid du bsdus tsam gyis bsgoms la/ de'i 'og tu rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge h+rI(rgyud 'grel): las 'od zer brgya stong du ma bsgoms te/ yang de nyid kyis thog ma med pa nas bsags
118b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag par byas nas bdag nyid kyi snying gar zhugs pa las/ bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sku rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ sku mdog dkar po
118b3(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas na phreng ba/ g.yon pa na pad+ma bsnams pa/ phyag dang po gnyis kyis thugs kar thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /g.yas su nor bu 'dzin pa sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa de dan 'dra/ g.yon du 'bru drug
118b4(rgyud 'grel): ma rig sngags chen mo phyag bzhi ma ston ka'i sprin lta bu'o/ /oM mahA su kha badzra satwa a la la ho(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): a(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar bsgoms nas de'i 'og tu
118b5(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las phreng ba 'dra ba skor/ zhal nas phyung zhing lte bar zhugs te 'khor lo'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bur rtogs pa sngags kyi
118b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po 'di mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis zla bar bya'o/ /de nas lus g.yo ba dang bcas par gyur pa la sogs par 'gyur ba'i rnal 'byor pa dad pa dang/ snying rje dang/ bla ma la gus pa dang ldan pas ni ring por mi thogs par 'gyur
118b7(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /oM ma nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po Ni padme hUM zhes de ltar bzlas so/ /de nas ldang ba'i dus su yang sngags brjod par bya'o/ /yi ge brgya pa brjod bar bya'o/ /de ltar bzlas nas ci bder gnas par bya'o/ /yi ge drug pa'i sgrub thabs
119a1(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //jo bo rje lha gcig gis dpal gyi ye dbang? mdzad/ /*/ /paN chen lugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ Arya a mo g+ha
119a2(rgyud 'grel): pa sha sA d+ha nAM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig las byung ba/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/ /don yod zhaD
119a3(rgyud 'grel): pa sgrubs pa'i thabs/ /gsal por dbye phyir gus phyag 'tshal/ /dang po re shig gnas dben par phun sum tshogs par snga par langs mtshan brjod te gdong bkru ba dang maN+Dal dang mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas gso sbyong
119a4(rgyud 'grel): blangs te dam bca' ba slob pa la gnas la/ sems can thams cad la mi bzod pa'i brtse bas sems bskyed la/ rang gi snying gar pad ma dang dang zla ba'i steng du/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkar po 'od zer 'phro lha 'am bla ma'i drung du ba bsams
119a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ma grub na sdom pa gnyis la brten nas bya gsung ngo ? te/ de'i 'od kis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang dri ma sbyangs te/ yang bla ma dang/ bam las a las sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs la/ phyag 'tshal ba
119a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mchod pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas dam chos bdun rnam dag bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgom ste/ oM swab+ha wa bi shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+hA wa shud+d+ho haM/ zhes pas dngos po ma lus pa stong pa nyid mos pa nyid du oM shu n+ya tA dzrDha? na
119a7(rgyud 'grel): dge 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsnam? kun btung de skyabs mchis nas/ mchod 'os gzhan la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdig pa las ni ldog bgyid cing/ /bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung/ /phul rnams kun gyi bsod nams gang/ /kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bdag gi spyi gtsug ? sbyar ro/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bsdor slad du/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ?
119b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams la gsol/ /de ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang/ /bdag gis bgyis dad ma bgyid dang/ /des ni sems can thams cad kun/ /bla med byang chub sems ldan shog/ ces yan lag bdun pa bya'o/ /badzra swab+ha wa at+ma ko haM/ zhes pas byin gyis rlob po/ /de nas rnam par sad nas stong pa'i ngang las
119b2(rgyud 'grel): paM las sna tshogs pad ma sdong po lnga pa 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus kyi sdong po'i pad+ma'i lte ba la a dkar po las zla ba'i steng du/ h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkar po las 'od zer 'phros shing 'dus pa las pad+ma dkar po'i lte ba la h+ri(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i dkar po/
119b3(rgyud 'grel): yis mtshan phyogs kyi pa'o/ /de las dbu la gyes pa'o/ 'od 'phros te sems can gyi don bsgrubs rang gi sems nyid kyi ngo bo te thim pa de yongs su gyur pa las/ rang nyid 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i lha lnga'i bdag nyid du bsams te/
119b4(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi pad+ma'i sdong bu'i lte bar zla ba'i gdan la bcom ldan 'das don yod zhags pa ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba/ zhabs gnyis mnyam par bzhengs pa'i sku/ zhal gcig phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas kyi phyag bzhi na phreng ba dang zhags
119b5(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bla ma sh+ri'i thugs dam gyi thad sku la gtso bo'i pad+ma ni dkar po 'od rab mchog dpal gyi dpe la sna tshogs pad ma'o/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang/ mchog sbyin pa'o/ /g.yon gyi bla ma b+hi b+hu ta'i phyag dpal g.yon dang po na glegs baM/ gnyis pa na pad+ma dkar po'i yu ba thugs kar 'dzin pa snang ngo/ /rab mchog dpal
119b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi dpe la g.yas dang po nas rim pa bzhin mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang/ zhags pa dang 'phreng ba bsnams pa zhas pa 'dug go/ phyag bzhin/ pad+ma ma dkar po'i sdong bu dang/ po ti dang/ yal ga gsum pa'i dbyug pa dang/ spyi blugs 'dzin pa'o/ /spyan gnyis pa/
119b7(rgyud 'grel): na bza' dkar po zung gis spras pa'i stag gi lpags pas smad bkris pa/ ri dags kyi lpags pa yal ga gsum pa'i dbyug pa dang po ti dang pad+ma'i sdong bu dang/ ril pa spyi blugs bsnams 'dug go/ /se ral khar g.yon nas 'phyang ba/ ral ba'i thor tshugs
120a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'od dpag tu med pas brgyan pa zhal 'dzum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis nye bar mdzes pa 'od zer dkar po'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i sku las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sku 'khro ba/ sems
120a2(rgyud 'grel): can la thugs rje'i spyan gyis gzigs sku rten te pa'o/ /de ltar mdun gyi pad+ma la gzhon nu nor bzang ser po/ rin po che'i cod pan can/ rgyan dang na bza' sna tshogs pas nye bar mdzes pa sems can gyi don byed pa la/
120a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa dang g.yon pas ka pA li dang/ thal mo sbyar ba'o/ /g.yas kyi pad ma'i sdong bu la khro gnyer can/ zhal gcig phyag ral ba ser po bzhi ma sku mdog dmar ser/ ral pa'i cod pan la mchod rten 'dzin
120a4(rgyud 'grel): mchan lung g.yon par ka pa li bcug ste shes rab kyi pa ti lag pa gnyis po pa/ 'di zhabs g.yon pa'i sor mos g.yas pa'i sdog pa dge mdzad pa'o spyan gsum nu ma dpal can/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pa dang/ na bza' brgyan pa/ steng na phyag g.yas
120a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang/ bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis na yal ga gsum pa'i dbyug pa dang/ spyi slugs bsnams pa'o/ /brgyab kyi pad+ma'i sdong bu la rta mgrin zhal gcig phyag gnyis
120a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sku mdog dmar po me'u thung gi rnam pa can/ gsus pa che ba dbu si pal b+hi ka skra dang smra ra dmar ser gyen du 'greng pa/ spyan gsum pa mche ba brtsigs pa khro gnyer can steng na rta mgo ljang gu bteg pa/ stag
120a7(rgyud 'grel): gi lpags bas smad bkris pa/ na bza' stong g.yogs dmar po can/ 'byang ba/ steng gi cha la rdo rje phyed pas mtshan pa'i phyag g.yon dbyug pa dkar po la rten pa/ la oM tshugs su g.yas dpral bar phyag byed bzhin
120b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /g.yon gyi sdong bu la sgrol ma zhal cig phyag gnyis ma sku mdog ljang gu phyag g.yon na utpal la bsnams shing/ g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa'o/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pa dang/ na bza' dmar pos
120b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs g.yas pa'i sor mos g.yon pa'i rting pa la reg bzhin pa'o/ /de g.yon brkyang mtshon g.yogs pa/ nu ma rgyas shing lang tsho dang thugs kar bzung nas rna ba la reg bzhin pa'o/ /ldan pa'o/ /de ltar lha thams cad zla ba'i gdan can no/ /gtso bo'i pad ma dkar po/
120b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor bzhi po sna tshogs pad ma'o/ /de ltar bzhi po de rnams ni sems can gyi don la brtson pas bzhengs nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par phyogs bar bsam no/ /de ltar brtan par bsgoms te gtso bo'i khro gnyer can sgrol ma
120b4(rgyud 'grel): gsum ni zhabs mnyam par gzhengs pa'i stabs yin la/ rta mgrin dang nor bzangs zhabs g.yas pa dang g.yon sdas pa'i stangs kyi sku ba'i/ rang mchog dpe la g.yon gyi utpal de g.yas pas kha 'byed pa bzhin rang gi snying khar ba las pad ma dang zla ba'i steng du h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkar por gyur pa las ye shes
120b5(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' rang dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de'i thugs kar pad ma dang zla ba'i steng du h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gsal bar lta'o/ /mgo bo dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying ga rnams su dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ nag po'i mdog can gyi oM
120b6(rgyud 'grel): A:hUM rnams pad+ma dang zla ba la rim zhal ni phyag pad+ma dang mchog sbyin no pa bzhin bsam mo/ /de nas sa bon gyi 'od zer gyi ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ dza hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): zhes pas dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang/ dags pa dang/
120b7(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med pa dang/ dbang du bya'o/ /yang rigs lnga spyan drangs nges sdang bzhin mchod de dbang bskur bar gsol ba btab pas lha mo bzhis dbang bskur te/ de nas sa bon las 'od 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad la phog pas/ 'phags pa don
121a1(rgyud 'grel): yong zhags pa'i skur gyur slar sa bon de nyid la 'dus par yang dang yang du bsam mo/ /de nas man ngag bzhin du sngags bzlas te/ oM a mo g+ha ba sha h+ri(rgyud 'grel): swAhA /nye ba'i snying po'o/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): h+ri 'o/
121a2(rgyud 'grel): kra bi dza ya a mo g+ha pra sha a pra ti h+ra ta h+ri:ha:hUM phaT swAhA/ snying po'o/ /de ltar gzungs kyang bzlas so/ /oM su b+ha d+ha na ku mA spro bsdu? byed? cing gtso bo'i phyed sgrol ma bzhi so ma bcu cha bzlas gsungs/ de ye swAhA/ oM b+h+ri btri ku Ta ye swAhA/ oM
121a3(rgyud 'grel): d+ha h+ra ya gri pa yA hUM phaT swAhA/ oM taM tA re tuda tA re tu re swAhA/ zhes so/ /ldang bar 'dod na mchod pa dang gtor ma dang maN+Dal phul te gsol ba btab la/ bsod nams yongs su bsngo te/ ye shes sems dpa' gshegs pa dang
121a4(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid la bsdus te spyod lam bya'o/ /de ltar nyin re bzhin du thun re bzhi la sogs pa'i nges pas/ nye ba'i snying po 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug gam/ snying po'i 'bum phrag bcu drug ma/ gzungs kyi sngags 'bum phra gcig
121a5(rgyud 'grel): bzlas par bya'o/ /nges ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nye bar bsgrub pa ni/ dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes bdun dang/ brgyad dang/ dgu'i zhag la sbyor ba dang/ dngos gzhi dang/ rjes kyi tshogs brgyad kyi
121a6(rgyud 'grel): zhag la za gcig pa'am snyung bar gnas par sgrub par bya'o/ /sgrub pa gnyis las dang po/ sgrub pa chen po'i sgo nas bcom ldan das mnyes par 'dod na yang/ dkyil 'khor nye bar bsgrub pa dang/ bum pa lnga nye bar bsgrubs
121a7(rgyud 'grel): te/ mchod pa dang gtor ma sngon du 'gro bas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad nas brtsams te/ rig pa stong phrag brgyad bar ma chad par gdon par bya'o/ /las kyi gsum las bya'o?/ cho ga thams cad bsgrub thabs bzhin ma nu
121b1(rgyud 'grel): dag bzhin du bsgrub bo/ /de ltar tshogs pa tshang bas bsgrubs na mtshams med pa lnga byas pas kyang tshe 'di la mngon du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs kha che'i paN Ti ta chen po sa'i steng na 'gan
121b2(rgyud 'grel): gzhud nas gsungs pa zla dang bral ba/ shAkya sh+rI b+ha tra sa mdzod la rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs na dza ka ta ta li'i paN tri ta dpal b+hi bu ta tsan+t+ra dang/ blo be lots+tsha ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bsgyur
121b3(rgyud 'grel): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /sa steng na 'gran zla dang bral ba'i paN tri ta chen po kha che'i shAkya sh+rI b+ha tra ces pa de/ rdo rje gdan na bzhugs pa'i tshe sku khams bag com ma bde nas dbying zla 'bring po'i tshes brgyad la gso/
121b4(rgyud 'grel): sbyong? la gnas pa dang/ nam gyi brgyad cha tsam lus pa na gzims nas bzhugs pa'o tshe/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa 'khor dang bcas pa gzims nas bzhugs pa zhal mngon sum du gzigs nas/ bzhengs pa dang de
121b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs par zhal bstan te/ sku khams kyang dangS nas sgrub thabs 'di mdzad do/ /des b+hi bu ti tsan+ta la/ des blo bo lots+tsha pa/ des sras blo gros bzang po/ nges slob dpon a mo g+ha la// dge'o// */ /rgya gar skad du Arya
121b6(rgyud 'grel): a no g+ha pa sha swa d+ha naM?/ bod skad du/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re shig tho rangs langs te/ khrus byas nas gso sbyong blangs te/ /?
121b7(rgyud 'grel): bug? pa dang tsan dan gyi chus gtor zhing/ gos gtsang ma bgos te rten bshams pa dang kha shar du ltas te stan bde ba la 'dug go /de nas sems can thams cad la brtse bas bskyed de/ rang gi snying gar paM las pad ma dang/
122a1(rgyud 'grel): a las zla ba'i steng du h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig dkar po las 'od 'phros pas/ bla ma dang 'phags pa don yod zhags pa dang/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs la/ phyag 'tshal ba dang bdun po rnam par dag
122a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bya'o/ /de nas tshad med pa bzhi sgom ste/ snying kha'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis snod bcud thams cad bsdus te stong? pa nyid du dmigs la/ oM swa b+ha wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+honyahaM/ zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab po/ /de'i
122a3(rgyud 'grel): rjes la paM ljang khu las sna tshogs pad ma'o/ /de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /de'i steng du sa bon h+ri:yig go /de las 'od 'phros bsdus pa las/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa bsgom ste/ zla ba ltar dkar ba/ zhal
122a4(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag brgyad pa/ zhabs gnyis mnyam po'i stangs kyis sku bzhengs pa/ sbyan gnyis pa/ dar dkar po'i na bza' 'chad ba/ ri dags kyi lpags pa sku'i g.yon du se ral khar 'chang ba/ stags lpags kyi sham thabs bkris
122a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ ral pa'i thar tshugs can/ dbul me tog gi phreng ba can/ zhal 'dzum pa/ rgyan med pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na phreng ba/ gnyis pa na zhags pa/ gsum pa na mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ bzhi pa na mchog sbyin pa'o/ /
122a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yon gyi dang po na shes rab kyi po ti/ gnyis pa na rna ba la reg pa'i pad+ma dkar po'i sdong bu thugs kar bzung ba/ gsum pa na yal ga gsum pa'i dbyug pa/ bzhi pa na ril pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /snying gar
122a7(rgyud 'grel): pad ma dang zla ba'i steng du sa bon h+ri:dkar po lta'o/ /de'i 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa lta bus ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dza:hUM baM ho:zhes pa la sogs pas dgug pa la sogs pa bya'o/ /spyan ma la
122b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pas dbang bskur te/ ral pa'i thor tshugs la brten par 'od dpag tu med par cod pan du bsam mo/ /mgo po dang/ mgrin pa dang/ snying gar pad+ma dang zla ba la/ oM A:hUM gi yi ge dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ sngon
122b2(rgyud 'grel): po dgod do/ /de la spro ba dang bsdu ba'i tshul gyis mi skyo'i bar du sgom mo/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha h+ri:swAhA zhes man ngag bzhin du bzlas so/ /bzlas pa zin nas/ oM a ka ro mu khaM zhes pa la sogs pas gtor ma bya'o/ /
122b3(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal dbul/ mchod pa bya/ gsol ba gdab/ bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba bya'o/ /'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal b+hi bu ti tsan+t+ra'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so// //
122b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dpal b+hi bu ti tsa n+t+ra'i zhal snga nas/ blo bo lots+tsha ba dge slong shes rab rin chen gyis bal yul thang gi b+hi har gyi gtsug lag khang du zhus te legs par
122b5(rgyud 'grel): gnang ngo// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya a mo g+ha pA sha sAd+ha naM/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs/ 'phags pa don yod zhags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por yid dang mthun pa'i gnas
122b6(rgyud 'grel): su/ stan bde ba la 'dug ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don du blo skyed la/ rang gi snying gar paM las pad ma/ de'i steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du yi ge h+ri dkar po/ de'i 'od kyis lha'i 'khor lo dang/ bla
122b7(rgyud 'grel): ma spyan drangs te/ mdun du bzhugs su gsol la/ mchod te sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa dang/ byams pa la sogs pa sgom par bya'o/ /de nas swa b+ha wa'i sngags kyis stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas nam mkha' i
123a1(rgyud 'grel): dbus su bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom ste/ de'i nang du gzhal yas khang gi dbus su baM yongs su gyur pa las pad ma a yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h+ri:dkar po yongs su gyur pa
123a2(rgyud 'grel): las spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa/ g.yon pa dang g.yas pa na pad+ma dang mchog sbyin no /mdog ni gser gyi mdog lta bu'o/ /shar phyogs su paM dmar po las pad ma'i steng du zla ba la/ ha:yongs su
123a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa las don yod zhags pa dmar po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi dang po na zhags pa gnyis pa na rdo rje/ g.yon gyi dang po na lcags kyu gnyis pa na bgrang 'phreng ngo/ /lho phyogs su baM dmar po las pad ma'i steng du nyi ma la hUM
123a4(rgyud 'grel): yongs su gyur pa las rta mgin zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas na dbyug pa dang sdigs mdzub bsnams pa/ g.yon na 'khor lo dang pad+ma 'chang ba'o/ nub phyogs su paM nag po las pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma las pha nag po yongs su gyur pa
123a5(rgyud 'grel): las ral gcig ma/ nag po stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can/ khro mo'i zhal mche ba brtsigs pa'i gdong can/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas na ral gri dang/ zhags pa dang/ pad+ma dang/ mda' bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa na 'khor lo dang/
123a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyug pa dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/ gzhu bsnams pa'o/ /byang phyogs su paM dkar po yongs su gyur pa las pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la Ta skya bo las khro gnyer can zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ g.yas kyi phyag na dbyug pa dang/ pad ma
123a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa na phreng ba dang spyi blugs bsnams pa'o/ /mdog skya bo'o/ /rten dang sa bon dang mtshan ma dang/ phyag dang zhal la sogs pa lha lnga'i bdag nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das skad cig gis blta bar bya'o/ /de nas
123b1(rgyud 'grel): snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od kyis ye shes kyi 'khor lo bkug? cing gzhug pa la sogs pa dang/ de nas sa bon gyi 'od kyis 'khor lo bkug ste/ dbang bskur cing rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan par bya'o/ /phyis ni spo ba dang
123b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdu ba byas te/ ro gcig tu gyur pas bcom ldan 'das don dam par bsgom par bya'o/ /de ltar mi nus na de'i rjes la ngag gis zlas pa'i sngags ni/ na ma:sa man ta b+hu d+ha nAM/ sarba tA thA ga tA a wa lo ki te/ kA ru Na ma ya mur ta
123b3(rgyud 'grel): ya/ hUM dza:swAhA/ dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'o/ /a'oM h+rI:trai lokya bi dza ya a mo g+ha pA shA a pra ti ha Da h+ri:ha:hUM phaT swAhA/ de bzhin du don yod zhags pa'i snying po'o/ /na ma:sa man ta bud d+ha naM haM khA da b+hu na dza satwa ya swAhA
123b4(rgyud 'grel): rta mgrin gyi snying po'o/ /oM e ka dza Ti mahA ro Sha Ni tra sa ya sa ma sa ma pra sa ma na hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ ral gcig ma'i snying pho'o/ /na ma:sa man ta bu d+ha naM/ sarba b+ha wa saN Da ra Ni hUM phaT pA ta ya swAhA/ khro gnyer can gyi snying po zhes
123b5(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /de nas lha'i sku la dmigs la bzlas pa bya'o/ /ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol te/ ji lta bde bar gnas so/ /mkhas pa gnyis med kyi rnal 'byor gyis las thams cad byas na myur du dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur
123b6(rgyud 'grel): ro/ /bsgrub thabs yang dag bsdus pa las/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob pa/ /de yis sems can thams cad kun/ /don yod zhags pa thob par shog /don yod zhags pa'i sgrub thabs/ /don yod zhags pa'i mdo las
123b7(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa/ slob dpon lhan cig skyes pa'i rol pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po don yod rdo rje dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba dge slong ba ris bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //
124a1(rgyud 'grel): la sarba Na lha lnga'i sgrub thabs pad+ma ka ras mdzad pa bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI kha sarba Na lo ka nA tha sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal 'jig rten mgon po mkha' la spyod pa'i sgrub thabs shes bya ba/ 'jig rten mgon
124a2(rgyud 'grel): po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan mngon 'dod 'bras bu ster ba'i gzi ldang dpag bsam rkang 'thung ni/ /bde bar gshegs rnams bzhad pa'i don chen bzod mdzad deng dpon chen po ste/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam pa'i dngos gyur dngos
124a3(rgyud 'grel): po kun gyi ngo bo nyid/ /phyag na pad+ma de yis 'gro ba'i sdig pa zhi bar mdzad du gsol/ /skye bos dben pa'i gnas dag tu/ /sngar langs kha sogs dag byas nas/ /'jam pa'i stan la yang dag gnas/ /snying gar zla rgyas 'od gsal
124a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i/ /steng du rang gi sa bon bsam/ /snying ga'i zla 'od kyis sa bon/ /yongs bskul de yi 'od zer gyis/ /khar sa pa Na mgon dpal ldan/ /bla ma sangs rgyas de sras tshogs/ /mdun gyi nam mkhar spyan drangs la/ /sa bon de dag
124a5(rgyud 'grel): las byung ba'i/ /sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyis mchod/ /de nas mngon par phyag byas nas/ /sdig pa gshags pa la sogs bya/ /thog med 'khor bar gang zhig rnal 'byor tshe/ /bdag gis mi dge bgyis dang bgyid stsal ba'i//
124a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyis bgyis la rjes su yi rang ba/ /thams cad bcom ldan rnams kyi spyan sngar bshags/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang rgyal sras 'phags rnams dang/ /gzhan dag gis kyang dge ba gang bgyis la/ /rjes su yi rang de dag ma
124a7(rgyud 'grel): lus pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni yongs su bsngo/ /snying rje dam pa las 'khrungs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams la skyabs su mchi/ /chos kun ro gcig rang bzhin can/ /gos pa med pa'i gos dag dang/ /rab dga' la sogs par
124b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i/ /byang sems rnams la'ang de bzhin no/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan 'da' bzhed gyur pa rnams/ /gzhan la phan phyir yun du bzhugs par gsol/ /sgrib pa thams cad dpyis 'byin gyur pa yi/ /rgyur gyur byang chub sems ni
124b2(rgyud 'grel): bskyed bgyi? zhing/ /bde gshegs rnam dag lam gyi dgongs pa rnams/ /rtag par yang dag kun nas bsten par bgyi/ /de nas rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /gcig dang du ma rnam bral stod pa nyid du rnam bsam bya/ /oM shU
124b3(rgyud 'grel): n+ya tA dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa at+ma konyhaM/ zhes bya bas stong pa nyid lhag par gnas par bya'o/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o/ /zhes lhag par gnas pa de ltar bdag nyid la'ang kun tu bltas nas/
124b4(rgyud 'grel): oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha:sarba d+harmA:swa b+ha wa shud+d+honyahaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas sgom pa pos sngon gyi smon lam gyi yang dag par bskul ba'i rnam par shes pa tsam gyi baM yig yongs su gyur pa las kha dog sna tshogs pa'i
124b5(rgyud 'grel): pad ma'i/ oM yag? las skyes pa'i dri ma med pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa/ de'i steng du h+rI:yig 'phros pa'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' i khyon yang dag par gsal ba bsam par bya zhing/ de yongs su gyur pa
124b6(rgyud 'grel): las pad+ma'i snying por rang gi sa bon 'od zer gyi phreng bas brgyan pa blta bar bya'o/ /de nas 'di dag yongs su gyur pa las bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das su bsam par bya ste/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od ltar dkar ba'i sku
124b7(rgyud 'grel): can/ ral ba bcings pa las dbu rgyan dang/ spyi gtsug tu 'od dpag med bkod pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma ma dang zla ba la skyil krungs phyed pas bzhugs pa/ sku la mchog gi brgyan dang ldan zhing zhal 'dzum pa/ brgyad
125a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis lon pa'i lang tsho can/ /phyag g.yas mchog sbyin dang/ g.yon pa sdong bu dang bcas pa'i pad ma 'dzin pa/ de'i 'og tu mdog lhag par nag pa'i ri dags gdong pa gyen du phyogs shing kha gdangs pa/
125a2(rgyud 'grel): gre ba khab kyi mig can bsus pa che gshin tu rid pa rnams/ phyag nas bdud rtsi'i rgyun sim par 'bab par mthong bas tshim par mdzad pa/ snying rjes brlan pa'i dpal dang ldan zhing gru 'dzin gyi ri bo'i spo la bzhugs pa/ lhag
125a3(rgyud 'grel): par zhi bas rnam par gzigs pa can/ sgegs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /de'i mdun du sgrol ma dang/ g.yas logs su gzhon nu nor bzangs po/ de la sgrol ma ljang khu phyag g.yon
125a4(rgyud 'grel): pas sdong bu dang bcas pa'i utpal 'dzin cing/ g.yas pas kha 'byed pa'i tshul can/ sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ lang tsho gzhon zhing nu 'bur rgyas pa'o/ /gzhon nu nor bzang gser gyi mdog can/ thal mo sbyar ba/
125a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu'i gzugs 'chang zhing mchan khung g.yon du glags bam bcug pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /rgyab tu khro gnyer can dang/ g.yon du rta mgrin te/ de la khro gnyer can ser mo/ phyag bzhi ma/ ral pa'i cha shas
125a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa/ g.yon pas dbyug gu gsum pa dang spyi blugs/ g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang/ bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ spyan gsum dang ldan pa'o/ /rta mgrin mdog dmar po thung zhing bsus pa 'phyang ba/ skra dmar
125a7(rgyud 'grel): ser gyen du 'bar ba/ sprul gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ldan pa/ bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor la sma ra dmar ser gyis spras pa/ spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum pa/ khro gnyer dang smin ma 'khyogs pa/ stag gi lpags pa'i sham
125b1(rgyud 'grel): thabs 'chad ba/ g.yon pas dbyug pa'i mtshon cha dang/ g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul can te/ 'di dag thams cad rang gi gtso bo la ji ltar mdzes pa'i mig dag gis blta zhing 'dug ba/ rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de nas rang
125b2(rgyud 'grel): gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng h+rI(rgyud 'grel): yig bsams la/ de las rnam pa sna tshogs ba'i 'od zer 'phros pas/ khams gsum po yongs su gang zhing sems can thams cad 'jig rten dbang phyug gi go 'phang la rab tu
125b3(rgyud 'grel): bkod nas/ slar yang 'od zer de/ sa bon gyi yi ge de la gzhug par bya'o/ /phyi nas 'od zer de nyid kyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ dam tshig sems dpa' dang chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa ltar gcig tu gyur pa'i skur
125b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam? par bya'o/ /de nas lus ngag yid gsum rnam par dag par bya ste/ rim pa ji lta bar spyi bor oM yig dkar po dang/ mgrin par A:yig dmar po dang/ thugs kar hUM yig sngon po rnams bsams la/ 'di rnams
125b5(rgyud 'grel): las mdza' yas pa'i 'od zer gyi dra brtag tu 'phros pas/ sems can gyi phung po thams cad kyi sdig pa'i tshogs gzhom par bya'o zhes nus pa ji lta bas gsal bar bsgoms par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor brtson ldan sgom pa
125b6(rgyud 'grel): pos/ sgrib pa rab spongs shes rab dang/ skal bzang nad med phun sum tshogs/ mngon du byed pa 'thob par 'gyur/ bsgom pas dub na sems rtse gcig pas bzlas ba bya ste/ de la sngags ni 'di'o/ /oM h+rI:swAhA/ 'di
125b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams ston ka'i rgyu dkar dri ma med pa'i phreng ba lta bu'i kha dog dang 'od kyi snang ba can las/ 'od zer du ma 'phro bas bzlas par bya'o/ /dub par gyur na bsod nams yongs su bsngo zhing/ langs la ji ltar bde bar lha'i nga rgyal
126a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis gnas par bya'o/ /dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug gi /yid 'ong bsgrub thabs bgyis pa yis/ /bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des/ 'gro kun de yi go 'phan gyur/ /dpal 'jig rten mgon po kha sarba?
126a2(rgyud 'grel): Na'i sgrub thabs shes bya ba grub chen pad ma 'byung gnas zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so/ //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po sh+rI ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas dang/ chos 'khor lots+tsha bas bsgyur ba las/ slad kyi btsun
126a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rgya mtshos dag bar bcos shing gtan la phab pa'o// // */ /'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ lo ki shwa ra sto tra ratna mA lA/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten dbang
126a4(rgyud 'grel): phyug gi bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba/ dpal ldan 'jig rten mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dri med thugs ni stong dang snying rjes brlan/ /lam mkhyen nyid dang thams cad mkhyen nyid la sogs don dang tshig gsal
126a5(rgyud 'grel): bar 'doms pas yongs su rdzogs shing rnam par dag pa'i sku/ /ye shes lhag pa'i bdag pos rol par mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/ /gdul bya'i dbye ba'i dbang las rnam pa mang por snang ba yis/ /gcig kyang chu snod rnams su gnas
126a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ri bong can mtshungs las/ /khyod ni gsal bar gzhan la phan pa'i rjes su song nyid phyir/ /e ma'o rdzu 'phrul shin tu rmad du rmad du byung ba'i sku ni rigs pa lags/ /mu stegs skye bo gdul zhing rab tu rtogs par bya don du/ /
126a7(rgyud 'grel): yongs rdzogs zla ba'i zhal gyi rnam par sgeg pa'i dpral ba yi/ /gnas las dbang phyug chen po lha yi bu ni nges phyung bas/ /lha dang chen po'i mi yi shin tu lha dang dbang phyug khyod/ /pad ma'i skye ba pa rnams gdul zhing khong du
126b1(rgyud 'grel): chud don du/ /khyod kyi phrag pa legs rgyas chen po'i dge ba'i mtshan nyid las/ /mes po lha yis sras po nges par byung ba nyid kyis ni/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang phyug mchog la mgo bos phyag bgyi'o/ /skye bo khyab 'jug pa rnams? gdul?
126b2(rgyud 'grel): dang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /mi bu yang phyag na pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thugs ka las/ /nges phyung 'di ni srid pa'i dbang phyug nyid de de'i slad du/ /khyod ni skyes bu rnams kyi mcho ga las/ mchod nyid gzhan yod min/ /nyi zlar bus? bcas rim gro bsnyen
126b3(rgyud 'grel): bskur stobs stob? rnams la ni/ /yang dag bstan phyr mthon mthing mdzes pa'i spyan ni gang dag las/ /ri pong spyan dang bla ma nges phyungs la mig rnams kyi/ /nang gi mun nag 'joms pa de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal mor rim gro bsnyen
126b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur sbyod pa po rnams gdul ba dang/ /rtogs phyir 'dir ni nges par bcom ldan ma ste dbyangs can 'di/ /rgyal pa'i sras po khyod kyi mche ba'i rtse las rab phyung bas/ /mngon 'dod shes rab 'bras bu ster ba la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /rlung gi skyel
126b5(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams gdul dang mi bzad lam grub phyir/ /de nas 'jig rten mgon po'i zhal gang zhig las nges phyung 'di/ /rlung lha mchog gi bla ma sa la skye ba pa rnams kyi/ /spyod lam rnam bzhi'i 'bras bu ster ba de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /chu
126b6(rgyud 'grel): lha pa rnams gdul dang zhi ba'i lam 'dod ldan rnams kyi/ /yang dag khong du chud phyir bde gshegs sras po'i lte ba las/ /yang dag phyung ba chu lha'i gtso po yang ste myur ba ru/ /'dod dga' i dbang phyug nyid kyi 'bras bu ster la rtag
126b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /mthun pa'i 'bras bu la sogs mngon par 'dod rnams nges gdul zhing/ /yang dag grub phyir rab mchog mtshan ldan zhabs kyi pad+ma las/ gang zhig nges par phyung ba bcom ldan nor 'dzin mar grags pa//
127a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po mnyam med de la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod ni srid las grol kyang de la yang dag gnas pa ni/ /sems can tshogs la snying brtse nyid las srid pa'i spyod tshul gyis/ /srid
127a2(rgyud 'grel): mdza' i bar du brtan pa bdag ni rtag gnas gyur snyam du/ /dam pa'i bsam pa chen po'i mchog gyur khyod la phyag bgyi'o/ /nam mkha' i phar du snang ba'i 'jig rten khams rnams khyod nyid kyis/ /rang gi zhabs gcig mthil gyis kyang ni
127a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par gnon pa ste/ /bskal pa'i mdza' ru srid pas rten par 'bar ba drag po'i me/ /khyod kyis dbugs kyi rlung gi stobs kyis nges par bcil bar gyur/ /rang gi 'dzub mo gyen? du gtod de 'dzin pa'i sdigs 'dzub kyis/ /lhun
127a4(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshogs rnams du ma g.yo bar gyur cing sen mo yi/ /spubs kyis gyen du 'dzin pas rgya mtsho'i chu yang lus ma gyur/ /e ma'o 'di lha'i nus pa khyod las gzhan du ci zhig mthong/ /mchog tu mnyen zhing zla ba gzhon nu'i
127a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa yang dag par/ /ston pa'i sku mchog 'di yang lang tshom yaM yin nam ci/ /'jigs byed drag po gnon las mi lhongs ci yang dub pa dang/ /gdul bar dka' ba'i bdud 'joms pa ni khyod kyi spyod tshul lags/ /kye lags
127a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar chen po'i skye bo'i ral phreng dang mtshungs par/ /rang gi dbu skyes mdzes pa'i lan bu 'khyog po de/ /de nyid me yis nyon mongs bdud shing spar bar byas pa yi/ /du ba'i phreng ba lta bu dri med khyod la snang bar gyur/ /
127a7(rgyud 'grel): zla zer cung zad 'phros pa yis ni phyogs bcur khyob khyod kyis/ /nag po'i phyogs zad chung du'i cha bcas 'od kyis mdzes pa ni/ /srid pa rnams su 'dod pa gang myur ri bong can gang de/ /cung zad las ni ma lus bsam pa rnam par mdzes//
127b1(rgyud 'grel): mthun par sgros pa'i ngan ba'i lam can lugs 'joms shing/ /mi dang mi min bsam pa rton la lam dang lam/ /yang dag thob byed gzhan don spyod tshul mchog gis ni/ /mdzes ldan rgyal pa sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/ /
127b2(rgyud 'grel): mya ngan 'das dang srid mi gnas kyang khyod gnas pa/ /'od gsal rang byin rlab ste sbyor dang phan pa po/ /ma lus skye bo'i mi dge mi mdzad dge ba yis/ /mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/ /rigs
127b3(rgyud 'grel): par dpag med 'od zer phreng bas yang dag bskor/ /de las bde skyed mtsho skyes rang gi phyag gis 'dzin/ /rjes mthun dga' ba thob pa yang dag dga' bde yis/ /mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag bgyi'o/
127b4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings las kun mchog snying rje rang nyid gtso/ /gang zhig dge ba la sogs tshogs rnams yang dag rdzogs/ /rnam par rtog spangs mthu las sgra yis ston pa po/ /mdzes ldan rgyal ba sa yi dbang phyug la phyag
127b5(rgyud 'grel): bgyi'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang nyid min gnyis med kun dga' brgyas/ /yongs su gang bar mdzad pa brgya phrag chos kyi gtam/ /'thad ldan mchog tu bden zhing rigs par gsungs pa yi/ /'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po mchog
127b6(rgyud 'grel): la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mi mchog de yi rang gi sku ni 'gro la rab 'phro ba/ /mtsho skyes spyan gyis shin tu mdzes par gyur pa yi/ /ma lus sems can rnams kyi myur ba'i thar mchog gi /'dzin ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po dam
127b7(rgyud 'grel): par bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mchog tu sprul dang longs spyod rdzogs pa gzhan don dgyes/ /stong nyid gos med chos 'dzin pa la dgyes pa can/ /grub pa dam pa rnams da 'dzin ma'i dbang po ste/ /nor 'dzin dbang phyug rgyal
128a1(rgyud 'grel): po mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /mchog tu lhan skyes dam pa'i rgya mtshor zla zhal gyi/ /sgo las thams cad gsung ba ma lus ngag tshig ni/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i mtshan nyid rjes mthun rgyan gyis phul/ /
128a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug 'dzin ma'i rgyal po dam par phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bstod par ni chen phreng ba ni/ /dpal ldan nags kyi rin chen zhabs kyis bgyis pa las/ /de yi gtsang ma'i dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa/ /de nyid
128a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni 'jig rten kun du bzang por gyur/ /bstod pa rin po che'i phreng ba 'di ni rdzogs so// //rgya gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di ta chen po nags kyi rin po che'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o/ /mkhas pa chen po de
128a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis spyan sngar/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sde zhes bya bas bal yul ye rang gi grong khyer chen bo'i 'dabs dpal go pi tsan+d+ra'i gtsug lag khang chen por bsgyur ba'o// //sems kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba dri ma med pa'i lung chen po bzhugs so// //
128a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ satwa mu dra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sems dpa' i phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dang slob dpon gyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal nas/ man ngag mdo tsam bshad bar bya/ dpa' 
128a6(rgyud 'grel): bo 'jig rten dbang phyug gis/ /nam zhig tshe na bdag la gsungs/ /'du byed ston ka'i sprin dang mtshungs/ /dam pa'i skye bo 'byung ba'ang med/ /'gro 'di sdug bsngal rnam par 'khor/ /de bas sgrub la gzhol par bya/ bag chags
128a7(rgyud 'grel): srid dang sgrib pa dang/ /shes pa 'bras du gnyis dbye bas/ /rim pa gnyis ka'ang ma bslabs 'di/ /thams cad du ni thams cad 'khrul/ /sdig pa bkrus shing byin rlabs pa/ /dad dang snying rje dam tshig ldan/ /zab mo lhag par dga' 
128b1(rgyud 'grel): ba yis/ /nags ba dab ri bo chu gling du/ /'dod dang bsam gtan rkun po dang/ /ca co kun tu rtog bral bas?/ /tshangs dang rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug /'chi bstod pa nyid du brtag /sgra dang khang pa yid 'ong par/ /zla ba rdo rje sogs sbyor bas/ /rdo rje
128b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa khu bar gyur/ /yi ge rdo rje'i rnam pa las/ /mi bskyod dbang phyug skye ba'i gzugs/ /skye mched rdo rje gsum dbu rgyan/ /'di la lha mo 'dod ma sgrub/ /de nas yang ni spro bya ste/ /rdo rje sogs la sbyar bar bya/ /'di ni rim pa dang po'o//
128b3(rgyud 'grel): khu khrag rlung ni skye dang gnas/ /'gag pa kun yang byed pa ste/ /'jig rten dbang phyug zhes pa'ang yod mod dkyis dag gsungs lus kyi bde sdug kyan 'diyin/ /rtag tu snying gi dbus na gnas/ /lus dang sems las ngag 'gyur ba/ /'di ni tshangs pa'i slo ba yin//
128b4(rgyud 'grel): sems bcas lus kyi thig le ni/ /rdul dang rlung gis rab tu g.yo/ /rlung rnams gang nas g.yo ba ni/ /'dod chags 'phro byed lte ba na/ /mi brtan gzhan yang stong pa la/ /'od zer lnga ni rab tu gnas/ /shin tu phra zhing ches g.yo ba/ /
128b5(rgyud 'grel): brtan dang g.yo ba las grol zhing/ /bde ba ma yin sdug bsngal min/ /nam mkha' i thig le sems tsam mo/ /rab tu phra ba'i khams gsum po/ /rang rig tha mal dbang po med/ /yod pa med cing med pa med/ /bde ba'i ye shes bzhi pa yin/ /
128b6(rgyud 'grel): rdul dag 'gags pa lha yi sku/ /lus yin 'di ni lus ma yin/ /'gro dang 'od pa 'gro 'od med/ /sangs rgyas gsung de gsung ma yin/ /rags dang phrab 'di dag ni/ /thig le bzhi zhes brjod par bya/ /ngag sems 'gro dang 'dab can/ /de la
128b7(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi de nyid ldan/ /thim pa rdo rje gsum sngags te/ /gzhan du nam yang yod pa yin/ /lus ni rnam par 'gags byur pa'i/ /dag ni yongs su dag pa na/ /rlung dag thim pa rim bzhin gyis/ /sems ni stong pa nyid la 'jug /rags
129a1(rgyud 'grel): pa med? cing phra ba'ang med/ /shin tu phra? ba'i lus la sogs/ /bud med sgyu mas rab bsgrub bya/ /de ru lus dag yid kyi sems/ /rdo rje bu mo'i spyod bas shes /de nas phyag rgya chen por 'gyur/ /'di yi sgrub
129a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rab bsgrub pa /da ni de nas shes par bya/ /rmo? sha can gyi bdag nyid che'i/ /bu mo utpal mthir ga'i mdog /lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa'am/ /yang na nyi shu lnga lon rnyed/ /bzhin sdug mgo ni dkyus ring ba/ /rab tu bzang
129a3(rgyud 'grel): la legs par sbyangs/ /cho ga bzhin du byin rlabs nas/ /lar par bzhag ste rab tu bsgom/ /'byung dang tsum+ba la lar glu bar mkhan gyi bdag nyid che/ ? u pa dang mar ba'i mdog /ces ?  'byung gsum? 'on kyang dkyus dag pa 'dra'o/ rjes chags pas/ /'dod pa lnga dag sbyar
129a4(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /dga' dang bde ba'i sbyor ba 'dis/ /lus ngag yid ni snying gar brtag /reg pa bsnyen pa zhas su brjod/ /nye bar bsgrub pa mnyam sbyor ba/ /nor bur rdul ni rgyas pa las/ /'dod chags chen po ye shes mthong/ /lus ni
129a5(rgyud 'grel): ngag la thim par 'gyur/ /bsgrub pa'i dam thig le tshig rlung sems? bsrubs pa yis /dag ni sems la rab tu 'jug /thig le rlung gi sbyor bcas pa /yi ge gsum gyi tshul gyis 'bab/ /rmongs pas lhung ba nyid gyur na/ /
129a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' 'am chos kyang rung/ /tshal par 'gas par gdon mi za/ /me long la ni dbugs kyi tshogs/ /thim pa'i sbyor ba ji lta ba/ /yang na srog dang rtsol ba yis/ /bde ba mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub/ /dang po la ni
129a7(rgyud 'grel): bsgrod ba dang/ /gzhan du dbang dang bdag por 'gyur/ /lha dang yi dags nor sbyin dang/ /rig 'dzin lha min bu mo 'am/ /ma sogs cho ga'i sbyor yang rung/ /byol song las kyang rab tu brtag /thig le mnyam par sbyor
129b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ sgrub pa chen po'i yan lag ste/ /'khor lo gsang gsum ye shes mthong/ /de nas lhan cig skyes par 'gyur/ /gang la lus gnas zla tshes dang/ /'gro ba rgyal mdzad thig le dang/ /don dam ye shes bsgom pa ste/ /
129b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub byed 'di ni rig par byos/ /thig le spro dang bsdu ba ni/ /sems kyi rgyud ni dri med byed/ /steng gi sbyor ba rnam lnga po/ /rlung dang/ /gzhi lus dbyangs yig /sems can sangs rgyas thig le bsam gtan ril gzhig dang/ /bde ba'i
129b3(rgyud 'grel): sgyu ma ye shes lha ru 'gyur/ /dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje gsum/ /sku gsum rdo rje rab tu sgrub/ /de dag yan lag rnam pa bzhi /bsnyen pa'i ye shes chen po'o/ /yan lag drug gi sbyor ba yis/ /mchog gi sgrub pa
129b4(rgyud 'grel): brtsam par bya/ /rnam pa gzhan du bsgrubs na ni/ /bskal pa gsum gyi yun duAng min/ /so sor bsdud dang bsam gtan dang/ /srog rtsol 'dzin pa rjes su dran/ /ting 'dzin yan lag drug tu brjod/ /dbang po bcu po
129b5(rgyud 'grel): rang gnas dang/ /thig le la yang rnam par sdud/ /'dod yon lnga po lhar sbyor bas/ /bde ba'i ye shes bsam gtan yin/ /ye shes yan lag dang po ste/ /longs spyod gnyis pa yin par brjod/ /rang bzhin shes dang
129b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba dang/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang gnyis med pa/ /lnga dang ldan pa'o srog stsol ni/ /dbang po ye shes rnam zhi ba/ /bde ba yi yang rlung dag pa/ /dang sa ma lnga yi gong bu ni/ /lte ba'i sna rtse rnams su bsgom/ /rin chen
129b7(rgyud 'grel): rlung du rab tu brjod/ /rang sngags kha sbyor lte ba la/ /phra mo srog gi thig le bzhag /rnam gsum rin chen rab zhugs pas/ /bde ba'i ye shes 'dzin par brjod/ /byang chub rdo rje 'di nyid la/ /mtshan ma mkha' snang lnga ru 'gyur/ /
130a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer du ba mkha' snang dang/ /sgron ma dri med mkha' rnam lnga/ /thig le spro dang bsdu ba yis/ /bde ba bla med gzugs su 'gyur/ /rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje chos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rigs khro bo/ /thigs
130a2(rgyud 'grel): pas mchod dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /sku gsung thugs dang sems can dang/ /rdo rje gsum dang dam tshig dang/ /shes rab dam tshig ma skyes pa/ /zhe sdang rigs rnams rjes su dran/ /'di las so sor snang ba skye/ /snyoms 'jug
130a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor bas dngos rnams kun/ /gong bu'i dbus su gzugs rnams brtag /yud kyis ye shes rdzogs byed pa/ /ting nge 'dzin zhes bya bar brjod/ /de ltar yan lag drug gis ni/ /dngos grub mchog la sbyar bar bya/ /rnal 'byor drug
130a4(rgyud 'grel): po 'di dag ni/ /byang chub rdo rjes bshad pa yin/ /thig le rnam bzhi g.yo ba las/ /'di ltar ye shes rnam pa bzhi/ /rlung rnams gang la thim pa ni/ /ting 'dzin gyi dbye ba'o/ /snang ba la ni spro ba dang/ /mi snang bsdu ba zhes su brjod/ /
130a5(rgyud 'grel): rang dang gzhan gyi dngos po la/ /de bzhin spro dang bsdu ba'o/ /bde dang gdung ba stong pa dang/ /rnam shes ye shes rnam bzhi'o/ /'dod dang dga' ba g.yo dang g.yo/ /gang ba dga' ba 'char ba dang/ /nub pa med dang yang chags bral/
130a6(rgyud 'grel): sems med thig le oTTa dang/ /rang byung gnyid spur sgra zhes pa/ /snang ba lhag par snang ba dang/ /mi snang thog ma lhan skyes te/ /skad cig nyi shu zhes bya'o/ /skad cig thams cad las 'das pa'i/ /dga' ba don dam mngon byang chub
130a7(rgyud 'grel): gang dag rang bzhin lhan cig skyes/ kun tu 'go zhing kun tu zhi/ /rang las rtag tu 'ongs pa ste/ /'di ni zab cing rgya che bas/ /'jig rten rmongs pas mi shes shing/ /'phags pa yis kyang de ma gtogs/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
130b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod yul 'di/ /byis pa'i sems dpa' rnam mi shes/ /gtso bo bdag dang dbang phyug dang/ /gang zag sems tsam rnam par brtags/ /yid kyi dmigs pa yang ji snyed/ /de dag lhan cig skyes pa min/ /yid bzang ma dang snying dbus
130b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dbugs dgag sems med sbyor ba dang/ /gsang sngags bzlas byed 'dod pa yi/ /cho ga'i ye shes de dag ni/ /rang bzhin lhan skyes zhes mi brjod/ /sangs rgyas lhan cig skyes pa ni/ /bla ma'i drin gyis gsal 'gyur te/ /thabs kyi
130b3(rgyud 'grel): rang nyid mtshon par bya/ /chos kun ring dang nye ba med/ /rang bzhin gnyis med lhan cig skyes/ /sangs rgyas bye brag med pa ste/ /'gro ba kun las rab tu 'byung/ /de ltar sngon mdza' med pa dang/ /sems can dbye ba med yin te/ /'di ste ye
130b4(rgyud 'grel): shes ldan yin na/ /sa la sogs pa'ang thar min ci/ /rnam snang rdo rje nyi ma dang/ /gar dbang rdo rje rta rgyal po/ /rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka /gti mug rdo rje la sogs dang/ /de bzhin ltung byed ma la sogs/ /'byung ba la sogs phung po la//
130b5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med tshul gyis grub pa'o/ /phung po sangs rgyas rnam lnga dang/ /'byung ba lha mo byang chub sems/ /mig sogs de bzhin gzugs la sogs/ /'dir ni gzugs ma rnam par brtag /tshigs rnams khro ba'i tshogs yin no/ /srid ba sku
130b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum rang bzhin dang/ /'pho bas ru shes par bya/ /lam gnyis brung du sbyor ba nyid/ /ji ltar nam mkha' i khams nyid la /'od kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ltar/ /sems ni zab dang rgya che ba/ /gnyis med tshul gyis rtag tu gnas/ /gang
130b7(rgyud 'grel): gi dngos po ma skyes pa/ /stong pa shin tu rang bzhin med/ /snang ba med cing brjod pa med/ /yul dang yul can med pa yi/ /zab mo bde ba dam pa yin/ /dngos po thams cad tha dad dang/ /gcig min mtshan nyid yongs su rdzogs/ /rdul
131a1(rgyud 'grel): dang dus ni yongs bral ba/ /zab mo rdo rje gsum 'dzin ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor rgya che zhes su brjod/ /de nyid mi byed rdo rje ste/ /brjod du med cing bsam du med/ /bsam du med pas bsgom bya zhes/ /thub pa chen
131a2(rgyud 'grel): pos bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba dbang po yul phrad pas /rnam shes dri ma med mthong ba/ /lhan skyes spros spang shes rab mthod?/ /thams cad mnyam par shes pa ni/ /zab mo lhag par mos pa 'thob/ /lhan skyes yongs su gyur pa na/ /
131a3(rgyud 'grel): bag chags rten dang bral par 'gyur/ /bde ba'i ye shes dkyil 'khor rgyas/ /'di skad rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das/ /lad kar gshegs mdo las gsungs te/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang/ /'du shes rnam par spangs pa yi/ /
131a4(rgyud 'grel): sems kyi rgyal po blta bar bya/ /nam zhig sems ni gyur pa na/ /pad mo 'dra ba'i gzhal med khang/ /sgyu ma'i spyod yul 'byung ba na/ /de yi che na ther zug gnas/ /gsungs pa 'di las spyod pa rnams/ /stong ba chen po la 'jug
131a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /'dod ma'i 'dod pa rnam lnga pos/ /chos kun yongs su mtshon byas nas/ /yul dang dbang po rjes chags pas/ /lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar rtogs/ /rnam pa gzhen du ma 'khrul par/ /rdo rje rig ma'i sbyo ba las/
131a6(rgyud 'grel): nam zhig yan lag 'gags ba na/ /de tshe lhan skyes gcig pur gnas/ /rnam bcu thig ler dang gi sems/ /rab gnas sa bcu dag tu shes/ /rnam bcu rnam par dbye ba dang/ /rlung dang thig le 'pho ba rnams/ /dag pa yi
131a7(rgyud 'grel): yang sa ru brtag /brda dang tshogs kyi rim pa rnams/ /'dir ni de nyid rig pas sgrub/ /dben pa 'am yang na dur khrod du/ /paTTa la sogs brgyan pa 'am/ /yang na bsam gtan kho nas kyang/ /dogs pa med pa'i sems
131b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis spyod/ /zab dang rgya che'i spyod pa 'di/ /rim pa dang pos rab sgrub la/ /rdo rje sems dpa' gzigs 'gyur zhing/ /mig sman la sogs rig 'dzin 'gyur/ /rang dang gzhan gyi grub mdza' la/ /sngags rgyud brten pa bde bar
131b2(rgyud 'grel): 'grub/ /bskal pa gsum du dal bas kyang/ /byang chub sgrub par mi nus pa/ /lus gcig la yang 'gyur ba ni/ /sngags shes rnams kyis byas pa yin/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa ma grub la/ /stong pa nyid ni yun rings bsgom/ /
131b3(rgyud 'grel): legs bris gzugs brnyan shar ba la/ /rtse gcig tu ni rab bltas nas/ /yang dang yang du bsgom par bya/ /lha yi de nyid grub par 'gyur/ /sngags rnams thams cad nyid la yang/ /yi ge gsum gyis bskul ba shis/ /spyod
131b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos grub g.yel ba la'ang/ /'dis ni sngags kyi de nyid 'grub/ /dpal ldan rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ /sngags kyi de nyid 'di rab bzhed/ /a u mra/ a h+ra/ h+ra umra/ srog ni gtsug tor dag tu yang/ /gyen rgyu thig leng bcas
131b5(rgyud 'grel): sdud byed/ /rdo rje'i sku ni bsgom par bya/ /steng 'og mgrin pa'i tshogs 'ching ba/ /gtso bo gzi brjid pad+ma la/ /rdo rje'i gsung ni rab tu bsgom/ /smin mar srog ni yi ge ma/ /mgrin pa gsang ba'i yi ge ni/ /rnam gsum thung
131b6(rgyud 'grel): du'i dag tu 'gyur/ /thugs kyi rdo rje rab tu 'grub/ /sku gsum rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom/ /rdo rje sngags rnams kun gyi ma/ /A li kA li zhes bya ba/ /skyes pa bud med ma ning nyid/ /lha rnams kun gyi gsang sngags ni/ /dngos
131b7(rgyud 'grel): grub a thud thim thams cad byed pa ste/ /rlung 'ching ba ni phyag rgya 'ching/ /lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje gsum/ /'di yis bskul zhing byin ? li oM ? gyis A li A(rgyud 'grel): hUM bi li pho mo ma nir rlob/ /dpag med rdo rje sems dpa' i tshe /
132a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog ring ba dang 'od gsal 'thob/ /rnam gsum lus ni gnas pa dang/ /'od tu song nas lus bskyed la/ /steng du yul rnams kun tu 'gro ? rnams sna tshogs bskyed pa dang/ /las rnams sgrub par byed
132a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'ang yin/ /bza' pa'i dam tshig byed pa ste/ /sgrib pa 'joms sdang 'jug gi byed shing sku yang bu bu mo'i rdzogs/ /sgrub dang dbang po'i sgo nas btus pa la sogs la/ /gsang sngags ?  rti ? sna'i thams cad 'di?
132a3(rgyud 'grel): yin no/ /nyin dang oM A:hUM/ mtshan du skye bo kun/ /'di ni yongs su bzla byed kyang/ /ye shes kyi bla ma'i man ngag dang bral bas/ /byis gnyis med pa rnams ni 'khor bar gyur/ /spyan drangs bzhugs dang gshegs su gsol/ /ye
132a4(rgyud 'grel): shes rdo rje gsum bor byed/ chung /'gro 'ong? bskyed dang sdud ba la/ /thung du ma lus dag tu 'gyur/ /'od dang 'gro ba g.yo dang brtan/ /gnas pas brtan g.yo ye shes byed/ /A:yis yongs su spro bar bya/ /oM gyis spyan drangs
132a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ste/ /hUM gis gsang sngags gnas skye mchi pa'o/ /rlung gis de nyid rab grub la/ /sngags lo kyi rgyal ya po yo rtag tu ya bzla/ tU? /gang zhig tha dad gsang sngags can/ /de ni nam yang grub pa med/ /de nas las rnams bsgrub
132a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /ci ste grub par ma gyur na/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /lha rnams rdo rjes bshig nas kyang/ /yi shes thig le ti 'dzin gyis/ /sems dpa' de ni don dam sgrub/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgom gyur na/ /nyi ma bdun gyis
132a7(rgyud 'grel): gdon mi za/ /ye shes rnam par g.yengs pa na/ /rlung gis rab tu bcings pa dang/ /'khor lo lnga po yongs bsregs pas/ /snying gi thig le zhu ba na/ /rnam gsum yon tan thim par 'gyur/ /bcing dang bcing ba'i sbyor pa
132b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rab tu bsdam dang dgag pa yis/ /rlung rnams 'phral du bcug nas kyang/ /tsaN+Da lI ni sbar bar bya/ /bde ba'i de nyid nye bar dmigs/ /srog ni dbu mar? bkag pa dang/ /pa tA la yi rlung yang bcing/ /gal te zug rgus? 'jigs
132b2(rgyud 'grel): pa na/ /mgo bo rgya mtsho bskyod par bya/ /lus kyi sdug bsngal rab spangs nas/ /mkhas pas rA sA ya Na bsgrub/ /sha chen bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba ni/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis bza' / /thig le gnas ni rnam bcu drug /a
132b3(rgyud 'grel): i u ri li e o aM a(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug las/ /thig le 'pho ba bcu drug dgug /yi ge'i sbyor ba rab sbyar bas/ /'dod can ma la spyad par bya/ /mtshan min thams cad rab spangs nas/ /ka ra Na yi rnal 'byor bcing/ /
132b4(rgyud 'grel): dga' la nye bar dmigs bya ste/ /bltas nas tsum+b+ha rab sbyor dang/ /ma mchu'i sprang rtsi 'thung ba dang/ /zla ris bri dper? 'dzin skyod/ /yan lag bzhi yis sgrub pa las/ /lhan cig skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /sbyor ba rnam pa drug gos
132b5(rgyud 'grel): ming /gyen du drangs pa'i rnal 'byor bya/ /bskor ba la sogs lnga sbyor bas/ /'pho ba med la 'bad par byos/ /brgyal dang gnyid 'khrig pa dang/ /shi dang glal dus gsal 'gyur ba/ /dus kun du ni mtshon par bya/ /
132b6(rgyud 'grel): las kyi mdza' la chags pa yis/ /de dag gis kyang ma grub na/ /gong du 'pho bas rab 'grub 'gyur/ /rdo rje ye shes yi ge dang/ /suMk+ShuM dag gis rab tu dgag /yi ge gsum gyi ye shes ni/ /thugs kyi yi ger bsdus pa gab?/ /
132b7(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa'i ting 'dzin thig ler thim/ /de yang 'od gsal bsgom par bya/ /de nyid nyi shu lnga thim nas/ /ye shes skad cig rnam pa gsum/ /'od gsal ba la rab zhugs pa/ /de tshe ye shes dam pa 'grub/ /gal te grub par ma
133a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i lam la zhugs pa rnams/ /rig ma'i dbang phyug rnams bsgoms nas/ /rdo rje sbyor bas rab bsgrub par/ /rigs kyi bdag pos legs par gsungs/ /
133a2(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa na/ /mtshan med nye bar bsten par bya/ /spros pa spros med nyid shes pas/ /rnam pa kun tu thams cad spyad/ /'di yi mthong pa rnam mang po/ /rnam pa lnga yi mtshan ma dang/ /sngags dang mngon par shes
133a3(rgyud 'grel): pa lnga/ /skye mched ye shes thob pa dang/ /rlung rnams rdo rje sems dpar gyur/ /'od kyi dkyil 'khor dri med dang/ /rmi lam mthong bar 'gyur ba ni/ /khye'u dang bu mo yid 'ong dang/ /lha dang rig 'dzin sgrog pa dang/ /yul rnams
133a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rje sems/ /'dod yon lnga la rol pa dang/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang mthong/ /bde ba mthong ba thim pa dang/ /sems dang sgyu ma ye shes sku/ /chos dang gzugs shes bya ba'o/ /rnal 'byor rgyud du gang
133a5(rgyud 'grel): bshad pa/ /de bzhin nyid sogs byang chub dang/ /de nyid rnal 'byor ma rgyud du/ /zla ba la sogs rnam pa lnga/ /de dag 'di la rnam par rig /rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni/ /sgrub ba kun du brtsam par bya/ /skya reng 'char ba'i dus su ni/ /sgom
133a6(rgyud 'grel): pa mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba bdun ldan ji srid du/ /ye shes dbang phyug brgyad rgyal po/ /bde chen rtag pa gdung med pa/ /rdo rje snying rjes don sgrub pa/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku zhes pa//
133a7(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa nyid dang yid kyi gzugs/ /gnyis spangs rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang/ /spros pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa/ /dz+nyAn d+hArma sdud kun gyi sam+b+ho ga ni rma ? de bzhin bag chags spangs pa ste/ /mi phyed rdo rje rnam bzhi'o/ /
133b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur dang chags pa ma rig pa/ /'di las yan lag bcu gnyis 'byung/ /'di dag 'gags pas sa bcu gnyis/ /rab tu gnon pa thams cad mkhyen/ /thub pa chen pos chags bral gyis/ /rigs rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir/ /
133b2(rgyud 'grel): mdo sde stong phrag brgyad cu gsungs/ /'khor lo bsgyur ba'i gzugs kyis ni/ /dam pa'i chags can rjes bzung phyir/ /dkyil 'khor sprul zhing bshad pa mdzad/ /dman mos chags can rigs rnams la/ /bya ba'i rgyud rnam gsum bshad
133b3(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /zab mo lhag par mos pa la/ /rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum rnams gsungs/ /rnal 'byor rgyud rnams thams cad du/ /rlung gi bde bar bsgrub byed/ /de nyid rnal 'byor ma rgyud de/ /thig le'i ye shes gsal bar bstan/ /sngags
133b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyud rnam pa gnyis dag la/ /'dod ma las ni ye shes dang/ /sngags kyi rgyud nas 'thob pa yin/ /rim pa gnyis kyi ye shes mchog /gang la rtags dang mngon gyur lha/ /gsang sngags rags dang phra ba yin/ /zhi la sogs pa'i khyad
133b5(rgyud 'grel): par dang/ /rig pa 'dzin dang dngos grub dang/ /sku rnam gnyis kyi dbye ba'o/ /gang gang sdom pa ma thob pa/ /de de theg pa la ma zhugs/ /gang ngag gsang sngags sgrub byed pa/ /dbang bskur med na grub pa med/ /de 'dir rdo rje'i lam zhugs
133b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /rim pa gnyis la brtson pa yang/ /dbang gi rim pas gsal ba yi/ /ye shes 'bang pas bsgom par gyis/ /mkhas pas rang nyid mi smad ye shes 'di/ /ngo mtshar ngo tshas mi g.yo brtan pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs yul dang spyod pas
133b7(rgyud 'grel): sgom byed pa'i/ /lhan skyes spyod 'di 'gro la sangs rgyas nyid/ /de bas rang bzhin lhan cig skyes/ /shin tu gsang zhing gsang ba che/ /gzhan du yongs su ma rnyed pa/ /'di ni nga yis khyod bde la brtan/ /rmongs pa las ni bzang por
134a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i phyag rgya 'di/ /'ga' zhig don du khyod kyis shong/ /rje btsun de skad gsungs ma thag /the tshom thams cad yongs su chad/ /rim pa gnyis kyi rnal 'byor gang/ /rnal 'byor
134a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyud bzhin bdag gis rig /lhan cig skyes pa rab rtogs pas/ /de nas 'gro pa'i bla ma gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' slob dpon te/ /dpa' bo spyan ras gzigs kyis mkhyen/ /dal 'byor shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang/ /tshe
134a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di glog ltar mi brtan par shes nas/ /'khor ba chu klung shugs drag bzlog pa'i phyir/ /rim gnyis lam la ci ste 'bad mi byed/ /'khor bar dga' dag 'grub par mi 'gyur bas/ /'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par spangs//
134a4(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i lam la brtson par bya ba dang/ /gang zhig bsgom par bya ba nan tan sgrub/ /rgyal sras chen po rnams kyang thogs 'gyur na/ /lam mchog 'di yis bcu gnyis lo dag gis/ /mtshams med spyod pa'ang byang chub nges 'grub
134a5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ bla ma'i drin las thob 'di cis mi bsgom /rdo rje sems dpa' i lam mchog 'di/ /'dir bshad 'gro ba sgrol phyir yin/ /bsod nams cung zad gang bsags pa/ /de yis rdo rje 'dzin par shog skye bo dam pa phrad dka' 
134a6(rgyud 'grel): zhing/ /lam bzang 'bras bu che ba'i phyir/ /sgrub par mdzod ces drakand+hi/ /thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba 'debs/ /sems kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba rim pa gnyis rgya cher gsal ba/ /slob dpon chen po grub pa'i sa la 'gro ba 'god
134a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thugs rje can 'jig rten dbang phyug gi zhabs kyi ze'u 'bru la spyi bos reg pa/ /bsod snyoms ngas bshad pa rdzogs so// //rje btsun shar phyogs pa ni trA Na sh+rI'i zhabs dang/ rmongs pa kun dga' snying po
134b1(rgyud 'grel): tA ra nA thas bsgyur ba'o/ /sngon chad gangs ri'i khrod du ma byon pa'i/ /gzhung bzang 'di ni bla ma'i zhal las thob/ /shar phyogs mkhas pa'i gsung bzhin 'di bsgyur te/ rmongs pa bdag gis cha tsam 'tshal pas so// //
134b2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge bzhi pa'i man ngag bzhugs so// //*/ /hA sAta/ ha zhes lus can dga' 'gyur la/ /gnyid kyis myos pa'ang ha zhes smra/ /'dod ldan hA hA ngal 'gyur te/ /de bzhin 'jig pa dang khro pa la'o/ /ha
134b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes lus can srog 'dor te/ /zla ba nyi ma lnga bdag rlung/ /snying nang phra ba'i hI la ka /yid ni rab tu g.yo pas na/ /has ni lus skyes 'gag 'gyur la/ /dbus ma la ni mi shigs pa'o/ /snying nas lkog ma nam mkha' la/ /ha
134b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes yongs su rgya bar byed/ /yid 'ongs glog dang thun mtshams kyi/ /mdog dmar de yi sgra ni sa/ /mnyam 'gyur shin tu gnyid yur dang/ /'dod la rna bar sa zhes grag /'brug sgra pi waM ljon pa ltar/ /gzhan dag sems dpar
134b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa 'das/ /gang 'di lte ba'i dbus gnas rdul/ /'dod chags rang bzhin bsgom bya ste/ /rlung gi thigs pa nyams na'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin rlabs na/ /zla ba gcig gis lha dang mnyam/ /ljon pa'i 'dab ma lta byed
134b6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /rtsa ba mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dag gi brjod pa rnam mang gis/ /ci ltar a yig smra? bar nus/ /lus ni mi snang shes pa'ang med/ /'di ni a zhes brjod par 'dod/ /gnyid stug log dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /khu ba lhung ba'i
134b7(rgyud 'grel): skad cig la/ /de bzhin chi ma dang 'jigs pa la/ /a A thos par 'gyur ba'o/ /chu ltung mi ni gyen 'gro dang/ /rmi lam de bzhin gnyis sad dang/ /'od gsal ba las sems ldang dang/ /yid ni nang du 'gyur ba na/ /ta yig mngon brjod
35a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bde ba dang/ /gdengs can yul la zla bshad/ /bya gdong nas ni shaM ma'i bar/ /nor bu 'od lnga ldan la gnas/ /'di ni 'khor dang zhi ba'ang yin/ /sangs rgyas sgyu ma rnams
