35a2(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'di/ /gang la rgod dang gang gis rgod/ /ci yi phyir na rgod pa yin/ /ci ltar de dang ldan par gyur/ /de la 'di ltar brjod bya ste/ /rlung ni lus ngag rdul bcas pa/ /de la'o rgod pa 'di ni bde/ /stong pa la ni lus ngag
35a3(rgyud 'grel): yid/ /bde ba mchog dang ldan pa'o/ /? lus 'phrog yid 'phrog bde/ /satwa ra sA ya Na bde/ /skyed par byed pa de yin no/ /a par dzaM? ta nam mkha' / /dngos po kun las rgyal bar gyur/ /ta thA'i tshul ni rnam med ba/ /
35a4(rgyud 'grel): dngos po kun yang song ba'o/ /rdo rje bla mas de ltar bshad/ /satwa mu dra'o/ /yi ge bzhi pa'i don ston pa/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag phyag 'tshal/ /slob dpon dwa kan+ti chen po/ /sems kyi phyag rgya gsung bar mdzad/ /khaDga? pa
35a5(rgyud 'grel): yi man ngag go/ //sngon chang gangs ri'i khrod du ma byon pa'i/ /gzhung bzang 'di yang bla ma'i drin las thob/ /sangs rgyas sbas pa'i gsung bzhin 'di bsgyur te/ /rmongs pa kun dga' snying pos g.yar

35a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyud pa'i rim pa yi/ /man ngag rin chen bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /gsang bdag mngon rtogs rim pa 'di/ /sgro skur med par bri bar bya/ /rdo rje 'chang nas da lta'i bar/ /tshig don rgyud pa bar ma chad/ /dbang gi rgyal po lta bu yi/ /mtshan nyid
135b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'i bla ma la/ /snying rje ldan zhing shes rab che/ /bzod ldan brtson 'grus dang pas brgyan/ /skyabs 'gro sems bskyed dbang thob cing/ /dam tshig sdom pa ldan pa yi/ /dben zhing nyams dga' yid bde dang/ /bkra shis
135b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal 'phel dbang dbang 'dzin/ /bur? khrod chen po 'jigs pa'i gnas/ /ri gsum rtse 'am brag gi 'og /khra bo'i cha byang 'dra ba'i gnas/ /der ni gsang bdag sgrub par bya/ /sgrub pa'i mthun rkyen bsags byas nas/ /der ni bkod
135b3(rgyud 'grel): ba bsham byas nas/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /skyabs 'gro dang ni sems bskyed bya/ /bla ma'i rnal 'byor sgom nas ni/ /oM swa b+ha wa shud+d+ha sarba d+harma swa b+ha wa shud+d+honya haM/ /sngags 'di lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /gzung 'dzin
135b4(rgyud 'grel): snod? bcud chos rnams kun/ /bar snang gang ba'i dkyil lta sgom/ /de nas hUM zhes brjod pa yis/ /sems nyid yi ge hUM mthing nag /badzra brjod pas rdo rjer gyur/ /oM badzra sa ma yastwaM/ /de skad lan gsum brjod pa yis/ /mthu stobs
135b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje ni/ /mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa gnam lcags rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa sdigs 'dzub zhags pa bsnams/ /srid gsum sku yi khyon du rdzogs/ /klu 'bum gnyan khris bdag stod/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i
135b6(rgyud 'grel): gdan stengs na/ /g.yas sku ma g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /dug lnga 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis/ /me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /ye shes sku mchog rngam pa'i tshul/ /ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ /rmar? smin ma
135b7(rgyud 'grel): me ltar 'bar/ /thugs rjes spyan gsum phyogs bcur gzigs/ /mche rtsigs sngags kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /khro rgyal sna tshogs sku la 'phro/ /khyud chen rigs lnga pho nyar 'gyed/ /gdug pa ma lus 'dul bar byed/ /thod pa rin chen
136a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan gyis brgyan/ /dbul nor rgyas dud skyod par/ /snyan la dga' bo nyer dga' dmar/ /gsungs? par ? chu lha dkar/ /se ral 'dab bzangs rigs ldan ? /sku gdung? thugs ni byin gyis brlab/ /
136a2(rgyud 'grel): thugs? kha'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ /dbang ni bskur la mi bskyod bsam/ /dza:hUM baM ho:? gsang sngags kyis/ /dgug gzhug dbyer med mnyes par bya/ /thugs kar nyi zla'i dbus su hUM/ /
136a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM las 'od 'bros sems can rnams/ /grol bar byas nas bdag la bsdu/ /rdo rje srin po'i khu tshur bstan/ /raM raM gnyis kyis mi sbar nas/ /dgra bgegs nad dang sgrib pa rnams/ /thams cad ma lus bsreg par bsam/ /mahA?
136a4(rgyud 'grel): ri Sha na e raM phaT phaT/ /khro rgyal sna tshogs mtshon cha thogs/ /ye shes me dpung phyogs bcur 'phro/ /lha yi sku ni sgom pa yis/ /bsod nams tshogs ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de n yid khru? ltar shes pa yis/ /ye shes tshigs
136a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de nas lha sku sgyu ma ltar/ /snang la rang bzhin med par sgom/ /mdun du khyung chen rgyal po bsgom/ /g.yas su mgon po nag po sgom/ /g.yon du lha mo bong zhon ma/ /nang gi bka' stod rnam gsum
136a6(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /phyogs skyong bcu la sogs pa yi/ /dpal mgon bdud cu rtsa gnyis po/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje yis/ /bka' nyan 'phrin las byed par bsam/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas pa'i tshul/ /u tsa tsarya nas li li
136a7(rgyud 'grel): kad+ha? d+ha hUM hUM phaT kyi bar bzlas/ /gsang sngags phreng ba de dag kyang/ /zhi ba dkar la rgyas la ser/ /dbang la dmar la drag la gnag /rdo rje'i lce'i 'od zer ni/ /gnam lcags thog rgod 'bar ba 'phro/ /gdug pa can rnams
136b1(rgyud 'grel): tshar gcod cing/ /de bzhin 'phrin las gang byed sgrub/ /ru rag sha dang lung thang dang/ /dung chen 'phreng ba rab tu shis/ /u tsa tsarya yak+Sha se na/ /oM g+hu sha dza dza hUM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags yig 'bru? bcu bdun la/ /'bum
136b2(rgyud 'grel): phrag gsum du snyen pa bya/ /sde brgyad 'dul pa'i drag sngags la/ /'bum phrag gcig gis grangs snyen rdzogs/ /dus snyen rab ni zla ba gsum/ /'bring ni zla gnyis tha ma zla ba gcig /rtags snyen rgyud las bshad pa yin/ /
136b3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub pa po yi snyen pa bya/ /thun mtshams dag tu gtor ma ni/ /thod pa la sogs snod nad du/ /mar gyis brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'am/ /rin chen la sogs snod du ni/ /mngar gsum dkar gsum ldan pa bsham/ /de nas byin
136b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab pa ni/ /yaM las rlung ste raM las me/ /ke las mi mgo'i sgyed bu las/ /a las dung chen nang du ni/ /hUM b+h+ruM aM dzi aM/ dbus nas shar nas g.yas bskor du/ /sngo dang dkar ser dmar ljang dang/ /de las 'od zer
136b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pa yi/ /bar du gcod po'i gdon bgegs rnams/ /bkug nas ye shes lnga la stim/ /lus ni sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga/ /sems kyi dug lnga ye shes lnga/ /gyur pas gsang bdag zhal du stab/ /gti mug sha yi mchod pa
136b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhes/ /zhe sdang rus pa'i mchod pa bzhes/ /bdag 'dzin la sogs dgra bgegs rnams/ /bdag med dbyings su sgral du gsol/ /zhes brjod rtsa sngags la ni/ sarba dus tra na sarba shag truM thums mar ya ma ra ya kha kha
136b7(rgyud 'grel): khA hi khA hi/ lan gsum dag tu bzlas pa yis/ /ljags las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis/ /drangs nas gsol bas mnyes par bsam/ /de ltar skul ba'i dgra bgegs de'i/ /gnod pa'i bsam ba zhib dang/ /gnyis med ye shes
137a1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs par shog /khyung chen la sogs bka' bstong la/ /dkar gyis rgyan pa'i gtor ma la/ /oM a ka ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NaM A de nud pan na tAta/ oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM phaT/ b+ha laM ta kha kha khA hi khA hi gsum gyis
137a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mnyes bar bsam/ /yi ge brgya bas lhag chang skad/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha rnams dang/ /de sras rnams dang tshangs la sogs/ /'jig rten skyong ba'i cho ga 'di/ /mchod ba ni bzod par gsol/ /gtso bas nus
137a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ci mchis pa/ /mtshang ba dang ma snyes dang/ /nyes ba'i dri mar gyur pa kun/ /de dag khyed kyi bzod bar gsol/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ /dge ba byang chub chen por bsngo/ /srod dang nyal bar gyur ba'i tshe/ /bsrung
137a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor gsal bar bsgoms nas ni/ /'od gsal chos sku'i dang la nyal/ /rmi lam longs skur gsal btab ste/ /nam gyi brgyad cha lus pa na/ /rtsa sngags lan 'bum brjod pa yis/ /nang stong zung 'jug lha yi sku/ /snang la rang
137a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin med bar bsgom/ /da nas rin bzhin sngar ltar bsgoms/ /de ltar rgyun du sgom pa las/ /grub rtags rnams ni rims bzhin 'gyur/ /bar chad thams cad zhi ba dang/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sgrib gnyis dag /
137a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i tshul/ /rang gi lus ngag yid gsum po/ /dag pa gnyis dang ldan pa yis/ /sku gsung thugs su 'char bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje'i sku/ /bsgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu 'di/ /rtsa ba
137a7(rgyud 'grel): klu sgrub snying po yis/ sgro? bkur med par gsal bar bris/ /gal te 'khrul pa mchis gyur na/ /bla ma yi dam mkha' 'gro dang/ /chos skyong rnams kyi bzod par gsol/ /dge bas mkha' mnyan sems can rnams/ /sdug
137b1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal kun bral bde ldan nas/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bar shog /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i sgrub thabs yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba/ slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
137b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mahA yaksha se na pa ti/ ni laM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pa Ni sa d+ha na na ma/ bos skad du/ gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la
137b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa'i d+harma khungs btsun pa dang skad gnyis pa drin che ba sgra don du cung zad rig pa'o/ /zla ba'i gdan la g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /bgegs 'dul gnod sbyin la dbang 'jigs pa'i gzugs /ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun gsum mo ?
137b4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga ldan rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /g.yas pa'i phyag ` klang kyi don la gnyis las dang po mchod bar brjod pa nas sku 'gying bag dang bcas pa'i chos sgrub bal bar du gcod pa byed ba'i gyi der dpon yin pas yak+Sha ma rung ba rnams kyis mthong na su snang ba'i khro bo chen po de ni na 'dzin la phyag
137b5(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ /klu sogs gnod zhi bar byed pa 'jig rten dang re phan pa'i dngos grub dang/ ba zhi rdo rje 'dzin pa li/ /go 'phang thob byed bdag gis bshad par bya/ /sems bskyang byas shing dbang bskur thob/ bla ma mnyes byas dam tshig 'dzin/ /
137b6(rgyud 'grel): gtsang spra la la phar? sogs rnal gnyis pa bshad bar dam bca' ba dgos pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten phyi ma rang zhin? don/ sa'i thabs kyi brjod bya tshig? dang yi ge'i chogs kyis brjod byed kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ 'dir dbang bskur ba'i don byin rlabs kyi gdams pa 'chad rang nyid kyi chos gang gi skor zhuD pa dang bla ma des ji skas gsungs
137b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i? mi dge ba bcu la sogs pa spangs cing lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ ? gnas pas gro gcod? pa la soD pa mi byed sha chang?  snod? bcod 'di? gos gsung rje nas gsum na ngag gtsang? sgra gnas pas brdzun sogs spangs? bzlas brjod dang kha don pa btson pa sems gtsang? sku? gnas pas bsnab sems la soD pa sbrangs pa'i dga' ba'i sams pa rang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam
138a1(rgyud 'grel): bar 'jog pa'o/ /'byor ldan/ /gsang sngags rjes su gnang ba thob/ /las zhib la sogs pa'i las kyi lud gnod rnams bya bar gnang ba blangs/ /snying rjes dmigs pa bsgrub pa pos/ /yid du 'od ba'i sa phyogs su/ /dkyil 'khor
138a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dom gang lci bas byug /'dir sngags kyi lung gnod dbus su mchod rten tshad ldan brtsig /snying po bris 'jig rten 'dir kyang sems can rnams la klu'i gnod pa bsal ba dang phyi mar rdo rje 'dzin ba'i go 'phang thob par byas la sems can sdug bsngal ba 'di rnams snying rje bas 'khor ba nas gdan
138a3(rgyud 'grel): snyam du/ sku phyags rtsa gtsang ma las byas pa pa'i mtshan rnams/ /de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor de'i sngags pas nang du gzugs sngags sku gzugs gzhug du gsol/ /de nas rang nyid bde ba'i stan la 'dug /sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis/ /khrus bya
138a4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge brgya pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa brjod/ /snying gar zla bar gnas pa'i/ /hUM gi 'od zer bla ma sogs/ /mchod rten de'i spyan sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gi dpal phyag na rdo rje'igo 'phang thob par byas la go 'phang de thob nas kyang sems can thams cad kyis sdul thams cad zhi bar byas pa go 'phang de la dgod par ba'o snyam du
138a5(rgyud 'grel): lus dag pa dag? kha drangs mchod pa rang nyid kyi dbus bar sngon po las spros ba'i bya/ /sngon gro bsod nanms mdun du bzhugs pa la rim pa bya/ /tshad med bzhi byams ba snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms yang dran par bya/ /de nas sgro bsdu sngon 'gro
138a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /stong pa rnam pa snga dang 'dod yon lnga ye shes tshogs rang sangs rgyas byang sems phyag rdor lha bskyed pa'i jo bo'i bla mA? bya? sh+ri tshad med bzhir bsgom par bzhed pas 'dir kyang de'i bzhed pa gtso bar mdzad nas tshad med bzhir bsgom bar gsung ba las jo bo rang gi bzhed pa byams snying rje gnyis bsgom ba rang du rnag 'du bar bzhed ba'o/ /'on
138a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang 'dir snag bsgom pa'o/ /bsgom bya/ /tshang med sems can thams cad kyi don du phyag na rdo rje'i go 'phang thob bar 'dod pa'i 'phen pas sems de ni/ /stong pa'i ngang du yi ger blta/ /de nas 'od zer gsum byung bas/ /pad ma zla ba rdo rjer gyur/ /
138b1(rgyud 'grel): lte bar hUM mtshan de 'od kyis/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas phyag rdor bsdus/ /mchod 'od zer las byung ba'i mchod pa bcus de rdo rje'i lte bar zhugs/ /de dag zhu las rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dmar/ /rab bsgeg mche ba
138b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'i rab tu gtsigs/ /skra ser sprul gyis yan mdun gyi nam mkhar dus gsum sangs rgyas dang phyag na rdo rje mdun du spyan drangs pa de rnams 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas na de las 'od kyi reg byas rdo rje nyid kyang zhu ba dang de rnams yongs su gyur pa las spyan 'bras ma rgogs pa lag brgyan/ /mdog
138b3(rgyud 'grel): gnag rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /mdza' yas sprul sngon pos dbuskra bcing/ 'jog po dmar bas na cha byas rigs ldan khra bsod dbu rgyan du ra skyes ser pos lag rdub stobs kyi ljang gus gzha pad+ma dkar pos rkang gdub byas ba'o/ /g.yon brkyang gar gyis zla bar gnas/ /ljags 'dril stag ti sham thabs
138b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang/ /a la la zhes gang rgyangs sgrogs/ /bgegs tshogs rnam par skrag byed par/ /bdag nyid bsgom bya de nas ni/ /gnas gsum byin gyis brlab pa dang/ /zla ba rdo rje'i 'od zer gyis/ /rigs la gsan gyi gnas nas rigs lnga'i mi bskyod pa nyid
138b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag spyan drangs dbang bskur dang/ /des bas rgyas bar du gcod par byed pa'i gdab dang du zla ba dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge gsum las phyag tshan gsum la yi ge gsum gyi mtshan pa lam yang na yi ge gsum nyid de/ /de nyid rang dbang bskur gyi bting la rigs bdag du bzhugs zer ba dang/ ye shes gzhug/
138b6(rgyud 'grel): chog thams cad rdzogs par bya/ /bdag bskyed pa'i rim pa'o// //yang de'i thugs gnas de 'dra ba spos nas rigs bdag du bzhugs pa dang yang des dbang bskur ba'i chu'i lhag ma las grub pa'i rigs bdag gsum bzhugs ba'i ra sug gsum yin te/ rang gang mos bya zhes rtsas gsung zhes bdag gi slob dpon gsung ngo/ /
138b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod rten stong par bsgom/ /de las phyag na rdo rjer bskyed/ /de la ye shes gzhug la/ rigs bdag spyan drangs pa dang dbang bskur la sogs/ /cho ga snga ma bdag bskyed pa'i skabs su bstan pa bzhin du bya/ /thugs mdun gyi p yag na rdo rje de'i kar mchod rten
139a1(rgyud 'grel): sngon po bsam/ /de'i bum par hUM bsams te/ /'od 'phros bder gshegs rdor 'dzin bsdus/ /mchod rten nyid la zhugs pa dang/ /zhu ba'i sbyor bas slar yang bsam/ /mchod rten bskyed pa'i rim pa'o/
139a2(rgyud 'grel): de nas bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /rang snying zla ba rdo rje la/ /gsang hUM las sngags rgyal bar sa thams cad dang/ pos bskor bar bsam/ /dag tu bzlas pa mchod rten/ mchod rten nyid bsam zer bar gsal kyang man ngag gis rdo rje nyer lnga la gcig dbus na gnas par lta ba'i don gsung
139a3(rgyud 'grel): la la ni bsnyen pa'i dus su rdo rje nyid bzhi'i dbus su mchod rten sems pa yang yod do rdo rje'i lugs ltar na mchod rten dang sems par gsal gsung/ 'thon pa dang/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nang du gzhug /mchod snyi ga'i rdo rje nyer lnga dbus na gcig gnas pa la rten la bskor g.yas nas sam kha nas 'thon
139a4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lam nas sna bur g.yon nas rang gi kha nas zhugs pa dang/ /dngos grub mdun ni ma'i thugs gnas /sna bug g.yas nas mdun na gnas pa'i blangs 'dir lugs gcig la rdo rje nyer bzhi'i dbus kyi mchod rten la bskor ba byas nas tshur sdud pa la 'dir man ngag la brten nas mchod rten zer kyang ngan rdo rje rang yin
139a5(rgyud 'grel): nye rdo rje nyer lnga pa'i dbus ma bskor ba byas nas sna bug g.yas bsam lan? 'thon te rang gi g.yon nam kha nas 'jug pa 'di gsum 'dul du gsungs pa'i 'gal me 'khor lo bzlas par bya ba de yin no/ /nas snying gar 'khor/ /'gal me lta bur 'khor ba la/ /dmigs pa gtang de bzlas pa bya/ /
139a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i rim pa'o/ /de ltar bsnyen pa byas pa na/ /ye shes lhas su dbang bskur dang/ /lo brgyad lon pa'i gzugs 'dzin dang/ /rang nyid kyi me tog sngon po 'thu ba dang/ /ri rtse mthon por phyin la sogs/ /rtags rnams nye bar
139a7(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar 'gyur gong du ? len pa'i rim pa de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par gras kyi bum pa thogs nas/ rus pa bya da ltar rtag bde nams thams cad dam gcig gnyis la sogs 'byung gi btam 'i? gling? du? byin nas? shin tu nyams dga' ba'i nas der gnas la thor das ltas bstan pa'i smi lam gyi dus su
139b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen 'i? rim pa rdzogs so// //bsnyen pa sngon du song bas/ rmi lam la gsum ste/ /srod la bag chags kyi snad ba 'byung/ /nas phyed kyi dus su gnyi bstug pa'i snad ba 'gyud la/ /wo rangs ltas bstan pa'i snang ba ste/ /shin tu
139b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal pa'o gsung/ de nas bgegs med sa phyogs su/ /bsgrub pa mngon par brtsam byas te/ /yid 'od sa sa nas sa blangs te/ /dkyil 'khor 'dom gang lci bas phyug /dbus su mtsho skyes 'dab brgyad gri/ /de la klu yi gzugs brgyad
139b3(rgyud 'grel): bri/ /'jug ma pad lter? gong du bstan pa'i rtags de rnams byung gi gting? 'khyil pa yi/ /steng du/ sa mnyams 'di srog chags med pa'i zhab pad brdungs nas chu gtsar dang bsres te rdo rje 'dzin pa pa'i bsang phyogs rnams shar nas dkar ser dmar ljang 'tshams kyang shar lho nas de bzhin no/ /dgod/ /
139b4(rgyud 'grel): byaMs pa la brgyad ba'ang bstod spu? mi thal mo sbyar ba 'dre ba smad sprul du snang ba'i kha dog ser po 'dab brgyad mu khyud dkar po la/ ral gri phreng bas bskor bar bri/ /de yi phyi'i sku gzugs bris pa'am khugs ma rol dag tu ni/ /gru chad bzhi'i gzhag lha snam bri/ /rdo
139b5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ /me ris dril bu'i phreng bas ba skor/ /sgro bzhi'i dag dang yang dag sngon po rtse mo ga? las stsa bstan pas pad ma'i mu khyud ldan/ /dkyil 'khor bzang po legs bris la/ /mchod pa'i tshogs kyang dgram
139b6(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /tsa na ce? reg? yod par dkyil /de'i mdza' ma dril bu ser po kha chos skor du 'khor bri pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas nub kyi sgor 'dug ste/ /khrus bya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed byas la/ /ye shes sems dpa' me tog la sogs pa gzhug
139b7(rgyud 'grel): pa sogs/ /chog thams cad rdzogs par bya/ /rang snying pad+ma'i steng du zla ba la/ 'di dkyil 'khor phyogs su gnas pas nub? skor mos ba byas la /sangs dang lag pa gnyis na pas rang nyid rdo rje nyi shu rtsa lnga bsgom/ /de nas dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /phyag
140a1(rgyud 'grel): na rdo rje 'kho bcas la/ /ye shes sems dpa' gzhug la sogs/ /cho ga thams cad rdzogs pr bya/ /mdun gyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i yang/ /thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje nyi shu rtsa lnga bas/ /
140a2(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od byung sangs rgyas dang/ /bla ma la sogs mkha' la bkug /mchod pa bshags pa la sogs bya/ /de nas bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /rang snying rje'i phreng ba'i mthar/ /gsang sngags 'khor bas sna nas 'thon/ /rdo rje 'dzin
140a3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba bdag? bzhed pas bsgrub pa'i dus su lha'i sku la dmigs bar 'dod pas jo bo'i bzhed pas dmigs pa rgya chen ltar lha chur? na 'dir bstan pa 'di ltar rnam pa rdo rje rang bzhin lha'i bdag nyid du lta'o gsung skad/ de 'dir dmigs pa rgya chud ba'i dbang du byas/ ? las dmigs pas nus na sgrub pa'i dus su phyag? rdor? nyi shu rtsa lnga re la dmigs pa gtong
140a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'o gsung/ /pa'i thugs kar zhugs/ /de nas yar 'thon rang nyid kyi/ /lam nas zhugs te snying kar 'khor/ /'gal me bzhin du bzlas byas te/ 'od zar tshogs kyis rdor 'dzin dang/ /bdag nyid lus ni yongs bkang ste/ /klu
140a5(rgyud 'grel): yi tshogs la phag pa dang/ /kun gyi lus gang phyogs bcur 'phros/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad bkug /'od du gyur las gcig tu 'dres/ /rdo rje mdun du bskyed pa'i 'dzin pa'i kyi nang/ kha spu'i bu gnas phyir la spros pas
140a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kar thim/ /kun klu'i tshogs de dag kyang kyang rdo nas ba spu'i bu gnas phyir spros pa bas nam mkha' gang ba'i thams cad dang rigs drug la sogs pa'i rje 'dzin gyur bsam/ /de ltar bsam ba brtan po yis/ /sngags kyi rim pa shes byas la/ /bsgrub pa'i
140a7(rgyud 'grel): dus kyi gsang sngags bzlas/ /bsgrub pa zhag bdun rdzogs pa dang/ /las la sbyar ba'i sgrub ba'i sgrub ba sngon du song bas rim pa brtsam/ /dpal phyag na rdo rje'i bsgrub pa rdzogs jo bo'i bzhed pas bsten pa la mtshan ma gal che der mtshan ma thob nas sgrub ba la dus kyi chog go gsung/
140b1(rgyud 'grel): so// //de nas las kyi rim pa ste/ /rjed byed zlog pa la sogs pa/ /gzhan du bstan pa ltar shes bya/ /glu bzlog pa'i rim pa ni/ /dang por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'i/ /dbus su bru gsum tshad ldan bru/ /de stengs
140b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod rten tshad ldan brtsig /nang du gnod byed gzugs bcug ste/ /cho ga rtsa ba gzungs kyi nang du thams cad tshad byas la/ /bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed/ /snying gar byas zla ba rdo rje las/ /song nyar gcig pa 'od byung ? las grub? pa'i
140b3(rgyud 'grel): su? gang pa sprul? pa'i tshogs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa dang tshad med bzhi bsgom pa dang stong pa'i ngang las sems hUM du blta ba de las 'od gsum spros pas gdan gnyis dang phyag mtshan sa bon gyi mtshan pa de las 'od spros bas sangs rgyas dang phyag rdor bsdus de rnams mchod nas rdo rje'i lte ba hUM la? thim tha? dad de'i reg byas hUM dang rdo rje yang zhu nas
140b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis su/ /gnod byed bkug la gzugs la gzhug /de nas spyi bo re hUM bsam cing/ /mig tu phaT bsam dpral par raM/ /mchan ma'i dbus su yi bsam ste/ /de dag kun las me 'bar bas/ /dang lus lcags gong lta
140b5(rgyud 'grel): dur bsam/ /lcaD? kyu dang zhags pa 'dzin pa spros bas/ dngos su gsum pa'i nang du 'jug? pa'i rang nyid phyag na rdo rje'i ting 'dzin du gnas ba'i de nas/ gnyis gnyis nyungs kar la sogs pa/ spar bar yaM las rlung byung nas yi ge gzhan rnams me'i rang bzhin du 'dug pa nus pas gi thams cad khyab nas
140b6(rgyud 'grel): blugs te sngags zlos pa'i/ /sbyor bas thun gyis brab par bya/ /mtshon char gyur de ltar ting nge 'dzin byas kyi gting pas lus 'big cing/ /'od kyi tshogs kyis bsreg par bsam/ /thun dang po la bya ba'i rim pa'o/ /de nas
140b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa'i thun dag la/ /cho ga mchod rten gsal nas dong nang gi gzugs la thams cad sngon du bstan pa kho na bzhin du tshang bas su/ /gnod byed de'i rang nyid rdo rje rang gi lus las spros ba'i 'dzin par bskyed/ /snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo'i lto ba'i rje hUM/
141a1(rgyud 'grel): de las 'od zer khru gang pa/ /rab tu 'bar bas gnod byed tshogs/ /bkug nas bsreg la sems gtad la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya/ /de nas gsum pa'i thun la ni/ /cho ga
141a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad tshad pa yis/ /rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed/ /thugs 'i? bod kyi zer las khro bo sros pas/ /yang de las ma'i tshogs chen po chad bas 'nag gi phug dgu nas 'thon pas mo'i 'o bas kyi nang du gnod byed rnams thul thul kar zla ba rdo rje bsam/ /de las 'od 'phro brtan
141a3(rgyud 'grel): yong du bstan pa kho na bzhin du g.yo bsdus/ /thams da ltar brtan g.yo cad bsregs te 'od zer slar bdag la bsdus/ /bdag kyang bsregs te snying gar bsdus/ /snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje /pas brtan pa dang g.yo ba la khyab pa dang bsregs/ /de ?
141a4(rgyud 'grel): yang hUM la bsdus 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas nas bsregs pas nas su/ /'od kyi rang bzhin du byas nas rang sems kun nas rang gi lus 'od zer gyi khyab pa dang nas zla ba rdo rje la 'od nas yang 'od de nyid kyi reg byas 'bar ba'i/ /hUM du bsams te bzlas pa bya/ /nas 'od zer

141a6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa des skyo nas/ ye shes kyi ngo bor bsams nas bstim pa yin te 'dir man ngag gis dmigs pa de las skyon hUM las phyag mtshan de gyur pa las rang ltar bsams te de'i thugs kar hUM ye shes kyi ngo bor bsams nas de phyung nas mchod rten la bstim pa yin no/ /yang rang nyid gdon gnod pa'i bzlas pa byed pa'i mtshams na gnas pa'i dus su hUM

141b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du/ /bskor ba la sogs dge ba'i las/ /ji ltar nus pa 'bad pas bya/ /bla ma dkon mchog mchod pa dang/ /gtor ma la sogs dge la 'jug /klu yi gnod pas nyin pa rnams/ /'jig rten gsum 'dul nas

141b6(rgyud 'grel): gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /byams pas sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa ltar lta ba'o/ /snying rjes de rnams 'khor ngan sdug bsngal ba la bu gcig pa sdug bsngal ba ltar snying rre rje snyam du bsam pa'o/ /dga' bas de rnams 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las thar na re dka' snyam du bsam pa'o//

142a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rje'i las bsgrub ba'i thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gos sngon bgegs can gyis mdzad bas so 'du la bar byed cing 'phrin las kyis/ /gnod ldan
142a2(rgyud 'grel): sems can smin 'di ni dpal phyag na rdo rjes rnal 'byor ma sh+raM sti ti la bshad/ des slob dpon byi dya sh+ri la bshad nas de'i man dag yi ge ris su bris pa las nyan tra la rten pa ma yin gsung/ de ltar yin par kyang rdo rje 'dzin ba'i lung las rnyed pa'i bya'i tshig des gsal gsung ngo/ /mdzad pa'i/

145b5(rgyud 'grel): bas bsrung ba rnam gnyis te/ /mtshan med stong bas bsrung ba dang/ /mtshan bcas lha skus bsrung ba'o/ /mtshan med stong pas bsrung ba ni/ /phyi'i yul gyi snang ba rnams/ /snang srid sgyu ma chen por gnas/ /nang gi rig pa byang chub sems/ /
145b6(rgyud 'grel): skye 'jig med pas ye sangs rgyas/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad ni/ /lus pa med par ye shes dang/ /mkha' dang bem po gsal ba yang/ /gsal Na par rgyan dang khyud rdzogs par sgom/ /rin chen khri rkang sen dang/ /nyi zla pad+ma'i
145b7(rgyud 'grel): gdan bshams nas/ /rgyu las bskyed pa'i sngags brjod pas/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag sku/ /sdigs mdzub lcags kyu'i phyag rgya can/ /mtshan dang dpe byad ldan par bsam/ /hUM ka ra
146a1(rgyud 'grel): dang rnam par rgyal/ /dbyug sngon gshin rje mi g.yo mgon/ /rta mgrin 'dod rgyal bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /khams gsum
146a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rgyal stobs po che/ /hUM gi rgyu las rang sngags brjod/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan rdzogs bar bsgoms/ /bsten pa'i sngags la 'bad de bzlas//

146a5(rgyud 'grel): bca' / /dang por ri rab rmang dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi la/ /rgya dang 'phang du khrur btang/ /gling dang gling phran ri bdun bcas/ /gru bzhi zlum po zla

148b5(rgyud 'grel): dag rgyan du bri bar bya/ /oM ma he b+ha ra hi sa man tra ma mu tra/ sa ma ti ma ra baM sarba lo ke swAhA/ /lho nub mtshams su gzugs ba ni/ /stobs chen srin po'i rgyal mtshan gyis/ /pho bdud dal ka g.yas su rgyud/ /de yi bzlog sngags

149a1(rgyud 'grel): bri ba ni/ /shar du rgyal po bzlog pa yi/ /sngags 'di phur pa'i dpal la dgod/ /oM ra tsa mahA sarba lo ka du stan mA ra ya swAhA le ke swAhA/ /shar lho mo'i dpal la bri ba ni/ /lha chen bzlog pa'i

149a3(rgyud 'grel): oM ra hUM la ra ma trig sarba lo ka sa ma ya zlog /nub du bdud po bzlog pa'i sngags/ /oM badzra sarba dus stan pra ma ya hUM phaT zlog b+hyo/ /nub byang 'gong po bzlog pa'i sngags/ /oM badzra sa ma sa ma ya kye kye has bya hus bya

149b1(rgyud 'grel): ba tsa/ bi ta na sa ya/ sa ta sa ta/ phra ta phra ta/ bi tsur na/ oM a us? Ni sha badzra tsakra war ti bruM sarba lo ki swAhA/ bsrung ba'i sngags ni gsum yin te/ /yul khams bsrung dang bgegs sbyir bsrung/ /gdug pa klu

150b3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug par bya'o/ /de nas khro bo zil dang ldan pas/ thams cad du lta zhing rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor zhing bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o/ /slob dpon mi 'di zhes bya bas/ slob ma mi rtsa sngags bzlas la 'di zhes bya ba/
150b4(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i byang chub rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob par bya'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'di lha dang/ rdo rje'i rab dra ba dang bsam ma/ lha ma yin dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ sa gzung ba/ yi dags dang/ sha za dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po dang/ mkha' 'gro

150b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes lan gsum brjod de/ /de nas dkyil sa bzhi de badzrab ? hUM hUM zhes byin gyis brlab 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la/ bdag nyid spro bskyed de/ deng du bdag che dang 'bras /sa sbyang ba/ /sa gzung ba pu yod/ bdag gis bsod
150b7(rgyud 'grel): nams dbang dang 'bras bur bcas/ ded bdag nyi ma dangs pa ste/ bdag gis mchod sbyin bla na med/ sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs ngas /dang bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas phyag byas la gdug spos 'bul ste
151a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab bo/ ma lus phyogs nas bzhugs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje can gyis dgongs su gsol/ /deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun
151a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs te/ /dngos grub 'dir ni gsol du gsol/ /zhes brjod la/ dkyil 'khor gi steng du/ lha gtso 'khor bsam ste/ ye shes sems dpa' bstim la/ mchod pa dang bstod pa bya'o/ /gser dngul las/
151a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa bya'o/ /ma 'byor na kham pa las byas pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la/ sman dang 'bru dang/ rin po che dang/ spos dam tshig pa la dang/ snying po la sogs pa dang ldan bar rang bzhin med bar bya byas
151a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ rdo rje rnam gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa par 'joms pa la sogs pa la bum pa lnga/ las thams cad pa'i gcig dang drug la/ rang rang gi phyag rgya bri la/ /brgyan gzungs thag mgur tshings yab yum 'od du zhu bas ye
151a5(rgyud 'grel): shes kyi bdud rtsi'i chur gyur par bsam mo/ /gtso bo'i bum ba dbang lha lnga la bskur rnam rgyal bum par gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la ba'i don du/ rdo rje 'chad gi mdun du bzhag /las thams cad pa'i bum pa byad
151a6(rgyud 'grel): shar du bzhag la/ 'di skad gsol gdab bo/ /khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma rdzogs kyi bar du/ bgegs rnams bsrungs shig ces bya ba ni/ bum pa sta gon gyi cho ga'o/ /de nas phyi rol tu byung la/ phyogs skyong la
151a7(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma btad la/ zhi ba'i sbyin bsregs zhun mar gyi bya/ de las bus mo nas 'di skad gsol ba spang nang du log la gdab bo/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa bcom ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas ldan 'das/ /rig sngags gtso bo'i ? rgyal kyis/ /cha gsum gyi
151b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang/ /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /ngas ni dkyil 'khor bri bar 'tshal/ /bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa la/ /de nas gnang ba mdzad pa rigs/ /
151b2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon brtsa? dang/ /? thogs dus mo btsugs la byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang/ /gsang sngags lha gzhan gang lags dang/ /'jig rten skye ba'i lha rnams dang/ /gang yang 'byung po
151b3(rgyud 'grel): mthu chen dang/ /gang su lha yi spyan ma pa'i/ /sems can stan la dga' tha rnams/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis/ /sang ni dkyil 'khor bzang po myong/ /'di zhes bgyi la ci nus kyis/ /chog bzhin du 'dri lags na/ /
151b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag dang slob mang bcas pa la/ /thugs brtse bar ni dgongs nas su/ /tshogs pa thams cad dkyil 'khor du/ /byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol/ /zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob ma'i sta gon bya ste/ bsrung ba dang/ gos
151b5(rgyud 'grel): sar pa gon te/ snyim par me tog thogs te/ slob dpon la phyag byas te/ gsol ba gdab po/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa yi/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /yid dge zhing sems dang ba'i slob ma byang chub chen
151b6(rgyud 'grel): po'i tshul rgyan ? rgyan la bstan na/ /mgon po chen po/ gus bar bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de slob mas brjod pa/ nyid bsal du gsum brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la bos te/ 'di dang dge
151b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dun dang/ /skyabs gsum de ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug bar bgyi/ /de skad lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma la bos te/ 'di skad do/ /
152a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /de nas kun mkhyen thob pa'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di
152a2(rgyud 'grel): gsol cig /de nas sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byed du gzhug ste/ bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang/ /bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang dang/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /de dag thams cad bshags
152a3(rgyud 'grel): par bgyi/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang/ /rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis/ /slob mas sgo dang bzlas brjod bsod nams tshogs/ /de dag kun la rjes yi rang/ /sems bskyed mngon par sangs rgyas dang/
152a4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs spyod la/ /deng nas bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba ji lta bar/ /skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis/ /byang chub sems ni
152a5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed pa ltar/ /'di nyid bdag ni sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje
152a6(rgyud 'grel): rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag sdom pa dpog pa nyid du gzung par bgyi/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'od pa
152a7(rgyud 'grel): la/ /nyin re bzhin ni dus dus su/ /sbyin pa rnams ni rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos rnams ma lus
152b1(rgyud 'grel): gzung/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po yi/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang/ /dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/
152b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /de bzhin brtan par gzung bar bgyi/ zhes zhus pa dang/ slob dpon gyis slob ma la bsrung ba bya ste/ sor ni sor bcu gnyis pa la/ dris bsgo zhing me tog btags la/ /badzra
152b3(rgyud 'grel): ha sa zhes bya pa bzlas zhing sbyin no/ /de nas badzra ti sha zhes bzlas pa'i/ /ku sha sar pa slob ma'i sngas dang stan du sbyin no/ /de nas mdud pa u dum wa ra la a sha ta gsum dang zhi ba le sogs pa'i si ti ldan pa lta ba'i don
152b4(rgyud 'grel): bsrung skud la/ oM badzra raksha haM zhes bzlas la/ slob ma'i dpung par bcing/ sdig pa sbyed zhing rmi lam brtag pa'i phyir/ su gzhug gding do/ /de nas bgegs kyi bar chod mi nus ba'i phyir dri chu la/ oM h+ri b+hi shuto har ma sarba pa pha ni/
152b5(rgyud 'grel): tsa ryas ka pa la na a nan hUM/ zhes dngos grub rang 'brid brtag pa'i tshu khyor ba gsum 'thung du gzhug go /de yi 'og tu sems dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos bshad par bya'o/ /slob ma dkyil 'khor gi 'gram du bsnyal la/
152b6(rgyud 'grel): rmi lam btag go /de nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod de/ bzhin bzangs man chu dag longs shig /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phyag tshal rang don du gcig/ seng ge'i nyal thabs su sang gi nyin mo khyod
152b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis bzang ngan thar pa chen khro bo'i sngags bzlas/ po'i grong khyer mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgo'o/ /de nas mchod pa dbul te phyogs skyong la gtor ma btang ngo/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas nyi ma shar 
153a1(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su/ dkyil 'khor bri ba brtsam par bya ste/ srad bu dkar po/ ser po ri 'byung/ dmar po/ sngon po/ ljang gu la/ oM traM h+ri hUM a/ sa bon las/ rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa lnga bsam
153a2(rgyud 'grel): ste/ oM? badzra sa ma ya sukra ma ti ti ma hUM/ zhes bzlas so/ /phyogs rnam snang 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa mdza' yas rdor sems don grug? rnams snyoms la/ de rnams las rang gi snying kha nas grogs mchog sprul la/
153a3(rgyud 'grel): dzA dzA dzA/ gsum pa sprul te grogs po rang lhar? bsam pa'i dang las brgya'am nyi shu rtsa gcig la sogs pa la btang? tang ngo/ /slob dpon nub tu gnas kha shar du bltas la/ slob ma shar du 'dug la/ tshangs lhar gsal ba'i thig gdab po//
153a4(rgyud 'grel): dag tu brjod yang lho ru 'dug ste/ kha byang du ltas la tshangs thig gnyis ba gdab po/ /de bzhin du bskor ba'i tshul gyis 'gro zhing gdab po/ /phyi ma rnams ni rim par shes par bya'o/ /mtshon dge ba ni dang po dkar po/ /
153a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa ser po/ gsum pa dmar po/ bzhi pa ljang gu/ nang du sngon po'o/ /dbus su gtso bo'i phyag rgyas/ rdo rje rgya gram ngos gcig med pa bri'o/ /thig man ngag ltar gdab po phyogs bzhir gri gug bzhi/ gru bzhir 'khor
153a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa ni srad bu ltar ro/ /khyad par du yig 'bru bri ba rigS lngar bsams su tsa dbul lo/ /dang po slob dpon gyi bri de nas slob mas bri'o/ /lo'i phyag rgya/ byang shar nas brtsams te/ 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la/ dang po la rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ gnyis pa rdo rje rtse
153a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa/ be con rdo rjes lho nub mtshan pa/ rdo rje tho ba nub byang rnams bri'o/ /rim pa gnyis par pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la bkra shis kyi lha mo brgyad dang/ lha rnams la phyogs skyong byang shar gi phyag rgya bri'o/ /sku shar lho 'am
153b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan nam/ yig 'bru'o/ /'bri bar ma nus na/ thig le dgong ngo/ /'bri ba'i dus su dbang ldan nas brtsam ste/ g.yas nas bskor te rgyan mchad par bri'o/ /gru bzhir chos smra ba bstan bde ba la 'dug la/
153b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs gdon no/ /phyogs bzhir me tog gi tshem bu gser 'od rigs lnga'i kyer dang bcas pa rtsig ba bri'o/ /dam pa/ sdud pa/ snang brgyad/ sdong po brgyan rnams gson no/ /de nas yid kyis sgo phye la/
153b3(rgyud 'grel): nam mkha' nas phab la gzhug go / phyog? ? nyi shu rtsa gcig gnyis med du rnal 'byor byang du du bya'o/ /gtso bo'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas shar du so/ /nur du 'khor g+ho bu rnams kyi bdun bdun bzlas so/ /ye shes lha ji tsam
153b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni dkyil nam mkha' la gnas ba'i lha/ 'khor bsgrub pa'o/ /las thams cad pa'i bum pas gnas bsang dang rtor bar bya'o/ /de nas lha bshos dang/ 'khur ba sna tshogs dang/ bza' ba dang/ bca' ba dang/ btung ba'i bye brag
153b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /gtso bo'i sngags kyis btab te dbul lo/ /lha thams cad la ras yug re dbul lo/ /bla re dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phan la sogs pa dbul lo/ /glu dang/ gar dang/ rol mo'i bye brag
153b6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ thams cad dbul lo/ /oM a nud da ba sarba pu ra me ga sa mu kra haM/ spa ra na hi maM ga ga na khang hUM phaT swAhA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis dbul lo/ /des lha rnams mnyes te/ byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nyes
153b7(rgyud 'grel): pa che chung rnams med par bya ba'i phyir/ dril bu dkrol/ yi ge brgya pa bzlas lan bdun zhing/ dkyil 'khor lan bdun bskor ro// lan bdun bzlas de nas ting 'dzin la des lha rnams mnyes bdag dang slob ma byin gyi rlab gnas la/ bzlas pa
154a1(rgyud 'grel): brgya 'am stong ci nus bzlas la/ ci bde ba gnas par bya'o/ /slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga bya ste/ slob ma yol ba'i phyi rol tu bzhag la/ las thams cad pa'i
154a2(rgyud 'grel): chus bsang ba dang gtor ba byas la/ mig dang gdong g.yogs la/ phyag byas la me tog thogs te/ slob mas dkyil 'khor du 'di skad gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /? pa'i nyi ma ma slob ma la khrus bya lus pa/ /
154a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs/ /bdag ming 'di dang gyis zhes bya ba ni/ slob dpon la slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la/ /thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che/ /slob dpon chen pos bdag gzhug mdzad zhes brjod do//
154a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ gsang ba chen po'i rang gi ming nas rigs dag pa/ /shin tu sbas pa'i yongs 'dzin par/ /bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam/ /zhes dri bar bya'o/ /des kyang 'tshal lo zhes
154a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod do/ /de nas slob ma la gong gi sdom pa dpag bo/ /slob mas kyang sdom pa gzung ba'i tshig gis zhes mjug la btags la brjod do/ /de nas slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste/ /khyod kyi
154a6(rgyud 'grel): snying la rab tu gnas/ /gal te gzhan la rab smras na/ /khyod? kyi snying la dral te gshags zhes brjod do/ /de nas dung chos sam/ nya phyis su chu blug la/ 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni sems can dmyal ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das
154a7(rgyud 'grel): te sreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'dis grub/ /badzra kro slod? ma'i man chu ta ka tha zhes brjod do/ /de nas slob ma la 'di skad ces bsgo ste/ de ring phan chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin
154b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis/ nga yi byos kyis shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa yang bya dgos so/ /khyad kyis nga la brnyas yang ma byed cig? /brnyan yang nga pha ma spangs pas/ khyod tshe thung la/ dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes pa sgo'o/ /de nas
154b2(rgyud 'grel): slob mas 'di skad brjod de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ phyag na rdo rje bdag la 'bab par gyur cig /zhes brjod par bya'o/ /de nas slob mas 'di skad brjod do/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /
154b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag na rdo rje yin par grags/ /de ring nyid du 'bab par shog /hUM a a a a zhas lan bdun bzlos su gzhug go /de nas me tog gi phreng bdor zhing dbul lo?/ /slob dpon gyis phreng ba blangs la/ slob ma'i mgo la bcing ngos?
154b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas sngags 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol/ ji ltar dmigs mkhan ? par 'gyur ro lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro rgyal po yis/ /dbang dor la lha gang bab yi dam du gzung 'jig rten yid tog gsal ba ltar// stobs po che 'di long bya la de
154b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin skal ldan khyod kyi dmigs/ /sems can don du dbye bar bya/ /tsag shu g+ha tA na tad pa nud ha ra zhes brjod do/ /de nas dkyil 'khor dang/ lha'i de bzhin nyid bstan no/ /de nas slob dpon la phyag byas la/
154b6(rgyud 'grel): yon gyi mchog dbul ste/ yo byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyis slob dpon mnyes par gyur pas ni/ las kyi dngos grub thob mtho bdag pa'i dbang ngo par de nas dbang bskur ba ni slob dpon la yon bul 'gyur/ /de ni slob ma dkyil 'khor du
154b7(rgyud 'grel): bzlad? rta chung ma bran gzhug gos? nor gser dngul? zhing dar pa'i tsha? ga'o/ /de nas gsol ba gdab par bya ste/ yon tan lnda pas rtse dgongs te/ dbang rnams bdag la gsal du gsol/ de nas slob dpon gyis snod du
155a1(rgyud 'grel): rung bar dgongs nas/ dbang bskur bar bya'o/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la/ gtso bo snying ga'i 'od zer gyis/ nam mkha' nas lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ gser gyi bum pa thogs pa byung
155a2(rgyud 'grel): nas/ dbang bskur bar bsam ste/ 'di skad do/ /hUM mi bskyod ye shes las byung la/ /gnyis med byang nub sems rtags chu/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bum pa 'di/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra
155a3(rgyud 'grel): a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ zhes chu'i dbang bskur ro/ /de nas dbu rgyan la sangs rgyas lnga bsgoms la/ dar dbyangs dang bcas pa thogs te/ snga ma bzhin lha mo rnams kyis dbar bskur bar bsam/ /hUM dbar? bskur rdo rje chen po la/
155a4(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum bzung? du yang gzhug go/ kun gyis phyag byas rin 'byung pas/ rigs lnga dam tshig gsum gyi gnas las byung/ /sangs ting nge 'dzin rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra pa ra ta ka badzra ra tso ho/ de'i 'og tu
155a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i sngags bzlas pa'i phreng ba bcings ste/ 'di ni 'phreng ba dang dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo/ /de nas rdo rje lag par bzung la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni/ khyod ni de ring dbang bskur 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas
155a6(rgyud 'grel): de kun nyid/ /rab tu grub phyir rdo rje long/ /oM mgo bo le badzra a b+hi Shi ny+tsa hUM/ rdo rje slob ma'i lag 'od dpag med par sbyin no/ de nas dril bu blangs te/ dril bu sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /dkrol pa'i sgra ni
155a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab nyid byang chub chen po sangs rgyas gsung/ /khyod kyis bstan par bzung bar gyis/ /g.yas su A/ dril bu'i dbang ngo/ g.yon du/ /don grub de nas lag pa spyi bor bzhag la/ dbang bskur te/ khyod ni lag na
155b1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ste/ /rab tu sngags pa'i gsang ba'i ming/ /rdo rje che ge mo zhes pa'i/ /de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro/ /oM badzra sA tra traM a b+hi Shiny+tsa myi/ badzra bi she g+ha ta/ che ge mo zhes bod te/ ming gi dbang ngo/ /'di dag kun
155b2(rgyud 'grel): ni rig pa'i dbang ngo/ /de nas yon rnams phul la/ me tog thogs te phyag byas la/ gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyid//
155b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir yi ldog pa'i dbang bskur rjes su gnang bar zhu gsol zhes zhu'o/ /de nas sna tshogs par ma'i steng du/ seng ge'i khri bcas la/ ras la sogs pa'i gdan gting la/ de'i steng du slob ma bzhag la/ bgegs gzhos
155b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sngags bzlas la/ lag pa gnyis su rang rang gi mtshan ma/ 'khor lo dang/ rdo rje dang/ pad+ma dang/ rin po che dang/ ral gri la sogs pa byin la/ 'di skad brjod do/ /zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa mtshams dag tu bcad dang/
155b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang dang/ gsang ba dang/ dgug pa la sogs pa thams cad/ de ring yi dam lha'i phyag mtshan phan chod gyis shig /mdor na 'jig rten thams cad du/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs
155b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ /de bzhin du rdo rje dang/ pad ma dang/ rin po che dang/ ral gri rnams la sbyar ro/ /dung yang sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas lung bstan par bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khu tshur g.yon
155b7(rgyud 'grel): pas/ snying gar chos gos kyi mdza' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'i tshul du byas la/ 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan de ring phan chad 'jig rten du skyob pa rnaMs kyis 'khor lo skor chos kyi dung ni sgroD bla med kun tu nang lus gang bar gyis
156a1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa mchog tu grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i ngan 'gro gsum las 'don/ /kye rdo rje che ge mo zhes bya ba/ gang la lung bstan par bya na/ /de la de bzhin
156a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa/ rang rang dam tshig mgrin cig tu/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su lung ston par gyur cig /zhes slob ma la
156a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor bar bya'o/ /de nas rol mo rnams dbul zhing/ bkra shis kyi dbyangs kyi kyang dbang bskur ro/ /de yang 'di skad brjod de/ zho ni kun gyi snying por 'gyur tam/ snying po rnam dag ye shes don rtogs nas/ /
156a4(rgyud 'grel): gzengs bstod yon tan kun dung dang rnga la sogs pa'o gyi dbyings su 'gyur don rnams rtogs pa yi/ /bkra myur 'gyur cig shis nges kyang bel? 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /me long ye shes dag gi gzugs brnyan te/ /mnyi?
156a5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la sogs ye shes zhing rtogs nas/ /rtog bral ma lus ye shes dag gi sku/ /bkra shis nges kyang deng 'dir dbang bskur ro/ /dung ni chos dung ste sgra sku gsum lhun grub chen ldan/ /chos kyi spra rnams ston par
156a6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i tshul/ /chos ma lus tshig tu bstan bgyis nas/ /bkra shis des kyang tshig la dbang thob shog /li khri dmar po dbang gi rang dung phor dbang bzhin ste/ /sems can ma lus dbang du gyur pa yi/ /bder
156a7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs chos kyi rgyal por dbang thob shog /nyung kar rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste/ /rtog bral mnyam nyid ye shes rdo mtshal rje'i sku/ /log rtog bgegs kyi tshogs rnams tshar bcad nas/ /bkra shis des kyang
156b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rnams zhi bar shog /'gi waM dug gsum 'joms pa'i sman yin te/ /spyan mchog chos nyid rab tu rtogs pa ste/ /nyon mongs zur du med par 'gyur pa yi/ /bkra shis des kyang nang kun zhi bar shog /dur ba tshe
156b2(rgyud 'grel): ni 'phel par byed pa ste/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i tshe ni rab grub nas/ /blo pur 'che ba'i rgyun ni 'chad 'gyur pa'i/ /bkra shis des kyang tshe ni 'phel 'gyur shog /bil ba ru rgyan 'bras bu bcas pa ni/ /'di dang 'jog? ram pa
156b3(rgyud 'grel): rten 'das pa'i spyod pa kun/ /bla med byang chub mchog thob 'gyur/ /bkra shis des kyang dus 'dir kun 'grub shog /sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ drang srong skar ma la dga' bas/
156b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod 'jo'i ba lo zho byung phul bas/ /bkra shis pa de bzhin du/ de ring yon bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba/ zho lag tu byin pa'i dbang thob par gyur cig /ces pas/ me long/ dung/ li khri/ nyung kar/ 'gi waM/ dur ba/
156b5(rgyud 'grel): bil ba/ de rnams kyi smon lam ga rab po/ /rin chen dpal be bkra shis rin chen rdzas/ /bde gshegs thugs la mtshan dang dpe byang de rnams kyi tshigs logs na yod shar/ /skal ldan rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas/ /
156b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro lun 'khor ba rgyun gcod bkra shis shog /ces pas gser nya ma yan chad kyis/ /rtags brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bar 'dir rin po che sna bdun dbang yang bskur ro/ /de nas slob ma la lha'i sngags dang/
156b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya yang bstan par bya ste/ de yang dbugs gzhan logs na yod dbyung bas bstan te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i slob ma rnams/ /dkyil 'khor mthong bas tshig loD na yod sgrib pa 'byang/ /lha de bstan de ring bzlas lung sbyin
157a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i rigs su ni/ /khyod ni skya bar the tshom med/ /de'i 'og tu dam tshig sbyin te/ /dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di/ /khyod kyi ma rtag bu bsrung bar gyis/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang/ /byang chub
157a2(rgyud 'grel): sems ni btad mi bya/ /gnod par byed la byams sems bskyed/ /rdo rje sdun? la rtse gdung bya/ /dang pa can la smad mi bya/ /slob dpon la ni snyam mi bya/ /zhabs la spyi bos phyag bgyis te/ /bla ma la ni yon yang/
157a3(rgyud 'grel): dbul/ /dngos po'i khyad par gad dang gang/ /bla ma mnyes phyir? de la dbul?/ /de bzhin bla ma de la ni/ /bza' dang bcas pa med par dbul/ /bla ma brnyas par mi bya ste/ /gal te de la brnyas 'gyur na/ /sangs rgyas
157a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad brnyas dang mtshungs/ /de yi rnam smin myong ba ni/ /dus med par ni 'chi ba'i rgyan/ /glen pa dang ni lkugs pa dang/ /de bzhin gdon dang rims kyis 'debs/ /me dang chu dang rtag tu dgu /shi nas sems
157a5(rgyud 'grel): can dmyal bar lhung/ /sems ni khro bar mi bya zhing/ /nam yang nyams par mi bya'o/ /mnar na da dmyal bar grogs pa yi/ /de nyid 'dir ni bzlog par bshad/ /de nas dus 'dir 'od bla ma smad par bsam /thams
157a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og tu thab khud du rdo rje 'dzin bsams te/ rgyas pa'i cho gas mar sbyin sreg bya gyi bsreg lugs slob ma la brgya rtsab rgyas ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad dbul lo/ /de'i 'og tu zhi ba'i thab khud du/ /rang dang slob ma dang rgyal po dang/
157b1(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi don du zhi ba'i cho gas mar gyi sgang blugs/ /brgya rtsa brgyad dbul te/ mchod pa thams cad kun gyis mchod la gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'dug la/ mchod
157b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ phyogs skyod la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thun mong du smon lam gdab cing/ /snga ma'i phyag rgya dgrol bar bya'o/ /de nas rdo rje dril bu thogs la/ dkyil 'khor
157b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir? mtha? ma bskor ba bya zhing/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gshegs par dmigs shing/ ji ltar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi snying gar bsdus la/ bsrung pa bya zhib btad pas bya'o/ /sa chon rnams bsdus la chu la
157b4(rgyud 'grel): gdab po/ /yo byad ltag ma dang rdzas thams cad ni/ slob dpon dag gis sbyar bar bya'o/ /gal te slob mas sbyang 'gyur na/ /dam tshig dag ni nyams par bshad/ /dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /rgya
157b5(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //lots+tsha ba rin chen bzang phos bsgyur cing gtan la phag pa'o// //bla ma mi bskyod rdo rje yis/ /rjes 'jug rnal 'byor bde
157b6(rgyud 'grel): skyong bdag la gnang/ /bris ba'i bsod nams gang thob nges/ /rnam mkhyen sa la phyin par shog/ //bla ma mi bskyod rdo rje yis/ /rjes 'jug rnal 'byor bde skyong bdag gnang/ /bris pa'i bsod nams gang thob des/ /rnam me gyen?

158a2(rgyud 'grel): nas ldang ba'i dus su/ rang gi snying gar a las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la tAM yig tu snang ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba bsgoms nas/ de las 'od zer 'phras pas lha mo sgrol mas gtso mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
158a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mdun du bltas nas/ me tog dang bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyi yig kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pa bya'o/ /de la gnas pa'i sems kho nas langs nas/ kha bkrub la sogs ba sngon du byas te/ bsam
158a4(rgyud 'grel): gtan kyi khang par byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis/ sna'i rtse mo dang 'brel par blta bas bsam gtan dang 'brel ba'i phyag rgyas/ oM swa b+hA wa shud d+hassarba d+hArmA(rgyud 'grel): swa b+hA wa shud+d+honyahaM/ oM swa b+hA wa shu n+ya ssarba
158a5(rgyud 'grel): d+harmAs swa b+hA? wa shu n+yo haM/ oM shUn+ya tI dzwa? na badzra swa b+hA wAt+ma konyahaM/ zhes pa'i sngags dran la sngon du 'gro bas khams gsum po thams cad dang ring gi lus stod pa nyid du bsam nas/ rang gi bdag nyid me long gri
158a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /de'i rjes su rang gi snying ga'i pad mar a las skyes pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la taM yig gi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa'i bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 
158a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams mdun du bltas te mchod yon dang me tog la sogs pa rnams kyis yid kyi rang bzhin gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o/ /de la tshigs su bcad po ni/ oM sangs rgyas kun la bdag phyag 'chal/ rgyal bas

158b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung/ /sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la/ /byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed bar bgyi/ /byang chub mchog gi
158b3(rgyud 'grel): sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/ /sems can thams cad bdag gi 'gron du gnyer/ /byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi/ /'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /ces pa la sogs pa smon
158b4(rgyud 'grel): lam gyi mthar thug pa byas la/ /lha mo sgrol mas gtso mdzad pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de thams cad rang gi lus la gzhug go /'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs spel ba'i cho ga'o/ /de nas ye shes kyi cho gas rdzogs
158b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i don tu cho ga bri bar bya ste/ paM las skyes pa'i pad+mar raM las skyes pa'i nyi ma la hUM las skyes pa'i bgegs mthar byed drag po'i gzugs can g.yon brkyang gis gnas pa/ g.yas na rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa sdigs

159a1(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ oM badzra bi tA na hUM biM hUM/ oM badzra sha rA dzA la traM shaM traM/ oM badzra dzwA lA na lArka hUM hUM hUM/ 'di ltar bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas/ puM yig las skyes pa'i ri rab la a las
159a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i pad+ma la/ b+h+ruM yig las skyes ba'i khang pa rtsegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa rta babs bzhis brgyan pa/ do shal dang do shal phyed pa dang me tog gi phreng ba dang me tog la sogs pas
159a3(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa de'i dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa/ sgo bzhir yang sna tshogs pad ma rnams so/ /dbus su gnas pa'i sna tshogs pad+ma las skyes pa'i zla ba la rar gi lus taM yig gis sa bon las byung ba'i lha
159a4(rgyud 'grel): mo sgrol ma'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid 'od kyi snang ba zhal cig spyan gnyis phyag bzhi ma/ sngo ljang sems dpa' i skyil krung can/ g.yas pa mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa utpal dang po ti sa mtshan
159a5(rgyud 'grel): pa bsgom par bya'o/ /de'i/ thugs gar traM yig go /de las byung ba'i yi ge gsum ni oM kha dog dkar po rnam par snang mdzad ni spyi bor bsgom par bya'o/ /A:yig kha dog dmar po 'od dpag tu med pa ni
159a6(rgyud 'grel): kha'i nang du bsgom par bya'o/ /hUM yig kha dog ljang gu don yod grub pa ni snying gar bsgom par bya'o/ /'dir sngags ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya wAka tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA wAt+ma konyhaM/ de nas rang gi lus la sngags

159b3(rgyud 'grel): 'das ma rdo rje sgrol ma nag mo mi skyod pa'i rang bzhin phyag gnyis rdo rje dang utpa la 'dzin pa/ lhor rin chen sgrol ma ser mo rin chen 'gyur ldan gyi rang bzhin phyag gnyis na rin po che dang utpa la 'dzin la/ nub tu par ma

159b6(rgyud 'grel): bu'i ye shes shes bya ba ste ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin du bsam par bya'o/ /mer me tog sgrol ma dkar mo me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin/ bden bral du bdug spos sgrol ma nag mo chu'i khams kyi rang
159b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin/ phyag gnyis na spos phor 'dzin pa/ rlung du mar me sgrol ma dmar mo phyag gnyis mar me'i kong bus mtshan pa me'i khams kyi rang bzhin/ dbang ldan dru dri'i sgrol ma gur gum gyi dmog can dri'i dung chos 'dzin pa rlung gi
160a1(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi rang bzhin can/ shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin pa dad pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin g.yas rkyang ba can/ lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma ser mo zhags pa 'dzin pa brtson 'grus
160a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi dbang po'i rang bzhin g.yas brkyang ba can/ nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin pa dran pa'i dbang po'i rang bzhin g.yas brkyang ba can/ byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma dkar mo rdo rje dril bu
160a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'i rang bzhin g.yas brkyang ba can no/ /dkyil 'khor kyi gtso mo khaM yig las skyes pa'i don yod grub pa'i cod pan can no/ /de nas bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mo'i
160a4(rgyud 'grel): snying gar gnas pa'i sa bon tAM? yig las 'od zer sna tshogs 'phros pas me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te/ dza:hUM baM ho:zhes pa'i sngags kyis dgug pa dang

160b7(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol lo/ /ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu te d+ha naM med da swAhA/ zhes pa'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /sgrol ma nor sbyin ma'i bsgrub thabs paN+Di ta chen po sa ha dza sh+rI sa

161a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal bzang po'i bka' lung dang/ dpon po grags pa rin chen gyi gsung bzhin du/ sne gdong nang sa nas yo byad phun sum tshogs pa stsal te gnas de nyid du/ kha che'i paN+Di ta chen po ku mA ra sh+rI b+ha tra dang/ bod
161a3(rgyud 'grel): kyi lots+tsha ba nam mkha' bzang pos bsgyur ba'o/ /'di yi brgyud pa ni/ rje btsun ma sgrol ma/ mahA paN+Ti tas ha dza sh+rI?/ mahA paN+Ti ta ku mA ra sh+rI b+ha dra/ mahA lots+tsha ba nam mkha' bzang po/ mahA lots+tsha pa thugs rje dpal la'o/ /
161a4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma u bra'i? sgrub thabs? kyi rjes gnang bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ u gra tAr pA dzA bi d+hi nI ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma u gra'i mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thog

161b3(rgyud 'grel): mar bsam par bya'o/ /de nas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /mngon par dbang bskur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni rang gi snying ga nas rnam par 'phros te/ mi bskyod pa

161b5(rgyud 'grel): chen po la/ /khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga tA a b+hi She ka sa ma ya sh+ri ye hUM swAhA/ de nas 'di ltar oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM
161b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes gsum du brjod de/ lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlab po/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung sngags kyi bzlas pa sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i sku mi dmigs par bsams la stong pa nyid kyi don la bzhag go /de'i rjes su
161b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa lnga'i cho gas rje btsun ma yang dag par mchod nas bzod par gsol te gshegs su gsol lo/ /sgrol ma u gra'i mchod pa'i chog rdzogs so// //rdo rje gdan gyi mkhan po sh+ri sha ri pu
162a1(rgyud 'grel): tra ma hA swa mi'i zhal mnga' nas mdzad de/ rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// //sgrol ma dmar mo'i sgrub thabs rdo rje gdan pas mdzad pa gzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ staM dA ra wa shaM bi d+hi na tsakra nA
162a2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ bod skad du/ sgrol ma dmar mos 'gro ba dbang du bsdu ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ ga bur dang/ gur gum dang/
162a3(rgyud 'grel): gla rtsi dang/ rtsan dan rnams kyis gro ga la utpal 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis pa bris la/ 'dab ma re re la'ang sngags 'di dag chos brgyad la bri bar bya'o/ /oM tA re tut+tAr tu re saM tA ra tA re Ni h+ri(rgyud 'grel): swAhA/ zhes lte
162a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang bcas par ro/ /oM tA re tut+tA re tu re che ge mo wa shi ku ru paM tA da tA de Ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): swAhA zhes pa ni mu khyud la'o/ /steng 'og gi bdag nyid kyis 'dab ma dang bcas par su rim mo/ /de nyid rab tu gnas pa byas pa la/
162a5(rgyud 'grel): dril ba srad bu dmar pos dkris shing/ sa'i mchod rten khru gang ba'i nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /gdugs kyis dkyil 'khor ma reg pa'i sa'i maN+Dal la sind+hu ra'am/ 'tshal la sogs pa sbags par bya'o/ /dang mchod
162a6(rgyud 'grel): rten bzhag par bya'o/ /me tog a sho ka la sogs pa 'am/ me tog lcags kyu can gyis sam/ med na me tog dang po gang rung gis dus gsum du yang dag par mchod nas/ sngon du gsungs pa'i sngags dang/
162a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrub bya'i ming spel dang bcas pa brgyad lhag pa brgya rab tu bzlas so/ /de ltar zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du sgrub par byas na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba yang nges par dbang du 'du bar 'gyur na gzhan lta ci zhig smos/
162b1(rgyud 'grel): gal te 'grub par ma gyur na/ seng ldeng dmar po'i me la 'khor lo bdugs na/ the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /sgrol ma dmar mos 'gro ba dbang du bya ba'i 'khor lo'i cho ga'o/ /de'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa
162b2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs gnyis kyis sbyor ba sngon du btang bar bya'/ /de nas pad ma dmar po dang zla ba dmar po'i steng du utpal dmar po'i ge sar la h+rI(rgyud 'grel): dmar pos mtshan pa yongs su gyur pa las bskyed pa'i sgrol ma dmar mo zhal cig
162b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis ma/ spyan gsum ma g.yas pa lcags kyu dang/ cig bshos kyis utpa las mtshan pa'i zhags pa 'dzin pa/ brgyad gnyis lon pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa/ dpa' ma'i cha byad dang ldan pa/ rgyan sna tshogs
162b4(rgyud 'grel): bas brgyan pa/ sems dpa' i skyil krung du gnas pa/ 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can du bsam la/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re tu re sa tA ra tA re Ni h+rI(rgyud 'grel): che ge mo wa shaM ku ru swAhA/ zhes kha dog dmar po dang bcas pa'i 'od zer
162b5(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang zhags pa lta bu rang gi snying ga nas 'phros pas sgrub bya gang dbang du bya ba'i snying ga la sogs par lcags kyus gzung ste/ utpa las zhags pas mgul pa nas bcings shing bkug pa de nyid 'od du zhu nas rang
162b6(rgyud 'grel): gi thugs kar thim par bsam la /sngags bzlas par bya'o/ /bzlas pa'i man ngag sgrol ma dmar mos 'gro ba dbang du bsdud pa'i man ngag 'khor lo dang bcas pa rdo rje gdan pa bsod snyoms pas mdzad pa rdzogs so/
162b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po za zhes bya ba zhig gsang sngags kyi theg pa bka' ma yin zer bas/ de'i log rtogs dgag pa'i chod du mdzad pa'o/ /ti paM ka ra'i sngags lugs bcu gsum bzhugs pa lags sho/ /rgya gar skad du/ man tra ya da ra/
163a1(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ sngags sngags zer kyi don 'jug pa/ rje btsun kun la skyobs pa'i nus pa yod cing sku gsung thugs kyi skyon mi mnga' bas na btsun pa'o/ /sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ltar mtshan nyid kyi theg pa la
163a2(rgyud 'grel): ` gling gsum dus khyad par du gyur ba 'dzam bu gling/ 'gro ba rigs drug las khyad par du gyur ba dal 'byor dang ldan pa/ sgrub pa khyad par du gyur pa mu stegs pa ma yin pa/ bud+d+ha'i theg pa la zhugs pa/ bud+d+ha'i theg pa las nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la khyad par du gyur pa 'phags pa'i theg pa chen po'o//
163a3(rgyud 'grel): thag pa chen po las khyad bar du gyur pa gsang sngags bla na med pa zhugs pa'i de lta bur gyur pa gcig/ gsang sngags la 'jug par 'di bshad par bya'o/ /'chil ba'i rtog ge pa rnams la ni/ sngags kyi theg pa zhes pa'i don ci zhig /ji ltar dgra 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan
163a4(rgyud 'grel): du 'gyur/ rnam par dbye ba ni du dang ldan/ ji ltar lam du khyer/ 'bras bu ji lta bu zhig thob par 'gyur rang la nyams med par zhe na/ kyi rigs pa de dag rtogs nas theg pa bzhi las khyad par bstan pa yongs su bcad pa'i
163a5(rgyud 'grel): nyams su len pa'i dus su ji ltar byed dri ba ni 'og tu 'byung ngo/ /phyir/ 'di skad ston pa'am de'i yin te/ sde snod gsum las don blo la gnas mchog tu gyur pa ni rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde snod bya ba yin te/ de yang sgyu skyes pas de lan gyi 'phrul dra
163a6(rgyud 'grel): ba las/ theg pa gsum theg pa gnyis po las khyad par yod de/ ba ni khams gsum 'khor ba las chos rnams ni blos rtags pas sku gsung thugs laM du khyer bas nyams su blangs pas rtogs bas ji ltar byug lan dngos/ sngags de ni gyis des 'byung de ci shes pa/ /theg pa gcig gis/
163a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bur sde snod gsum gnas zhes gsungs pa'i don ni/ gsum ni rgyu yin la gcig ni 'bras bu yin no/ /gsang sngags sku gsung thugs mi phyed par ston pas sde snod theg pa gsum las de ltar khyad par du 'phags so//
163b1(rgyud 'grel): mdo sde nas gsum slab pa gsum ka 'dul ba nas tshul khrims mngon pa nas shes dang blo gros de yi rang gi ngo bo yang/ /so sor ye nas 'bras bu 'grub pa de ltar rig pa'i ye shes dang/ /dngos dang mthun pa'i rnams zhen pa dang bral ba de tsam ni sngags te/ /rang bzhin
163b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ /de sngags rang gis stan pa srings pa las 'khrul pa dang gzhi dngos pa ltar ye nas grub pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'bras bu de bsal bar bstan nas la sgra la 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan ni/ nges chig bstan pa dang dgyes rdor la sogs pa sgom pa'i/ /man tra'i
163b3(rgyud 'grel): sgra las drangs na shes pa skyob par byed pa'i don can du 'gyur ba'o/ /de yang shes pa ni? yid kyi rnam par shes pa la/ skyob pa ni ngo bo nyid sngags pa rang gi ji ltar na phung po lnga lta bu yod pa la sogs pa ste yongs su shes ba'i dbang las/ 'dzin
163b4(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlabs pa'i lha sgom pa'o mi lag stan pa ma ma ya na yid tra tra ya na skyob pa mdor na shes pa dang sgrub? pa'o/ /byed ba'i las stan pa chags dang bral pa'i sgrib pa' lugs bshad pa de bzhin nyid bde nyoms pa lnga/ 'dod yon lnga la spyad kyang gzugs ji mthong bde ba sgra ci thos bde ba/ nges pa rnyed pa nyid do/ /
163b5(rgyud 'grel): yang 'bras bu la du byed pa'i phyir mtshan nyid la khyad par du ston te/ shi srid ta a bdar las bde stong/ don cig las ni ma rmongs dang/ thabs mang rka ba med pa dang/ dbang po rnon po'i yul du 'gyur/ /sngags kyi theg mi 'ching ba nyid do//
163b6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi spyod na thabs kyi theg pa ga re zhan pa khyad par 'phags/ /ces sam? kri ta'i sgra ba'i rigs lus rjes 'phags pa 'dis shes bya snang stong dbyer med par phyi nang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la yid 'chid ba'o/ /dbang po btul po'i lam ma yin pas so/ /khyad par bzhin theg sngags kyi
163b7(rgyud 'grel): bdul? bya ba gong ma gnyis bshad pas yin te/ pha rol tu phyin pa las de kho na nyid la ma/ bde ba'i dang du thim bde ba'i ngo bor thim mu tra bzhi dang rga/ ba dang rtsa rlung la sogs pa'o// rmongs las/ po/ la skye ba'i thabs sar dmyal ba la sogs pa mi 'chor ba dang/ thabs mang bas
164a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa sgo mang ba dang/ rka ba med pa'i man ngag gis le lo can sangs rgya ba dang/ dbang po rnon pa'i yul du gyur bas/ zab mo gting dpag dka' bar ston to/ /de'i dbye ba yang
164a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags can lag? mchod ba chen po 'dod chags che zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i na mi dgos pas/ glo srid bde ba dang thabs 'dra la mos bal dbang po rnon po zhes bya'o/ dbang po rtul po phyag rgya la bden da? blo bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan to// lus ngag yid da ltar phye nas nyams su len/ sku rdo rje
164a3(rgyud 'grel): gang dag sbyor ba tsan la sogs sbyar ba nyid stong pa'o// dang/ gsung rdo rje dang /gang? zlas ba thugs rdo rje dang/ dam tshig rdo rje'i dbang gis/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi rtog pa sbyang ba'i gsang sngags dang/ rigs sngags dang/ lus la
164a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs 'di ltar rang la sbyor ba'o sku gsung thugs 'di ltar mnga' ba de sin? gyis thob bar bzhed do// sems bud+d+ha dang po dam bca' i? ba'i dbang gis so// lha skur sngags kyi bzlas la chos nyid sku gsung thugs kyi grog gcig sbyor na dam tshig lus lhar byed pa snod? yid la sogs pas dag sngags kyi zlas ba gdong lha dang?
164a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa snying po dang/ chos sku phyag rgya dang thugs rje rgyas zhes bya ba'i rgyu bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsgrub par bya ba'i don lam du khyor na/ dbang po dman bas rang gi rtogs pa ltar khyer ba dang/ 'bring gis lha nyid kyang sgyu ma'i rang
164a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub gang 'dod pa'i rig pa dang sbyar ba'i sngags bzlas so 'debs pa dang thugs rjes mdzad bsgrub bas so/ /dper na gser 'gyur ci na bya ba la sogs pa'o// bzhin du shes skyed rims sku gsung thugs nyams su blangs pas rtog pa 'di ltar byung na 'di ltar ro// ba dang/ sgyu ma snang la rang bzhin med pa
164a7(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyang/ 'dul bya'i snang ba ? pa'i stong pa rnam pa'i ye shes nyid de don li mchog dang ldan pa dang/ yi la de tsam gyis kyang rdzogs rims su 'gro ba zhes pa med bar mi byed tshul gyis gnas pa'i rol pa'o/ /dbang po dbang po rab mchog ni
164b1(rgyud 'grel): snang ba 'di dag sems su bsdud pa dang/ sems kyi rang bzhin med pa dang/ rang rig pa de yang bde ba chen por byed la/ bde ba chen po de yang rtoD dang 'gyur bas don gyis stong par byed pa'o/ /'di'i dpe yang gser 'gyur gyi rnam pa bzhin
164b2(rgyud 'grel): du rig par bya'o/ /'bras bu ji ltar thob par theg pa sman pa las zlog nas 'di man chad rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o 'das par shes gzung ba'i yul lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o/ /'bring gis 'dzin pa'i sems kyang med na/ rang gis ni yul pha rol tu phyin pa las sngags khyad par 'gyur ba ni/
164b3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag rnam pa kun ldan gyi stong pa'i dngos po ma spangs pa'i don sgom pa rab kyi mdza' las skyes pa'i shes pa/ mchog tu gyur ba'i bde ba chen po/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings/ khyad par can du byed gzhi 'gyur ba'i lam yin pas so//
164b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres rdo rje sems dpa' i rang pa bco brgyad kyi dngos gzhir gyur pa'o/ /des na chos nyid don chen po'i las ni ma nyams pa la/ tshogs sa chen po'i med pha rol tu phyin pa man chad ltar nang nas lam du khyer ba/ par rang
164b5(rgyud 'grel): spangs? pa'i ye shes phyin ci ma log pas gong ma bzhi po ltar? ba phyag rgya bzhi ting 'dzin sgrib pa zad pa/ gsal ba zhen pa med pa lha dang mi'i bde ba las ma rmongs pa dang thabs mang ba dang rka ba med pa dbang po snon po'i yul yin pa bzhi'// gi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin/ sangs rgya ba 'di ni skyes bu
164b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi don chen du 'gyur ba kho na'o/ /sngags kyi don 'jug pa/ slob dpon ti paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa'o/ /rdzogs so// //mtshan nyid pa ni phyin sbyor 'dod pa rten pa la sogs pas rgya gar
164b7(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ she ka u pa d+he sha /bod dbang po snon po sngags kyi don shes pa des rmi lam dbang la 'jug pa'o// skad du/ dbang gi ji ltar spyod kyang? dge ba'i dgos ched de phyir gsang sngags su gsungs so// man ngag /rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor
165a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lam 'gyur ba/ /dbang gi rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /bum pa la rten dbang dang ni/ /de bzhin shes rab ma bsten pa'o/ /bum pa'i dbang la rnam pa gnyis/ /sgrub pa'i dbang dang slob
165a2(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi/ /dbang ni gnyis su nges pa yin/ /nyon mongs sgrib pa ma lus pa/ /chu dang rdo rje nas rdo slob dpon gyi dbang lan chod gsang ba nas shes rab ye shes snang ba yan chad bum pa rgyas par bshad bas de yis khrus byed cing/ /chu dang cod pan
165a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril/ dang/ ming dang bdag po dbang du bcas/ /rigs las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ /sgrub pa po yi dbang du nges/ /dkyil/ slob dpon gyi dbang 'khor lha yi de nyid dang/ /slob dpon las la slab med? pa dang/ rin/ /
165a4(rgyud 'grel): chu nas phyir mi ldog pa'i bar ro/ /lha'i de nyid nas nges shes skyed pa'i bar ro/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sgor zhugs nas bum pa'i dbang shin tu sbas pa bshad pa/ gsang ba'i rgyu dang nges pa che/ /slob dpon dbang du shes bar bya/ /kyi dbang gzer bstod pa dang lha mchod
165a5(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /dam tshig sgrag pa thun mong ste/ /lung bstan pa dang rjes gnang mchog /so so nyid du nges pa yin/ /de yang bris sa thebs pa'i dkyil 'khor kyi la/ /rten pa nyid du shes par thun mongs pa'i dbang bya/ /phyag
165a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya 'ching slob ma la ba'i dbang la yang/ /phyi dang nang du shes par bya/ /phyi ni lce bum pa'i dbang dang rdo rje slob dpon man chad la byang chub sems/ /rdul tshon dkar dmar 'di la rten pa'o thig le sbyin byed cing/ /ngag gi sgrib pa sbyor
165a7(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i bshad pas lus kyi dkyil 'khor la rten ba'o// ba can/ /de yang da dang re'u'i tshul dge slong lta bu la pha las thos pa dang/ /ma ? nas long gi slab bya dan bye'u'i tshul du'o// /dper bskur ba na las thos ba'i bye brag gis /gad mos bar bya'o/ /dbyo ba /sgrib ban
165b1(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gnyis su nges/ /de la ba ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /'khor lo nang gi dbang bshad pa/ /de yang gnyis su shes par bya/ /shes rab dbang dang ye shes kyi/ /dbang mchog gnyis su shes bya ste/ /de la shes
165b2(rgyud 'grel): rab dbang bstan pa/ /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bshad pas bu mo rigs lnga gang rnyed kyang/ /lha mo nyid du byin rlab cing/ /cha lugs nyid kyang de 'dra de nyid yin tshig dbang rin po che yin sems kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /yi ge nges par sgrub
165b3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas/ /slob ma'i lag tu gtang pa dang/ /rdo rje gsang dbang gi dus kyi bu mo yang 'di 'phra yang gnyis kyi dus su 'dra ? so sa/ pad+ma snyoms 'jug pas/ rang lus gnas pa'i bde ba ni/ /mtsh+n nyid 'khrul a las pad+ma sbyor ba'i phyag ? rdo rje ? mkha' gsang byin kyi rlabs so//
165b4(rgyud 'grel): pa shes med pas/ /shes rab stobs las skyes dngos gzhi pas na/ /shes rab dbang du brjod pa yin/ /de nas rang lus thabs dang ldan pa la de rjes tshangs ba'i phyag rgya gnyis las nyid la ni/ /de yi mtshan nyid ci 'dra ba/ /
165b5(rgyud 'grel): sngon bde bdes chad shes kyis skyin byas so// par ma gyur ba/ /lkug mas dbang de'i med yang/ bde ba myong ba'i tshul/ /bzhi pa'i dbang bshad pa dri med dran pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/ /ye shes dbang du brjod sems kyi dkyil 'khor la bsten nas
165b6(rgyud 'grel): pa yin/ /de yi dbang rnams rdzogs pa dang/ /rgyal rigs sa de lta nyams su myong yang smra ra med do// la bkod pa dag /spyi bo nas ni dbang bskur brjod du Na bas nyams su myong ba'i bzhin/ /dpe'i ye shes la rten nas don gyi ye shes skye ba'i gdams pa bshad pa'o
165b7(rgyud 'grel): dus de man chad skal ldan dbang thob nas /rigs kyi bu/ /gling bzhi la dbang ba'i ra tsa yang dag rdzogs pa'i bud+d+ha de'i sras su dbang bskur ste/ dbang bskur nas khrims 'dzin pa bzhin sangs rgyas sras/ /yon tan rgyal bo'i gdung la rigs la stobs rnams
166a1(rgyud 'grel): chubs pa yin/ /ti paM ka ra sh+ri dz+nya nas mdzad pa'i dbang gi man ngag rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sa ma g+ha pa ta/ bod skad du/ dam tshig sbas pa/ rje btsun ma
166a2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo// longs spyod pa bzhin du thA d+ha'i chos la longs spyod pa'o/ /dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du/ gyi / dbang bskur dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor blo dang bskur nas daM tshig srungs dgos pas dam tshig bstan
166a3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas/ /dam tshig rtag tu skyang bar bya/ /byang chub sems kyi rdo rje dang/ /dam tshig mdor bstan pa sgrub thabs bcu gsum gyi sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa rang gi chos nyid par bla ma rdo rje shes rab dang ldan pa yin dam tshig srangs na 'dzin pa yang/ /tha dang
166a4(rgyud 'grel): par ni ma mthong ba/ /skyon yon shes par byas la'o/ de ni dam tshig yi dam lha dang dang po yin/ /thos pa'i byas pa'i spun dang dbang gi spun/ /man ngag khus ba'i spun dang sgrub pa'i sbun/ /dam tshig spyan ras gzigs snying skur gcig ba'i rgyud
166a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// mthong na nyams par 'gyur spun dang lte bar ster ma 'dra pa'o bgrang ba'i lnga po rtsa bzang rtsa lung nas skad 'don pa lhan gcig tu bkur ba'i la/ /rtsa bza' ba rdo rje'i bum pa khro mi mdzad pa'i bo lhan gcig du byas ba'i lhan gcig du thob pa'i btson par byed pa ni/ /
166a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig gnyis par brjod pa yin/ /chig 'gru dang ni gang zag dang/ /drang don dang rnam par shes/ /de la yid bstan mi byed pa/ /de ni dag tu dam tshig gsum pa yin/ /ri mo can dang dud lus brtags pa
166a7(rgyud 'grel): lung zab mo'i don ston par byed/ can ma/ /pang dpral ban pad+ma'i ru ba yod pa ma can dang glang po can/ /phur lnga mngon dang ldan pa mi bden rdzun zer ba bu can/ bde gshegs bka' las 'da' ba' i gyi 'di rnams rten stogs par bshad bas bud med
166b1(rgyud 'grel): bstan/ /de ni dam tshig bzhi pa'o/ /bza' btung rnam pa ci mthong ba /gos sogs sha yi rnam pa dag /ci gsol bdud rtsi'i rnam rang bzhin par shes/ /'di ni dam tshig lnga pa'o/ /snod bsdud? gzhal ya? mkha' /
166b2(rgyud 'grel): bsdus pa'i chos rnams kun/ /'dod gi dam tshig lha'i bud+d+ha cung zad kyis thob par bshad pa las sa mi'i la sogs pa dkyil rtog pa med pa la dngos grub tu shes pa'o// 'khor rnam pa ru/ /dkon mchog la mi mos dran pa cig ? la gang yin pa/
166b3(rgyud 'grel): de ni dam tshig drug pa'o/ /stod smad bskur dang ma rang gang bsgom pa'i lhar bkur dang/ /grags dang ma grags rnyad pa dang/ /ma rnyed pa la mnyam sems ldan/ /de ni dam tshig bdun pa'o/ /srungs dam tshig ma ni drang srong
166b4(rgyud 'grel): ? ma? srungs na nyams pa'o thub dang/ /dga' mi dga' ba rang gi bud med rgyal po dang/ /mu chos mgon nyam ba'o stegs bram ze dbang mi skur/ /de ni dam tshig brgyad pa'o/ /mos pas mgom mnyam na nyams smad dang lo lo can//
166b5(rgyud 'grel): dag? slong sbyor ba dregs pa mtshan ma nyams pa don mi mthong g.yo ldan snying stobs med pa la/ /bstan pa'i gsang ba sgrog mi byed/ /'di ni gtsang sbra che dam tshig dgu pa'o/ /snying rje byams sems gzhan la med/ /shes pa theg pa 'og ma la
166b6(rgyud 'grel): srid chags chos rnams la/ /dngos rgyus chos tshol ba por mngon par zhen mi byed/ /'di ni rtags mthong ba'i mo ngan shes ? te rtsa rlung gdaM ? lo gnam zlas rjod dang mchod sbyin tsam la chags nang rgyal che dam tshig bcu ba'o/ /dam tshig sa las dang
166b7(rgyud 'grel): zab pa'i snod yin dgos? pa'i chos kyi rgya/ /phyag rgya chen po dngos par ma rtogs par par bya gcig zhen na nyams ma zhe nan spungs pa'o/ /las/ /don gzhan la log par sems mi byed pa/ /de ni dam tshig bcu srungs na dam tshig gcig pa'o/ /
167a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag dang mi rtag sdug bsngal dang/ /stong pa dang ni bdag med dang/ /byang chub sems ni dran byed pa/ /de ni dam tshig bcu gnyis pa'o/ /chos la ming ni yod min cing/ /'phags pa la ni gzugs med pa/ /gang
167a2(rgyud 'grel): brag? ngo bo nyid med shes/ dus rtag tu chos sarba de ni dam tshig bcu 'khor ba gsum don dam par na pa'o/ /rdo byams pa snying rje rje'i dam tshig bcu gsum pa/ /gang gis brjod pa las 'das pa bar byed na nyams don dam du bsrungs na thar don ?  par?
167a3(rgyud 'grel): bas ste/ /gal te nyams par gyur pa na/ /rdo rje dmyal bar 'tshad pa yin/ /des na gsang sngags pa las ni/ /skye ba gnyis yin bde gshegs gsung/ /ji ltar smyug ldom sbrul zhugs bzhin/ /'gyur bar 'di la the tshom
167a4(rgyud 'grel): med/ /dam tshig sngas pa/ ti paM ka ras chos nyid mi phyed par ston pas de ltar shes na srungs pa bud+d+ha dang chos dang gang zag dang bcas par bzung na nyams/ rgyu 'brul drang las bud?  d+ha pa dang po rdo rje dmyal ba mdzad pa dper na rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sra
167a5(rgyud 'grel): da ta ta/ bod skad du/ gzhal yas khang sbyin pa/ rje btsun ma sgrol lam la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stong nyid bsgom pa'i rnal 'byo pas/ /snying rje chen pos 'gro ba ma lus pa yul du byas la/ /cho ga gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i/ /
167a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig dang ldan pa nges lha mnyes par byed dgos bas lha dang bla ma la gzhal yas khang sbyin pa ston/ 'dod pa'i lha rjes su dran dang po kho nar 'dod lha skyed ba'o don dam par na 'di ltar yin pa la de ltar 'dri bas/ /ma rtogs pas/ 'khor ba'i du kha gsung di 'brul sogs pa las pa dang/ gnas gsum du a las zla ba'i
167a7(rgyud 'grel): dal gsum oM A(rgyud 'grel): hUM la gnas ba'i yi ge'i rgyal po 'bru gsum yi dam gang byed skyed la gyis/ sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlabs/ pa'i phyir 'khor spyi bor lo pad+ma /mgrin par rdo rje'i snying gar nang du tshud pa'i/ 'dod lha'i sku rdo rje sku gsung thugs la sogs
167b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dkar po dang/ dmar po dang/ sngon po'i rnam pa la/ de dang de'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa bsgoms pa ni/ ji ltar me long gi bzhin gyis gang ba'i rnam pa lta bu'o/ /de nas snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i sa bon las/ 'od bros bla ma
167b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod sku spyan drangs /gsung? la/ bdun thugs po rnam phyag mchan rtags kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa par dag pa dang/ dper na me long? gi gzugs lta bur rig/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i blos/ sngon du 'dod lta skyed la dang bar tshags bsags pa la sogs pa bya'o// byang chub mchog tu bskyed
167b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ oM sarba 'dod? lha'i mnga' la? mdun du d+harma a ka sha bi sa ma sa d+hu sarba hUM/ zhes pa'i don gyis/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas sems bskyed pa'i 'dod gnas pa dang/ yaM baM laM paM gi sa bon las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chags?
167b4(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ suM las gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i lte ba la baM las pad+ma'i mchod sdong bzang po la pad ma rang bzhin med pa ston pa nyid kyi dang las stong gis brgyan pa gcig bsams la/ yang rlung gu ba rim? ba dan bum badzraSh+The? bas mtshan pa bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i sa
167b5(rgyud 'grel): bon las 'od zer 'phros pas tshogs bsags pa'i yul rnams thob nas/ pad ma'i mchod sdong bzhugs pa/ gzugs dang/ dri dang/ 'od dang/ kha dog sna tshogs ba las gzi brjid kyi rnam pa can/ sngon gsum lta bur dmigs la/ srog
167b6(rgyud 'grel): chags spangs pa'i chu la/ dri zhim pos spyan ? nas bgos pa'i ma 'da/ bla ma ? 'dod lha me tog la sogs bla ma dang bur lha rnams kyang gtor byas la/ ba las byung ba'i bdud rtsi lngas/ byugs la/ bdud rtsi chen po'i chag chag gtab la/ me tog/
167b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ma? lha'i grangs dang mnyam bar dgram pa dang/ sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs par bya'o/ /me tog dbul ba dang dgram pa dang gnyis ka sngags 'dis bya/ mar dang 'o ma dang zho dang chu dang lci ba'o oM a ka ne ni ka ne/ a byi la ma d+ha la/ tsan dan ba sogs pas swAhA/ oM
168a1(rgyud 'grel): badzra re khe hUM/ zhes pas bla ma la 'bul na rin po che'i phye ma brdal bar bsam pa 'am/ 'phags pa la 'bul na rin po che'i? gzhal med khang du bsam la dbul te/ de yang sil ma dang/ tshom bu'i rnam par dbyi
168a2(rgyud 'grel): pas dbye bar shes ma 'dal byi dod byed pa'i sngags par bya'o/ /'di me tog sa'i ma gtor ba'i bla ma mchod pa'i ma 'dal du bzung bar bya'o/ /de yang bla ma sangs rgyas mchod pa yi/ /ma rin po che'i mkha' 'khyed na 'dal rtag tu 'dod lha'i gzhal yas khang du skyeb na bya
