168a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /sdig pa thams cad med byed pa/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /gtso bor sangs rgyas zhing khams rab lung pas/ spyan ras gzigs/ rtogs pa bcu gcig pa'i tan dra las 'byam du/ /rnal 'byor phun sum chogs par 'gyur/ /ces
168a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phan yon gsungs so/ /ma 'dal 'bul ste gang ba sus brdzogs so/ / //gang du sngags gsung ba de bzlom kyang ma 'da' byas nas phul na ne ni bud+d+ha'i zhing stong la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro rgya gar skad du/ pa yo k+Shi pa ti baM d+hi/ bod skad du/ chu gtor gyi tsha ga/
168a5(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu gtor byed par 'dod pas/ dang por thams cad bdag med par dran par byas la/ snying rje'i dbang lha dang bla ma mnyes ba des thun mong du tshogs bsags cing bar chad ni par bya ba'i phyir chab gtor bston te gis 'gro ba
168a6(rgyud 'grel): la bltas ste/ sdug bsngal dmyal ba la sogs pa rnams la gyi yul rjes su mthong sngon du 'gro ba ni ba dang/ gtor ma'i snod ci 'byor de yang ma par na pa'i nang du/ phye dang rin po che dang/ me tog la sogs pa ci 'byor ba blugs la/ gtor ma'i nang
168a7(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ma rtogs shing 'khrul pa'i 'gro ba rnams la du a las gnyis pa te sbyar bstan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i don du gyi dang por btong ma bshams pa steng du yi ge ri gyis smag?  rdul bral bar byas la/ de nas yi ge a y s gsum bste bdud rtsi bsgyur ba phyo 'dus pa'o/ /
168b1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsid gyur bsams la/ sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /oM sarba d+harma badzra si ti hUM/ zhes pa 'di ci rigs par bzlas so/ /de nas sems can gyi zas dang/ skom la sogs pa bral med par so so'i spyod yul dang
168b2(rgyud 'grel): cham par thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di zlas par bya'o/ /oM bdud rtsi stan bar byed pa'i sngags sarba ta thA ga mdun du ta a ba lo ki te saM d+ha ra so gang sgo pa'o saM bzhi pa ste so sor sdo ba sten pa b+ha ra hUM/ tshad med pa j i tsan 'dod pa yid tshim pa de nas sngags
168b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dis phan tshun zhe 'dras pa med cing 'byor ba phun sum tshogs par bya'o/ /oM na ma sa dga' ba rang yang chim par byed pa'i sngags 'di'o/ /man ta bu ta nan gra hi sha dri sra pa te dza ma ha sa ma ye swAhA/ de nas sems can de lnga pa mnyam snyoms su sdong bstan pa
168b4(rgyud 'grel): dag gi mig dang/ nga rgyal 'thab tsod med bar yid mngon par dga' bdag mi skye ba'i dos la bzod de'i sngags 'di char bdun par bya ba'i phyir/ sngags 'di brjod bar bya'o/ /oM ru ru spu ru mig gis gzugs gdags pa zhes sti ta drug pa sngon la za ? gi de nas 'di ltar chos kyis so dza la
168b5(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa na sarba satwa a ra tha ne swAhA/ ces 'bir du'o bas rtogs pa bla na med par bya'o/ /de nas sngo ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i dam tshig gi mthus/ zang zing dang/ chos kyi
168b6(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa bkye bas/ sems can mdza' yas pa thams cad kyi lus dang sems tshim pa dang/ gang su brjod pa ni bdun pa ste tshig du sngo bstan pa mthar sdug bsngal ma lus pa zad pa dang/ bde ba chen po mi zad pa'i gter gyi go 'phang thob par
168b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig /de nas sbyin pa gnyis pa de'i stobs kyis zang zing dang chos kyi gzhan yang/ dge ba 'di yi skye bo kun/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs don song gi rgyud dang bral nas bsags pas/ /bsod nams ye shes bas byung ba'i/ /dam pa gnyis ni
169a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par shog /ces klu grub kyi tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang/ mthu mtshungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas dal bar gyur pa na/ chos kyi gtam rgyud gzhan
169a2(rgyud 'grel): yang brjod par bya'o/ /chu gtor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// klu grub kyi smon lam 'debs pa //rgya gar skad du/ ma ho ma bi ti/ bod skad byams? pa snying rje mnga' ba du/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga /rje btsun sgrol ma lor? yod na la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sher snying la sogs pa
169a3(rgyud 'grel): thog de nas cir? dbang po mar sngags pa dam tshig dang ldan pas/ chos thams cad khyad par du tshogs bsags pa dang/ bar chad gsang bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin srg ston te/ bdag med par mos pa'i rjes la/ byang chub kyi mchog sems bsky+d par bya'o/ /de'i rjes
169a4(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bsreg byed pa'i la lha'i rnal 'byor yud dam tshig sogs sgrang bya tsam gyis byas la/ dben pa'i gnas su dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa la/ don dam par thab khung mtho gang pa/ /pad ma'i mI kri ga ru Na dbyibs lta bu byas la/
169a5(rgyud 'grel): zhabs su sor drug pa bya/ ? gyer sor phyed dang gnyis pa/ skad cig nas nang chag kyang dang por ce ba khung bya ba bstan pa de'i tshad do/ /zab tu de nas bzhi 'o ma can gyi shing la/ sor rgyar lnga'i zlum? pa dang zhangs phra ba'i yams shing byas la/ srub shing
169a6(rgyud 'grel): gtir? las byung ba'i me dor ba spar la/ yi ge raM dkar gcig po las/ phyi chag gi tshod tsam zang ba yin me lha drang srong gi gnyis pa ste bud shing stan pa tsan dan dang shug pa la sogs pa rnam pa lta bu la/ yams sing bgrang 'phreng gsum pas sta me spang dwar ba stan pa gis do
169a7(rgyud 'grel): shal byas pa/ dbyig pa dang ril pa spyi blugs 'dzin pa/ ra skyes skad cig mas lnga pa sta ye shes kyi me lha bskyed pa/ bzhi pa ste dam tshig gi me lha bskyed pa la zhon pa bsgoms la/ bdag gi thugs ka spyan drangs na nas 'od lcags kyu'i rnam pa spros pas/ rang bzhin gyi
169b1(rgyud 'grel): me lha bkug pas/ las kyi me lha la bcug te/ mchod yon 'dres pes yon phul ba phul la/ sreg lugs bdun byin te/ bdag gi sdig pa'i ming nas phyung la/ snying gnas nag po phri'i rnam pa lta bu bya ba cing/ me lha'i kha gdangs
169b2(rgyud 'grel): oM ag ne yE zhes pas 'dod ltas rin po che'i du rgyan phul bar bsams la dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'o/ /par bsreg rnam smin gyi lus logs su bzhag la drug pa ste sreg rdzas dbul ba lus ngag yid gsum gyi 'gal rkyen gan gang tsam/ 'dod lha'i snying gnas 'od 'phros pas rnam smin gyi lus kyi bshad lam du zhugs nas snying ga phye nas sdig pa'i brgya?
169b3(rgyud 'grel): phyung nas rdzas la stim par bsam mo/ /'di tshe yang bdun bdun no par bya'o/ /sreg rdzas ni/ til dang/ tsan dan dang/ gur gum rnams la/ sngags 'di bzlas shing sreg go /oM badzra a na a sarba thu du dzwa shA sa pa shan+ti ku ru ye swAhA/ zhes brjod cing
169b4(rgyud 'grel): sreg rdzas byin pa'i rjes la/ dgang lugs sbyin no/ /de nas rdzas rnams la bsang gtor byas la/ me lha'i snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang bsgoms la/ de'i nang du cho ga gsum gyis bgyes
169b5(rgyud 'grel): mang dang sreg rdzas la pa'i lha sgyed la/ lan bdun bdag gi bdun pa ye shes kyi lha tshogs thugs ka'i thab tu mchod bstan pa sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis 'og min gyi gnas nas/ de'i rim pa spyan drangs te/ gnyis su med par stim rang gi 'dod lta ba dang/ bdag
169b6(rgyud 'grel): kyang mar me chad pa'i tshul du/ me lha bskyed pa'i lha la bzhugs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlab par bsam la/ sku gsung thugs ye shes kyis rgyas gtab bud+d+ha dgongs pa mdzad pa la sogs kyis dbang bskur ro/ sogs 'di na lha yod pa la
169b7(rgyud 'grel): pa de/ sreg bdag gnyis su yod pa'i cha gcig gis so/ /ba su chang ba las lugs dang dgang 'od kyi thab 'dod pa'i 'od kyi du bar bsam ma lugs sbyin par byas te/ oM A hUM gis byin rlebs stan par bya ba'i phyir de rang rang gi ming dang/ zhi ba'i tshig gi bar du bcug la bzlas so//
170a1(rgyud 'grel): oM badzra ka ti ad mo sarba pA pa ra ha na pra mo k+Sha yA swAhA/ /zhes brjod cing bdag gi snying gnas sdig pa'i gzugs gnas pa bya ba rdzas snga ma/ cing bsregs pas/ bdg gi byang chub kyi sems di ma med pa/ ? ba rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bur gyur pa de yang
170a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rtog sngags 'di/ pa med cing/ rang bzhin gyis shan+tiM ku ru 'od rnams kyi lus kyi/ ji lta byas na sdig pa ci byas pa'i de bzhin bar bya ba'i phyir/ dang po steng du su rtsi'i yul sgrub pa'i phyir/ rdzas la stim pa la/ gsal de 'byin dra bas kyis/ ba'i bde ba chen po/ dam chos kyis lhun gyis grub pa nyid du
170a3(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa thams cad zhi ras/ bzhugs par bsam/ sbyin sreg gi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ de wa pu tsa krama/ bod skad du/ lha mchod pa'i rim pa/ rje du zangs ngas pa med yi dam du bya'o// btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /las dang po
170a4(rgyud 'grel): dper na bdag nyid ye shes lha'i ye shes gshegs dam tshig sdu'o/ /pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ mngon par 'dod pa'i 'dod pa'i dngos grub dbang du phya ba'i phyir lha mchod bston/ dngos grub dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ 'dod bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags bar 'dod pas dang po ste lha mchod pa'i dgos pa ston pa'i
170a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lha tshur? dang shi lus la bsdu /chos sku spos bral la sems ldan te gzhag go/ lha'i mngon gsum du lha mnyes nas thugs dam yongs su bskul ba ni/ mchod pa chen po yin te/ mnyes pa'i stobs kyis/ 'di ltar dang? na ma la 'byor pas/ mkha' 'gro ma 'pho ba'i
170a6(rgyud 'grel): dus shes par byas la/ mchod pa'i yo byad phyi dang/ lha gang mnyes par byed na/ nang dang/ gsang ba dang/ de kho na'i rim rnams cis mnyes par byed na/ byin gyis brlab gnyis pa ste pu tsa byin gyis brlab cing bshas pa ston te/ lo zla tshes grangs dus byin gyis rlabs yin gsung
170a7(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams tshul bzhin du rjes sngags phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin dbyangs dang lnga'o lnga'i byas la/ te spro ba lnga'i/ 'dod lon gyi lha mo spros te/ la gnas pa'i su tsa/ med pa'i don la lhag gsum pa ste su rtsa'i yul bstan pa don dam pa 'di den par rtogs par bskyod pa/
170b1(rgyud 'grel): par mis pa'i blo du spong bas/ rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i cho ga bzhin skyed pa dang/ ye shes sems pa sgrub pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin sems pa'i 'od zer las/ paM chad pa las kun tu bzang po yab yum du skyed la/ de 'od du zhu ba
170b2(rgyud 'grel): de yang bdag dang gzhan gnyis ga'i'o mngon? par 'dod pa ltar las/ chos kyi 'byung ji ltar na gnas/ kha dog dkar ba/ zhabs phra pa/ kha yel gnyis med 'dre ? thugs? ka nas ting nge 'dzin mtshon ? ba? snying gnas pa/ dbyibs gru de nyid snyoms par zhugs pa las gsum
170b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi rnam par bsgoms la/ de nas ting nge 'dzin sems nyam? ting ba las thung pa'am thung ba las ring dang 'gro ba'i dus 'ong tshes grangs bzang po'i dus des mkha' ba 'gro ma thams cad kyis ma nges pa'o/ /pa las/ h+ri chad ba las/ /pad+ma'i sdong po 'dam ma stong dang ldan pa'i
170b4(rgyud 'grel): ? 'dru la/ nyi ma 'am zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya pa skyed la/ de'i steng du yi ge a las rtags pa yab yum du gyur pa dang/ de'i 'od du zhu ba las/ gzhal yas khang rgyu chos 'byung nang du rin po cha las grub pa/ phyogs su ma chad pa/
170b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba/ mthong ba tsam nyams dga' ba chen ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' las po bsgom rnam snang la/ yang snyoms par zhugs las dang nyid kyi lus mags? ma chag 'phan med? pa ji ltar mos pa'i tshogs kyi rnam de las kyang par sprul
170b6(rgyud 'grel): nas gzhal yas khang de'i nang du 'khod de/ dkyil 'khor chen por gyur pa dang/ bdag gi rnam ba'i lus 'di grib ma'i tshul du logs su slar bsgom pa e khad pa'i nang du 'phron gyi bzhin du 'od chad? pa las/ de'i thugs ka nas mchod pa'i lha mo
170b7(rgyud 'grel): mang po spos los? dang me tog dang zhal ngas? la sogs pa spros lnga pa ste lhas 'go don mdzad pa bstan pa ste/ pa rnam smin gyi/ bzhi pa ste ji ltar mchod pa bstan no/ /mcho pa rgya chen chad pa yang ? pa'o/ pos mchod bas mchod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bla ma dang bcas pa mnyas nas
171a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi tshogs thams cad la mchod pa rgya chen po byin pas/ sems can dang/ lha de dag kyang byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed nas sdom pa gsum la gnas shen? rig pa 'dzin pa'i sde smod
171a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi lam phyag rgya bzhi 'od zer 'phros? shing khyab? rgyud la skyes nas/ kun 'dod yon gyi? dga' bas dmyal ba yan chad gzhi'i rnam par shes 'dod yon gyi pu tsa nyams su myong bcam gyi?/ pa sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes/ bde ba la mtshas che ba la zhugs te chen
171a3(rgyud 'grel): po rtogs pa dang bral ba'i ro mchog btar nas/ rang gi nyams dga' ba skye ba'i bstod pa/ mnyam nyid mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o/ de nas dkyil 'khor nas gong ltar tshogs rgya chen po bsags nas chen po lha tshogs rang gi lus
171a4(rgyud 'grel): la dbang bskur ba dang/ ? sku nyams su shis gong ltar don chen po sgrub pas na kyi tshigs su bud+d+ha dang sems can mnyam pas na g.yo bcad pa rdo rje'i glu ru lha'i da la'i tsag rdzas dang rang bzhin gyi ye shes 'gro ba rnams gnyis sbyor ba'i phyir rdo rje'i tshig brjod pa gyur pa
171a5(rgyud 'grel): brjod nas/ phyi snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyang gzhal yas khang de'i bkra shis ngo bo dag gyur te sems la dbang ni thob par shog ngo bo nyid du dmigs/ nang bcung kyi sems can thams cad kyang lha'i dkyil 'khor de dag gi ngo bo nyid du dmigs
171a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag thams cad khyod don chen po 'di ltar byed mkhan yin zer nas don 'di ltar gyur par yang bsam kyang rang rig pa'i rnam 'phrul tsam du dmigs la/ rang rig pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i stong pa nyid kyi ngang? la bzhag par bya'o/ /bdag gi
171a7(rgyud 'grel): re ba ji lta ba bzhin su? chi'i? phan yon stan pa'o du dngos tshe 'dir yang phran tshegs kyi dngos grub grub gnas su de ltar snang ba de kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam du bstan pa dang/ zhing don dam par na khams? skye ba 'phos nas ji lta ba'i dbang 'byor byed can? la sogs par mnyam par drug pa ste pa'i
171b1(rgyud 'grel): lung nges par ston par 'gyur ro/ /lha mchod pa'i rim pa rdzogs so// rgya gar skad du a yu sa d+ha na/ bod skad du/ tshe bsgrub pa'i thabs/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po
171b2(rgyud 'grel): kho nar rnal 'byor pas/ rnam par de ltar rgyun du tshogs bsags de'i mi rtog pa'i don la mos pa byas la/ rnal 'byor ba che grub na sgrub pa'i long med pas tshe srid ba'i gdam ngag bshad pa sngon gyi smon lam gyi dban las sems can gyi don rjes su dran par byas
171b3(rgyud 'grel): dang pos te tshoD bsaD pa stan pa yin la/ cho ga lngas rang mos pa'i lhar bsgrub d+harma sarba ? n+ya ltar pa dang/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/ a nyid 'od zer gzugs skur dang ldan smon 'jug gi dus su pa'i byed pa la sngon du che sgrub dgos bas phreng
171b4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang ldan par bsgoms la/ gnyis pa ste lhar ston de'i mthus bla ma dang sangs rgyas ye shes bzhugs pa yin rnams snang gsum pa ste srungs mtshams kyi rnam pa stan? no bar byas la/ /phyag dkar zhing gdang ba/ 'tshal ba la sogs pa bsod nams kyi tshogs
171b5(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs par bya'o/ /de nas oM h+ri no me b+ha rak+ShaM sarba swAhA/ ces pa'i sngags kyis rwa ba dra ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i khang pa/ rtsig pa dang/ gur du byas pa 'byongs pa dang/ ye shes kyi tshogs yan lag bdun pa rdzogs par bya
171b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i phyir/ stong pa sngags 'di brjod pa tsam gyis nyid kyi don la/ bud d+ha dang bla ma dang 'dod lta las 'ong byung bas khyab pa las 'jug par bya ste oM shu nya ta dz+nya na badzra swa b+ha wa at+ma konyahaM zhes pa'i bzhi pa ye shes kyi tshogs bsgom sngags kyis rang gi shes
171b7(rgyud 'grel): pa mig yor tsam las ma gtogs par/ dngos phyin snod bcud po'i rang bzhin med cing/ dmigs lnga pa ste gzhal yas? khang? byed pa sten? dmigs te tsam? pa de yang par byas la de nas sems kyi chos nyid kyi yi ge yaM baM laM raM bzhi'i rnam par chad pas/ rlung
172a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ chu dang/ sa dang/ me dang/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab tu snang ba'i nga rgyal du bstan pa dang/ de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba la/ paM las pad ma/ de'i lte ba/ a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du/
172a2(rgyud 'grel): maM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams la/ de nas de rnams kun tu 'od du zhu ba las/ rin po che las grub pa'i hUM las bum pa/ tshe'i rnam par shes pa'i mdzod dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ de las 'od zer 'phro 'dus
172a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhu brtul byas pas/ bdag nyid 'phags pa tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ sku mdog dmar po la/ phyag g.yas na tshe'i bum pa khyad par du shel bsnams pa/ khro bo 'dud rtsi 'khyil pa drug pa ste dam tshig? sems dpa' ? sgom pa stan gsum pa las
172a4(rgyud 'grel): la bka' bsgo ba gcig bsgom/ de nas de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la gnas pa'i yi ge a las 'od byung bas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas/ tshe dpag tu md pa mdun du 'dug pa la tshe la bar chod byed pa srung ba'i tshe dpag med kyi spyan drangs la
172a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la bstim pa dang/ oM a mri ta bdun pa ste ye shes bzhugs par bstan pa h+ri ces pas bdag gi bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o/ /de nas oM sarba saM ska ri pa ri shud+ha d+harma te/ ga ga na sa mung ga te swa b+ha wa bi shud d+ha ma ma na ya pa
172a6(rgyud 'grel): ri ba re swAhA/ zhes brgyad pa ste tshe sgrub pa bstan pa rgyun du brjod pas sangs rgyas gang gA glung gi bye ma snyed kyis/ bskal pa chen po'i skabs skabs su bzlas bar du gnas pa'i tshe byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa yin no/ /ming gzhug cho ga
172a7(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta nges? sbyor gyi bar ? du byas na'o/ nu ni rdo rje lta bu'i/ cho'i dngos grub las 'od byung bas rang la thim pas thog dgu pa ste pa na yon gtan pa'o par the tshom med do/ /rdo rje tshe bsgrubs pa'i thabs rdzogs so// //
172b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mi thu ma sha na/ bod skad du/ 'chi ba slu ba/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyams su myong ba'i thabs la/ mchog tu gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor pas/ dngos po thams cad rmi lam gyi shes pa lta
172b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa tshe thub na sgrub pa'i long med par 'chi ba ltas gyur na 'chi ba slu ba bshad pa ni/ bur shes par byas pa/ de kho na nyid yid la bya'o/ /gal te bsgom pa'i long med par 'chi ba'i rtags mthong na/ sbyor ba 'dis snang pa mi bden par slu bar bya'o/ /de la 'chi
172b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rtags ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi 'chi rtags dang/ phyi'i 'chi rtags bstan stong pa nyid pa'o/ /de la 'chi ba slu ba sngon du 'go ba'i bsam pa/ tshe 'di la bya ba rdzogs par 'dod pas phyi'i 'chi 'chi ba'i mtshan ma dang de nas blu ba'i tshigs? dang gal che bas rtags la
172b4(rgyud 'grel): yang gnyis te/ rmi lam du mthong ba'i rtags dang/ dngos su mthong ba'i rtags so/ /rmi lam du mthong ba'i rtags ni/ 'dir lug bon zhon nas kha lho phyogs su bltas te/ lung pa stong pa gcig tu 'gro ba dang/ lce ru nam byed
172b5(rgyud 'grel): na? grogs med par zla ba dang skar ma ma mthong par 'khyams pa 'am/ bdag gis skad rigs mi mthun pa'i yul du phyin pa la/ lung bong gzhan gyi mis dbang du byas nas/ gos med par bdag gcer bur 'dug pa 'am/ bdag
172b6(rgyud 'grel): rang dbang med par sa gting du 'dzul ba 'byung ba'i gtor chud byas kyang stub oM ba de na ba de su ba de swAhA/ ces bzlas ns stab kyang rung ngo/ /rmi ba yin no/ /dngos su mthong ba'i rtags ni/ bdag rang zlab? nya'i? nub mo zla 'dros? ? gnyis spyi bor sbyang grib ma la ma yengs par bltas pa la thal mo'i srid ma la gnyis su X
172b7(rgyud 'grel): mchod? ? gsang yin te ? so/ /sos ka'i rmig rgyu byung ba'i dus su dben? bar rang gos? med par long bu sgred lag bsnol bas spyi bo mnan te/ lus thang sha bcad de ltas pa las bri ba ma'i mgo nyams na 'chi/ yan lag nyams na bar chad phra mo 'od dkar la gzugs tshang na tshe ring bar 'ong/ /? pa rang dbral dar btad la la bltas pas mig sding?
173a1(rgyud 'grel): de chad pa dang/ grib ma'i gzus brnyan nam mkha' la snang ba de nyams pa dang/ bshad pa dang sbring pa 'dom pa dang/ 'du rten med par rtags pas snying mi dga' ba dang/ nye ba dang grung? po tshogs pa la glo
173a2(rgyud 'grel): bur du 'dod pas gdungs pa yin no/ /de la nang gi 'chi ba'i rtag ni/ bdag nyid kyi nyams byin gyis brlabs pa la/ g.yas kyi dbugs rgyu ba mchod pa dang/ g.yon gyi dbugs rgyu ba mtshad sngar phrad? kyang yang sprad par 'dod bral par mi 'dod pa'o//
173a3(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ bla rta 'phar ba ma tshad ba shes pa ma 'khrul ba dang/ gsus kyi rtsa la dgra dang ba dang/ sdod nye ba dang bcas pa'i rna bug btsa? yod pa rgyu brgya phra gcig yin no/ /de la slu pa'i cho ga ni/ rmi lam ngan pa mthong pa'i rtags
173a4(rgyud 'grel): byung na/ skyes pa'i g.yas bur med kyi g.yon tshe dpag tu med pa'i cho ga rnal du mi 'dug pa dang byas te/ dngos su byung ba'i rtags ni/ shin tu mi rtag pa dran pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa'o/ /ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang lhan cig pa'i
173a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyin pa rgya chen po btang ngo/ /lus gong du bshad pa ltar kyi 'chi ba'i ltas la ni/ rgyu ba spong 'dud pa dang/ nad srun ba dang/ shin tu mi dmigs pa yid la bya'o/ /de ltar byas na 'chi ba dge ba stobs chen byas pa'o yang the phan? yon? tshom med
173a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos saM? bsam ps par slu bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi ba slu ba smun ni rdzogs so// //gdam ngag gis thig le 'bar? 'dzag na ya byi du'i sgo nas so/ /na ba ni rang gi snying gi dkyil dus sug nyungs 'bru tsam pa bsaM pa de rje che stong sangs te song par bsgom pa'o// //dngos po thams cad rang gi
173a7(rgyud 'grel): lus la 'dus na sje chun de chun la stong par bsgom pa ni gcig dus so// ? dbang bskur ba'i dal dang de nas skyed rdzogs bsgom pa sa ma ta'i dal dang gnys/ gong gi man ngag bsgom pas 'dod lha dbyin gyis brlabs pa sprul ba'i dal dang gsum/ de nas 'og min du rnam snang dang 'jal nas byin gyis brlabs pa rang bzhin gyi dal dang bzhi/ de ngo X
173b1(rgyud 'grel): nas byang chub lnga'i gdams pa bstan pas chs sku thob pa don dam pa'i dal dang lnga'o/ /bud+d+ha dz+nya na dang kun dga' snying po lam lngar 'dod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs min gsung ngo// */ /rgya gar skad du/ a de sha sha? na/ bod skad du/ 'tshig ma'i bstan chos/ rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag
173b2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor dam tshig ldan pa kun/ /'das pa'i dus na chos gsum gces/ /'khor ba zhe thag bcad pa dang/ /dus chen po la bab te 'chi? ba ? na 'chi ka ma'i gdams pa ston te/ man ngag mtshan rtags pa byang chub sems dpa' sbyed? pa'i man ngag zer/ thar
173b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i grod la 'dun pa dang/ dam tshig med pa dags pa med byang chub sems kyi gnas po bya/ /de ltar gang skyes byang skyed na med pa shes pa shes na 'chi ba yi/ /'jigs payod pa ma yin no/ /de la dang po stan pa ni/ /rang lus ming bzhi'i phung po
173b4(rgyud 'grel): bya ? las 'das pa la spro la/ /gsob kyi phung 'dar bya de ba'i gong ma gnyis kyi bya ba de gang gis byas na por shes bar bya/ /bag chags sdig pa'i rnam pa mchog /bde nas bde bar 'gro bas so ha la'i dug dang 'khor ba zhe thag bcad pa'i bcu po 'di 'khor ba'i sgo dgag 'dra bar gzugs dang lnga
173b5(rgyud 'grel): shes/ /tshe 'di rmi lam lta snying po med bar bu la/ /longs spyod 'ja' tshon lta bur nges/ /rten lung 'byung las 'byung bas na mi dge ba ma skyes pa mi skye skyes payang 'gags rkyen bu tsha lus kyi las skyes pa gsal shig 'dra la/ /'chi bdag bdud bdag gzhan thams cad la ni
173b6(rgyud 'grel): grib so snang ba mi bden? 'dra/ /rnyed pa thag rgya lta bu mi rtag la/ /rang sems rdza gog bye'u bzhin te/ /bud med sdos dang 'dra ba yin/ /yul ni ngal so 'dra ba ste/ /'du she 'di bcu phyi nas drang thog du 'od zlog bar dka' sus shes pa/ /
173b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba'i chos la yid byung ba rang gis 'chi bos yin/ /gzhan yang rten dang bral bas so rjes thar ba'i grong la dpa' bo 'dis thar bai sgo 'byed? su dran pa ma cang du mi gter bas so dar gcig ldod pa yin bdud/ /gang gis shes par gyur pa de/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen phar
174a1(rgyud 'grel): shes shed/ /de bzhin nyid ni m rung shes/ /mya ngan 'das pa yul du drn/ /rang sems thar pa chen por dran/ /chos kyi tshul cig nyid du dran/ /bsam gtan sa 'khor chen por dran/ /lus rgyud bag chaD
174a2(rgyud 'grel): zar par dran/ /'di rnams 'phags pa'i nyams myong gshegs shul yin/ /de ltar 'du shes rjes dran gyis/ bdag 'dzin las phrol na man ngag rjes su steng nyid du bzung nas ni/ /bsam gyis dbang dra bar/ che zag kyi bag chags dang bzad par 'dod pa'o//
174a3(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab phyag rgya che/ /rnal 'byor payi dbang du bya/ /snying gar raM las nyi dkyil 'khor/ /'od zer gdugs pa bsgom byas la/ /nang bla ma'i grol bcud kyis sa bsregs lam 'di la zhus pa la dang/ /thal ba thur sems dbugs
174a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi brda/ /khong pa nam mkha' reng sems stong pa la/ /sems bsam gyis mi khyab pa ji ltar 'jug na nyid byad tsha zhing rtsub pa rnob chu pa a yi dngos/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang ltar dkar/ /de steng yi ge hUM las ni/ /nad du rdub pa dang sbyar ro/ rdo rje gdan
174a5(rgyud 'grel): gyi spo bsgom ste/ /nang grol med nas rig pa hUM gi 'phro ba snga yis/ /rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga a'i tshul du pa/ /yar bstan las zla ba'i/ snying po tshangs pa'i/ /bu ga dag kha dog la gtang ba yin/ /mar snying po gsang ba yi/ /nor bu dag
174a6(rgyud 'grel): ? thung bas bdud brdul nas sangs rgyas 'dra bas ni rdo rje gdan gyi spo bo/ /rdo rje hUM gi 'gro 'dul sa la gtang pa yid/ /gsang ba'i sdo chen bsdams pa las/ /rdo rje rgya gram langs pa las/ /sa ma mdo me ni yar bar bya/ /zla ba rdo rje bcas pa zhu/ /thil le
174a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po nyid du rgyur/ /sgo brgyad dmig lags pa nas las ni 'phros pa yis/ /rang bzhin a? thung du'i? rnam pa steng 'og/ rnam par ru ba la sogs pa yum lnga zhen pa'i rtog gi rlung rtog pa'i tshogs lte pe gru gsum du gsang nas/ /rang sems zlum gong ma shas med pa?
174b1(rgyud 'grel): thig le spro ba Na/ /phyi nang med par kun tu gsal/ /la la mi rtag mar me'i tshul/ /tshangs pa'i bu gar bstan pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam nyid/ /'chis ma'i bstan chos so/ /byang chub kyi sems sbyang ba'i man?
174b2(rgyud 'grel): ngag rdzogs so/ /tsms pa'i dgos byed? stan? pa/ #/ /ro gsreg? gi cho ga bzhugs so/ /'od dang bcas pa/ du dkar pa la/ /rgya gar skad du/ chu lha ma de la/ sam lha skur dmigs pa bod skad du/ ro bsreg pa rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig?  tshogs
174b3(rgyud 'grel): phung po'i rgyun gcad phyir/ /ro bsreg cho ga btsam par bya/ /spal sbyar ro'i snying ga ru/ /che 'phos pas ngag chags kyi sgrib pa sbyo ba dang phun po lha tshogs la dbul ba'i ro ston to 'dod lha gang yin snying gnyis pas ste me lha dang ta thA ga ta la sbyin sreg bya ba stan? no/ /de man? mchod? pho bri/ /las
174b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i/ /snying po spyi bo tsug du dgos? pa de'i phyir na dang por ro de'i pa bzhi stan pa 'gro ba la gu gum gyi khrus rgyan star pa'o gdags/ /gnas tsang ma'i khri stengs la/ /kha ni nub tu bstan la bzhag /ma 'dal bcas pa'i steng du ni/
174b5(rgyud 'grel): shas? spyod ? shing dang bcas pa'i mchod pa dgram/ /lan chags gtor ma gtor ma des ? gyi bsngo ba'o gtang nas ni/ /ngan song spyod ba'i gsang sngags gyis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam skul/ /de'i mdun du gnyis pa ma 'das bstan pa nye
174b6(rgyud 'grel): ring? mtshan ma mthong ba dang/ /de nas cho ga byas nas dmigs pa de ltar byas pa'i gtor ma sngon du ba ga ban shAkya thub pa la/ gnyis pa stor byin gyis rlab pa stan/ dmigs la sngags bzlas kyi na cho las 'das pa'i sgrb ba sbyong ba'i bsam pas zhag bdun du zlas na ni/ zhal nas gsungs pa'i
174b7(rgyud 'grel): ? sogs dkar po gon pa smis na dkyil sngon du de ltar byas nas 'khor bri/ /rts ba'i lta gar byed kyan rnams tshad ba dang/ /'jig rten gtso phyogs skyong la b+ha lir sbyin po bran du skol/ /dbus su thab zhi ba'i khung spung khang gi bri ba dang/ yaM shing/ geng mos kyi
175a1(rgyud 'grel): sreg rdzas 'phreng? sngags kyi skye med du'o byin rlabs la/ /shing ni me'i me sbar ba'i nang du gzugs/ /ro la sngags kyis gtab nas ni/ /tsan dan dri yis gdug pa dang/ /gos dang rgyan gyis mdzad pa la/ /snying ga sgom? na
175a2(rgyud 'grel): spyi bo ru/ /sarba phyi nang gi bar chod zhi ba dang/ tshe 'das kyi cho gas rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir me tog gtor ba'i ? dang la'i lha rnams thab khung du sbyangs pa la bya gsung/ sngon dag la bya ba yin/ byid kyis byin gyis/ bgegs bsang byug pa yin rlab/ /bris byugs nas lus gzhan dag la sngags gzhan
175a3(rgyud 'grel): de god/ /de nas ngan song spyod ba'i phyir/ /steng du bcas shing cher ba'i nang du mi lha'i thugs kar ye shes spyan drangs pu ? gya'o/ te dbus su bzhag /de bzhin gshegs me lham?  bskyed par thab du dgang phuD bdun slug go /rgyad dang spral bar 'phreng sngags ? a a sarba ta thA ga'i sngags so/?
175a4(rgyud 'grel): ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags rnam sam gdags pa spyan dam tshig di me lha dang ye shes gzhug pa dang dgang lugs bdun dang sreg rdzas gzhan dang bdun? pa snyed tshad kyang dbul lo me lha'i snying gar ye shes pa spyan grangs nas dgar lugs lags pa dbul/ /drangs pa/ /sna tshogs mchod pa'i sbrin gyis mchod/ /
175a5(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams rang dang sngags kyis su/ /bsregs lugs nyi shu rtsa re bya/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje dang/ /phyag na pad+ma zhags pa bsnams /zhabs kyi pad+mas sdig mnan cing/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs
175a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod lugs ji ltar mchod na pa'i dbul ye shes gshegs pa'i shol du rgyan mthos/ /bsams saM yang na bris kyang rung/ /dang po snying po sdig pa'i gzugs mnan pa de bzhin du/ /brgya phrag gaM ni stong dag gis/ /rnam snang gi dbu rgyan no/ /sbyin
175a7(rgyud 'grel): bsreg ji tsam nus tshang bya/ /sbyin nang ste yon tan brjod pa stno to/ /ting nge dzin du ma gsal dmigs pa'i rten dgad lugs nas su tsha sreg pa yam shing gi bar du oM badzra pa na hUM phaT/ bsreg de nas lha gshegs pa me lha mchod/ des kyan dmyal ba nas ye shes gshegs pa dam tshig bdud nas so/ /yon tan
175b1(rgyud 'grel): nges brjod pa/ /shi ba'i ming nas byung nas ni/ /mkhas pas sbyin bsreg rab 'bad na/ /dmyal pa chen por gyur pa yang/ /sdug bsngal las grol the tshom med/ /gang gis ro ni med pa pa/ zlas shing? bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ?
175b2(rgyud 'grel): cung zad nges de ltar byas pa'i phan yon tan pa rnyed dmigs pa dbang? tu 'od dang dang? byas nas pa dang/ dkyil mnar med pa la sogs par 'khor mtshan ma bris de nas tshe 'phos nas nas ni/ /mchod /rten med kyang yin de rten phreng ba bya ba 'am/ /yang na bsam gtan pas
175b3(rgyud 'grel): sku yid tshig par byas nas gzugs byas kyang rung/ /sbyin bsreg mngon par dbang bskur bas/ /gdon mi za bar de bar zhugs pa dang grol bar ni/ /de bzhin tshan mang po gshegs pas nges par gsungs/ /sdig can le ? gyur pa
175b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ /tshe 'dir bd eba mthong me 'gyur/ lugs ma lags pa /rdo rjer bla ma stobs ldan gyis/ /sreg nus gsung sus gsungs na rnam par rgyal ba lags pa nas lugs ram par thob pa ni/ /bar der langs kyang byang chub 'thob/ /rigs cha dang ngo bsreg
175b5(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs par ma'i cho ga rdzogs so/ /sla med de 'dra yang/ /rgya gar skad du/ a ti bi ti/ bod skad du/ /bdun tshigs kyi cho ga /gong bshad pa'i rje btsun ma sgrol rgyu rkyen de la rten nas ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor pas
175b6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan shi ba la phan gdags par 'dod pas/ shi ba'i dus tshigs la cho ga bar do'i du la zhi zhing bog min la sogs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir 'di ltar bya ste/ dang por bshed dang dbral ba dang/ rnam shes ltar bzung ba dang por dgos pa bstan pa
175b7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ khrus bya ba bzhi pa ste dang/ dus la bar phan lha skyed lnga pa te/ bdun bdun gyis bar chod pa la 'dir byas te/ pa dang/ dbang drug pa te bskur pa dang/ lam gnyis pas ste gshed dang dbral ba dang/ stan bdun te/ gsum pa ste pa'o/ /dang por bshed dang dbral
176a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ slob dpon bdag nyid yang dag pa'i mdza' i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ yi ge yaM las gshin rje gshed shin tu 'jigs pa'i cha byad can/ /'od zer kun nas 'bar bar bskyed/ /ka la ru pa ya/ a
176a2(rgyud 'grel): ra badzra kro tra hUM phaT/ ces brjod par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi snying ka'i stong pa nyid du byas la sa bon las rang dang hUM nag po las 'dr ba'i ye shes sems dpa' bkug la bstims te/ byin gyis rlab pa dang/ yang bstan par byed pa'i sngags
176a3(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka'i 'od zer las/ sangs rgyas grangs med lar snying ga'i hUM las 'od 'phros pas pa bkug te/ zhal du zhugs pa las/ zhe sdang 'dul ba'i khro bor gyur nas 'og min nas mdun na ro la yi ge bru gsum la lan gsum brjod/ 'khor ba'i
176a4(rgyud 'grel): gshin de hUM baM bsang nas/ dur khrod du bya/ slar yang yi ge a las ltar skyed de/ dam la bdag rang gi gdags par bya'o/ /de pu ta? de dag nas bstan par by+d pa rnam par phyir 'phros bas shes pa gtar bzung ba ni/ rus pa 'am/
176a5(rgyud 'grel): ro bgegs dang bral bar byas gos sam/ kyi gnas su ming byad la/ mi rus byas la rten byas la/ nor dang/ drung po la sos pa shes pa gang la chags pa yang bris la bcang bar bya'o/ /de nas khrus bya ba ni/ bum pa sngon po mgul chings
176a6(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa la/ 'brus can gyi kha rgyan dang/ snying po la sogs pa khrus byas la/ /byin gyis rlabs la/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug la sogs bya 'bul pa gdung ba'i dbyangs gyis brjod cing/ me long gi logs la khrus byas te/
176a7(rgyud 'grel): a'oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/ sarba karma a ba lngar? ni/ bi sho d+ha ni byed? du bcug pa swAhA/ bum gang? mos kyis cho ga de'i stobs kyis gsum 'di gsum 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ bcom ldan sangs rgyas dug mi mnga' / /sangs rgyas?  bzi brjid du gang? com mo/ /chos dang dge 'dun yang des 'gror?//
176b1(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa dang/ bag chags kyi sgirb pa ma lus pa yang dag par byang nas/ rnam par shes pa mar me ltar bur gyur pa yin no/ /de nas lha bskyed pa ni cho ga gsum gyis lha yod na der bskyed/ med na nor bu dri ma med pa'i nga
176b2(rgyud 'grel): bsam pa'i khyad par rgyal du mos pa dang/ de nas dbang bskur pa ni/ snying ka'i sa bon las sdig pa dag nas 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas grangs ro dang pa yi dam yod na med pa spyan drangs la/ phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas
176b3(rgyud 'grel): bston la/ bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs cam par bya'o/ /spyan drangs mchod pa lnga phul pa dbang bskur ba'i gsol ba gdab yang? dang skur bar bsam/ thob nas ? 'jug pa rdzogs par bya'o pa'i lha mo ? lha rnams kyi thugs ka nas byad na rdo rje'i?  zhal? du phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka nas bton la/ ro?
176b4(rgyud 'grel): la dbang bskur rdzogs par bya'o/ /nga nas lam bstan pa ni/ oM pad me pad me/ pad me b+ha ba/ su kha b+ha ta/ ga tsa hUM swAhA/ de nas bkra shis drangs med pa kyi tshig gis dus gsum du ni khrus? bya'o/ /rang snying sa bon
176b5(rgyud 'grel): kha? chen po'i dus? su dbang bskur na mos pas de bzhin du bya/ ? po'i dus su dbang yin rdzogs na/ dam par 'jug rdzogs par bya'o/ bskul ba yis/ /me tog rnams bab pa dang/ bde legs dang dbon mchog gnyis dang rig lnga'i dang yid 'ong bar snang lha bran tshogs/ /rol mo'i sgra yis
176b6(rgyud 'grel): bsdungs? te song/ /'og min gnas ga song na las bsam yad bsam la 'gre? bdag par 'gyur gsung ngo// /drongs du chu dang slug?  go /gzhan du min/ skad cig bdun tshigs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsI ta ba ti/ bod skad du/
176b7(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs de rnams bsdun? nas zhong par bsam tsha tsha'i cho ga rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang por sngags pas chos dngos po thams cad 'di 'dra ba ngan bdun nad bdun gyi bar du bya'o/? rten dus pa la rten nas tshogs khyad par can bsags pa'i phyir tsha tsha'i? stan te/ bdag med par
177a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom la/ /de nas tshad med pa'i rnal 'byor du bya'o/ ? /de nas srog chags dad mi gtsang ba spangs pa'i 'jim? pa'o tshogs la/ bla rtsi dang/ a ka ru dang/ du ru ka dang/ gur guM la
177a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dri zhim stong nyid du pos stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can du yid la bya bran pa dang/ ka skyes 'jim pa spru ba bu bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lha'i nga rgyal gyis/ gnas te/ sarba ka ri hUM zhes pa'i sngags kyis/ skyon gyi rim pa rnam
177a3(rgyud 'grel): par dag par bsam zhing/ ? sarba si ti hUM zhes bya bas/ 'jim pa'i tshogs de dag kyang/ ji ltar gser spyad ba 'gyur gyi rtsi ltar/ gad mos kyi rin po che'i rang bzhin bzhin g yi/ gser dang/ man shel sa mi gtsang ba la sogs pa
177a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ pad+ma ra ga dang/ be durya dang/ byin gyis rlabs pa in tra ni la'i rnam par bsgom mo/ /de nas gzhi gnas dang/ lhag mthong gi lag pa gnyis/ 'byi 'byi bya zhing/ sngags 'dis byin gyis rlab par bya'o/ /a'oM
177a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga ta tsi na ta ma Na yE swAhA/ zhes bzlas shing/ skol por yi ge kham gis byin gyis g.yon brlabs g.yas pa'i nang du bcug kyis 'byi 'byi bya zhing brtag pa dang bzhugs su gsol ba la/ badzra mu ces pas rdungs pa'i dus
177a6(rgyud 'grel): su sems can gyi don la skul zhing/ d+harma d+ha tu ga b+ha a/ ces rin po che pas skol phor nas phyung la/ sngags 'dis bzhugs su gsol bar bya ste/ a'oM na mo sh+rEe ya d+ha d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ h+ri da ya/ 'dir ma bzhugs par don mdzad gcig pa'o//
177a7(rgyud 'grel): gar rbe dzwa la/ ya ga ga ra/ ma sa/ a yu saM sho dya? ? mi/ sa dra pA pi/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ u ShI? Sha/ bi mal bi shung d+he/ hUM hUM hUM aM baM saM dzaM swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags brjod pas sngags pas 'od byung mchod pa phog pa las sam tis kyi 'od zer
177b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis mchod rten skul bas/ mchod rten la sangs rgyas kyi sku nyi zer gyi rdul dang/ 'dra ba bcug nas slar de ltar mnyam pa las bzhengs pa'i tshul gyis sku rnams byung nas/ 'od zer kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'phros pas/ bdag gi phung po
177b2(rgyud 'grel): la phog pas rnam par rtog pa sa 'od zer 'phros pas ma lus pa'i tshogs sregs par bsam mo/ /de nas yang sangs rgyas re res kyang/ /skal pa chen po'i bar du 'gro ba'i don mdzad par gsol ba btab pa'i sus kyang mi 'gal pas/ rab tu gnas
177b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bya ste/ ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha pA/ he tun te Shan ta thA ga to/ hya ba dang te Shanya tsa yo ni ro d+ha a'e baM bA d+hi/ sngags 'dis kyang byang gtub mahA sh+ra ma Na(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa'i don la lhag par mos pas 'gro ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa yin no/ /bdag gis kyang
177b4(rgyud 'grel): skal pa chen po'i bar du mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab bar bya'o/ /tsha tshwa'i cho ga /slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa bdag gzhan gnyis ga'i don/ rdzogs so/ /mchod rten bsdu zhing 'phro ba'i bud+ha de rnams la
177b5(rgyud 'grel): gsang de/ /dge bshes sprang ? bya yul ba'i/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti paM ka ra sh+ri dz+nya na dang/ drod? kyi lo tsha ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis sgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// //aTii?/ ti paM ka ra'i sngags lugs bcu gsum
177b6(rgyud 'grel): pa 'od //kun la yod na ngo mtshar che/ /bcu gsum ni/ sngags kyi don la 'jug pa/ /dbang bskur pa/ dam tshig spas pa/ /gzhal yas khang sbyin pa/ chu gtor/ sbyin bsreg /lha mchod pa/ tshe sgrub pa/ 'chi ba slu ba/ 'chi
177b7(rgyud 'grel): ka ma'i bstan chos/ bo bsreg pa/ bdun chigs/ tsha tsha gdab pa dang bcu gsum mo/ /a ti sha'i sngags kyi/ chos chen bcu gsum 'di dag la/ /bdag gis 'chan gtab pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /myur du byang chub thob
178a1(rgyud 'grel): par shog/ athi? /lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa mu tig phrad ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya tA ra de bi stod tra gu lu ta ma las d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa mu tig
178a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phreng ba zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig bdag la de nyid ster mdzad/ /'gro mgon zhabs la spyi bos btung de/ /sgrib pa nyon mongs dri ma bsal phyir/ /lha mo mchog la bstod par
178a3(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /yi ge taM las skyes pa'i sku mchog /thugs rje nyi ma 'bum gyi 'od kyis/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skems par byed pa'o/ /sdug bsngal stongs par mdzad la phyag 'tshal/ /las kyi rnam par smin pa'i bud shing/ /ye shes
178a4(rgyud 'grel): me yi dpung gis bsreg nas/ /mchog gi dngos grub grub par mdzad ma/ /ris drug nyon mongs sal la phyag 'tshal/ /rdzu 'phrul thogs med nam mkha' i lus can/ /thugs rjes srid pa'i mtsho chen bsgral nas/ /'gro rnams
178a5(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i gling du khrid pa'i/ /ded dbon chen mo khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /bris pa'i sku la gsol ba btab pas/ /nges kyang bru ba chen brgyad po 'thob 'gyur/ /gang la gad 'dod dngos grub ster ma/ /'dod gu'i 'byung gnas khyod la
178a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal/ /lha rnams rgyab phyogs rig sngags sdus nas/ /khyod kyi sku gzugs spyi bor blangs nas/ /phrin las rnam bzhi grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur/ /mthu rtsal thog med khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /rna rgyan mgul rgyan longs sku'i
178a7(rgyud 'grel): cha byad/ /rin chen du mas spras pa'i do shal/ /dpung rgyan se mo de yis brgyan ma/ /dpal gyi 'od can khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la gus pa'i blo mchog skyes pa'i/ /mi de'i rna bar bla ma'i man ngag /tshig gcig song bar
178b1(rgyud 'grel): ma gyur kyang ni/ /stong nyid bde ba'i nyams kyi drong snyoms/ /shes rab mchog skyed ma la phyag 'tshal/ /khyod kyi gsung mchog brjod du med las/ /a li ka li rol ba'i sgra 'byung/ /tub tA ra yis 'ur sgra chen pos/ /'phaD
178b2(rgyud 'grel): lam bsgrod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /d+ha na ta ra phaT kyi yi ges/ /bdud sde dpung bcas mi bzang 'joms ma/ /gzhan gyis mi thub drag rtsal chen mo/ /mthu stobs ldan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /lha dang klu dang dri za gnod sbyin/ /
178b3(rgyud 'grel): drang srong dang ni mkha' 'gro'i de mod sngags/ /byang sems?  la sogs pa rol 'khrul 'khor/ /'joms par mdzad ma khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /swAhAs drod kyi skye gnas bshig nas/ /hU lu hU lus mngal gyi kha 'gag /sgo da'i skye
178b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas oM gyis 'joms ma/ /tA res brdzus skyes sel la phyag 'tshal/ /stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis/ /nang nyams phyi ru shar ba'i gzi mdangs/ /dpal gyi 'od zer shes rab 'bar ma/ /ma rig mun sel khyod la phyag
178b5(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i 'od kyis/ /bar chad bdud kyi mda' lnga bsregs nas/ /sgrub pa rkyen gyi khar mi gtong ma/ /byang chub lam dgra sel la phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi grin las bdag mo/ /sku gsung
178b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs dang rdzu 'phrul kun 'gro /stobs bcu ma lus pha rol phyin ma/ /dbang phyug brgyad ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sku yi rang bzhin shes bya'i dkyil 'khor/ /spros pa dang bral nam mkha' i rang bzhin/ /chos kyi sku la gzugs /
178b7(rgyud 'grel): sku rnam gnyis/ /sna tshogs du mar sprul la phyag 'tshal/ /a li ka li chos kyi g+han d+he/ /gsung dbyangs yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis/ /tshogs drug yul la rang bzhin med pa'i/ /stod pa'i sgra sgrog khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /
179a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa bral nas gzhan gyi sgo rtsar/ /rdza chag dum bur zas sgom slong ba'i ?/ mi nges khyod kyi bsngags pa brjod na/ /rgyal srid ster mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /ri mo'i gzugs kyis a li ka lis/ /
179a2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i yang dag don gyi glegs bam/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag nyid/ /arya tar khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /gti mug sgrol pa'i shes rab ral gris/ /nyon mongs mi shes 'khor pa'i g.yul bzlog /rmongs pa'i
179a3(rgyud 'grel): ma rig mun rum 'thug po/ /sel mdzad sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /pad+ma dang ni zla pa'i gdan la/ /g.yas brkyang ba la g.yon pa bskum pa'i/ /zhabs gyi mthil la pad+ma'i 'dab ma/ /stod dang ldan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
179a4(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi yum du/ /mtshon pa'i? ud phal che'u legs ldan/ /phyag na 'khor lo rtsibs ma stong tshad/ /mtshan mchog ldan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /khams gsum spong byang bsam gtan rdzogs pas/ /
179a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ching pa'i thag pa mdza' dag gcad de/ /srid gsum 'dam gyis gos pa med ma/ /'khor ba las sgrol khyad la phyag 'tshal/ /'khor los sgyur ba rgyal po'i cha lugs/ /rin chen bye brag du mas spras pa'o /dbu skra
179a6(rgyud 'grel): 'thon 'thing lcang lor 'khyil ba'i/ /mi bskyod pas brgyan khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis sgrol ma'i sku yi gzugs brnyan/ /mthong pa la ni mos gus skyes pa/ /dran pa tsam gyis ngan song sdug bsngal/ /ma lus
179a7(rgyud 'grel): sel mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /swAhA oM gyi phreng ba 'khor bas/ /sngags kyi nus pa nor bu sman ltar/ /rten 'brel sna tshogs 'char bar byed pa'i/ /phrin las 'byung gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /sku gsung thugs kyi
179b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan rdzogs pas/ /smon 'jug mthar phyin 'gro ba'i don la/ /brtson 'grus myur mgyogs glog dang 'dra ma/ /le lo tshar gcod khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /bag chags dang ni las la grol nas/ /skya sgo bzhi chod yangs
179b2(rgyud 'grel): srid med pas/ /'khrul med yon tan pha rol phyin ma/ /sngon sbyangs mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshal/ /bud med sgrol ma'i ming can de la/ /mos pa skyes nas gus phyag 'tshal na/ /de yis bsod nams sangs rgyas rgyur 'gyur
179b3(rgyud 'grel): mthong thos don yon khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /nags tshal e ran ta'i gseb tu/ /tsan ngan sa mchog skyes pa bzhin du/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad lha rnams nang na/ /khyad du 'phags pa khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /mi 'jigs
179b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa bzhi po brnyes nas/ /bdag med seng+ge'i sgra chen bsgrags pas/ /'jig tshogs lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis/ /'joms par mdzad ma khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /rgyu skar cho gas nang nyi zla bzhin du/ /che ba rnams kyis
179b5(rgyud 'grel): nang nas khyad par/ /'phags pa ri rab lhun po lta bu/ /'gran zla med pa khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /bzhin bzang lam du zhugs pa'i dus der/ khyod la gsel ba btab nas phyin na/ /dgra rkun nyes pa mdza' dag mi 'byung//
179b6(rgyud 'grel): skyabs gnas bzang mo khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /yud tsam mos pa byas pa nges ni/ /'bras bu ci bsam 'grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i re ba sgong dang mdzad ma/ /yid bzhin nor 'dra khyod la phyag 'tshal/ /'gro
179b7(rgyud 'grel): po che'i 'du phyed gtong ba'i/ /dus der mtshan mchog ta ra thos pas/ /des ni srid pa h+rul por byed 'gyur/ /'khor ba dag par mdzad la phyag 'tshal/ /'gro mgon khyod la bskyabs pa'i mi de/ /gnyen bshes rnams
180a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis spang bar gyur kyang/ /ya rab gong ma rnams kyis khur 'gyur/ /snang ba khul bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal/ /hu lu hu lu ta ra zhes pa'i/ /tshig de brjod pa tsam gyis kyan ni/ /mkha' la spyod pa'i gnas
180a2(rgyud 'grel): su skye 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar bla na med la phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis mu tig phreng ba'i bstod pa/ /'di brjod yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab/ /sbyar dug la sogs 'khrul 'khor mi tshugs/ /'jigs pa ma lus kun las skyob
180a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur/ /dud 'gro'i rna bar thos pas kyan gni/ /bsod nams de yis bde 'gro'i lus 'thob/ /'khor lo bsgyur rgyal bran bzhin bka' nyan/ /ci bsam pa ni rtag tu 'grub 'gyur/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig
180a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod na/ /dus min 'chi dang nang rnams phyir sol/ /'di ni 'du ba 'dzoms pa'i sman yin/ /rgyal po'i chad pa las ni grol 'gyur/ /rgyud la yon tan sna tshogs 'char zhing/ /de yi nyams len rkyen khar mi 'tshar/ /
180a5(rgyud 'grel): byang chub lam nas lam mdza' mi ldog /da yi bsgrub pa mdza' ru phyin 'gyur/ /dri ma mang pa'i snying po'i don mchog /bton pas rgyud la skye bar byed de/ /ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgyad cu'i sgol byed/ /srid pa'i dra
180a6(rgyud 'grel): pa bcom nas 'tshang rgya/ /lha mo khyod la mu tig phreng bas/ /bstod pa'i bsod nams zla ba rgyas 'dra/ /'gro rnams snying gi mun pa sel nas/ /ye shes snang bshad bar shog cig /mu tig phreng pa'i bstod pa zhes bya ba/ /
180a7(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma lo rig pa'i gnas rnam pa lnga la ma rmongs pa snyan dag mkhan po rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu lta bu/ /slob dpon chen po can ? go mi 'am 'chi med zla ba zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so// //
180b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar gyi mkhan po ti paM ka ra sh+rI dz+nyA na'i zhal snga nas bod kyi ban d+he sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha pa nag tso tshul khrims rgyal pas bi ka ma la shI la'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phag pa'o//
180b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ arya de bi ta ra stong tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma lha mo lha mo sgrol ma'i bstod pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bzlog dga' srid pa'i mun pa ni/ /'joms mdzad nyi ma'i 'ong dang mtshungs/ /thugs
180b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes brlan pa'i thugs mnga' ba/ /sgrol ma la ni rtag tu 'dud/ /shin tu rno ba'i sems can gyi/ /glang po che rnams gsod byed pa'i/ /lha mos seng ge 'khros pa rnams/ /mthong ba la ni 'jigs shing 'bros/ /mche ba mdud
180b4(rgyud 'grel): rtse rtse mo yis/ /brag 'joms shing drung rtsa ba 'don/ /khyod kyi sngags 'di bzlas pa las/ /'jigs shing glang po 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs dang nam mkha' ma lus pa/ /'dul pas khyab cing bzod par dka' / /'bar ba yis ni
180b5(rgyud 'grel): khyi tshig la/ /khyod bstod char pa me zhi 'gyur/ /ma lus gdengs ka las byung ba/ /phung sgra sgrogs shing dug ma can/ /sprul ni lha mo khyod bstod pas/ /nam mkha' lding gi byin du 'jigs/ /ral gris gcod pa grol la rnams/ /khrag gi
180b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bskas pa ste/ /khyod kyi mtshan tsam thos pa yis/ /tshom rkun nus pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po 'khros pa'i bran rnams kyis/ /skra nas bzung zhing zhags pas bcings/ /brtson ra spangs te lha mo kye/ /khyod la bstod
180b7(rgyud 'grel): byed 'jigs med 'gyur/ /dpa' rlabs tshogs kyis phyogs bcu dang/ /nam mkha' yang ni khyab byed pa/ /gru log nas ni rgya mtsho nas/ /khyod kyi 'phangs ni pha rol phyin/ /khrag dang glang pa 'dam gyis byugs/ /de dag bza' ba 
181a1(rgyud 'grel): la chags pa/ /lha mo khyod kyi sngags bzlas pas/ /sha za de dag 'jigs par 'gyur/ /yan lag chang cing phreng ba'i/ /khrag dang snag ni sna nas 'dzag /khyod la 'dus pa tsam gyis ni/ /mdze
181a2(rgyud 'grel): go 'dod khams lnga 'drar 'gyur/ /bkres skom g yis gdung gcer bu dang/ /slong ba yi dag dang 'dra ba/ /khyod la btud pa tsam gyis ni/ /'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/ /
181a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar dag pa khyod bstong pas /dge ba gang bsags de yis ni/ /'jig rten bde ba thob par shog /lha mo sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad ba rdzogs so// //slob dpon gyis sgrol ma'i shing sku de
181a4(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pas phyag 'jug ke re mdzad skad/ /de ltar mdzad pa ci lags zhus pas/ /khyod kyi bstod pa de snyan gsungs te sgrol ma 'dzub ker du grags so// //rgya gar skad du/ Arya ta ra stong tra pra ni d+ha na na ma/
181a5(rgyud 'grel): bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod ba smon lam grub pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi ge ljang ku ud pa la las byung ba'i/ /sku mdog ljang ku zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /
181a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sku la rin chen du mas spras/ /yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /don grub la sogs rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing/ /bcu drug na tshod 'dzum pa'i bzhin dang ldan/ /gzi brjid bzod dka' dgra tshogs
181a7(rgyud 'grel): rtag par 'dul/ /yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phyag g.yas mchod sbyin phyag g.yon ud pal 'dzin/ /sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la/ /g.yas brgyad g.yon bskum tshul gyis rab ? bzhugs /
181b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro la rtag tu gzigs/ /sku la 'jigs pa brgyad skyob sgrol ma 'gro/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun nas sgrol mdzad pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag po dang/
181b2(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs las rnams myur du sgrub mdzad cing/ /phrin las rgya mtsho myur du bsgrub mdzad pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /seng ge glang chen me sbrul? choM? rkun dang/ /lcags sgrog rgya mtsho sha za'i 'jigs pa brgyad//
181b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag kun las yongs su sgrol mdzod pa'i/ /yi dam sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /skye ba sngon bsags las dang nyon mongs dang/ /'tshams med lnga dang mi dge btsul? sogs/ /mi bzang sdig pa'i las rnams ci bgyis
181b4(rgyud 'grel): pa /de dag thams cad ma lus byang bar shog /bdag la de lta'i skye ba 'di las kyang/ /rmi ngan ltas dan dus min 'chi dang dgra/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad byang gyur cig /che dang bsod nams longs spyod rgyas par shog /
181b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni ma 'ongs skye ba thams cad du/ /yi dam sgrol ma rjes su dran gyur nas/ /mchog dang thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang/ /bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub 'gyur cing/ /phrin las ma lus kun la dbang bsgyur
181b6(rgyud 'grel): shog /yi dam sgrol ma thugs rje ldan pa la/ /bdag ni rab tu brtson pa'i gdung sems kyis/ /bstod pa bgyis pa'i bsod nams gang bsags nges/ /rje btsun sgrol ma khyed dang mi 'bral shog /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la bstod pa
181b7(rgyud 'grel): smon lam thams cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon chen po tsan+d+ra go mis mdzad pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga wa ti arya ta ra sto tra na ma/ bod skad du/ bcom? ldan 'das
182a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ rgyal ba thams cad kyi phrin las gcig tu bsdus pa'i bdag nyid rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i yum gyur sgrol ma nyid la/ /rgyal dang
182a2(rgyud 'grel): mkhas rnams kun gyis bstod mod/ /bdag kyang de rjes 'jug par 'dod pas/ /lha mo khyod la bstod par bgyi'o/ /chos kun gshis lugs stong pa'i ngang las/ /'khor po'i skyon spangs 'dab brgyad gdan dang/ /byang chub
182a3(rgyud 'grel): sems rgyas ku mud gdan steng/ /taM yig las 'khrungs ma la phyag 'tshal/ /sku mdog rab mdzes mar gad mdangs ldan/ /bcu drug lo lon gzhon nu'i lus can/ /'gying ldem sgeg pa'i rnam 'gyur dang ldan/ /sku
182a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog yongs rdzogs ma la phyag 'tshal/ /yon tan cha shas ma lus rdzogs phyir/ /zla rgyas zhal la bzhi bcu'i tshems dang/ /bden gnyis gzigs pa'i spyan gnyis dkyus ring/ /mtshan bzang mnga' pa ma la phyag 'tshal/ /
182a5(rgyud 'grel): bud bltar gnag ral ba'i thor tshugs/ /lha mo sil bus sku stod mdzes byas/ /zhal ras bim pa'i kha dog gis mdzes/ /dpe byang ldan pa ma la phyag 'tshal/ /phyag gnyis g.yas bas 'gro la mchog sbyin/ /g.yon
182a6(rgyud 'grel): pas thugs khar ud pa la legs bsnams/ /zhabs gnyis g.yas brkyang g.yon sku mtshul gyis/ /'gro pa'i don bzhugs ma la phyag 'tshal/ /lta bas mi ngom mig gi bdud rtsi/ /khyod sku nyid kyis khyod nyid mdzes na/ /
182a7(rgyud 'grel): dar dang rin chen rgyan gzhan ci dgos/ /rang bzhin rgyan ldan ma la phyag 'tshal/ /rin chen rtsa bran rnams las dbu brgyan/ /ngo shal phyag gdub zhabs gdub sil khrol/ /lha mi'i dar chen na bza' lhab ?/ /mdzes byed
182b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyan ldan ma la phyag 'tshal /sngon tshe byang chub spyad ba spyod dus/ /mthong thos dran reg gyur pa kun kyang/ /go 'phang cho thob gyur cig ces pa'i/ /smon lam mthar phyin ma la phyag 'tshal/ /'jig rten 'di na che pa'i che mchod/
182b2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i bdag po lha chen gcug gis/ /khyod zhabs cod ban bzhin du gus mnos/ /lha yi lhar gyur ma la phyag 'tshal/ /khyod sku'i cha shas dbang po'i gzhu bzhin/ /gsal la me 'dres so sor snang yang/ /rang bzhin dben
182b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i dngos po dang 'brel/ /snang stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshal/ /dri za'i glu bzhin snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis/ /gang la gda' 'dul char phab kyang/ /'gro 'ong gnas gsum ngo bo dang bral/ /grags stong dbyer med ma la phyag
182b4(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /ji lta ji snyed gshegs pa'i chos kun/ /ma 'dres ma 'khrug mngon sum mkhyen kyang/ /shes dang shes bya'i mtshan ma dang bral/ /rig stong dbyer med ma la phyag 'tshal/ /mthong na dga' dang 'byor ldan smon bzhin/
182b5(rgyud 'grel): mgon khyod mthong dang thos pa tsam gyis/ /mi mthun rkyen zhi mthun pa'i dpal ster/ /yid bzhin? nang ? la phyag 'tshal/ /sgrub gyi dug la ma ki'i rtsi bzhin/ /dgra dang tshom rkun rgyal po'i chad sogs/ /dran pa tsam gyis rab
182b6(rgyud 'grel): du zhi mdzad/ /'jigs pa brgyad skyobs ma la phyag 'tshal/ /gang gis chos kun chub par 'dod kyang/ /gti mug mun pas blo mig mdongs? rnams/ /khyod la cung zad gsol ba tsam gyis/ /shes rab mchog tsol ma la phyag
182b7(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal/ /sgrib gnyis dgra las rgyal bar 'dod pa'i/ /mi des khyod la dpung gnyen bcas nas/ /mun pa'i chags la nyi ma'i 'od bzhin/ /ma rig mun sel ma la phyag 'tshal/ /nam mkha' i khyon dang khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i/ /rgyal dang
183a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba rgya mtshor bcas pas/ /tshad kyang bzung bar ma nus zhes grags/ /mkhyen rabs mdza' yas ma la phyag 'tshal/ /chu yi rgyun kyang dus kyis chad 'gyur/ /khyod kyi brtse ba'i thugs rje'i chu rgyun/ /
183a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba srid du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i/ /thugs rje'i mnga' bdag ma la phyag 'tshal/ /brgyad khri bzhi stong nyon mongs g.yul ngo/ /dba' mo khyod nyid gcig bus bzlog par/ /nus pa'i mthu dpung bsam mi khyab pa/ /skyob pa'i
183a3(rgyud 'grel): nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab/ /rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyang dus la yol srid/ /dpal khyod gdul bya 'dul ba'i dus la/ /skad gcig tsam yang yol ba mi mnga' / /phrin las myur mgyogs ma la phyag 'tshal/ /rang gzhan don bya'i
183a4(rgyud 'grel): kun rtog bral yang/ /yid bzhin nor dang dpag bsam shing bzhin/ /so so'i skal dang 'tsham par don gnyis/ /'bad med lhun grub ma la phyag 'tshal/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig phyag 'tshal mchog 'dis/ /thugs rje mda'
183a5(rgyud 'grel): ba rje btsun ma la/ /mi byed dang pas rgyun du bstod na/ /mchog gi dngos grub thob par gyur cig/ rang gzhan ye shes kyi lha mo sgyur 'phrul chen mo la/ /shAkya'i dge slong dang byed go cha rin chen zhes bya bas bstod pa rdzogs so// //
183a6(rgyud 'grel): lots+tsha ba rig pa'i khu byug gis bsgyur zhing legs par gtan la phab pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ arya ha ra mahA aSh+Ta b+ha yod ta re sta ba/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las
183a7(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ba'i bstod pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khyod zhabs lha dang lha min ma lus phyag byas shing/ /thugs rjes ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams la gzigs/ /mi mthun spangs pa'i sgrol
183b1(rgyud 'grel): ma khyod la ni/ /zla ba sbas pa zhes bya bdag gis bstod par bgyi/ /glang po bsad pa'i khrag gis rkang lag dmar gyur cing/ /lam du zhugs pa mthong nas rnam par gnon byed pa'i/ /seng+ge lam du khyod dran pas ni bgrod dga' 
183b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ /nags tshal shin tu rab tu sdug por 'jug par 'gyur/ /bar med myos chus dri ma can gyi khur tshos la/ /bur ba lding bzang zir tshogs kyi sgras g.yos pa/ /yud tsam mi sdod gsod pa'i lam du ni/ /sgrol khyod la
183b3(rgyud 'grel): btung bcom par byas par 'gyur/ /'jig dus rlung stobs tshe bas sbar ba yi/ /gnam ltar rgya cher ba tu 'bar ba'i me/ /grong khyer 'ga' zhig gal te khyod kyi ming/ /brjod byed de mod nye bar zhi bar 'gyur/ /'khrig cing khyogs
183b4(rgyud 'grel): pa can gyi ri sul ljongs/ /bam zhugs mthong nas lam du rgyug pa yis/ /sgrul stobs che ba sgrol ma dran pa yis/ /dreg pa slar bcom phyir yang bzlog par byed/ /chom rkun mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa yis/ /lam
183b5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs mthong nas rnam par gdon pa yang/ /sgrol ma'i zhabs ni dran pa'i stobs kyis su/ /yun mi ring bar bde bar khyim du 'gro/ /nyin re brnyes nas smon byed la mkhas pa'i/ /sa yi bdag pos btson rar bcings pa yang/ /khong
183b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrol mi bzang sgrol ma'i zhabs dran pas/ /skad cig gis ni dum bu brgya ru 'gyur/ /gyen du 'khrug pas tshangs gnas tsam 'phags shing/ /nya dang chu srin 'jigs skrag byed pa'i lus/ /rgya mtsho'i dbus su gzings zhig
183b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa yang/ /sgrol ma dran pas mi 'jigs pa nyid 'thob/ /lus ni mig sman dang 'dra skra ser skya/ /skams shing ltogs la lhag par rgyus pas 'grel/ /mi gsod byed pa la ni dga' ba yi/ /ro langs khyod zhabs dran pas bcom
184a1(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de ltar 'jigs pa brgyad las sgrol pa yi/ /bdud las rgyal ma dran pa'i bsod nams ni/ /gang zhig 'di ru bdag gi thob pa des/ /'jig rten mdza' dag ma lus rig par shog /
184a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrog ma 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las sgrol pa'i stod pa/ slob dpon dpal btsun zla ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa bzhugs so// //
184a3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ arya tar stod h+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gsum mgon yum gyur spyan yangs ma/ /dus gsum sangs
184a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i yum/ /gnyis med ye shes dang las mi g.yos kyang/ /thugs rje'i dbang gi 'gro don sna tshogs mdzad/ /byams pa'i yum gyur khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'phrin las sna tshogs
184a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /yon tan rab rgyas bcu drug lon pa'i tshul/ /'gro la rab dgyes zhal ni 'dzum pa dang/ /zhi ba'i spyan gyis 'jig rten gsum la gzigs/ /thugs rje che mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud/ /byang sems rang bzhin zla ba
184a6(rgyud 'grel): gdan du bting/ /nyon mongs mi bskyod rdo rje'i skyil krungs bcas/ /sgrib pa kun spangs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /zag med bde rgyas zla ba'i rgyab yol can/ /zag med bde ba chal phyag 'tshal lo/ /na bza' mchog dang rin
184a7(rgyud 'grel): chen du mas spras/ /phyag g.yas mchod sbyin sgrub la dngos grub sbyin/ /g.yon pas ud pa la skyon bral dag pa'i rtags/ /phyag gnyis thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel/ /mdza' bral zung 'jug sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
184b1(rgyud 'grel): lus ngag yid kyis khyod la phyag byas pas/ /lha ba dman dang sgrub mchod dman pa dang/ /nyon mongs dbang gyur dam tshig nyams pa dag /khyed la bzod gsol thugs rjes gzung du gsol/ /yon tan mdza' yas mtshan gyis
184b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa'i sku/ /khyed la dga' bas rdul tsam bstod pa'o/ /khyod kyis zhal ni rtag tu mthong ba dang/ /yang dag lam mchog gang ma dag bstan pa'i/ /mtho ris thar pa'i lam mchog bdag la gsol/ /byams pa'i yum
184b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur bdag la dgongs nas kyang/ /bdag cag 'khor bcas bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang/ /tshe 'di'i rkyen rnams khyed kyis bzlog pa dang/ /phyi mar ngan song sgo rnams bcad pa dang/ /bdag gi dge blo khyod kyis rgyas par mdzod//
184b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa slob dpon mar me mdzad bzang pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i mkhan po b+hud ha ka ra bar ma dang/ lo tsa ba dge slong chos kyi ye shes kyis bsgyur zhing
184b5(rgyud 'grel): zhus pa'o// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa bzhugs so// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ arya ta ra stong tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol
184b6(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig pa las skyes dbyings na bzhugs/ /spras med rtog bral bde ba che/ /rnam dag don dam byang chub sems/ /sgrol ma chos sku phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i tshul ldan mdzes pa'i sku/ /kha dog mchog
184b7(rgyud 'grel): ldan brjid pa'i zhal/ /lha mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus na bzhugs/ /sgrol ma longs spyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /thugs kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /yang dag rig pa'i gzugs 'phro ma/ /'gro drug sems can sgrol mdzad ma// 
185a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma sprul sku phyag 'tshal lo/ /log rtog ma rig gnyid spangs nas/ /thugs mchog shes bya kun la khyab/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas mchod brnyes/ /sgrol ma sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo/ /
185a2(rgyud 'grel): bde chen zhi ba mya ngan 'das/ /dam pa'i chos mchog ye shes bcu/ /pha rol phyin pa bcu ston ma/ /dam chos sgrol ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum bder gshegs thams cad kyis/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs grub
185a3(rgyud 'grel): ma/ /'dus pa'i ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ /sgrol ma dge 'dun phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi 'dod pas/ /khams gsum po la rjes su chags/ /ma ltar brtse ba'i lha mo'i gzugs/ /'dod chags sgrol ma
185a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod phyag 'tshal/ /srid pa'i rang bzhin dag par mkhyen/ /khams gsum po la chags mi mnga' / /rgyal ba bskyed mdzad yum gyi sku/ /chags bral sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas/ /
185a5(rgyud 'grel): srid dang zhi la mi gnas pa/ /'dod chags ma yin chags dral min/ /mi gnas sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku/ /gti mug mdongs pa'i sems can gyi/ /ma rig mun pa sel mdzad ma/ /
185a6(rgyud 'grel): bde gshegs sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis yon tan tshogs/ /khengs pa zil gnon sems can gyi/ /nga rgyal ri bo 'joms mdzad ma/ /rin chen sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dri med
185a7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs/ /'dod chags kyis gdungs sems can gyi/ /srid pa'i gdung ba sel mdzad ma/ /pad+ma'i sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mdzad pa mchog /phrag dog gis bsnun sems can gyi/ /phrag dog zug
185b1(rgyud 'grel): rnga 'byin mdzad ma/ /'phrin las sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rdo rje'i sku/ /khong khro bcom pa'i sems can gyi/ /zhe sdad mtshon cha gcod mdzad ma/ /rdo rje sgrol ma khyod phyag 'tshal/ /gzugs brnyan lta
185b2(rgyud 'grel): bu'i sku 'dzin ma/ /phra dang rags pa'i gzugs dang bral/ /mtshan dang dpe byed rnam par spras/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sgra brnyan lta bu'i gsungs brjod pa/ /brjod dang yi ge nam par spangs/ /tshig dang ngag
185b3(rgyud 'grel): gal? ma las 'das/ /rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod?/ /rmi lam lta bu'i thugs mnga' ma/ /dngos dang dngos med sogs mi mthong/ /rtag dang chad pa sogs mi shes/ /rdo rje'i thugs la phyag mtshal bstod/ /rdul bral
185b4(rgyud 'grel): mkha' bya ba sgrol ma la/ /phyag bya phyag byed mi dmigs par/ /yan lag med cing lus med pa'i/ /gzugs med rdo rje'i lus kyis 'dud/ /rtog med spros bral sgrol ma la/ /bstod bya bstod byed mi dmigs par/ /snga
185b5(rgyud 'grel): dang brjod pa rnam bral ba'i/ /brjod med rdo rje'i tshig gis bstod/ /tshor bral dmigs med sgrol ma la/ /bsam bya bsam byed mi dmigs par/ /'dzin pa med cing rig bral ba'i/ /rdo rje sems kyis rab tu 'dud/ /slob
185b6(rgyud 'grel): dpon a k+Sho b+hya badzras mdzad pa'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa ma ya ta ra staM ba/ bod skad du/ dam tshig sgrol ma la bstod pa/ srid pa sgrol mdzad sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
185b7(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i yum ni khyod lags sdug bsngal med par mdzod/ /byang chub 'gro bar 'dod pas gtso mo khyod bsten to/ /sdug bsngal ldan pa bdag la thugs rjes bskyab du gsol/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'bras bu bdag la grub
186a1(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod/ /byang chub lam mchog khyod la brten nas thob 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs mi bzang dga' i me rnams 'bar ba la/ /ye shes char gyis rgyun gyis bsil bar mdzad du gsol/ /'jig
186a2(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum na dbyings kyi sems can ma lus pa/ /sgrol ma khyod ni rlung lha'i ngo bo 'am bdag nyid de/ /yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin chen sku 'dra ba/ /sems can 'jigs par lhung nas bying ba bskyab par mdzod/ /khyod
186a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis dgra rnams ma lus myur du bsal bar mdzod/ /klu'i dug ni khyud gis bcom nas zhi ba ltar/ /khyod kyis dpal ldan sku mchog gang gis mthong gyur na/ /sdig pa kun bcom bsod nams dpag med thob par
186a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ /don grub khyod mthong grub pa rnams ni 'grub 'gyur zhing/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid sems can thams cad sgrol mdzad pa/ /khyod kyis byin brlabs bka' drin bdag la 'byung 'gyur ba/ /blo dan bsod nams
186a5(rgyud 'grel): chung ba bdag ni gzung du gsol/ /rtag tu bdag gi khyod kyi gzugs ni g.yar dam bsgom/ /sa gzhi 'dra bar byams pas 'bras bu smin mdzad ma/ /kye ma'o rtag tu bdag ni sdug bsngal gzhir gyur te/ /ma bzhin
186a6(rgyud 'grel): phan pas dngos grub 'bras bu cis mi gsol/ /lha mo khyod kyis 'gro ba ma lus bde bar mdzod/ /dman pa'i sems kyis srid pa'i rgya mtshor lhung gyur pa/ /de dag skyab med gyur te shin tu sems gdung la/ /gtso mo
186a7(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyis 'gro ba yang nas yang du bsgral/ /zhi bar gyur ba'i gzugs can khyod ni thugs rje'i bdag /zhal ni nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu khyab par gsal/ /sdig pa'i gti mug shin tu mi bzad 'joms mdzad pa/ /sgrol ma
186b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sgrol mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshangs pa ru tra la sogs rtag tu phyag 'tshal zhing/ /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes par spras gyur pa'i/ /dbu'i rgyan rnams khyod kyi zhabs ni brgyan gyur te/ /
186b2(rgyud 'grel): dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu bstod de 'dud par byed/ /mtho ris lha rnams ltung bas shin tu 'jigs par skrag /de bas sems ni shin tu dang bas dad pa skyes/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khyod kyis de phyir skyab grol mdzod/ /
186b3(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba thugs rjes skyes nas gsung gi mi 'jigs sbyin/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas yang ni sems ni dad pa skyes/ /man d+ha ra ba in tra ni la'i 'phred ba sogs/ /pad ma lta bu'i zhabs la lha rnams mchod mchog mchod/
186b4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs mchod pas mchod de khyod la bstod phyag 'tshal/ /mchod pa mchog gis lha rnams khyod la mchod byed pa/ /bsod nams 'bras bu rang gi thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /mchod pa dgyes dang mi dgyes khyod la mi mda'
186b5(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid ldan pas lha rnams gzung bar mdzod/ /sngon tshe mi zhig mtshan mo don gnyer lam 'gro ba/ /don sar ma phyin lam na dgra dang phrad pa la/ /shin tu 'jigs sgrag sdangs te sgrol ma rjes su dran/ /
186b6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis rlabs kyis dgra de bran bzhin dbang du bsdud/ /sngon tshe mi zhig nags dkyil glang chen phrad/ /glang chen 'khros nas mche bas rab tu bzung ba las/ /ha ha zhes smras du 'bod sgrol ma sgrol mdzad bos/ /de ma thag tu gtso
186b7(rgyud 'grel): mos glang chen 'jigs pa bskyab/ /sngon tshe mi zhig dogs med khyim na nyal ba na/ /dgra chen gdug pas de'i khyim la me btang nas/ /skrag cing sdangs te langs nas sgrol ma sgrol mdzad bos/ /de ma thag tu char gyi rgyun gyis me
187a1(rgyud 'grel): 'bar zhi/ /sngon tshe smad 'tshong mdzes ma rol phyir nags tshal phyin/ /langs te a sho ka'i yal ga gzung ba la/ /yal ga'i rtsa na sbrul nag 'khros pas de la bzung/ /sgrol ma dran pa tsam gyis
187a2(rgyud 'grel): sdul gdug rab tu zhi/ /sngon tshe tshong dpon nor ldan don gnyer lam 'gro ba/ /grong khyer ma slebs lam du mi rgod phrad pa las/ /de'i 'jigs pas yum chen sgrol ma rjes su dran/ /byin gyis brlabs kyis dgra rnams
187a3(rgyud 'grel): bran bzhin dbang du bsdus/ /sngon tshe mi zhig 'phongs nas rkun mar song ba las/ /mdzod khang nang du phyin nas rgyal po'i nyul mas bzung/ /khyer nas btson khang nang du lcags sgrog mang pos bcings/ /skrag ste sgrol ma dran
187a4(rgyud 'grel): pas bcings pa'i sdug bsngal bral/ /sngon tsha 'phags pa'i dge bsnyen tsan tra go mi des/ /'khor bcas rgya mtshor gyur zhugs gru de lam du zhig /sgrol ma dran te thal mo sbyar te rjes su bstong/ /byin rlabs mngon du zhal/
187a5(rgyud 'grel): bstan chu las gling du chags/ /rgyal po gcig ni 'chags khang nang du nub mo phyin/ /skabs su bgegs kyis gdug pas de la bzung ba las/ /shin tu 'jigs skrag sngags pas sgrol ma rjes su dran/ /gtso mo khyod kyis
187a6(rgyud 'grel): bsrungs pas 'byung po'i 'jigs pa bral/ /'jigs pa chen po brgyad ni de ltar med par mdzad/ /thugs rje'i bdag nyid sgrol ma khyod kyis yud tsam gyis/ /srid gsum ma lus sems can rnams ni 'jigs med mdzad//
187a7(rgyud 'grel): bdag ni shin tu 'jigs skrag gtso mo khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /'jig rten sems can khyod kyis mtshan tsam sus thos pa/ /thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms par mdzad/ /bdag gis dad pas nang nub
187b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod bsngags rjes su dran/ /sdug bsngal bdag ldan gtso mo khyod kyis bsgral bar mdzod/ /kye ma ho bdag ni khyod kyis bsgrub par dka' ba ste/ /nang nub khyod kyi sngags ni bzlas brjod brtson par bgyis/ /bdag ni sdig
187b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan de phyir khyod ni grub ma gyur/ /'jigs sems ldan pa bdag la lha mos dngos grub gsol/ /ma rungs sems can rmongs bas dge spyod mi dran pa/ /gti mug drag pos bsgrib bas lam mchog ma mthong ste/ /bsod
187b3(rgyud 'grel): nams chud pas bdag ni sdig pa'i g.yang sar ltung/ /sdug bsngal 'joms mdzad sgrol ma khyod la skyabs su mchi/ /dgra dang glang po che dang me dang sprul dang ni/ /chom pos bcings pa chu dang 'byung po'i 'jigs pa rnams/ /
187b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma thugs rje ldan pa bdag gis bstod byas pas/ /srid gsum sems can ma lus sdug bsngal kun bral shog /yum chen lha mo dam tshig sgrol ma la bstod pa ko sa la'i yul rin chen ri zhes bya ba'i gnas na bzhugs
187b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i slob dpon dag gi dbyug tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin thob pa des 'chi bdag bzlog pa'i phyir mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po mar me mdzad grags pa dang/ lots+tsha ba tshur pra ba ka ras bsgyur ba'o// //
187b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan rje btsun ma la bstod pa bzhugs so// //oM swa sti/ bde ba'i 'byung gnas dpal ldan rjes btsun ma/ /nyes tshogs 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po dang/ /sdug bsngal kun la skyob par mdzad
187b7(rgyud 'grel): pa mo/ /bcom ldan sgrol ma yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yid 'ong rnam mdzes lha'i gzugs dang ni/ /srid gsum ma lus thams cad zil gyis mnan/ /yon tan mtshon dang dpe byad phun sum 'tshogs/ /tshogs gnyis mthar
188a1(rgyud 'grel): phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs dang 'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang ni/ /dus min 'chi dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho che las khyod kyis sgrol/ /thugs rje'i spyan mnga' 
188a2(rgyud 'grel): ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kun sbyar 'ching bsang dag 'dzin pa dang/ /phyin ci log gi 'jigs tshogs lta ba la/ /bdag 'dzin nam mkha' i mdud pa grol bar mdzad/ /stong nyid sku mnga' ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu
188a3(rgyud 'grel): sdug cing 'phongs par gyur pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang/ /sdug bsngal kun las rab tu thang par mdzad/ /bkra shis bde sbyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis thugs rje las/ /
188a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni 'khrungs shing sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /rgyal ba'i sras po rnams kyang khyod las skyes/ /lha'i lha mchog ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma zla gdan la/ /sna tshogs gzugs can rje btsun ma khyod ni/ /
188a5(rgyud 'grel): ud pa la dang rin chen rgyan gyis phreng/ /ltar mdzes kun mkhyen yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmi lam ngan dang ltas ngan glo bur ba/ /bdud bzhi'i sde dang dpung rnams ma lus bcom/ /sgrib gsum nyes ba'i rtsa ba drung nas
188a6(rgyud 'grel): 'byin/ /dpa' mo g.yul las rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dod pas gdung ba'i skye bo chags can la/ /rin chen gter mdzod 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang/ /zag med yon tan gdul bya'i bsam pa bzhin/ /dgos 'dod
188a7(rgyud 'grel): re ba skong ba'i nor bu ma/ /snyigs ma'i skal par nad mtshon mu ge'i/ /sems can dus min glo bur 'chi ba la/ /skye 'chi 'pho 'gyur med par thugs chud nas/ /dus gsum bsgres rgud med pa'i rigs 'dzin ma/ /rang
188b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyud nyes pa'i dmag gis bcom pa la/ /bzod pa'i go gyon shes rab mtshon cha yis/ /nyon mongs log pa'i dpung? rnams 'joms mdzad cing/ /'khor pa'i g.yul las rgyal ba'i dpa' mdzad ma/ /'gro kun sred pa'i nyes pas
188b2(rgyud 'grel): skom pa la/ /chags med bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'gro rnams la/ /rgyun chad med par rab tu tshim byed cing/ /nad med chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ma/ /gzi brjid 'od kyis gza' bdud zil gyis khrims bsil zer can/ /yon tan ri bor 'dzin phyir mdo 'od zla
188b3(rgyud 'grel): mo dbyed/ /thugs rje'i ? kyis srid pa'i chu klung skems/ /mthon dman kun la gsal ba'i rta bdun ma/ /lha bran skar tshogs nang na zla nya laM zhal/ /nyes pa'i gza' bral sgrib ba'i rab rib bsal/ /nyon mongs gdud ba'i tshul
188b4(rgyud 'grel): khrims bsil zer can/ /yon tan ri bor 'dzin phyir mdo 'od zla rgyas ma/ /bsam gtan rdzid bur nyams kyi bad sdong 'khrungs/ /drod rtag po 'dab bde ba'i ge sar rgyas/ /gdangs pa'i dri bsung bud ba'i 'khor tshogs tshims/ /bying rgod
188b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dam gyis ma gos chu skyes me/ /rnam dag gangs rir nus pa'i rtsal chen rdzogs/ /rigs pa'i mchu sder mu stegs ri dags 'dzoms/ /bdag med sgra'i nyan thos wa tshogs skrags/ /theg dman zil gyis gnon phyir mi 'jigs ?//
188b6(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i tshar nas byang chug stobs chen rdzogs/ /ting 'dzin chang gi nus mthus glang chen myos/ /dran pa'i mtshon chas bag med g.yul do 'dzoms/ /mos pa'i rgya mtshod 'jug pa'i rab brtan ma/ /'khor ba mya ngan thad la
188b7(rgyud 'grel): 'khyam ba la/ /theg chen myur mgyogs shugs kyi zhon pa la/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pas theg chen lam bsgrod nas/ /smon lam shes rab rdzogs ba'i cang shes ma/ /nyon mongs dug la spyod kyang zhen pa med/ /nyes tshogs skyon gyis mgos sku
189a1(rgyud 'grel): mdog mdzes/ /ma yengs chos nyid zab mo'i mdang? la gzigs/ /ngo mtshar mdzes bskyed pa'i rma bya med /stod pa'i mkha' ltar lta ba'i gshogs rlabs gcod/ /ngan song gcod rod g.yang sar
189a2(rgyud 'grel): nyam nga med/ /brtul zhugs mchu sder rtogs pa'i klu rgyal 'joms/ /tshangs pa'i gsungs snyan ka la ping ka mA /bskal ba'i mun nag nyes pa'i rdul khrod du/ /rin chen sems stor btsal ba'i don chen du/ /zhi gnas
189a3(rgyud 'grel): lhag mthong snum gyis sgron me bskyed/ /ma rig mun pa sel ba'i snang gsal ma /bag chags g.ya' bral kun gzhi me long gis/ /rtog med sgrib pa'i dri ma rnam bsal nas/ /bsal ba'i thugs brtan pa'i gzugs
189a4(rgyud 'grel): brnyan shar/ /gnas lugs rang bzhin gsal ba'i mdzes ston ma/ /lnga phung btson rar yid kyi btson bu de/ /bdag 'dzin nyon mongs lcags kyis bcings pa la/ /stong nyid rnam thar rtogs pa'i lde mig gis/ /sdug
189a5(rgyud 'grel): bsngal 'ching las sgrol ba'i thar byed ma/ /mtshan ma'i yul ngan sdig pa'i smag rum na/ /snyoms las le lo gnyid kyis non pa la/ /brtson 'grus glog dang chos kyi 'brug sgra yis/ /gsal zhing go bar sgrogs pa'i
189a6(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs chen ma/ /'jig tshogs phung po mi gtsang dur khrod nas/ /lta ba'i tshe srog rtag chad mthar shi la/ /byang chub rga shi med pa'i bdud rtsi yis/ /skye 'gag med par gso pa'i bdud rtsim/ /le lo g.yeng ba'i bsod
189a7(rgyud 'grel): nams ra ba na/ /nyes spyod dgra kun dge ba'i nor 'phrog la/ /dran pa'i so pa bslab bya nyams skabs su/ /shes bzhin mas rtses bsrung ba'i 'tsho byed ma/ /log lta'i than pas dge ba'i myu gu gdungs/ /byams pa'i sprin 'dus
189b1(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje'i chu rgyud gyis/ /dad pa'i zhing spangs byang chub lo tog rnams/ /smin pas 'jig rten gso pa'i 'tsho byed ma/ /nam zhig srog gi dbang po 'gag pa'i tshe/ /bshes gnyen srog dang bral nas gshin rjes khrid/ /nyams
189b2(rgyud 'grel): thag nga ros ? 'dod 'bod pa la/ /'jigs ba skyob phyir srid gsum gnyen cig ma/ /rtsod dus lnga brgya'i skye ba dug lnga rag /sangs rgyas bka' smod mkhas pa'i sku la bsdo/ /log ltas byang chub bar chad byed pa'i/ /dgra bo?
189b3(rgyud 'grel): myur du gsod pa'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /shes rab mgo bu ma rig ling thog gis/ /mdongs nas mi kham g.yang sar ltung ba la/ /bsdu ba'i lcags kyus bzung nas yang dag lam/ /ma nor drang por 'jug pa'i lam ston ma/ /sems
189b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyed stobs dang smon lam 'phel stobs kyis/ /dus gsum mi bshol thugs rje phyi shol med/ /sems can don la 'khor ba ma stong bar/ /dam bcas skyo dub med ba'i byams sems ma/ /rtogs pa'i chos nyid mkha' la 'gro gyur kyang//
189b5(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa 'dul phyir khro mo'i skur sprul nas/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i bar chad byed pa yi/ /dgra bo myur du gsod ba'i sgrol byed ma/ /de ltar mtshan gyi me tog bcu rtsa gnyis/ /dpe byad brgyad cu 'bras bu'i bstod pa ni/ /don kun grub
189b6(rgyud 'grel): byed rin chen rgyan 'drar mdzes/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog /mtshan thos pas ni skal ba stong gi bar/ /ngan song mi skye las dan sdig sgrib mdzad/ /glo bur 'jigs pa kun las thar byed cing/ /blo ldan rigs dang
189b7(rgyud 'grel): skal par ldan par byed/ /gang zhig gtsang sbra nang par sngar lang ste/ /spro zhing gus par ma yengs ting 'dzin gyis/ /gsum 'am bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig sogs/ /klog gam kha ton brjod pa rab bsgrags na/ /tshe rabs sngon gyi las
190a1(rgyud 'grel): ban bag chags sad /nyon mongs mi dge sdig sgrib 'byang bar byed/ /mtshams med lnga dang nye ba lnga la sogs/ /sdig pa stobs chen ma lus ngag par byed/ /ngan 'gro sdug bsngal 'ching ba gcod byed cing/ /
190a2(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /mchog dang thun mong yon tan rdzogs par byed/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras su dbang bskur zhing/ /byams sems mkha' 'gro lha srin sde brgyad kyis/ /grogs dang rje bor bkur ba'i gnas
190a3(rgyud 'grel): su mthong/ /bag la nyal dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams/ /dag cing sangs rgyas go 'phar myur du 'thob/ /tshe 'dir 'jigs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang/ /'byung po ro langs sha za mang po'i tshogs/ /grib gnon la sogs
190a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsub cing sdang sems kyis/ /gnod pa'i 'jigs pa dran pas sel bar byed/ /pha rol dmag tshogs gcan zan mi rgod dang/ /rkun po dug sprul rgyal po'i chad pa dang/ /seng ge glang po stag dang me dang chu/ /'jigs pa brgyad
190a5(rgyud 'grel): sogs dus min 'chi pa rnams/ /mtshan 'di dran pas mos pas rab brjod na/ /sdug bsngal zhi zhing sdig las thar par 'gyur/ /mdze dang rims dang dug nad la sogs pa'i/ /gnod pa'i sdug bsngal zhi zhing sel bar byed/ /byin
190a6(rgyud 'grel): rlabs myur zhing rab myur thugs rje can/ /gsol ba gang btab dngos grub thams cad dang/ /brtse ba chen pos skad cig nyid la ste/ /mi bsnyel skyob mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba rin po che'i dgongs ba ltar/ /
190a7(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs pa'i dge 'dun rgya mtsho rnams/ /'dun pa 'thun zhing byams pa'i sems ldan nas/ /bde ldan zhing ltar byin gyis rlab du gsol/ /sa steng 'dzam bu gling 'di thams cad kyang/ /pha rol gdug pa'i tshogs ni zhi
190b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cing ngo/ /bka' rgyud rin chen dang zhing rgyas pa dang/ /'phrin las rgyun chad med par mdzad du gsol/ /thub pa'i bstan pa nyi bzhin gsal gyur cing/ /sgrub pa po rnams gang du gnas pa'i sar/ /byin gyis rlob cing mnyam
190b2(rgyud 'grel): par gzhog pa dang/ /sgrub pa'i 'bras bu myur du smin mdzad gsol/ /bdag cag gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs su/ /mngon dga' i zhing dang dga' tshal lta bur ni/ /sems can sdug bsngal thams cad zhi gyur cing/ /'gro rnams
190b3(rgyud 'grel): bde chen sa la 'god par shog /ding nas bzung nas byang chub snying po'i dar/ /bcom ldan 'das ma khyod dang mi 'bral zhing/ /thugs rje'i lcags kyus rtag tu bzung nas kyang/ /dus rnams thams cad byin gyis brlab du gsol//
190b4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan mdza' yas bcom ldan 'das ma la/ /cung zad bstod pa'i bsod nams ci mchis pa/ /'gro drug 'khor pa'i sems can ma lus pa/ /bla med byang chub myur thob shog/ //'di mtshan yongs su grags pa rin
190b5(rgyud 'grel): po ches gsungs pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi sgra bsgyur gyi lots+tsha ba gnyan dge slong d+harma ki rtis ras 'gyur du gtan la phab pa'o// //*/ /oM thams cad grub pa dpal 'phel
190b6(rgyud 'grel): lha mo khyod lags kye/ /rnam thar yongs rdzogs dri med shes rab pha rol phyin/ /kun la mnga' mdzad bsdu ba'i tog ltar mdzes/ /zhabs gnyis rol pas gzhan don mdzad la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshad med bzhi'i bdud bzhi'i
190b7(rgyud 'grel): dpung rnams bcom pa kye/ /gang gis 'dod don gsol ba de ngag grub pa kye/ /sku dang phyag zhabs rin chen du mas rnam brgyan kye/ /bsdu ba dngos po bzhi ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /dpa' mo rab brjid dus gsum sa
191a1(rgyud 'grel): ler mkhyen pa kye/ /'khor ba'i 'dam nas 'gro ba ma lus 'dren mdzad ma/ /h+ri dang hUM phaT rab sgrogs dus gsum dbang phyug ma/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams myur sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rnam?
