191a2(rgyud 'grel): dag spyan gyis yul kun dus kun gzigs pa kye/ /sprul ba'i tshogs kyis srid pa'i 'jigs chen 'dzoms/ /thugs skyo mi mnga' rin chen nor 'dra ma srid tshul/ /thugs rje'i dbang nyid sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
191a3(rgyud 'grel): mkhar gnas zla ba nya 'dra bsil ba'i 'od ldan kye/ /rims stsogs nyon mongs gdung ba kun sel cing/ /gang gis bsam pa'i don grub thams cad rtsol mdzad ma/ /yid bzhin rin chen sgrol ma khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /
191a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur ye shes 'od 'bar kye/ /srid gsum skye 'gro ma lus smin grol mdzad pa ni/ /yid bzhin 'phrin las bzhi'i yal bar mi 'dod cing/ /mkhyen brtse mthu ldan ma cig khyod la phyag 'tshal
191a5(rgyud 'grel): bstod/ /phyag bzhi mnga' gzhu lcags kyu ud pal 'dzin pa kye/ /bdag gi las sgrib sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad pa dang/ /'dod don gang gsol myur du 'grub cing dpal la sogs/ /'phel bar mdzad cing zhabs la
191a6(rgyud 'grel): gsol 'debs phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nam mkha' lta bu rgyal yum rig pa 'dzin ma kye/ /'phrin las bzhi mdzad khyed zhabs lha dang lha min gyis/ /tshogs kyis btud cing kun la dbang bskur mkha' 'gro ma/ /sa gzhi
191a7(rgyud 'grel): lta bu'i mthu mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /slob dpon klu grub kyis bstod pa'o// //rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin mdza' bral yid 'od mngon dga' i zhing/ /
191b1(rgyud 'grel): yon tan lhun grub bde chen rnam dag pa'i/ /chos kyi mtho bas dpal ldan po ta la/ /'dod yon rin chen spras pa'i zhing khams na/ /gnyis med 'od gsal dbyings las ma bskyod kyang/ /'od dpag med pa'i thugs rje rin chen
191b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /'dzam gling chags chen skye bo'i don bsgrub phyir/ /bud med mtshan dpes gzhan la snang mdzad nas/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug byams sems rig 'dzin dang/ /rta mgrin la sogs khro rgyal khro mo dang/ /lha dang lha min gnod
191b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dri za'i tshogs/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo la sogs skal bzang ma/ /bstan pa rgya mtsho nam mkha' i rin chen mdzod/ /zab cing rgya che re skor dpag dka' i bcud/ /brjod pas don che thog mdza' bar dge ba/ /'jigs dang sdug bsngal
191b4(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs las grol ba/ /rtogs ba'i don la dus gsum 'du 'bral med/ /'gro la mos pa'i skabs dang dus snang zhing/ /sdig pa dag byed mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis/ /thos pas grol phyir gzhan la brjod par bya/ /chos
191b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid spros bral bde chen zab mo'i don/ /gnyis med blang dor med par thugs su chud/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa skye med dbyings su grol/ /dus gsum gcig tu mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas ma/ /dgongs pa'i don la mnyam nyid mi g.yo
191b6(rgyud 'grel): yang/ /brtse ba'i thugs rjes sems can gzhan don la/ /mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gang la gang 'dul ba'i/ /ma nges cir yang 'char ba'i sprul pa ma/ /shin tu dpag med ya nga'i gnas rnams su/ /'jigs pa brgyad sogs
191b7(rgyud 'grel): gdon gyis nyen pa la/ /bsnyems pa med pa 'phrul gyis blo gros kyis/ /'khor gyi 'jigs pa sel ba'i rje blon ma/ /gzhon nu'i lus la tshul khrims dri bsgom nas/ /khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa'i gsang gos bsgris/ /chog
192a1(rgyud 'grel): shes rnam dag mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan/ /'chal pa'i skyon gyis ma gos khrims btsun ma/ /rnam shes sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying ba la/ /'dren pa'i thugs rje thabs kyi zhags pa yis/ /'gro
192a2(rgyud 'grel): drug byang chub skam sar 'don mdzad pa'i/ /srid pa'i skyon gyis ma gos khyad 'phags ma/ /sbrang? stong gnyis med mkha' dbyings zung mjug cing/ /rtogs pa'i rigs pas gnas lugs don la sbyor/ /ting 'dzin thabs kyis
192a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i ye shes bskyed/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i yum gcig ma/ /skye rgas na 'chi'i chu bo rgal dka' ba'i/ /rgyud lnga mi dge rab kar 'khyam pa la/ /snying rje byang chub sems kyis gru gzings kyis/ /
192a4(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal chu bo sgrol ba'i kun sgrol ma/ /'gro ba 'gron po srid pa'i lam rgyun rnams/ /zag med bde ba'i nor gyis 'phongs ba la/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i rin chen gser gling gis/ /thar pa'i grong du 'dren
192a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ded dpon ma/ /khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal khang ba na/ /dug gsum gcod gis zin pa'i nang pa rnams/ /dam chos bdud rtsi sman gyis chu rgyun gyis/ /sdug bsngal zug rdu sel sman mdzad ma/ /
192a6(rgyud 'grel): grags dang bkra shis bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /dpal dang tshe dang rang bzhin rgyas gyur te/ /nor dang longs spyod bu tsa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /shes rab 'phel zhing bstan chos rig par 'gyur/ /gtsug lag mkhas
192a7(rgyud 'grel): shing tha snyad rgyal 'gyur te/ /rten 'brel gsal zhing drod rtags yon tan 'byung/ /mngon shes 'char zhing skye ba dran par byed/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing yid 'od mthong dgar 'gyur/ /gsung dbyangs tshangs pa'i dbyangs
192b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin snyan 'gyur cing/ /ngag tshig gsal zhing lus sems dpa' bar byed/ /gang dang gang du skye ba thams cad du/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rtag tu mi spang zhing/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan cing mi 'bral bar/ /'dod pa'i
192b2(rgyud 'grel): don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bstod pa don thams cad grub par byed pa/ /rin chen brgyan 'dra zhes bya ba/ kha che nyi ma sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
192b3(rgyud 'grel): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bkra shis bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ arya ta ra mang gal gi ti/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bkra shis pa/ /dpal dag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs
192b4(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yum gyur dge mche/ /dus gsum rtag par zla rgyas zhal can yid 'od sgegs/ /gzhon nu'i rol pas 'jig rten khyab par gsal mdzad sgrol/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs
192b5(rgyud 'grel): shog /phyogs bcu'i dus gsum kun tu byang chub sems dpa' lcam/ /pad+ma rgyas pa'i zhal nas 'od zer 'bum dang bcas/ /yud tsam skad cig blo 'gyu zhing khams du ma khyab/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde
192b6(rgyud 'grel): legs shog /phyogs bcu'i gsung dbyangs du mas chos kyi char pa 'beb/ /yan lag bcu gnyis gsung dbyangs yi ge bcur bsdus nas/ /pha rol phyin bcu'i tshus gyis gdul bya 'dul byed pa/ /'gro ba'i sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i
192b7(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcur 'od kyis 'gengs mdzad mgon po bcom ldan 'das/ /rse dpag med pa dbu la rgyan mdzes khur du khur/ /bla ma skyong mdzad dam tshig mi spang sdom pa can/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol
193a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i bde legs shog /phyogs bcu'i 'phags lam 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /thugs rjes gzigs nas bde thabs du mas rtsol mdzad pa/ /dgra bcom rang rgyal sogs dang bu mo'i gzugs 'dzin
193a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcur 'gro ba rnams su rtag par 'jigs pa brgyad sel phyir/ /kha dog dkar dmar sngo ljang ser nag sogs/ /du ma'i gzugs bzang rlung
193a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin myur du rgyu bar mdzad/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcu kun tu gsal mdzad nyi ma'i 'od zer can/ /lha'i 'khor los gsang ba'i brag phug nang gnas pa/ /thugs rje'i
193a4(rgyud 'grel): spyan gyis rgyan chad med par gzigs pa'i/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs rnams gzugs mdzes khyab pa'i lha'i 'khor lo ni/ /nor bzang 'od zer can dang phag mo khro gnyer can/ /rtag par
193a5(rgyud 'grel): phyi bzhin 'brang mdzad mdzes pa'i 'khor gyis brgyan/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /po ta lar ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon po'i mthus/ /rig pa'i lha mo tshogs rnams 'gro don bya'o
193a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes/ /rtag par zhal gyis bzhes nas nad gdon kun sel ba'i/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcu'i dang ldan bsgrub pa rnams kyis dran tsam gyis/ /rgyal po me chu glang chen rkun
193a7(rgyud 'grel): po gdon sprul gdug /mu ge mtshon 'khrugs nad yams dran pas zhi byed pa'o/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcur bud med gzugs mdzes rnams ni bsdus/ /sgrol ma'i sku'i
193b1(rgyud 'grel): brgya'i char nye bar lha mi klu mo lha min ma/ /gnod sbyin mo mdzes rnams kyis bcu drug char mi phod/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma yi bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcu'i lha mo rnams dang rin chen rnams kyi 'od/ /kun bsdus
193b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma'i 'od kyi brgya'i char mi nya/ /'on kyang rin chen tshogs mnga' rab sgegs mdzad rnams brgyan/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba rnams kyi mtshan ni yi ge bcu/ /oM yig ta re dang
193b3(rgyud 'grel): bcas khyad par tud ta re/ /ta re swAhAs mya ngan 'das mchog zhib bsgrub/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcur spyan dang ma mgos kar la sogs rigs/ /mi'i tshogs kyis rnga yab dri za can thogs
193b4(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /sil snyan tshogs dang snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis sgrol ma bstod/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcur rigs 'dzin tshogs rnams 'gro phan gang spyod kyang/ /rje mo khyod dran tsam gyis nyi ma'i
193b5(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer ltar/ /nyon mongs mun pa sel cing sdug bsngal tshogs las skyobs/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol me'i bkra shis bde legs shog /phyogs bcu'i khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed swo rnams/ /sgrol ma dran byed rnam kun bsrungs la
193b6(rgyud 'grel): brtson/ /khyab 'jug la sogs lha chen rnams kyis rjes 'brang ba/ /'gro ba sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i bkra shis bde legs shog /'phags ba sgrol ma'i bkra shis brjod pa rdzogs so// //paN Ti ta surya sri dang/ lots+tshab
193b7(rgyud 'grel): longs sa dge slong tshul khrims rtsags kyis bsgyur ba'o// //oM ku ru ku le hI hUM swa swAhA/ /oM ta re tu da ta re tu re swA hA/ bkra shis par shog/ //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ /ba d+hi ra d+ha ra sto tra/ bod skad du/
194a1(rgyud 'grel): seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la bstod pa/ 'phags ma seng ldeng nags kyi sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags ma'i pho brang seng ldeng nags na sgrol ma rtse/ /u dum wa ra seng ldeng rgya shug n+ya gro
194a2(rgyud 'grel): ta/ tsan dan 'bras bu gsum stong dza ti li shi'i tshal/ /kha brum la bye me tog shing lo nyams dga' gnas/ /ljon shing 'bras bu smin dang ma? smin ? po la/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chu ni lhung lhung sgra snyan la/ /rma bya ne tso khu khyug
194a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhad rnams sgra snyan sgrogs/ /stags gzig rgyug cing e nas gar byed de ma dred mchongs/ /lce sbyar glu len spre spre khri snyan be'u snun/ /lha'i du mo gzhon nu nags na drug ldan len/ /dge slong klu grub seng ldeng nags na grub
194a4(rgyud 'grel): chen mdzad/ /sgrol ma gshegs bzhud zhing khams gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /skye med thugs rje'i mtsho las pad ma mar gad mdog /me tog zla mdzes bud med rin chen bcud kyis mdzes/ /ngang pa'i 'gros ltar bgyid zhing
194a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'thur dreg bzhin gzigs/ /bde gshegs thugs rje'i rlan gyis gang mos skur ston ma/ /gser gyi pad mas snyan rgyan ud pal dar dbyangs can/ /rin chen rtse bran dbul don grub cod pan bzhugs/ /mu tig btso ma
194a6(rgyud 'grel): byu ru'i chun 'phyangs 'gur chu mdzes/ /phyag zhabs gdu? gu dpung rgyan sku reg dar sgeg ma/ /thugs rje 'khod ba las sgrol phyag na pad mo yis/ /spyan gyi chab las lha mo sku 'khrungs 'od dpag med/ /smon lam mthu yis brtse
194a7(rgyud 'grel): chen gzhan gyi don la brtson/ /zhing mchog rnam dag seng ldeng nags kyi gzhon nu ma/ /zhal gyi pad ma yid 'ong bzhin ni zla ltar rgyas/ /chu skyes spyan mdzes dkyus ring dkar nag mdangs gsal ba/ /mgor skyes khur bu
194b1(rgyud 'grel): gser gyis sgra brgyan bud ltar gnag /bi'i rdzi 'dra snum zhing mdzod spu dud 'khyil ma/ /bden gnyis phyag ni ud pal kha 'byed bdag sogs gyi/ /gti mug mun sel snying gi chu skyes kha dbus na/ /ud pal g.yon bsnams ye shes
194b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas mdzad g.yas pa yis/ /'gro rnams bung ba'i me tog sngon po kha 'byed ma/ /srid par lhungs nas mya ngan smre sngags 'don pa la/ /sems can don mdzad seng ldeng nags nas bzhengs la gshegs/ /lang tso dar bab 'o ma
194b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i nu 'bur can/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis srid zhi g.yo zhing bskyod mdzad ma/ /khyu mchog spyad mo 'gying bag lte ba pad ma can/ /dza ti tsam pa li shi dri dad bzang por ldan/ /phyag zhabs par ma ltar dmar 'khor ba'i skyon
194b4(rgyud 'grel): mgos/ /pan tsa li ga lha dar stod smad brgyan byas ma/ /nyi tshe'i sku min khyab pas thugs rje'i 'phrin las sku/ /thub bas rgya mtshor gsungs pa klu grub snying po yis/ /nags su gzigs so sems can ngal gyis khur chen khyer//
194b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad tshangs srid pa'i nags nas zhi bar sgrol mdzad ma/ /bsgres mo gzhon nu'i tshul 'dzin sangs rgyas kun gyi phyi/ /ming tsam dran pa nyid kyis 'jigs la bskyod mdzad ma/ /yun ring 'khor bar mi skyo zhi bar mi gnas pa'i/ /sa
194b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu'i dbang phyug rgyal sras rnams kyi thugs rjes/ /rje btsun yon tan mdza' yas bdag gis brjod mi nus/ /kun tu rtogs spangs ye shes mnga' brnyes chos kyi sku/ /gzhan gyi don phyir sku ni seng ldeng nags na gshegs bzhud
194b7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /srid las bdag grol nags kyi bu mo phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'od zer ral cig ser sngo? g.yas g.yon phyogs char gshegs/ /zhi khro'i phyag gnyis rdo rje a sho gri khug thogs/ /snga phyir bzhud cing dpe med gus ldan
195a1(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkur mdzad/ /mdzes ma nye 'khor 'od zer ral cig phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sngon mchod phyi nas gdugs khur rigs rgyal ? mo'i tshogs/ /rnga yob? ting shag rnga gling pa bid? glu gang 'gengs/ /lha'i bu mo bco lnga rgyan ldan na bza' 
195a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes/ /sna tshogs sku yis mchod bsnams rol la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /nags tshal lnga? mo sku mdzes dag ma 'khor btsas la/ bdag gis bstod bgyis mi bzang dge ba bzang po nges/ /'gro ba kun thugs rje'i chu'i nyon mongs
195a3(rgyud 'grel): kun dag nas/ /srid pa'i nags nas zhi ba'i tshal du phyin par shog /gzhon nu kha ti ta re ma la bstod pa tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug pa/ /slob dpon 'phags pa klu grub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
195a4(rgyud 'grel): oM tha ma hA b+ha pa/ gAnba dzra d+har sarba ta thA ga tA gram hI Shi /sa ma ya tA rA nA ma sarba ku la ta thA ga ta/ badzra ratna pad+ma karmA? d+hi pati? / tsar Ni tsar kritA (rgyud 'grel): s+thi re Na tsa tsa la swa b+ha ba
195a5(rgyud 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo'i mchog /dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang las kyi riD thaM cad kyi bdag po rgyu ba dang mi rgyu
195a6(rgyud 'grel): ? hya ti gu hya ta ri ma hA gu hya shwa re mahA gu hye shwa re at+mA nAM badzra nA me mi swakA ya bAk+tsi ta t+te badzre b+hyo ni shtsa rA yan b+hag wa tI tA rA badzra na sa ma ya tA rA badzra mahA yo gi nI pany+tsa
195a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'i byed po brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i rang bzhin gsang ba las chos shin tu gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po'i dbang phyug mas bdag nyid kyi rdo rje'i ming 'od rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thuD rdo rje las phyung ngo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma/ sgrol ma/ rdo rje ma dam tshig sgrol
195b1(rgyud 'grel): dzanya na b+hu Shi tA badzra pany+tsa mu ku Tai (rgyud 'grel): sarba bud+d+ha b+hi She ka (rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA na maN+Da la su tsan+d+ra/ a ho k+She ma kA ya wa k+tsit+ta rany+dza nI ya skand+ha pa te A ya ta ne shwi hUM? prapti b+hU ta (rgyud 'grel): bi de
195b2(rgyud 'grel): ma/ rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo/ ye shes lngas brgyan pa ma rdo rje cod pa Na lnga dad ldan ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur ma/ /ye shes dal/ zla ba'i bde ma/ ngo mtshor? gand+he? ma sku de gsungs dang thugs kyi 'od de ma phud po'i bdag/ mo/ skye mched kyi bdag
195b3(rgyud 'grel): shaswa b+hA wA tanh+re shwa rI pany+tsa dz+nyA na bo d+ha bi ra rdza bi ma lo ma hA mA n+t+ra a ti suk+Sh+na bi chi te tro la k+Sha? nA nu bya ny+dzan shud+d+hi ta(rgyud 'grel): ma hA shu d+d+hi ha :
195b4(rgyud 'grel): por gyur pa/ 'byung ba rnams rab tu thob pa/ yul dang bral ba'i rang bzhin/ rgyud kun gyi dbang phyug ma/ ye shes rnam pa lngas byang chub pa/ rdul dang bral ba/ dri ma med pa/ gsang sngags chen mo shin tu phra ba mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis
195b5(rgyud 'grel): sarba karma sid+d+ha ka ri sarba kA ma pra daM da shA k+Sha rag rdzan ru la rA tI tu t+tA rA tu re bidz+nyAn pa ri shud+d+ha d+h+ri d+ha sudz+nyA garb+ha ma hA su kha(rgyud 'grel): ta tre daM yo gI nI sa ma ya s+thi ta tya hA tsa Arya tA rA nI nA ma hA? shas ha sri rken sh+yal? ?
195b6(rgyud 'grel): pta/ spras ba/ dag byed/ dag byed chen mo/ las thams cad grub par byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ yi ge bcu'i sgra sgrogs ma/ sgra sgrogs dgyes ma/ gdung ma/ myur ma/ rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa/ sra zhing
195b7(rgyud 'grel): bde ba ye shes snying po/ bde ba chen mo'o/ /de la 'di ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dam tshig gi gnas so/ /'di skad kyang bka' stsal to/ /'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan des pa zhes bya ba stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba rdzogs so// //
196a1(rgyud 'grel): yang mtshan rnams 'di ltar sdebs na legs pa yin te/ bcom ldan sgrol ma rdo rje ma dang dam tshig sgrol ma rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo/ /ye shes lngas brgyan rdo rje cod paN lnga dang ldan ma
196a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur ma/ ye shes dkyil 'khor zla bzang ngo mtshar bde ma sku gsung thugs kyi 'dod ma phung po'i bdag /skye mched bdag gyur 'byung rnams rab thob yul dang bral ba'i rang bzhin rgyud kun
196a3(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug ma/ ye shes rnam pa lnga yis byang chub rdul dang bral ba dri ma med/ gsang sngags chen mo shin tu phra/ /mtshan dang dpe byang rnams kyis spras/ /dge byed dag byed chen mo ste/ /las rnams thams cad grub
196a4(rgyud 'grel): byed pa/ /'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin/ /yi ge bcu yi sgra sgrogs ma/ /sgra sgrog dgyes ma gdung ba ma/ /myur ba ma ste rnam par shes/ /yongs su dag ba sra zhing bde/ /ye shes snying po bde chen mo/ /zhes pa ste rgya
196a5(rgyud 'grel): skad tshig lhug pa yin mod kyi /don lo brton pa nyid kyi phyir 'od? bzung bde bas legs so/ /` 'di yi dbang dang rim gnyis cha lag bcas/ /zhib par gsungs pa yid la nges byas nas/ /bla ma'i gsung bzhin phyi rol bstan
196a6(rgyud 'grel): bcas dang/ /mthun par rgyud kyi snying po 'di tsam bsgyur// //rdo rje rnam 'joms kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra pid bas? ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya
196a7(rgyud 'grel): ba gdug pa kun gyi dgrar gyur pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal la gus btud de/ /rgyas pa bsgom par mi nus dang/ /sdug bsngal nad kyis nyen pa la/ /de don sgrub thabs 'bang par bya/ /snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /mgul
196b1(rgyud 'grel): khu yungs kar tshogs byas te/ /kha bshal khrus dang ldan byas la/ /dben gnas bde ba'i stan la dug /badzra bcu yis mtshams bcad de/ /rang snying bsil ? hUM bkod de/ /de 'od bder gshegs spyan drangs te/ /mkha' la
196b2(rgyud 'grel): gsal bkor bdun rdzogs bya/ de nas /chos nyid dang gnas de rjes la/ /drag po'i hUM sgra stong zil gnon/ /khro bo'i khang par bsam stong gsum g.yo ldan mkha' ma las ba'i ? ste du ljon po po hUM sngon po 'phros pas/ 'byung bsam/ mo /mdun gyi nas de rjes
196b3(rgyud 'grel): hUM bar 'od/ la lo rnam dag thams cad stong kyi du mkha' bar byas pa la bsam/ /drag pas gsum gyis pa/ da las yaM baM sgra nges laM gsum ba dang/ par nam la sgra chang/ /de dag rim gyis zhu 'gyur bas/ /rlung bar mtshos /bang gi sems nyid
196b4(rgyud 'grel): sngon po ri rgyal por gyur/ /de steng a hUM pam dang bcas pa gcig nas zhu bas/ /zla nyi mo pad+ma'i gdan du bsi/ hUM de yi ge steng hUM ba bas zhu 'gyur bas/ /sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje la/ /phyogs gcig yu yam las ban las/ bar lam las gyur par
196b5(rgyud 'grel): bsam/ /de 'ong ba der gshegs mdza' dag bsdus/ /de gyur a las hUM ? bam las rdo rje snying po'o/ /sku ljang spyan sngon po de las 'ong 'phros don gn yis byas tshur 'dus pas 'ong du gsum phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram la/ /ngos gcig
196b6(rgyud 'grel): yu sna tshogs rdo rje las 'phros pas pa bar 'dzin pa'i nas rim ral? tshul/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub thugs kar 'dzin/ /g.yas bslum? g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /dbu skra gyen brdzes klu rigs brgyan/ /mche gtsigs phyag rdor sprul
196b7(rgyud 'grel): bar bsgom/ /de thugs kar a las zla pa'i steng du hUM gi 'od zer 'gros/ /badzra gnyis dang bcas pa yis ? gsung dang thugs 'dre'o/ /sngon du? rang lhar bskyed la lha'i ye shes spyan drangs te/ /na mo ratna tra yA yas/ /ye shes lha la phyag byas te/ / 
197a1(rgyud 'grel): mchod ba rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho/ /gnyis med bya/ par? /badzra brgyad dang kI la lnga/ /badzra bdun sogs brjod byas pas/ /sku gsung thugs sogs byin gyis brlab/ /thugs ba'i
197a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM las byas bder gsheD sbos la sogs pa'i bkug /na mas man rang dang sngags su sogs de nas kyis/ /khro bo nyid la dbang bskur bsam mo/ rang gi spyi bor A:las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gi steng du badzra brgyad kyi sngags 'bru dkar por bzheng nas kwar gyis byung bar bsam?
197a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar 'od 'phros pas gsal pa mang po bar bsgom par la bya/ /de skyo gzungs sngags rim pa gsum/ /mos pa'i bye brag bzlas bas dbang rtags su rigs su rigs ? mgon po par bya/ /de skyo gtor btang ye shes 'byung/ /mchod la
197a4(rgyud 'grel): gshegs su gsol bar bya/ /lha'i rtogs pa can dang rtags pad man pa gnyis so nga rgyal don dam gyi bzlas pa dang kun rdzob kyi bzlas pa 'phrin las bzhi'o/ /ldan par bya/ /bdag blo shin tu dman bzlas pa byed pa na ma gyur sems dpa' yas seM dpa' pa phul
197a5(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /yi dam lhas bskul rang thun mtshams su dam tshig gi sgrub thabs 'bad/ /'bad pas dge ba ci thob pa/ /'gro rnams re 'dod skong 'o bar shog /bdag kyang yi dam lung bstan bzhin/ /rang 'dod gnas su skye bar shog /
197a6(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis yi dam zhal mthong shog /bdag gi bstan bcos rgyas gyur cig /slob dpon chen po mkhas pa ratna kirtis mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i sgrub thabs bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// /khal po'i
197a7(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta mahA pa na'i rang 'gyur// //rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ri ba ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ las rnams bzhi po mthar phyin pa/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi'i sku la mdud/ /
197b1(rgyud 'grel): bum mang bca' bar mi nus la/ /'phrin las rnam pa bzhi po yi/ /bum gcig cho ga bstan par bya/ /rgyud nas 'phrin las rnam bzhi gsungs/ /bum gcig cho ga rnam pa bzhi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis/ /bum gcig cho ga
197b2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gnyis 'gyur/ /zhi ba dkar dang rgyas pa ser/ /dbang ni dmar dang drag po nag /bum pa mgul chings gzungs thag sogs/ /las dang mthun par 'gyur byas te/ /gu gul tsandan dud pa dang/ /las bzhi yi ni sngags dang
197b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /shin tu bsdus pa'i sngags kyis ni/ /bum pa bdug cing bsang ba bya/ /rgyu bzang bum pa tshad ldan nang/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ni/ /so so'i mtshon gyis bris nas ni/ /sku gsung thugs ni gang byed pa'i/ /yi ge rdzas
197b4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa ni/ /ras su gtums te bum nang gzhug /nang dang mtshon dang mu ge yi/ /bskal pa de dag ser byed cing/ /sman lnga rin chen 'bru lnga yis/ /bum pa yang ni dag par bya/ /tshul khrims dang ldan mchog yin phyir/ /
197b5(rgyud 'grel): dri dang snying pos bum pa bkang/ /de sogs bum rdzas sna tshogs brtsal/ /bum pa rnams ni rgyan gyis brgyan/ /bum pa la ni gdugs pu dbub/ /zhi ba yi ni maN+Dal ni/ /pad+ma dkar po 'dab brgyad pa/ /rgyas pa rin chen ser po
197b6(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs can/ /dbang la pad+ma dmar po lcags kyus mtshan/ /drag po la ni mthing nag rtsibs brgyad ngo/ /bum gcig cho ga bsdus pa yis/ /gzhan gyi don ni byed 'gyur na/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bshams nas ni/ /zhi ba'i maN+Dal
197b7(rgyud 'grel): shar du bri/ /rgyas pa'i lho dang dbang gi nub/ /drag po byang du bri ba ste/ /bum pa yang ni de der dgong/ /mchod dang gtor ma rgyas par bsham/ /ku sha'i stan ni bting bya ste/ /slob dpon smyud bar gnas pa'am/ /yang na dkar gsum
198a1(rgyud 'grel): [dr:] */ /zas la brten/ /gtsang mi'i gos sogs khrus byas te/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug byas te/ /badzra bcu yis mtshams bcad de/ /rang snying bsil hUM dgod de/ /de
198a2(rgyud 'grel): 'ong bder gshegs spyan drangs te/ /mkha' la gsal bkod bdun rdzogs bya/ /chos nyid dang gnas de rjes la/ /drag po'i hUM sgra stong zil gnon/ /stong
198a3(rgyud 'grel): gsum g.yo ldan mkha' 'byung bsam/ /de rjes hUM 'od ldan pa ni/ /nam mkha' la ni bsam par bya/ /de las yaM baM laM gsum tshad/ /de dag rim gyis zhu
198a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur bas/ /rlung mtshos ri rgyal por 'gyur/ /de steng A:hUM baM zhu bas/ /zla nyi pad+ma'i gdan du gyur/ /de steng hUm babs zhu gyur pas/ /sna tshogs
198a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yi rdo rje la/ /phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/ /de 'od bder gshegs mdza' dag bsdus/ /de gyur rdo rje snying po'o/ /sku ljang spyan gsum
198a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rgya gram pa/ /ngos gcig yu bar 'dzin pa'i tshul/ /g.yon pa sdig mjub thugs kar 'dzin/ /g.yas brkum
198a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon brkyang gar gyis bzhugs/ /dbu skra gyen rjes klu rigs brgyan/ /mche gtsigs phyag rdor sprul ba bsgom/ /de nas bum pa'i nang du
198b1(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /a zhu bas ni bdud rtsi'i mtsho/ /de steng a zhu zla ba bsam/ /de steng so so'i kha dog dang/ /ldan pa'i yi ge hUM bsam mo/ /gsung sgrub de la dmigs de sgrub/ /de zhu sna tshogs rdo rje la/ /phyogs gcig yu bar gyur par bsam/ /
198b2(rgyud 'grel): kha dog las dang mthun pa'o/ /thugs sgrub de la dmigs te bsgrubs/ /de zhu rdo rje snying po ni/ /sngon lta ba ni bsam par bya/ /de nas ye shes spyan drangs te/ /hUM 'jigs bcas lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog nas/ /rigs sngags
198b3(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kun gyi bdag po ste/ /khro rgyal rdo rje 'dzin gyi rab sprul pa'i/ /khro rgyal rdo rje snying po gshegs su gsol/ /ha ra ha ra badzra bi dA ra na ya swAhA//pra ha ra pra ha ra badzra pra ba na dza na ya swAhA/ /sngon lta'i ye shes spyan drangs te/ /phyag
198b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya bzhi yis gnyis med bya/ /badzra brgyad dang kI la lnga/ /badzra bdun sogs brjod byas bis?/ /sku gsung thugs sogs byin gyis brlab/ /thugs hUM las byas bder gshegs bkug /na ma sa man sngags sogs kyis/ /khro bo la ni
198b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur bsam/ /na mo ratna tra yA yas/ /dum pa'i lha la phyag kyang bya/ /mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod/ /de mchod sku ni gsal bar bsgom/ /sku sgrub de la dmigs te bsgrub/ /de nas gzungs sngags rim pa gsum/ /mos
198b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bye brag bzlas par bya/ /de skyo gtor btang ye shes dbyung/ /dam tshig bum lha 'od du zhu/ /rang nyid lha yi nga rgyal bya/ /de nas gzungs chog bya ba ni/ /kun khyab gzung chog bzhin du bya'o/ /yang na 'di ltar bya ba ste/ /shis brjod mang du byas
198b7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ //khyab? cing bsrung ba'i cho ga bya/ /rgyud kyi sbyor tshig la sogs pa/ /khrus chog rgyas par shes par bya'o/ /de ltar bum gcig ma'i cho ga bsdus pa 'am/ /dgos pa'i bye brag gis shes par bya'o/ /bdag blo shin du dman 'gyur yang//
199a1(rgyud 'grel): [dr:] */ /rgyud 'di nyid dang mi 'gal ba'i/ /las bzhi'i bum gcig cho ga 'bad/ /'bad bas dge ba ci bsags pa/ /'gro rnams re
199a2(rgyud 'grel): 'dod skong bar shog kun kyang 'di la 'jug 'gyur cig /slob dpon chen po ratna ki rtis mdzad pa'i/ /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i khrus kyi
199a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga rdzogs so// /bal po'i paN+Di ta ma hA pa na'i rang 'gyur ra// //drag pa'i gtso bum 'di skad do/ /cis kyang
199a4(rgyud 'grel): mi chod mi shigs pa/ /bden pa sra ba brtan pa ste/ /thams cad du ni thogs pa med/ /thams cad du ni ma 'pham pa/ /shes rab thugs kyi rang
199a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin te/ /sems can thams cad skrag par byed/ /sems can thams cad 'jil par byed/ /rigs sngags thams cad gcod par byed/ /gdon
199a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams thams cad brlag par byed/ /sems can thams cad rengs byed pa/ /kI li kI la'i sngags dang ni/ /tra ta ya'i sngags sogs kyis/ /'phrin
199a7(rgyud 'grel): las drag po'i las mthar phyin/ /khro rgyal rdo rje rnam 'joms mthus/ /drag po'i bum chu 'di yis ni/ /dri ma thams cad dag gyur cig /'phrin las drag
199b1(rgyud 'grel): po mthar phyin shog/ //*/ /dbyangs can ma'i bstod pa paN+Di ta nag mo'i khrol gyis mdzad pa paN+Ti ta dz+nyA na shI la dang/ dge slong chos 'bar gyi 'gyur bzhugs so// */ /rgya gar skad du/ swo ra swo stot+tra na ma/ bod skad du/ lha mo
199b2(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs can gyi bstod pa/ ston zla rab rgyas ku mud dung dang chu shel gangs ri ltar dkar ba/ /rab dkar dkar gsal gzi ldan yi 'phrog lha mo dbyangs can phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi shes gti mug rmongs pa'i chags ni kun nas 'joms/ /smra
199b3(rgyud 'grel): ngan sun 'byin thogs med kun gzigs spobs pa'i gter mchog rgyas par mdzod/ /sgrib gnyis sprin bral blo gros 'od zer stong ldan rab tu 'char ka yi/ /nyi ma'i zer gyis 'byed bya'i padmo rab dul kha 'byed rnam rgyas pas/ /rab tu
199b4(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim bsil dang? ldan pa'i padmo'i ze 'bru'i ngos dag la/ /bdag bla'i gus bas 'thungs pas blo gros cher rgyas sbrang rtsis 'gro rnams skyongs/ /gser gyi ri dang kun mkhyen chu gter lta bur kun nas lhun chags pa/ /rtsod pa'i phye
199b5(rgyud 'grel): ma leb dang bdud dang dus kyi rlung gis bskyod ma yin/ /bcu drug na tshod lta bu'i bu mo rab mdzes sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan/ /lha yi rgyan rnams du mas khyod kyi lus dang yan lag mdzes pa yis/ /chu 'gram gnas nas mgrin
199b6(rgyud 'grel): sngon dga' bskyed rgya mtsho'i lha mo dbyangs can ma/ /khyod la phyag 'tshal brtse bas bdag blo'i mi shes mun pa myur du sol/ /rab tu snyan pa'i dbyangs ldan dri za'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma/ /lag gi 'du byed rab tu bsgyur bas tshangs
199b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gsung dbyangs rnams 'byung bas/ /sgra dang tshad mi snyan ngag mngon brjod sdeb sbyor legs bshad chos rnams kun/ /pha rol yid 'phrog 'dzin par nus pa ci'i phyir bdag la mi stsol lags/ /khyod kyi thugs ni kun tu
200a1(rgyud 'grel): mi g.yo rgya mtsho chen po lta bu ste/ /thugs rje'i brlabs shugs drag tu bskyod pas 'gro ba'i gdung ba rab tu sol/ /dbang gi rgyal po'i 'byung gnas yid bzhin re skong dbyangs can rgya mtsho yis/ /rmongs
200a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gdung bas gdungs pa'i skye bo rings por skyong ba dang/ gti mug dag gis blo dman skye bo'i re ba myur du skongs/ /bdag blo'i ku mung da ni rab tu kha zlum rnam par gnag pa la/ bsil zer byed pas rab tu sprin bral
200a3(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rnam par rgyas pa yis/ /ku mung kha bye rab rgyas ze 'bru'i bsil dang rnam par sel bar mdzod/ /rab tu dri bral rkyen gyi dri mas ma phog ma 'gags khyod kyi sku/ /kun tu tshangs pa'i dbyangs can ca co'i dri bral khyod
200a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi gsung/ /shes bya kun la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan khyod kyi thugs/ /bstod pa 'di yis bstod la dbyangs can ma yis blo gros mchog rab rtsol/ /dbyangs can gyi bstod pa 'di ni/ /lho phyogs gyi rgyud du byung
200a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mkhas pa chen po paN+Di ta nag mo'i khol gyis dbyangs can ma zhal gzigs pa'i dus su dgyes te bstod pa rdzogs so// //gang zhig 'di 'don pa la shes rab stsol bar khas blangs so/ /rgya gar
200a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dz+nyA na si la dang/ lots+tsha ba dge slong chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /tshe dpag med kyi rgya gzhung bsgrub thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a yu a pa ra mi ta sa d+ha nas/ bod skad du/
200a7(rgyud 'grel): tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ mgon po tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang brtson 'gro rnams sgral 'dod pas/ /bsod nams tshogs ni sngon song nas/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par
200b1(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rang nyid snying khar h+ri dmar las/ /ye shes me 'bar rnam smin bsregs/ /de rjes rang sems thig le dang/ /h+ri:dmar tsheg drag gyur pa las/ /'od 'phros don byas tshur 'dus pas/ /rta mchog spyan gsum zhal
200b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgrad pa/ /dbyug pa sdigs 'dzub rab 'jigs bsgom/ /de'i thugs khar pad zla'i steng/ /h+ri:las bcom ldan tshe dpag med/ /mdog dmar rgyan mdzes 'dzum zhing sgeg /bum pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /de'i thugs khar pad
200b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi'i steng/ /h+ri:las 'bruM chad 'khor lo ni/ /rtsibs brgyad yongs su gyur pa las/ /gzhal yas gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa/ /'dab brgyad khyams dang pad rag dang/ /'dod yon dra phyed pa gus brgyan/ /rta babs mchod rten la sogs mdzes
200b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma ri dmar smug 'khrug /dang zhing thogs pa med pa yi/ /'od zer tshogs 'khrugs bsgom par bya/ /de yang h+ri las pho brang gi /dbus su saM gcig chad pa las/ /mi 'jigs brgyad du gyur par bsgom/ /de stengs paM a ri las/ /
200b5(rgyud 'grel): pad zla rta bdun ngag tu gyur/ /de'i steng du h+ri:las ni/ /'od 'phros don byas tshur 'dus pas /pad ma dmar po 'dab lngar gyur/ /de las bcom ldan tshe dpag med/ /mdog dmar gzhon sgeg brgyan gyis mdzes/ /bgro rnams re bskong
200b6(rgyud 'grel): dpag bsam shing/ /bum pa'i kha brgyan thugs khar 'dzin/ /'gying bcas 'ong 'khrug skyil krungs bcas/ /de'i g.yon du paM dang a/ /gyur pas nged? zla'i gdan stengs su/ /a las yum mchog gos dkar mo/ /mtshal
200b7(rgyud 'grel): mdog 'gying bcas 'dzum zhing sgeg /thugs khar pad ma ra ga'i/ /bum pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /shar du pad zla nyi ma yi/ /steng du hUM las rdo rjer 'gyur/ /de las mi bskyod tshe dpag med/ /be dur sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// 
201a1(rgyud 'grel): skyil krung dang bcas bum pa 'dzin/ /de'i g.yon du pad zla'i steng/ /swa las yum mchog sangs rgyas spyan/ /mdog dkar phyag gnyis bum pa 'dzin/ /gzhon sgeg skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /lho ru pad? zla?
201a2(rgyud 'grel): nyi stengs su/ /swa las rin chen tshe dpag med/ /btso ma gser mdog skyil krung bzhugs/ /bum 'dzin rin chen brgyan spras so/ /g.yon du pad zlar nyid las/ /byung ba'i yum mchog ma ma ki /nam mkha' i mdog can
201a3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzum sgeg mdzes/ /bum pa bsnams shir skyil krung bzhugs/ /nub du pad ma nyi ma yi/ /steng du bruM las 'khor lor gyur/ /de las snang mdzad tshe dpag med/ /dkar zhing skyil krung bzhugs pa'o/ /g.yan du pad zla
201a4(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma las/ /dbyings phyug ma ni dung gi mdog /'gying bcas rin chen brgyan gyis spras /zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krungs so/ /byang du pad zla nyi ma yi/ /steng du a las rgya gram pa/ /de las don grub tshe dpag med/ /mdog
201a5(rgyud 'grel): ljang bum pa skyil krung mdzes/ /g.yon du pad ma zla ba'i steng/ /ta las dam tshig sgrol ma ni/ /sngo ljang sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes/ /thugs khar bum pa 'dzin pa'o/ /shar khyams zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /hUM bzhi
201a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje bzhir gyur pas/ /rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhi/ /g.yas pa rang rtags rdo rje 'dzin/ /g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa 'dzin/ /rgyan mdzes rdo rje'i skyil krung mdzes/ /lho phyogs pad ma zla ba'i steng/ /swa las rin chen
201a7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba bzhi/ /rin chen rigs kyi sems par gyur/ /g.yas pa rin chen g.yon pa na/ /tshe'i bum pa thugs khar 'dzin/ /btso ma gser 'dra skyil krung bzhugs /nub du pad zla h+ri bzhi las/ /pad ma 'dab ldar gyur
201b1(rgyud 'grel): pa las/ /pad ma'i sems dpa' bzhi ru 'gyur/ /phyag g.yas rang rtags pad ma bsnams/ /g.yon pa bum 'dzin rgyan spras shing/ /skyil krung dag gis bzhugs pa'o/ /byang du gdan stengs a bzhi las/ /rdo rje
201b2(rgyud 'grel): rgya gram las gyur ba'i/ /las kyi sems dpa' bzhi ru gyur/ /sngo ljang rgya gram bum pa 'dzin/ /gzhon sgeg mdzes shing skyil krung bzhugs/ /'od zer tshogs gyis bskor ba'o/ /shar sger dza dang lcags kyu las/ /lcags
201b3(rgyud 'grel): kyu ma ni mu tig mdog /lho sgor hUM las zhags ba ser/ /nub du baM las lcags sgrog dmar/ /byang du ho? las dril bu ljang/ /lha mo de dag thams cad kyang/ /'khril ldem gzhon sgeg rgyan spras mdzes/ /zhal ni phyir gzigs
201b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs pa'o/ /gru chad bzhi la mchod pa'i/ /lha mo spyi dang 'thun bar bsam/ /de las thugs kha'i 'od zer gyis/ /rang bzhin gnas nas ye shes pa/ /'di brjod spyan ni dad? bar bsam/ /hUM gdod nas rang bzhin mkha' 
201b5(rgyud 'grel): ltar dag /thugs rjes gzha' tshon skur ston pa/ /bcom ldan gsung mchog 'od dpag med/ /rang bzhin lhun grub gzhal yas nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /'gro ba'i don du spyan 'dren na/ /tshe zad
201b6(rgyud 'grel): tshe? nyams bsal mdzad phyir/ /gnas 'di nyid du gshegs su gsol/ /rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang/ /las kyi rigs mchog tshe dpag med/ /mchod pa'i lha mo rnams bzhi dang/ /sems pa bcu drug sgo mar bcas/ /rang bzhin
201b7(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor chen po nas/ /ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dam pa 'dir/ /tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa dang/ /thugs mchog ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /gnas 'di nyid du spyan 'dren gyis/ /byin gyis brlab phyir gshegs su gsol/ /
202a1(rgyud 'grel): dza hUM baM hos dgug cing gzhug /mnyes par gyur la mchod pa dang/ /bstod pa rgyas dang bsdus pa bya/ /sku gsung thugs ni byin gyis brlab/ /de nas bying rgod rab spangs la/ /ma yi? lha
202a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams rab tu bsgom/ /de rjes bzlas pa bya ba ni/ /lha rnams thugs kha'i bum pa'i nang/ /h+ri hUM swa bruM a las ni/ /rang rang sngags kyis bskor bar bsgom/ /oM h+ri bruM badzra dz+nye na a yu she swAhA/ /oM hUM bruM badzra dz+nya na a
202a3(rgyud 'grel): yu she swAhA/ /oM swa b+huM badzra dz+nya na a yu she swAhA/ /oM b+h+ruM bruM badzra dz+nya na a yu she swAhA/ /oM a druM badzra dzA na a yu she swAhA/ /de rnams yab kyi bsnyen pa'o/ /yum gyi bum par a pa ra/ /mi ta bsams la sngags
202a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dis bskor/ /oM bruM a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na su bi no tsi ta ta tsi ra tsa ya swAhA/ /yum mchog lnga'i snying po brjod/ /phyogs bcu'i sems dpa' bcu drug po/ /gtso bo'i sngags rnams bskor ba bsgom/ /dza hUM baM ho
202a5(rgyud 'grel): a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na su b+hi ni swAhA/ sgo ma bzha'i snying po'o/ /de ltar bum pa'i sngags rnams la/ /dmigs nas bzlas pa byas pa yis/ /yig 'bru rnams las bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /byung bas bum pa gang bar bsaM//
202a6(rgyud 'grel): bum nang ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rang gi gnas gsum thim pa yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum nad gdon dang/ /sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/ /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /de nas rang gis sngags bzlas
202a7(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad kyang/ /rang rang gsang sngags zlos par bsam/ /rang snying sa bon shar phyogs nas/ /lha mo dkar mo lcags kyu thogs/ /dpag med shar du 'phros pa yis/ /nad gdon zhi ba'i
202b1(rgyud 'grel): las byas nas/ /dri za'i lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /rang dang bum bar bstim par bya/ /de bzhin lho'i zhags pa las/ /tshe dang long spyod rgyas byas nas/ /gshin rje'i lag nas che bkug nas/ /gong bzhin du ni bstim par
202b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /nub kyi lcags sgrog dmar mo yis/ /srid gsum ma lus dbang bsdus te/ /chu lha'i lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /bstim zhing klu gdon dag par bsam/ /byang gi dril bu dges mdzad mas/ /nad gdon log 'dren tshar bcad
202b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ /gnod sbyin lag nas tshe bkug nas/ /gong bzhin dmigs pa gsal bas bstim/ /shar phyogs rnam rgyal bum par ni/ /rdzas dang mgul chings kha rgyan bcas/ /phyag mtshan bris la bzhug par bya/ /phyi ni bum pa'i
202b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa la/ /nad ni gzhal yas khang du bsam/ /gong bzhin bdud rtsis bum pa gang/ /de yis rang gzhin thams cad kyi/ /nad gdon sdig sgrib sangs dag nas/ /'chi med dngos grub thob par bsam/ /las bum rta
202b5(rgyud 'grel): mgrin bskyed pa yang/ /bgegs kyi steng du bzhag par bya/ /de yis rang gzhan bar chad srung/ /bdud rtsi dmar pos khrus bya'o/ /de ltar rang don gzhan don la/ /ma yengs bskyed rim gsal bo yis/ /zla ba gcig tu sngags
202b6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas na/ /rtags rdzogs zla drug zhal mtheng 'gyur/ /de yang rgyun du nyams len na/ /kha ta'i skad kyis ma non par/ /mdun du gtso bo yab yum bsam/ /gsol ba btab la mchod bstod bya/ /bum ba dag la dmigs nas/
202b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /gsang sngags nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ /de'i bdud rtsi'i rgyun byung nas/ /rang gi spyi gtsug thim pa yis/ /'chi med tshe'i dngos grub thob/ /tshe dpag med par gyur par bsam/ /brtan pa'i yan lag sngags bzlas so/
203a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis tshe nyid nyi zlar 'gyu/ /tshe nyams la sogs smos ci dgos/ /gsangs nas bsgrub pa rab tu bsngags /de nas gsang sgrub bshad par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gong dang 'dra ba la/ /yab
203a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga'i sku mdog dmar zhing 'tsher/ /sna tshogs rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /bum pa thod par bcas 'dzin pa/ /rdo rje skyil krungs bzhugs pa'o/ /yum lnga sku mdog yab dang 'dra/ /gzhon sgeg rgyan mdzes sku sha rgyas/ /'dzuM
203a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing nu ma 'bur ba yi/ /g.yas pa pad+ma rdo rje dang/ /rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram ste/ /g.yas pa rang rtags phyag mtshan 'dzin/ /g.yon pa thad? pa bdud rtsis bkang/ /yab la stob cing skyil krungs 'khril/ /yab
203a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od zer dkar ba'i mdog /yum la phog cing yum gyi ni/ /'od zer yab la phog pa yi/ /yab yum 'od zer tshogs 'khrug cing/ /snyoms 'jug zag med bde ba rgyas/ /gnyis su med pa'i sbyar mtshams nas/ /byang
203a5(rgyud 'grel): sems dkar dmar bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /rang gi gnas gsum phog pa yis/ /lus ngag yid gsum sdig sgrib dang/ /thun mong ma yin dbang bzhi thob/ /rang lus zag med bde bas rgyas/ /ye shes lus la mgon por bskyed/ /
203a6(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs khyams la rdo rje'i rigs/ /khro bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /mdog dmar phyag g.yas rdo rje bsnams/ /g.yon pa ra ga'i bum ba bsnams/ /sprul dang rin chen sna tshogs brgyan/ /me ri 'bar ba'i rlong dkyil
203a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bzhengs pa'o/ /yum kyang mdog dmar rdo rje dang/ /bum pa 'dzin cing yab la 'khyud/ /khro zhing cung zad dgyes par bsam/ /lho phyogs su ni rin chen rigs/ /yab yum g.yas pa
203b1(rgyud 'grel): rin po che/ /g.yon na tshe'i bum pa bsnams/ /nub phyogs bud+d+ha'i khro bo ni/ /yab yum g.yas pa 'khor lo ste/ /g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa bsnams/ /byang shar 'phrin las khro bo ni/ /yab yum g.yas pa rgya gram bsnams/ /
203b2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa bsnams/ /dbus kyi steng dang 'og tu ni/ /khro bo yab yum g.yas pa ni/ /pad+ma 'dab lnga bsnams ba ste/ /g.yon pa tshe'i bum pa'o/ /phyogs bzhi khro bo gnyis gnyis bsgom/ /rgyan dang cha lugs sku mdog
203b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /shar phyogs bzhin du bsam par bya/ /sgo ma bzhi ni mdog dmar zhing/ /zhal ni phyir gzigs khro mo'o/ /gtso bo lnga dang khro bcu'i/ /bum pa dag la dmigs nas ni/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni bzlas bar bya/ /oM h+ri
203b4(rgyud 'grel): hUM sba bruM a/ dza hUM paM ho/ a pa ra mi ta a yu dz+nya na ma ha si ti/ ha sa ni ri swAhA/ de skad ma yengs bzlas pa yis/ /bum pa'i chu rgyun spyi bor phog /sdig sgrib dag nas dbang bzhi thob/ /de nas rang nyid yab yum du/ /gsal
203b5(rgyud 'grel): la gsang ba'i sngags bzlas so/ /shar dang byang shar mtshams su ni/ /bum pa lhar gnas gong bzhin bsam/ /rang dang lha rnams sngags zlos bsam/ /'chi med bdud rtsis bum pa khengs/ /rjes su lha rnams zhu pa'i chus/ /
203b6(rgyud 'grel): rang gzhan thams cad khrus bya'o/ /de yis mchog dang thun mong gi /dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas kho na nyid 'di bsgrub/ /lus gnang gtum mo bzhin du bya/ /rang nyid mgon por gsal ba yis/ /gsang
203b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas tshes 'byung gru gsum du/ /h+ri:dang raM las me 'bar bas/ /khong pa'i nang rnams thams cad khengs/ /spyi bo haM brgyad zhu ba las/ /bde chen bdud rtsi'i rgyun babs pas/ /rtsa rnams khengs pas bde ba rgyas/ /drod dang
204a1(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i khyad par kun/ /steng 'og rlung gi gnad ces bya/ /rta bdun ri bong rgyas btab nas/ /mthar thug lhun grub rnam gsum thob/ /bcu gsum sa rnams rdzogs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das tshe
204a2(rgyud 'grel): dpag tu med pa'i bsgrub thabs/ ye shes gyi mkha' 'gro ma grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad pa rdzogs so// // */ /tshe dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a ba ra mi ta a yu
204a3(rgyud 'grel): dz+nya na ma Na Da la b+hi ti na ma/ bod skad du/ tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin tshe dpag med pa'i sku /ye shes lnga
204a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan gsung gi bdag /thugs rje'i thugs kyis rjes 'dzin pa'o/ /bla ma tshe dpag med la 'dud/ /rtsa rgyud bshad rgyud las byung ba'i/ /cho ga bzang pos yongs bzung bshad/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing/ /gzhan
204a5(rgyud 'grel): phan bsgrub pa'i blo gros can/ /rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub phyir/ /yid 'ong nyams dga' i gnas nyid du/ /lha'i rnal 'byor gsal ba dang/ /gtso bo 'bum la 'khor rnams khri/ /rab 'bring mtshan ma thob pa dang/ /slob mas
204a6(rgyud 'grel): me tog dang bcas pas/ /gus pas gsol ba gdab par bya/ /de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir/ /sa gzhi brtag cing sbyang dang bzung/ /nyes pa med pa'i sa phyogs 'dir/ /bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal byas nas /baM las bskyed pa'i
204a7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo ser/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan lus phyed snang/ /bum pa 'dzin la mchod cing bstod/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /skyob pa
204b1(rgyud 'grel): shAkya seng ge yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis bdud sde las/ /rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /lag pa sa la bsnun pa las/ /dga' ba'i mdangs ldan lha mo yis/ /khyod ni slob dpon mchog
204b2(rgyud 'grel): yin gyis/ /dkyil 'khor las ni rab tu bsgrubs/ /brjod nas sa la thim par lta/ /phyogs skyong gtor ma dbul ba dang/ /'thun pa'i grogs dang gsol ba gdab/ /ro bsal nyes pa spangs pa de/ /'thas par bcag cing rnam
204b3(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni khyab par byug /me yis sbyang dang sngags kyis ni/ /byin brlabs lha'i khang par bsam/ /bskyed pa'i yan lag kun rdzogs pas/ /slob dpon dkyil 'khor steng 'dug la/ /slob ma gus pas spos
204b4(rgyud 'grel): thogs te/ /mchod cing bstod dang gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /skyon gyis ma gos li khri ltar/ /mnga' dang mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba/ /mnyam nyid sku la phyag 'tshal bstong/ /yon tan ma lus bskyed
204b5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing/ /yid bzhin nor bu mtshungs ldan pa'i/ /'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /tshe dpag med pa gsung gi bdag /'chi bdag ma lus 'joms mdzad pa'i/ /che'i dngos grub gsol ba'i sku/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du
204b6(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /dkyil 'khor bsdus te rta mchog skur/ /khro zhing brjid pa'i nga rgyal dang/ /rkang pa hUM las rdo rjer byas/ /mig gnyis nyi zla 'bar ba ste/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yis/ /'jigs med byang shar mtshams
204b7(rgyud 'grel): song nas/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha dang lha min bgegs tshogs nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ /nga yi bka' las ma 'da' bar/ /bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'gro bar gyis/ /gal te mi 'gro 'dug gyur na/ / 
205a1(rgyud 'grel): ye shes rdo rje 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing/ /lus rnams stong du gyur nas ni/ /rnam par 'joms par gdon mi za/ /de bas khyed rnams gzhan du dengs/ /rta mchog sngags dang rdo rje'i
205a2(rgyud 'grel): 'gros/ /dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor bar bya/ /de nas khro bo'i phur pa rnams/ /ki la ya zhes btab nas kyang/ /a ko ta yis brdung bar bya/ /me d+hi sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// /sa'i lha dang lha tshogs rnams//
205a3(rgyud 'grel): sta gon gnas par bya ba ni/ /lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang/ /mchod cing bstod de spos thogs la/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs thams cad dang/ /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul can/ /khyed rnaMs
205a4(rgyud 'grel): la yang mchod pa dang/ /slob ma rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kun/ /thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /rdo rje can bdag che ge zhes/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs su gsol/ /rjes su brtse bar
205a5(rgyud 'grel): nyer dgongs nas/ /sang nub dgyes par byon par 'tshal/ /de nas phyi nang mchod pas mchod/ /dkyil 'khor lhag par gnas pa'o// /rin chen rgyu las byung ba'i/ /lto che mgrin pa ring ba dang/ /mchu tha? phyang nag po ra
205a6(rgyud 'grel): ri med/ /lha grangs mnyam pa las bum dang/ /rang rang phyag mtshan rdzogs par bya/ /ha sa d+he pa gser dngul dang/ /mu tig mu men byi ru bzhug /nas til gro sran mud ka dang/ /ga bur dza ti mung ka mchog /ga pur dza ti gur gum
205a7(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /tsan dan gnyis dang a ka ru/ /mar dang bu ram sbang rtsi dang/ /lan tsha rnams kyis lto ba dgang/ /kha tshar ma nyams ras gzungs kyis/ /mgrin pa rab tu brgyan pa dang/ /kha rgyan ku sha 'bras bu can/ /sna tshogs pad+ma ras
205b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi steng/ /yang na ku sha gdan la bzhugs/ /bruM las bskyed pa'i gzhal yas khang/ /chu skyes nyi zla'i gdan stengs su/ /lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed pa dang/ /sngags bzlas ye shes bdud rtsi'i rgyun/ /bum pa gang bar bsam pa
205b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /lha rnams rang rang bstod pa bya/ /las bum rta mgrin bskyed pa dang/ /sngags bzlas bar chad bsrung ba dang/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi gtor mas mchod/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab/ /slob ma lhag par gnas pa yang/
205b3(rgyud 'grel): snyim pas me tog bcas pa'i/ /skye rga 'chi ba na khra yi/ /chu srin la sogs 'jigs rung ba/ /srid pa'i mtsho las bdag sgrol mdzad/ /dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen por tshul
205b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen por bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de ni bdag la gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum de ni bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong
205b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /'od kyis bur byas sdig pa sbyang/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yis/ /khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te/ /gsang sngags sbyod tshul cho ga ni/ /khyod la yang dag bstan par bya/ /sku gsung
205b6(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /sangs rgyas dus gsum 'byung ba rnams/ /rdo rje gsang sngags rab bsgoms pas/ /ye shes mnyam med yang dag brnyes/ /skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis/ /drag po chen po bdud kyi sde/ /dpung chen dag kyang
205b7(rgyud 'grel): de yis bcom/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ /sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa/ /sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga bya/ /tshe dpag med pa bdag la dgongs/ /ma
206a1(rgyud 'grel): lus bzhugs pa'i bde gshegs rnams/ /'di nyid nas bzung sangs rgya bar/ /bla med bdag la gzigs par mdzod// //dam tshig sdom pa bzung pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/
206a2(rgyud 'grel): bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la/ /rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang/ /yang dag nyid du bzung? bar bya/ /slob dpon dag kyang bzung
206a3(rgyud 'grel): bar bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la/ /nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba'i/ /pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i
206a4(rgyud 'grel): theg pa gsum/ /dam pa'i chos kyang bzung bar bya/ /las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ /sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni/ /yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi/ /tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang//
206a5(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang/ /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /bdag gis brtan par bzung bar bgyi/ /gnyis su med pa'i tshangs spyod dang/ /rang gis dam tshig bsrung par bgyi/ /bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams kyis//
206a6(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas myur du bsgrub byas te/ /sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /bla med gnas su sgrol bar bgyi/ /gus pas lan gsum brjod par bya/ /dpal ba mgrin pa snying kha ru/ /dri'i thig le gsum byas te/ /rta bdun chu
206a7(rgyud 'grel): skyes 'khor lo'i steng/ /thugs gsung sku'i snying pos brgyan/ /rigs kyi lha las 'od 'phros pas/ /ye shes gnyis su med par bstim/ /chu gnyis mngon du 'gro bas mchod/ /deng nas bzung nas pu khyod kyis/ /'khor bo'i? nyes
206b1(rgyud 'grel): par ma gos par/ /mchod pa kun dang ldan pa ni/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /a shA? tha dang pa la sha/ /u dum 'bar pa la so sogs pa/ /bcu gnyis sor gyi tshang dag la/ /rtse mo me tog gis brgyan nas/ /maN+Dal 'dab
206b2(rgyud 'grel): brgyad rnam lngas brgyan/ /shar ltas dbus su dor ba ni/ /pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas/ /steng du mchog gi dngos grub yin/ /phyogs su 'phrin las 'grub pa yin/ /'thur ltas sa 'og 'grub pa yin/ /'tshams su 'jig rten dngos
206b3(rgyud 'grel): grub po/ /de nas skyor chu sbyin pa ni/ /aM h+ri:bi shud+d+ha d+harma sarba pa ba tsarya bi sho d+ha ya bi kal pa a na ya hUM/ zhes pas dag sbyangs nas/ /skud pa dmar po gsum sgril la/ /rta mgrin sngags kyis bcing par bya/ /ku sha gtsang ma sngas dang stan
206b4(rgyud 'grel): ma nor seng ge'i nyal stangs bzhin/ /thub pas ting 'dzin 'grub pa ltar/ /mtshan ma gang byung brjod par bya/ /bzang na dngos grub spro ba bskyed/ /ngan na sbyin sreg gis bzlog go /zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad ni/ /'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen
206b5(rgyud 'grel): dag /u dum 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin/ /brgya lam na ni res dga' zhig /res dga' byung dam mi 'byung srid /gsang sngags spyod ba'i tshul 'byung ba/ /de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon/ /bla ma rdo rje can mchod la/ /nang par langs te dkyil
206b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la/ /nam mkhar gtegs te thig gdab te/ /bu mo gtsang ma sdom ldan gyis/ /ngas? bal gang byung? skal ba dang/ /ye shes lnga'am sku gsungs thugs/ /oM a:n+yo na a nu ga ta sarba d+ha rmA/ brjod nas sgril par bya ba ni/ /pad+ma'i snong du
206b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhag nas kyang/ /mi 'chi lnga yis spangs byas la/ /blo ldan ye shes bstim byas nas/ /nam mkhar ye shes dza dza gdab/ /sgo'i bcu gnyis cha dang ldan/ /srid kyang khang pa gnyis 'gyur la/ tshangs pa'i las thig drangs byas la/ /oM badzra
207a1(rgyud 'grel): su kra sa ma ya ma hi kra ma hUM/ tshangs dang zung thig la sogs pa/ /bstan bcos mthong zhing blo ldan des/ /cha ni gang yin rnam pa dbye/ /gal te nyes pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /chad na bla ma'i srog g.yo zhing/ /
207a2(rgyud 'grel): dman lhag nad kyis gtab par 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma rmongs par 'gyur/ blo ldan nyes pa med par bya/ /gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bcas/ /dra ba dra ba phyed pas brgyan/ /nyi zla dril bu er khas brgyan/ /pho brang chu skyes
207a3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis/ /mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng ba dang/ /'khyams dang phyi rol? par nga? dang/ /rdo rje mi ri la sogs pa/ /rnam pa ma lus rdzogs par bri/ /rin chen lnga dang 'bru phye'i/ /pad+ma'i snod du so sor bzhag /sa bon bris la ye shes
207a4(rgyud 'grel): bstim/? /sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis brlab/ /sngon po ser po dkar po ljang/ /dmar po 'di ni nang du 'dong/ /g.yas bskor rgyun ma chad par bri?/ /dbang ldan 'tshams su drang bar bya/ /pad+ma'i snod kyi steng nas bkab/ /
207a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can khams ni rab sgrol byed/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /tshon gyi las ni yang dag brtsam/ /me tog dor la mtshan ma brtag /shar sngo lho ser nub dkar po/ /byang phyogs
207a6(rgyud 'grel): in tra ni la'i mdog /pad+ma lha rnams dmar po'o/ /de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /khrus byas dri zhim lus byugs nas/ /gos bzangs brgyan la lan gsum bskor/ /tshe dpag med pa'i nga rgyal gyis/ /shar gyi sgo nas
207a7(rgyud 'grel): nang du zhugs/ /yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar bya/ /oM badzra tu? da g+ha ta sa ma ya pra be sha ya hUM/ rnam rgyal la sogs bum pa rnams/ /gnas dang go rim bzhin du dgod/ /sna tshogs gos dang rgyan rnams bre/ /mchod pa'i rdzas
207b1(rgyud 'grel): kyis legs par brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor lha rnams rdzogs par bskyed/ /ye shes bstims la mchod bstod bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor los tshim pa dang/ /bar chad zhi phyir shar phyogs su/ /zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg bya ba dang/ /slob
207b2(rgyud 'grel): ma'i cho ga ji lta bar/ /slob dpon bdag nyid dbang dang ldan/ /shar gyi phyogs nas 'jug pa dang/ /de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir/ /khrus byas bgegs dang sdig pa sbyang/ /gdong pa ras kyis bkab nas ni/ /bu khyod su yin ni la
207b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' / /bdag ni skal bzangs rigs yin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku/ /slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi/ /gtso bo lha mor bcas pa yi/ /lha rnams kun la? phyag 'tshal lo/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon
207b4(rgyud 'grel): pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol/ /de nas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /tshe dpag med pa'i grong khyer mchog /snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni/ /bdag gis spob ma gzhug par bye/ /oM
207b5(rgyud 'grel): a khaM b+hi ra hUM/ me tog phreng ba gtad pa dang/ slob dpon gyis lhag? dkyil 'khor lha la phyag 'tshal te/ oM na ma te hUM/ oM na ma mi hUM/ na mo? na ma hUM swAhA/ shar nas zhugs dang lho nas dbang/ nub nas chos bshad byad nas ni/ /'phrin las
207b6(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i/ /don du gsol ba gdab ba ni/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza u pa thA na ya ad ma naM/ nisya? ha ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzras ta a stiSh+Tha sa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza a b+hi sha ka ta ad ma naM nirya ta ya mi sarba ta
207b7(rgyud 'grel): thA ga ta badzra rang? na a b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza pra bar d+ha na ya ad ma naM niryA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra d+ha ma naM pra pa ra d+ha na ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dza karmA ni ad ma naM ni ra ta pa mi sarba ta thA ga ta badzra karmA ku ru maM/
208a1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig sdom pa sbyin pa dang/ rnal 'byor du ni sems bskyed de/ /oM sarba yo ga tsita u pa ta ya mi/ rdo rje snying gar bzhag te/ oM su ra te sa ma ya stoM sid+ha badzra ya tha bu khaM/ deng khyod de bzhin
208a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs pa thams cad dang/ tshe dpag med kyi dngos grub thob/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /dkyil 'khor ma zhugs mi smra'o/ /dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ /'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ste/ /gal te khyod kyis smras
208a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur na/ /dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje yis/ /rang gi mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur/ /tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi/ /snying la de ring yang dag zhugs/ gal te tshul 'di smras na ni/ /de ma thag tu dral te gshegs/ /'di ni khyod kyi dmyal
208a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i chu/ /dam tshig 'das na bsreg par byed/ /dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub rnams/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub/ /badzra u:ka oM A:hUM/ de nas brtsams nas bu khyod kyi/ /tshe dpag med pa nga yin gyis/ /khyod kyis
208a5(rgyud 'grel): nga la brnyas pa na/ /mi bde ma spangs dus byas nas/ /dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ /de nas slob ma'i gtso bo yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /sred? maN Dal phul nas gsol ba gdab/ /bdag la byin gyis rlobs mdzod la/ /tshe
208a6(rgyud 'grel): dpag med pa dbab par mdzod/ /rkang mthil rlung gi dkyil 'khor dzhaiM/ /snying kha laM las sa'i dkyil 'khor/ /mgrin par baM las chu'i dkyil 'khor/ /spyi bor yaM las rlung dang haM/ /de'i spyi bor tshe dpag med/ /yab yum
208a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od kyi rang bzhin du/ /gar byed sku las ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsi bab nas lus la thim/ /zag med bde bas gang bar bsgom/ /oM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): bruM badzra dz+nyA na a yu she a:bE she ya staM pa ya staM pa ya rA rA tsa la ya tsa la yA/ hUM hA
208b1(rgyud 'grel): a:dzhyaiM/ zhes brjod rol mo'i sgra dang/ gu gul zla mtshan thod pa ru/ /dur khrod sol ba'i me yis bsreg /bab gyur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /a las gsung gi rdo rje bsam/ /'bru hi badzra/ dge dang mi dge la sogs pa/ /
208b2(rgyud 'grel): smros shig rdo rje can gyi rigs/ /stiShDa badzra brtan par bya'o/ /tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /rig pa'i me tog 'di dor bas/ /sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha/ /gang yin de la 'bab par shog /pra ti tsha badzra ho/ /bye brag
208b3(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub brtag par bya/ /pra ti g+h+ri h+na sa mi maM swa ta ma hA b+ha la/ slob ma'i mgo la bcing bar bya/ /tshe dpag med pa deng khyod kyi/ /mig 'byed pa ni brtson par mdzad/ /phye bas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i mig ni bla na
208b4(rgyud 'grel): med/ /oM badzra nai tra ya ha ra pa taM laM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor bzang po 'di la ltos/ /da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed/ /khyed ni tshe dpag med du skye/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /thams cad
208b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di las mngon du 'gyur/ /dngos grub thob cing dam tshig bsrungs/ /gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis/ /rims kyis rnam par dag par bstan/ /de nas slob ma dang ldan nges/ /bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ /yon
208b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog dam pa 'bul ba dang/ /dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan mgon po tshe dpag med/ /yab yum gnyis med bde chen sku/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/ /dbang bskur ba ni bdag la gsol/ /lan
208b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum brjod nas shar phyogs su/ /pad+ma slob ma 'dab brgyad khri la 'dug /rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs nas/ /chu rnams dung chos bum par bsdu/ /rdo rje'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra/ /rigs lnga rig ma'i lha mo dang/ /byang chub sems 
209a1(rgyud 'grel): dpas bkra shis brjod/ /khro bo rnams kyis bgegs bsrung ngo/ /gsang gsum dam tshig las byung ba'i/ /ye shes bdud rtsi dri ma med/ /lha'i chu ni dag pa yi/ /mi skyod rdo rje'i dbang bskur ro/ /oM
209a2(rgyud 'grel): badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+ny+ya na a b+hi shiny+tsa hUM/ gser la sogs pa'i dbu rgyan la/ /rin 'byung bskyed cing ye shes bstim/ /dar dpyangs bcings la tshig 'di brjod/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun
209a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis rab bsngags pa'i/ /rin chen dbu rgyan dam pa dang/ /dar dpyangs dbang bskur sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta rang na mu gu ta a b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ /rin chen la sogs rdo rje la/ /snang ba mdza' yas bskyed cing bstim/ /
209a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang/ /de ring khyed la bskur bar bya/ /sangs rgyas kun tu rab bsgrub phyir/ /rdo rje 'ang ni khyod kyis bzung/ /oM badzra a ti pa ti stoM a b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ drili bu don grub bskyed byas la/ /ye shes
209a5(rgyud 'grel): bstims la tshig 'di brjod/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /'gro don mnyam med byed pa yis/ /mchod pa'i 'phrin las rdzogs byed pa'i/ /dril bu las kyi dbang bskur ro/ /oM a d+hi pa ta ya a b+hi shiny+tsa maM/ slob
209a6(rgyud 'grel): ma oM las rnam snang bskyed/ /ye shes spyan drangs gnyis su med/ /rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas/ /byang chub snying po'i bar du ni/ /cis kyang gzhom par mi nus pas/ /rdo rje ming du rab tu grags/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi she
209a7(rgyud 'grel): ka ta maM/ chu dang cod pan rdo rje dang/ /dril bu dang ni ming gi dbang/ /rig pa yi ni dbang lnga'o/ /nyon mongs lnga ni rnam dag pas/ /dbang bskur lnga ni thob pa yin/ /ma rig pa las 'das nas kyang/ /ye shes lnga ni rims kyis thob/
209b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas spyi bo mgrin pa dang/ /snying kha lte ba gsang gnas rnams/ /'khor lo lnga'i gnas nyid du/ /rigs lnga tshe dpag med rnams kyis/ /dbang bskur lha rnams yab yum de/ /'chi med byang chub sems su 'gyur/ /rtsa gsum
209b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo lnga rnams gang/ nang gi dbang /byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro/ /'chi med rdo rje'i lus su gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i sku ru bsgom/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na 'dug /khyod kyis kyang ni
209b3(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bcad/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i brtul zhugs brtan/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid+hi badza sa m ya tiSh+Tha e shad d+ha ra ya mi hi hi hUM/ thog mdza' med pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che/ /kun tu bzang po kun
209b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid/ /rdo rje snyams tshul dag pa'i bdag /dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad/ /khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcad/ /byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba
209b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhed/ /srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag /ngo bo nyid kyi dngos bral byas/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' ni/ /mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur/ /mtshan ma med par 'gro ba'i don/ /gang dag bdag gis byed nus pas/ /phyir mi
209b6(rgyud 'grel): ldog pa dbang bskur che/ /dpa' bo chen pos bdag la gsol/ /shar du seng ge'i khril 'dug /steng du gdugs dkar phub nas kyang/ /rnam rgyal bum pas dbang/ gsol ba gdab bskur te/ /dbang bskur rdo rje chen po la/ /khams
209b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa yis phyag byas te/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi/ /gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya/ /oM badzra a b+hi she ka a b+hi shiny+tsa? maM/ /dril bu glegs bam lag tu gtad/ /'phrin las thogs pa med pa rnams/ /bu yis
210a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan don bla med byos/ /khyod ni rdo rje slob dpon yin/ /chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ro/ /lha'i snying po len gsum brjod/ /me tog phreng ba spyi bor bzhag bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis//
210a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol/ /bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis/ /bdag la go bar mdzad du gsol/ /'jig rten khams ni ma lus par/ /sems can ma lus drang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bsam pa
210a3(rgyud 'grel): yis/ /ji ltar gdul bya sna tshogs la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/ /de bzhin rigs kyis gang 'dul ba/ /khyod kyi 'phrin las mchog yin no/ /de nas bzung nas bu khyod kyis/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang bsad pa la/ /
210a4(rgyud 'grel): dgug dang bcing dang bsreg pa dang/ /bskrad pa dbye ba la sogs pa/ /'phrin las sna tshogs 'grub par gyis/ /ral gri mig sman la phog dang/ /mchil lha ma de bzhin ri lu ste/ /mi snang bcud len mkha' la sbyod/ /thun mong
210a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub ma lus ba/ /de dag khyed kyis 'grub par bya/ /ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal pa yis/ /'jig rten rab rib bsal ba ltar/ /bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i/ /rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal/ /oM badzra ne tra a pa
210a6(rgyud 'grel): ha ra pa Da laM h+ri(rgyud 'grel): chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/ /dag cing gsal la dri ma med/ /gzung du med cing brjod du med/ /chos rnams de ltar shes par gyis/ /ho yis mda' gzhu phyogs bzhir 'phang/ /mtshan mo gnas
210a7(rgyud 'grel): khad dben pa ru/ /bzhin bzangs mig yangs lang tshor ldan/ /lus la dri yis byug byas te/ /brtse dang rgad pa la sogs pas/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis phab te/ /nor bu byang chub sems ltung bas/ /gsang ba'i dbang
210b1(rgyud 'grel): nya phyis bya? ba chos la sogs su/ /draM ra bXas slob ma'i kha ru ni/ /the bong srin lag dag gis sbyin/ /a ho su kas de btung ngo/ /zag med bde chen lus pa rgyus/ /rdo rje ro yis nyon mongs 'joms/ /mtshan ldan shes rab
210b2(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin te/ /lha mo 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /mdza' yas bde ba sbyin ba mo/ /rnam pa kun du phyag rgya long/ /bu yis sla med mchod par gyis/ /yol bas bar bcad snyoms 'jug gis/ /bsrub dang bsrub shes rab ye shes kyi dbang
210b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mi rtog ye shes skye bar 'gyur/ /ltos shig ltos shig sems la tos/ /sems nyid cir yang grub pa med /bsal bzhag dgag bsgrub gang yang med/ /'dini rang rig ye shes yin// //
210b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma sprul pa'i skur bstan te/ /chos gos bzung la lung bzhi ba bstan bya/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /srid pa'i mdza' ni grub pa'i phyir/ /srid pa'i dan 'gro nyid las btan/ /'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan yin//
210b5(rgyud 'grel): lung bstan oM sarba ta thA ga ta sing d+hi sa ma ya stoM b+hur bu ba swa/ /khams gsum pa ni rgyal srid che/ /rgyal ba'i bdag por bstan pa dang/ /des ni bdud las rnam rgyal zhing/ /grong khyer mchog tu zhugs pa yin/ /deng
210b6(rgyud 'grel): bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas/ /bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas/ /thugs dbud de ring sangs rgyas sras su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su da gyur to/ /rta dang glang po ma he dang/ /bu dang chud ma sogs dang dbyig /phyag byas bla ma dam
210b7(rgyud 'grel): gzengs stod pa la/ /ma zhen sems kyis dbul bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor lha tshogs mchod bya ste/ /tshogs kyis rnal 'byor tshim byas la/ /lhag mas 'byung po tshim pa dang/ /bkra shis brjod cing smon lam gdab/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba
211a1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pa yis/ /rdul tshon chu bo chen por dor/ /dri bzangs kyis ni thig 'phyis te/ /lhag chad bskang phyir sbyin sreg bya/ /cho ga bzang po yongs bzung 'di/ /rtsa rgyud le'u 'bum
211a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang/ /bshad rgyud 'od zer dra ba las/ /brten nas grub pa'i rgyal mos mdzad/ /de yis dge ba gang yod bas/ /rigs drug sems can ma lus pa/ /tshe dpag med pa'i lam zhugs nas/ /de yid 'bras bu myur thob
211a3(rgyud 'grel): shog /bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bzang po yongs su bzung ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN Dit zla ba bzang po dang/ bod kyi lots+tsha ba glan dang mtshul khrims
211a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis bsgyur zhing zhus te dag par byas sho// //chog ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil chog bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ a pa ra mi ta d+ha ga bA ti a yu dz+nyA na/ maN+Dal bi ti na ma/ bod skad du/ bcom
211a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das tshe dang ye shes dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog zhes bya ba/ mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang ldan mgon la gus pa yi/ /nags 'dab chu gling mgon bar ni/ /rang dang slob ma'i don gyi phyir
211a6(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa sa chog sta gon dang/ /dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya/ /de la dang po bsnyen pa ni/ /rab dkyil 'khor lha tshogs dngos su mthong ba 'am/ /'brid rmi lam du mthong ba tha ma yang lung bstan thob pa'o/ /grangs kyi
211a7(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa ni/ rab 'bum tshe bdun/ /'brid gsum/ tha ma khri 'am/ bla ma'i rjes gnad thob pa'o/ /sa'i cho ga ni rgyud las/ sa ni brtag dang blang ba dang/ sbyang dang byin brlabs pa'o/ /ces gsungs so/ /dang po sa brtag pa ni/

211b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'o/ /sa blad ba ni/ 'jig rten dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/ /dang po mngon pa la bslang ba ni/ gzhi de'i sa bdag rgyal po la sogs pa la'o/ /mi mngon pa la spyir blang ba ni/ sa gzhan nas bslag ba 'am/ ras yi steng
211b3(rgyud 'grel): bu dri'i thig le dang/ me tog gi tshom bu byas la mchod pa lnga dang/ gtor ma gsum gsham mo/ /de nas stong pa'i dang las rang skad cig gis tshe dpag tu med par bskyed/ thugs kha'i hUM las 'od 'phros/ nam mkha' la lha
211b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs rnams spyan drangs par bsams la mchod pa dang bstod pa bya/ bar chad med par gsol ba gdab/ gtor ma yang phyogs skyod dang lha srin sde brgyad dang gzhi bdag la sbyin no/ /bye brag tu sa'i lha mo las blad ba ni/ maN+Dal
211b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus su dri'i thig le'i steng du me tog gi tshom bu dkod/ de nyid baM las sa'i lha mo/ sku mdog gser gyi rang bzhin dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil ba lte ba yan chod sa las byung zhing/ phyag gnyis bum pa bsnams pa bskyed la/
211b6(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gyi lha mo spyan drang ba ni/ hUM tshur byon tshur byon lha mo che/ /sa mchog lha mo 'jig rten yum/ /rin chen rgyan gyis rab gang ba'i/ /rgyan mchog utpal rab tu mdzes/ /phyag zhabs mgul rgyan gser gyis brgyan/ /sangs
211b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyas tshogs rnams rab mchod pa'i/ /gser mdog lha mo chen mo khyod/ /phrin las bsgrub phyir gsheg+gs su gsol/ /ces brjod la mchod yin dbul ba ni/ lha ma khyod ni byon pa legs/ /bdag cag bsod nams skal bar ldan/ /
212a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi mchod yon bzhes nas kyang/ /'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol/ /oM pra ti arkaM sa ma ya hUM/ ji ltar bltams pa tsam phyis ni/ /lha rnams kyis ni khrus gsol ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis
212a2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i chu/ /dag pa yis ni sku khrus gsol/ /pra ba sa da kar tI dza hUM/ ces pas khrus gsol/ bdag dang 'gro la thugs brtse'i phyir/ /nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul mthu yis ni/ /ji srid mchod pa bdag bgyid na/ /de srid lha mo bzhugs
212a3(rgyud 'grel): su gsol/ /pad+ma ka ma la hUM zhes pas gdan dbul lo/ /de nas dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig pa la ye shes lha mo dgug gzhug cing mnyes par bya/ de la mchod pa dbul/ sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la/ lha mo'i ljags
212a4(rgyud 'grel): zug par bsams la/ oM pra tri b+hya na ma(rgyud 'grel): sarba ta thA ga te b+hyo/ bi sha mu khe b+hye/ sarba tad khaM ud ga te spha ra na hi maM ga g+ha na khaM b+h+ri na ti ba li ta kha kha khA hi khA hi swAhA/ lnga 'am bdun gyis phul la/ mnyes pa la bstod pa bya
212a5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ khyod ni sa 'dzin lha mo ste/ /sku phyed 'thon po gser gyi mdog /rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan/ /sa 'og lha mo khyod la 'dud/ /gsol ba gdab pa ni/ sa la rgyu ba'i lha klu dang/ /gang yang sa la gnas pa rnams//
212a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /byams pa'i sems kyis gnang bar mdzod/ /ces brjod pas gnang ba byin par bsam/ ye shes pa gshegs la dam tshig pa bstim mo/ /de nas sa sbyan ba bshad par bya ste/ nad
212a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams mi 'byung bar bya ba'i phyir/ sa khru gang la sogs pa rkos la/ rus pa dang gyo mo la sogs pa bsal bar bya'o/ /de nas yang bdag nyid 'od dpag med kyis nga rgyal gyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha' la bltas te/
212b1(rgyud 'grel): de dag gri bdud rtsi 'gug la/ sa phyogs gser gyi sa gzhi g.ya' dag bar bsams la/ oM puShpe puShpe mahA puShpe/ a par mi ta a yu dz+nyA su bi ni tsi ta te dzra ra dza ya swAhA/ zhes lnga 'am gsum brjod par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor
212b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi rgya ni khru bzhi ba byas nas/ spangs ni ci 'byor ba'o/ /de nas sa gzhi dri bzangs kyi chus me long gingos ltar byas la/ bla bris dang yol ba dang/ 'od dpag med kyi gzungs rnams bzhugs so/ /de nas rang dang slob mas rgyud
212b3(rgyud 'grel): dang gzungs rnams klag khar bya'o/ /spro ni zha ba'i sbyin bsreg kyang lan gsum bya'o/ /de la 'ang slob ma la dal 'byor rnyed par dka' ba dang/ 'chi ba mi rtag pa dang/ 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs rnams brjod la/ thun mong gi
212b4(rgyud 'grel): skyabs 'gro so so thar pa'i sdom pa rnams dbog /khyad par gyi skyabs 'gro dang/ byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de ni sa'i cho ga rnams bstan to/ /de nas sta gon bshad par bya ste/ de yang slob dpon bdag
212b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid dgongs ka'i dus su khrus byas/ ras dmar pos lus kyi stod g.yogs/ smad g.yogs byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas/ rta mchog gi bdag bskyed nas bzung ste/ gsang bsgrub yan
212b6(rgyud 'grel): chad bzlas pa dang bcas pa rgyud dang bsgrub thabs ltar bsgom/ de nas shar phyogs kyi yum sems dpa' dang bcas pa dang/ lho dang nub dang byang gi yum sems dpa' dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ nyon mongs
212b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dam gyis tshogs nang du/ /thar med byid bar gyur pa yi/ /'gro kun ma lus don phyir dang/ /tshe zad tshe nyams nad kyis gzir/ /skyabs med nyams thag gyur ba yi/ /sems can rnams la phan don du/ /bcom ldan mgon
213a1(rgyud 'grel): po chen po yis/ /'chi med rnga sgra chen po rnams/ /gsung mchog tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ /de ring bdag la bsgrag tu gsol/ /'chi med bdud rtsi'ichu rgyun rnams/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bos bdag la gsol/
213a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes phyogs bzhi nas spos dang dril bu thogs nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid dpal rta mgrin rta mgo ljang nag /dbyug pa dang sdigs 'dzub me 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i nga rgyal gyis langs te/ rkang pa
213a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis hUM las rdo rje rgya gram/ mig gnyis su ma dang Ta las/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'degs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas nam mkha' bteg pa dkyil 'khor gyi steng du hUM re re/ smin 'tshams su nyi zla 'dres pa'i steng du hUM cig bsam/
213a4(rgyud 'grel): mig gnyis dang smin 'chams kyi hUM rnams rdo rje re rer gyur te/ de'i lte bar h+ri(rgyud 'grel): dmar po re re bsam/ /de las rta mgrin dpag tu med pa mang po spros pas/ bges rnams bsreg pa'i bsams pas rdo rje dril bu thogs la/
213a5(rgyud 'grel): byang shar du dga' ba yongs su gyur pa'i 'gros kyis 'gro zhing/ stong gsum thams cad g.yo ba'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas bgegs la bka' bsgo ba ni/ hUM dkyil 'khor chen po'i sa gzhi la gnas pa'i/ /lha la sogs pa'i
213a6(rgyud 'grel): bgegs chogs rnams nyon cig /nga ni gnas 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po 'bri/ /bgegs kyi rigs tshogs gang yin byer bar gyis/ hUM hUM h+rI(rgyud 'grel): phaT lan gsum bzlas la/ bdag rdo rje slob dpon ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ sa
213a7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bzung po dri ma med pa 'dir/ /bcom ldan 'das mgon po tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bri yis/ 'di na gnas pa'i lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang dag gnas pa de dag thams cad dengs shig/
213b1(rgyud 'grel): gang dag mi 'gro bar sems pa de dag /nga yi ye shes rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /mgo bo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o/ /spros pa la dga' na g.yas rkyang la sogs pa'i stad
213b2(rgyud 'grel): stabs gsum pa bya'o/ /yang rta mchog gi nga rgyal gyis/ oM badzra pad+ma ta krita krod+ha hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs mtshams su/ /stod rta mgrin la/ smad phur par dmigs la/ dngos su btab pas phyogs

213b7(rgyud 'grel): dang? ? gnyis la bya'o?/ /de ltar bam pa gu gul gyis bdug cing bgegs skad/ ras dmar po kha tshar mnyams pas mgul chings byas la/ rin chen lnga/ sman lnga/ 'bru lnga/ dri lnga/ snying po lnga blugs la/ ba dmar
214a1(rgyud 'grel): mo'i 'o ma dang/ chu gtsang ma dang/ dur ba yang blugs par bya'o/ /de la 'bras bu can gyi shing dang/ rma bya'i mdongs kyi steng du bzhag nas mchod pa lnga ldas bkor ro/ /bkod pa'i rim pa ni
214a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i bum pa rdo rje me ris kyi nang dang/ mnga' yab kyi phyi'i shar du'o/ /'khor gyi bzhi po ni phyogs bzhir rdo rjer ba dang gdugs kyi bar du'o/ /las bum ni bgegs kyi steng du bgod par bya'o/ /de nas skyed pa'i rim

214a7(rgyud 'grel): pa lhags nas bstan no/ /de nas spro na tsan dan gyi thab zlum po 'am/ zla gam du/ gro dang nas dang yungs kar dang dkar gsum mdar gsum rnams bdud rtsir byin gis brlabs te/ yab yum gyi zhal du phul bas zag pa

214b2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs dam tshig pa mi dmigs par bya'o/ /sbin bsreg lhags gnas so/ /de nas sa'i lha mo ni mchod bstod gtor ma rnams gong bzhin byas la mchod pa ldas mchod de/ lag pas spos thogs dbus bus mo sa la rtsugs la
214b3(rgyud 'grel): skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par lam/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis/ /ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcm pa/ de bzhin bdag gis
214b4(rgyud 'grel): bdud kyi sde/ /pham par byas te dkyil 'khor bri/ /ces lan gsum brjod pas lha mos dban por zhal gyis bzhes par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes su dam tshig pa bsdu/ ye shes pa gshegs par byas pa yi ge brgya ba brjod
214b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o/ /de ni sa yi lhags gnas bstan to/ /de nas slob ma lhags gnas bshad par bya ste/ de yan slob ma rnams khrus byas/ gos gtsang mgyon la gugul gyis bdug cing bgegs bskrad/ slob mi'i zan blud gtsang
214b6(rgyud 'grel): ma chad bu dang bcas pa chu gtsang mas bran nas gzi brjid chen mo'i sngags kyis bgegs la bka' bsgo bar bya'o/ /de nas yol pa'i phyi rol du slob ma rnams gral la 'khod pa rnams me tog dang bcas pas gsol
214b7(rgyud 'grel): ba gdab pa ni/ dga' chen khyod bdag sngon pa ste/ /slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa'i/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo/ /dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol/ /byang chub sems kyang
215a1(rgyud 'grel): bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la gsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu/ /mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal/ /ces lan gsum gsol

215b7(rgyud 'grel): las/ 'khor lo dang/ pang? dang/ rdo rje rnams yi ge gsum gyis mtshan par bsam mo/ /de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor yi hor maN+Dal zlum po la me tog gi tshom bu lnga bkod pa tshe dpag med rigs ldar bskyed la/ so shing sor

218a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan pa'i bcu bzhi ni/ /spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste/ /phas pham par ni rab tu bshad/ /rtsa ba'i lhung ba zhes bshad do/ /nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du/ /nyin re bzhin du blang bar bya/ /gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor
218a6(rgyud 'grel): pas/ /kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur/ /khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya/ /ma byin par yang mi blang ngo/ /'dod pa log par mi spyad cing/ /brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o/ /phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /chang ni yongs su spang ba
