248b3(rgyud 'grel): skal pa stong gi sdig pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /gong ma ltar byas ste/ tsher ma phyir rgol ba'i pus mo la btsugs na/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par 'gyur ro/ /lce la btsugs na lce rengs par byed do/ /mngon par ni 'bum ma
248b4(rgyud 'grel): du bsags pa'i sdig pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa men sdig pa dngos mdo? las sogs bsked las byung ba'o// bsngags pa'i dus khrod kyi thal ba sgo'i steng du stor ra dza dzwa ha re sa pa'i sngags so 'di ga'i na 'byer bar/ b+hA ra ti b+ha ra hi zhes spel byed do/ /kham por gsar pa la rdo rgyus
248b5(rgyud 'grel): gyis bris ste sgol sbyangs na/ byis pa gsar du bu btsas pa bsrung bar byed spel ba dang gcas pa'i sngags u tsa ta pa do/ /dpa' bo cig du bsgrub pa'i rgyud las/ /paN+Di ta chen po ra dan sh+ridz+nya nas phyung ba rdzogs so// //phan 'dogs pa ni/ yi ge ?
248b6(rgyud 'grel): bcu pa che ge mo'i byis pa srubs cig hUM hUM phaT ces pa kha sbyar gnyis kyi nang du gnyis? bris tes las hUM de las bcom ldan 'das su bskyed dang/? ye shes sems dbang bdul? skur ba ser po dkris la sgro'i nam rol du gnyis pa btags so? 'og?  tsam na rnam bsam por du byas sung/ */ /gtum po khro ba chen po'i sgrub pa don dam pa zhes bya bar zhugs so// //
248b7(rgyud 'grel): oM swasti/ rgya gar skad du/ tsaN+Da mahA ro Sha Na sar mArtha sAd+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ gtum po khro bo chen po'i sgrub pa don dam pa zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo/ /dus gsum rgyal dang de sras dam chos la/ /mar
249a1(rgyud 'grel): me mdzad dpal bdag gis gus btud nas/ /gtum po khro bo'i rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs pa/ /don dam rab tu sgrub pa'i sgron me brtsams/ /'di ni shin du gsang ba'i phyir/ /su la 'ang bstan
249a2(rgyud 'grel): par mi bya ste/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i spyod yul la/ /mkhas pa bla mar gus la sbyin/ /gtum po khro bo'i dngos grub ni/ /dga' thub sdom pas 'grub ma yin/ /bud med dang bral 'chi 'gyur gyi/ /rtag pa'i dngos
249a3(rgyud 'grel): grub med par gsungs/ /rgyal ba rab tu byung bstan dang/ /mdo sde chos mngon thams cad du/ /de nyid rab tu spas mdzad mod/ /thams cad zab mo 'di la gzhol/ /rin chen rin thang med gzung nas/ /nor bu'i gling
249a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas dbul po ltar/ /sgyu ma mchog gi chur nub kyang/ /de yi ye shes 'di ma thob/ /bde bas yang dag sdom pa ni/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs/ /shes rab ma la brten gcig pus/ /pha rol phyin drug
249a5(rgyud 'grel): thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu rnam dag byang chub dang/ /bcu gsum pa yi sa thob pa'ang/ /she rab ma las myur 'grub kyi/ /gzhan du bskal pa brgyas kyang min/ /de nyid sbed par mi byed na/ /phyin ci log phyir
249a6(rgyud 'grel): dngos grub med/ /bsod nams sdig pa kun byed de/ /mi g.yo khro bo'i dam tshig yin/ /a ni lhan cig skyes pa'i tshul/ /tsa yig dga' ba bzhi zhes brjod/ /la yig rkyang ma'i lam du rol/ /a yig shes rab
249a7(rgyud 'grel): dam par brjod/ /tsa yig gis ni thabs su brjod/ /bde ba'i mtshan nyid la zhes brjod/ /chags bral 'joms pas gtum po'o/ /bdud las rgyal ba khro bo che/ /mi g.yo 'di la mngon byas nas/ /rig pa'i brtul
249b1(rgyud 'grel): zhugs spyad par bya/ /lo ni bcu gcig gsang te sbyad/ /de nas rigs kyi dbye ba yi/ /gzhon nu ma zung chas brgyan te/ /rig pa'i brtul zhugs mngon du spyad/ /kha dog rnam pa tha dad dang/ /mtshan ma tha dad rnam brtags
249b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /de bzhin nyon mongs sems kyi mthu/ /'di las rigs mthun blang bar gsungs/ /kun rdzob tu ni rigs tha dad/ /nges par rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /dam pa'i don du dbyer med pas/ /rnal 'byor can rnams ci dgar
249b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod/ /dang por mkhas pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /lus 'di dri med sbyang bar bya/ /a tsa la yi sbyor ba yis/ /zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba dag /kun 'dor du ni rab gzhug phyir/ /nyin dang mtshan du 'bad par bya/ /bgang ba de bzhin dbyung ba
249b4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /bum pa can dang rengs pa can/ /sbyor ba 'di dag rnams kyis ni/ /rtsa yi khyim ni dbug par bya/ /bla ma'i man ngag lung gis ni/ /'dug stangs sna tshogs tha dad dang/ /thag pa'i 'phrul dang gzhu bdungs shing/ /'phrul shing
249b5(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba sna tshogs bya/ /gang zhig haM dang 'brel pa'i phyir/ /srog gi rlung ni zla bar brjod/ /nyi ma k+Sha dang thud du'i gzugs/ /'di las thur sel zhes bya'i rlung/ /'di gnyis gnyis med bsres byas na/ /rtag tu thig le thig le
249b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /gtum mo 'bar ba mchog tu brtan/ /'bar bas kyang ni gnyis 'gag go /khro bo'i mig ni g.yas pa srog /g.yon ni thur sel dbu ma yang/ /dbus su brjod do yan lag bzhi/ /ro ma dang ni rkyang mar 'gyur/ /
249b7(rgyud 'grel): de 'gags aM ni mchog tu 'bar/ /des bzhu de las 'bar ba yin/ /dpyid dang thig le kha sbyor bas/ /a tsa la yi ye shes skye/ /bud med kun gyi bde chen gang/ /de ni b+ha ga zhes brjod de/ /de la sku dang gsung thugs kyi/ /
250a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bcom ldan bzhugs zhes brjod/ /pad+mar rdo rje rab bzhag ste/ /lhan cig skyes pa mtshon byas nas/ /b+ha ga'i dbus chung thig le yang/ /mi 'gyur rdo rje'i lus gnas bya/ /bdag tu
250a2(rgyud 'grel): rnam rtog kun du bral/ /sgros med g.yo ba med pa ste/ /bud med kun gyi lus la gnas/ /de phyir shes rab ye shes so/ /khyab bdag rgyal ba gcig pu yang/ /lnga yi tshul du gnas pa de/ /gcig gyur 'od gsal
250a3(rgyud 'grel): bar thim pa/ /'di yi ye shes a tsa la/ /ti mug la sogs dkar po sogs/ /phung po'ang de bzhin gshegs ye shes/ /sems ni tshe dpag med rdo rje/ /khro bo yid srub 'joms byed pa/ /sems ni rkyen gyis mi
250a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yo pa/ /mig mi 'dzum pa'i lta stangs kyis/ /rlun dang yid ni a tsa la/ /tsaN+Da tsaN+Da lI 'bar byed/ /phung po'i bdud med sku zhes brjod/ /ye shes kyis ni 'chi bdag 'joms/ /rgyal ba tshe dpag med gsung mchog /
250a5(rgyud 'grel): rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs bdud/ /de bcom thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /sems kyi 'gyur byed sna tshogs pa/ /stong pa'i srung bas go bgos nas/ /smyon pa'i spyod pa spyod byed pa/ /de la bdud kyi 'jug pa med/ /sku dang gsung
250a6(rgyud 'grel): thugs rdo rje yis/ /tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /legs ldan gdon rnams gzhom par bya/ /mgo bor zla ba bsams byas nas/ /chu yi sa bon bzung bar bya/ /yi ge'i phyi mo bzlas byas na/ /'chi ba bslu
250a7(rgyud 'grel): bar byed pa'i mchog /dngos dang dngos med rnam grol ba'i/ /dga' ba bzhi yi de gcig mchog /rnam par rtog pa kun spangs pa'i/ /spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin thob /de ltar bla ma'i man ngag mdor bsdus
250b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di/ /dam pa dam par brten nas shes byos la/ /mi g.yo rgyud rgyal thos par bya ba ste/ /mar me lta bur mar me mdzad kyis byas/ /ces la gtum po khro bo chen po'i sgrub pa don dam pa zhes bya ba/ /slob dpon chen po b+hang+ga la'i mkhas
250b2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /dI padka ra sh+rI dz+nyra? nas mdzad pa rdzogs// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta ni rbA Na sh+rI'i zhal snga dang/ /rmongs pa ta ra nA thas g.yar khral du bsgyur ba'o// //bur mgon lha bcu bdun gyi sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /
250b3(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI ma hA ka la sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma la gus bden pa bskur?/ /pha rol phyin pa drug dang ldan/ /
250b4(rgyud 'grel): bsdu dngos bzhi pos gzhan don byed/ /snying rjes brtson grus brtsams pa yis/ /slob dpon la dmod bstan pa 'jig /dam tshig spong zhing mtshams med byed/ /de rnams bsgral bar bya ba yin/ /gzhung dang 'gal na dam tshig
250b5(rgyud 'grel): nyams/ /dang por bdag nyid yi dam lhar/ /rim pa thams cad rdzogs bsgom pas/ /bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang/ /byang chub don du nag po sgrub/ /yi ge b+h+ruM gyis gnas bstan pa/ /rgyud du bstan pa shes par bya/ /de dbus
250b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /bsgrub bya bkug nas gdan du bsam/ /de las zangs grir gyur par bsam/ /de las nag po chen po bskyed/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum dur khrod nag po dang dur khrod chen po'i rgyud la sogs pa'i pa/ /dbu
250b7(rgyud 'grel): skra nag po gyen du brdzes/ /mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid che/ /gri dang ka pA lag na bsnams/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas/ /mche ba gtsigs shing spyan bgrad pa/ /kha nas khrag 'dzag khros tsa na/ /rang gi
251a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag sha gcod cing/ /gcer pu stag lpags smad g.yogs can/ /nag po sbrul gyis yan lag brgyan/ /khrag gi rgyun dang yi ge hUM/ /de yi zhal du tham? par bsam/ /'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad
251a2(rgyud 'grel): pa la/ /ma mo gshin rje bcu drug bskyed/ /de dag rim bzhin bstan pa ni/ /shar phyogs su ni ya ba ti/ /lho phyogs chos kyi rgyal po ste/ /nub phyogs su rtel pa/ byang phyogs su glang mgo can/ /byang shar mtshams su ral pa
251a3(rgyud 'grel): tshar dgu /nub byang du dmigs pa/ bco po grub pa dang thabs gcig tu lus dang grib ma lta bur 'khor lho nub tu phya bsangs/ shar lhor mig dmar/ de dag ni mdog sngo skya gri dang thod pa thogs pa'o/ /'di dag ni go rims bzhin te/ /gshin rje pho nya mo
251a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ gshin rje mche ba mo dang/ gshin rje be con nag mo dang/ dus mtshan ma dang/ lcags kyu ma dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ lu gu brgyud ma dang/ g.yas g.yon gshin rje 'bebs ma dang/ 'di dag kun shad kyang zhal gcig
251a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag lho gnyis pa/ nub dbu skra lhug par 'dug pa/ gcer bu lce byang byang shar 'jib nub byang ba/ mche ba lho nub gtsigs pa/ gdug pa thams cad shar lho 'gugs pa/ las thams cad tshul bzhin mdzad pa
251a6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog nag mo/ phyag gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa thogs pa'o/ /de nas thugs ka'i 'od zer dang/ /tshigs bcad dag gis spyan drang ba/ /rdo rje 'chang gi spyan snga ru/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i
251a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas 'di ru/ /drag po'i las la spyan drangs bzhugs/ /myur bar 'ongs nas de la thim/ /mon sran gri'u 'dzam bu ti/ /me tog bdug spos sha lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga sbyar gtor ma sbyin/ /de dag dbul ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ /oM
251b1(rgyud 'grel): ma hA kA la ya dz+nyA na a mri ta oM A:hUM hUM ma/ oM ma hA kU la shA sa nA pa ha ri re ShA ba shtsa ma kA lo yaM/ i daM rad na tra yA ya pa ka ri NaM/ ya ti pra ti dzwA?/ sma ra si ta dA/ i daM duSh+Ta/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+na grih+na/ b+han
251b2(rgyud 'grel): d+ha b+han d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na me ka na mA ra ya hUM phaT/ nag po chen po 'khor dang bcos pa khyod kyis sngon bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa bzhin du/ nga yis las ci bcol ba
251b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis cig /de ltar ma byas na mgo bo ardza ka'i rdog pa bzhin du 'gas so/ /dam chu blung/ lag tu rdo rje byin/ d nas srog gi snying po brjod do/ /oM sh+rI ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ de nas bstod pa/ hUM srin po'i gzugs kyi gdug pa can/
251b4(rgyud 'grel): tshar gcod byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /grong khyer sum rtsegs 'jig byed pa/ /gtum po khyod la bdag bstod do/ /hUM mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid che/ /gdug pa tshar gcod gri gug g.yas/ /g.yon na gdug pa'i khrag bkang
251b5(rgyud 'grel): snod/ /thod phreng can la bdag bstod do/ /hUM/ khros pas zhabs brdabs sa gzhi g.yo/ /'jigs pa'i gang mos ri rab bsgyel/ /dam tshig nyam pa'i snying 'byin pa/ /dam tshig can la bdag bstod do/ /de nas bskul ba/ hUM/
251b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi/ /bstan pa bsrung bar sems bskyed pa/ /nag po khyod ni yin pa ste/ /gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /ral pa nag po gyen du g.yengs/ /steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed/ /spyan bsgrad?
251b7(rgyud 'grel): 'jags 'dril bar gyi gdon tshogs sdigs/ /g.yas pa'i gri gug gnod sems can la sdang/ /g.yon pa'i thod par gnod sems can khrag gsol/ /zhabs brdabs gnod sems can gyi lus la nyed/ /gang zhig dkon mchog
252a1(rgyud 'grel): gsum dmod dang/ /bla ma brnyas byed sems can 'tshe/ /gdag gi bsgo ba kun khug la/ /lid ka 'di la myur du chug /'di'i sha zo? khrag la 'thung/ /rus pa klad pa nad rol gsol/ /rigs rgyud rtsad
252a2(rgyud 'grel): nas chod la shog /'dza' ba kun dang phrol la shog /bdag gi bsgo ba mnyan na/ /nag po khyod ni nyams par 'gyur/ /zhes bskul lo/ /gong gi sngags sam/ yang na/ oM sh+rI ma hA kA la che ge mo hUM phaT/ stod rtsa brgyad bzlas/
252a3(rgyud 'grel): rtags dang mtshan ma mthong ba des/ /las sbyor rim pa brtsam par bya/ /'bru sna tshogs kyi phye ma la/ /tsha ba gsum la gzugs brnyan bya/ /ling ka sor brgyad tshang du bya/ /dug dang skye tshe lan tshwa dang/ /rgya tshwa kha ru rtsal du tsha//
252a4(rgyud 'grel): srin lag khrag dang smyo byed kyis/ /ling kha bris nas snying khar gzhug /gdug pa'i tsher mas lus la dgang/ /dur khrod me la phub ma dang/ /pad+mar 'dzag pa'i rak+ta dang/ /tshil chen gu gul nag po dang/ /da du ra yi 'bras bus
252a5(rgyud 'grel): bsreg /stong rtsa brgyad du byas na ni/ /gdon mi za bar nges bar 'gyur/ /mnan pas gsang ba'i cho a ni/ /rabs chad thod pa g.yon g.yon la/ /'khor lo bris la snga ma yi/ /ling kha rab tu gzhug par bya/ /de nas nyi ma
252a6(rgyud 'grel): bdun pa'i bar/ /sbyor ba bzhi yi cho ga brtsam/ /de yang nyi ma dang po la/ /ya ma rA dza sa ngo me ya che ge mo pra ma yaM ku ru hUM phaT/ nyi ma gnyis pa la/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ che ge mo murtsa pa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma gsum pa la ya
252a7(rgyud 'grel): da yo ni ra ya k+She ya che ge mo rak+ta tsang? pa ya hUM phaT/ nyi ma bzhi pa la/ yak+She ya ts+tsha ni rA ma ya che ge mo mA ra ya hUM phaT/ ya ba ti dang/ phya sangs dang/ gshin rje lu gu rgyud ma dang/ gshin rje 'bebs ma rnams kyis bsgrub bya mgo
252b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du bcug pa'o/ /gshin rje tel pa dang/ chos kyi rgyal po dang/ gshin rje lcags kyu ma dang/ gshin rje zhags pa ma rnams ni bsgrub bya khrag skyug? pa'o/ /glang mgo can dang/ dmigs pa dang/ gshin rje pho nya mo
252b2(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /gshin rje mche ba mo rnams kyis ni bsgrub bya smyo ru bcug pa'o/ /ral pa tshar dgu dang/ mig dmar dang/ gshin rje mtshan mo nag mo dang/ /btsen? ma rnams ni gsod pa'i las byed pa'o/ /nyi ma lnga pa la yi ge bcu pa'o//
252b3(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma drug pa la yi ge bdun pa'o/ /de dag la ni gsad pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o/ /nyi ma bdun pa la nag mo chen mo'i sngags brjod nas dur khrod du sbas na rgyud mi lus par 'gyur ro/ /klu yod pa'i gnas su klu'i 'khor lo'i
252b4(rgyud 'grel): bar du bcug la gong gi sbyor ba brtsam par bya'o/ /dur khrod kyis la mchod rten nag po khru gang ba byas la/ de'i nad du gzugs brnyan mgo 'jug bzlog la bzhugs/ /phyogs bzhir rtsa ba'i sngags gong ma bzhin bris pa gzhug /
252b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phan nag po dang dar nag po'i rgyal mtshan btsugs? la/ de la gtang? na yang gang bsgo ba 'grub bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na bas khang pa la sbas na yang gang bsgo ba 'grub sbyor bas khang pa la sbas na yang gang bsgo ba 'grub
252b6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro/ /yang na dur khrod kyi ras blangs la/ dgra'i snang mdzad la sogs pas byugs la gong du bstan pa'i rdzas rnams kyis 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa gnyis bris la/ rtsibs brgyad la dur khrod kyi ma mo brgyad dang/ las
252b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi gshin rje brgyad bris la/ dbus su dgra'i ming rus bri/ /de'i rgyab tu sprul nag po mgo bdun yod pas dkri/ /de'i khang yi ge khaM dug gis bri/ /'khor lo mgon po'i sngags bris pa gong dang mthun/ /de nas lha rnams
253a1(rgyud 'grel): bskyed nas ni/ /ling ka bar du gzhug par bya/ /kha sbyar byas la thod par gzhug /dug gis byugs la sngags kyis bcing/ /sprul dang sbal pa ljong mo'i sha /gong du gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams ni/ /
253a2(rgyud 'grel): dug dang bcas pa dag la gdung/ /nag po'i phur bus btab nas su/ /klu yod ba'i gnas dag gam/ /sa bdag drag po'i gnas dag tu/ /sgyed bu gsum gyi bar du gzhug /de yi stong du sbyin sreg bya/ /zhag bdun bar ba
253a3(rgyud 'grel): byas nas ni/ /bsgrub bya tsha ba'i rims kyis 'dzin/ /mdzes 'dzin pa la the tshom med/ /sngon du bsnyen pa song ba yis/ /gnod sbyin chen po'i bsnyen pa ni/ /khri phrag bdun du bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas ra ru g.yas pa ru/ /'bum
253a4(rgyud 'grel): tsho gcig gi yungs kar bsag /kha bcad gang 'dod gnas su sba/ /de yi bsnyen sngags bstan pa ni/ /oM kri syi ri/ shag pra ma ya/ oM kri li shag /shar ser d+h+ril b+hyo/ oM bu ting khe/ shar ser d+h+ril b+hyo/ oM dza ti khe shar sar
253a5(rgyud 'grel): d+h+ril b+hyo/ oM pra ma ya gar gri phebs b+hyo/ de yi sbyor ba bstan pa ni/ /lha rten btsugs pa'i gnas dag tu/ /rnal te shi ba'i thod pa ru/ /dkar thab sngo thab dmar thab bya/ /yi ge dang po spangs nas ni/ /rabs chad thod pas
253a6(rgyud 'grel): dgab par bya/ /ra gsob brdab cing dug me bud/ /stong re bzlas shing spub par bya/ /ra hu la dang sbyar nas ni/ /thal ba gang 'dod gnas su sba/ /yang na bsnyen pa'i tshul du bya/ /yi ge lnga yi rang gnas bsrung/ /sbyin sreg byas
253a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thal ba la/ /yungs kar dag la bsngags nas ni/ /gtor bas ser ba 'chad par 'gyur/ /yang na phur bus gsang ba dang/ /sbyin sreg bya ba mchog tu gsungs/ /dpal nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs/ /slob dpon bram
253b1(rgyud 'grel): ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //a tsa ra hU la dmar po dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba kyi ljang gis bsgyur// //'di'i brgyud pa ni/ rdo rje 'chang/ bram ze mchog sred/ bde ba'i rdo rje/ sh+rad+d+ha kAr?/
253b2(rgyud 'grel): dI paM ka ra/ rin chen bzang po/ dge tshul pu r+Na/ lcags ri gong kha ba/ rdzing bu kha pa/ spen mug pa/ zhang ya?/ gze ba don grub/ bar thang yab sras/ dar shag /bu ston bsod dbang/ mchog ldan/ spyi? ston pa/ kun mkhyen
253b3(rgyud 'grel): chen po/ byang chub seng ge /sa bzang 'phags pa/ chos rje kun dga' bzang po/ mkhas pa gzhon nu seng ge /chos rje dmar ston rgyal mtshan 'od zer ba/ mkhan chen rin po che bdag A nandas zhus/ 'di'i dkyil cho ga /sa
253b4(rgyud 'grel): lugs kyi gri gug lha lngas byed pa phyag len yin/ 'di lha lnga ma'i brgyud ba yin pa 'dra/ gsan yig na ni 'di ka 'dug lha bcu gnyis ma la/ gzhal yas khang gi dbus su/ 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa'i lte bar gur/ /mdun du
253b5(rgyud 'grel): a'e ka tsa ti'i lto bar lha mo/ rtsibs gnyis bar yab/ rtsibs gsum bar yum/ bzhi bar ming po che ba/ lnga par ming po chud ba/ drug bar ral gcig ma/ shar sgor seng gdod dkar mo lcags kyu dang thod rlon gyi phreng ba/
253b6(rgyud 'grel): lho sgor gzig gdong ser mo zhags pa dang thod pa/ nub sgor dom gdong dmar mo lcags sgrog dang mar me/ byang sgor dred gdong ljang khu tho ba dang lcags kyu 'khor lo/ gsnams? pa/ 'di'i sgrubs thabs rgyas pa rin chen grags
253b7(rgyud 'grel): gyi lag bris gsar bzhengs phror na yod/ sgo ba bzhi phud na brgyad kyang yod/ /lha bcu gnyis ma sogs po ti tshad ma'i brgyud pa ni/ 'phags pa yan rjes gnang dang 'dra la/ de nas/ dga' ldan pa kun bsod/ dpal ldan
254a1(rgyud 'grel): seng ge /snyam med pa/ gzungs kyi dpal/ dpal ldan tshul khrims ? shar pa ye rgyal/ kun bzang pa/ dmar ston pa/ zhal snga nas/ des bdag go /yang na/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa
254a2(rgyud 'grel): yan rjes gnang dang 'dra la/ /dpal ldan tshul khrims yan 'dra/ /chos kyi rnam grangs/ zhal snga nas kyi gsan yig brgya so bdun la yod// // */ mgon po nag po'i sgrub thabs slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad paN+Di? ta
254a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag gsum pa dang lo tsa dge slong dang ma grags kyi 'gyur/ gshin rje cho bdag nag po'i sgrub thabs gtor ma ? chog dang bcas ba nag po pas mdzod pa paN+Di ta de nyid dang lo tsa ba dang ma grags kyi 'gyur// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI na ti mahA kA la nA ma/ bod skad du/
254a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal mgon po nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs kyi rim pa/ dpal mgon po nag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams 'jigs byed pas/ /nag po de la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de yi sgrub thabs 'dod rnams
254a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ /don bstus pa ni bshad par bya/ /bla ma rnyas byed sems can 'cho/ /dam tshig smod dang bstan pa bshig /de rnams sgral bar bya ba yin/ /gzhan du nam yang bya ba min/ /dang po gnas btsal brtag par bya/ /skye
254a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas sgo can dbang ldan lha/ /ri ma tshad tshing phug dag gis dur khod dag gam lam can nam/ /mtshan ma gcig pa dag tu bya/ /rang snying hUM bsgoms 'phro 'du las/ /de las lha tshogs rang snang 'gyur/ /sna tshogs
254a7(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa rnam gsum bya/ /bshags pa byed dang sdom pa dang/ /yongs su bsdo dang lam la gnas/ /de nas byams dang snying rje dang/ /dga' dang btang snyoms bsgom par bya/ /de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms la/ sngags
254b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di yis ni bstan par bya/ /oM shA n+ya hA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA a da ma ko haM/ sems de ra ma las nyi mar gyur/ /paM las sna tshogs pad+mar bskyed/ /de steng hUM ni mthil ga las/ /gri gug sngon po dag tu 'gyur/ /par 'phros
254b2(rgyud 'grel): tshur ni 'dus pa las/ /gzas pa bsgyal? ba'i gdan stengs na/ /sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa che/ /khams gnyis ma 'dus za par byed/ /zhabs rnams sa la rdeb mdzad cing/ /lha dang lha min sdigs par byed/ /zhal
254b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa la phyag drug pa/ /g.yas pa dkar la g.yon pa dmar/ /rgyab ni seng ge'i zhal dang ldan/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po ste/ /rtsa ba'i phyag ni gri gug dang/ /thod pa khrag gis bkang ba 'dzin/ /bar ma gnyis na dbyug to dang//
254b4(rgyud 'grel): glang po che yi phaT ? 'dzin/ /gsum pa dgra sta zhaD pa 'dzin/ /stag gi paD pa smad bkris shing/ /'dzag pa'i mgo pos do shal byas/ /shin du 'jigs su rung ba bskyed/ /g.yas su gtum mo sngon mo ste/ /g.yas na thod pa g.yon dang nag /g.yon

254b6(rgyud 'grel): thim/ /dza:hUM baM ho:sa dgu zhug bya/ /rdo rje rtse lnga'i rgya phyag yis/ /brtan par byin gyis brlab par bya/ /me tog nag 'bras bu dang/ /mi dbang 'bras dang dkar dmar dang/ /gla ba na tshe? med bzhi dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang dbang
254b7(rgyud 'grel): po ni/ /a las byung ba'i ka pA lar/ /zla ba nyi ma'i bar du ni/ /sa bon lnga dang lcags kyu lnga/ /'og tu me tog 'bar ba ni/ /dri ma rnam par dag byas nas/ /mi rdzug dri dang rnam rtog ni/ /ha dang h+ri dang hos sbyangs nas/ /de nas
255a1(rgyud 'grel): cho gas lce myang bya/ /de la dbul ba'i sngags ni/ /oM badzra gying ni dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM baM ho:/ /oM ma hA kA la i dam/ d+dU paM/ puShbaM/ dI paM/ g+hand+daM/ arg+haM b+ha ling kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+hand+ha b+hand+ha/

255a7(rgyud 'grel): gug 'gyur/ /de yis bcad cing btubs par bsam/ /oM mahA kA la laM g+hu na h+ri da e ka dza ti hUM phaT/ /de nas rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rtags ni brtan par gyur pa dang/ /gsang ba'i las la 'jug
255b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /gong gi sngags dang sbyor ba yis/ /gru gsum nga la gru gsum la/ /byugs la ral gri gri gug bri/ /gru gsum gdud rtsi mda' dang gzhu'/ /kha dog nag po byas nas su/ dgra bo'i gzugs brtan kho ci 'dra/ /?

259b1(rgyud 'grel): lag thams cad me'u? thud gi gzugs brnyan can/ /kha nas khrag 'dzag pa/ skad cig gis bdag nyid bskyed la sngags bzla bar bya ste/ de la 'dir sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ dug dang/ thag
259b2(rgyud 'grel): dang sgog pa dang/ yungs kar rnams bsres pa'i spos nag po chen po la dbul lo/ /sran ma/ sha chen dang/ chang dang/ me tog dang/ byug pa dang/ sgron ma dang/ bdud rtsi lngas nag po chen po le gsol mchod byas la
259b3(rgyud 'grel): gtod ma'i sngags 'dis so/ /oM ma hA kA la ya/ shA ya na/ u pa ha ri Ni/ i Sha a paShtsi/ ma lo a yi/ i di ratna tra yA ya/ a pa ka ri Ni/ ya ti pa ti dz+nyar sma ra si hA dA/ i daM duSh+Ta kha kha/ khA hi khA
259b4(rgyud 'grel): hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+na grisna/ band+ha band+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di na? ma ke na mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ de la 'di'i nye bar spyad pa ni/ tsha ba gsum la bsgrub bya'i gzugs so sor byas te/ de'i lus la char
259b5(rgyud 'grel): mas bkang ste/ dug dang ske che dag gi cho ga bzhin du byugs la me la bdugs na gang gi ming nas pos na skad cig la mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /yang slob dpon rtag tu smod pa/ sems can dpag tu med pa la gnod par byed pa ni/ nag
259b6(rgyud 'grel): po chen pos gsol bar byed de/ de'i lus kyi sha ? zhing de'i khrag kyang 'thung par byed/ rtag par byas nas spyi bo nas yongs su gzung nas til tsam du byed do/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang du yid la go bar bya'o/ /dpal nag po
259b7(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba slob dpon klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //bod kyi lo tsA ba ga rod kyis bsgyur bao// //rgyal cha lung mang po dang/ chos rje bsod nams kyi phyag dpe las/ yar lung
260a1(rgyud 'grel): pa seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis klu'i dgon par zhus dag bgyis pa las bshus so// //*/ /ta thA ga ta ? tas mdzad ba'i sgrub? thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ tsa turma kha sa ma ya ?
260a2(rgyud 'grel): sA d+ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ zhal bzhi pa'i dam tshig dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bla ma dang ni yi dam lha/ /zhing skyong 'khor dang bcas la 'dud/ /rtsa zhal nag po ro za ba/ /g.yas zhal dkar po khro ? 'dzum//
260a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon? ba dmar zhing rgya cher bzhang/ /steng zhal nag po khro zhal ni/ /bdud dang srin po lha srin dang/ /gshin rje la sogs bkrag par mdzad/ /drag rgyas dbang dang zhi ba ni/ /khral bzhi'i kha dog dag gi shes/ /de dag bla ma'i
260a4(rgyud 'grel): zhal shes ni/ /las bzhi bsgrub par 'dod pa yi/ /phug dang nags dang dur khrod dang/ /dmar zhing mtho ba me tog rgyun/ /dben zhing nyams dga' bsgrub pa'i gnas/ /der 'dug spros pa bcad par bya/ /shog bu gro ga dur khrod
260a5(rgyud 'grel): ras/ /dud dang gur kum sin d+hu ra/ /dur khrod sol pas snag tsha'o/ /rtsa ba dang ni sham bu'i sngags/ /bton dang bcug pa man ngag yin/ /bsnyen de bsgrub pa las la sbyar/ /dung dang ra gan zangs dang lcags/ /maN+Dal snod kyi
260a6(rgyud 'grel): bye brag go /lha dang 'khor lo 'od zer yang/ /bsgom pa'i rim ba shes par bya/ /snga dro dus dang nyi ma'i zer/ /zla ba yar do mar ngo yi/ /de dag dus kyang shes par bya/ /phreng ba gos dang rgyan rnams shes/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bu
260a7(rgyud 'grel): ram dang/ /zho dang 'bru dang rin chen lnga/ /dug yungs khrag sogs dbye ba shes/ /ma rungs zhi dang mngon sbyor rgyas/ /bsgrub bya dbang sdud tshar gcod pa/ /bsam pa'i bye brag shes par bya/ /rang dang bsgrub bya'i bsod nams
260b1(rgyud 'grel): brtag /bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid di yis shes/ /bstan pa'i don sbyang the tshom med/ /rgyal khams dang ni grong khyer gcig /dbye ba'i rim ba shed par bya/ /las mdza' sdud pa man ngag yin/ /zhal gyi u pa de sha 'di/ /rakI ta yis
260b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa las/ /gnyan lo dar ma grags kyis bsgyur/ /bla ma yi dam chos skyong la/ /nyes pa gang snang bzod par gsol// //*/ /dpal nag po chen po srog gi sbu gri'i bsgrub thabs bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ shI ma hA ka
260b3(rgyud 'grel): la sa d+ha na ma:bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen po'i bsgrub thabs/ /dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon sku yi dgro bo dang/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang/ /bstan pa'i chos la sdang ba rnams/ /
260b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgral bar bya ba'i man ngag yin/ /gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams/ /de bas mang du mi spel lo/ /man ngag 'di la rnam pa gnyis/ /bsgrub pa'i thabs dang gsang pa'i thabs/ /bsgrub pa'i thabs la rnam pa bdun/ /dus
260b5(rgyud 'grel): dang gnas dang dkyil 'khor dang/ /dam rdzas bkod pa'i rim pa'o/ /nag po bskyed cing bsnyen pa'i grangs/ /gnas ni dur khrod la sogs pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gu gsum la 'khor lo/ /rdo rje dbus khrag 'khor lo'i dbus//
260b6(rgyud 'grel): gru gsum mthing nag 'bar ba ni/ /dur khrod ro yi sol bas byug /shi ba'i khrag gis brtsig par bya/ /gru chang gsuM yang mthing nag ste/ /zla gam gsum yang dmar por bya/ /de rgyab mthing nag zlum por bskor/ /rdo rje gtsol gzhi
260b7(rgyud 'grel): bya ba yang/ /phyogs dang kha dog rnam par gsal// //dam rdzas bkod pa'i rim pa ni/ /dbus kyi gru gsum mthing nag la/ /nag po'i 'phan dang rgyal mtshan btsugs/ /gri gug thod khrag dag kyang bzhag /mi 
261a1(rgyud 'grel): nag khyi nag glang nag dang/ /tri rgod snying yang der ni bzhag /de nang gru gsum mthing nag la/ /bshos bu bsten gtor rgyun gtor bzhag /zla khams gsum la la dus byug /tshil chen gu gul drag du bdug /de ni dam
261a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzas bkong pa'o// //brag steng 'khor lo gru gsum dbus/ /hUM skyes 'bar ba nag po che/ /ro ye steng du hUM las skyes/ /oM sh+ri ma hA kA la ye hUM phaT/ /nag po chen po bskyed pa'o/ /gri gug dang ni ka pa la/ /phyag
261a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis thugs kar 'dzin pa'o/ /skam po lnga yis dbu rgyan can/ /rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas/ /spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /mche gtsigs gzugs thung khros tsa na/ /rang gi yan lag sha gcod byed/ /khrag gi rgyun
261a4(rgyud 'grel): yang 'jib par byed/ /dur khrod chas kyis brgyan pa'o/ /me ri me dpung dbus na bzhugs/ /spyi bor oM las mgrin par A:thugs kar hUM yig 'bar ba bsgom/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs pa/ /A(rgyud 'grel): las zla
261a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dkyil 'khor steng/ /hUM las gshin rje gshed po bsgom/ /slar yang lcags kyur gyur pa las/ /rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs pa/ /hUM rdo rje 'chang gi spyan snga ru/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas bzhin/ /
261a6(rgyud 'grel): byin gyis brlab pa'i gnas 'di ru/ /drag po'i las la spyan 'dren bzhugs/ /oM e hya hi ma hA kA ye/ ma hA ka ru Ni ka /sa ma ya dza:dza:hUM baM ho:klog ltar 'ongs nas myur bar thim/ /lcags kyu 'od du zhu ba
261a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /lha mo bum pa thogs par 'gyur/ /khrus byas dbang bskur bum pa las/ /zla ba'i dkyil du lha mo ni/ /gshin rje gshed du gyur pa las/ /nag po'i dbu la brgyan par bsam /hUM srin po'i gzugs kyis gdug
261b1(rgyud 'grel): pa can/ /tshar gcod byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /grong khyer gsum brtsegs 'jigs byed pa/ /gtum po khyod la bdag bstod do/ /mdog nag gzugs thung gzi brjid che/ /gdug pa tshar gcod gri gug g.yas/ /g.yon
261b2(rgyud 'grel): na bdug pa'i khrag bkang snod/ /thod 'phreng can la bdag bstod do/ /'khros bas zhabs brdabs gzhi g.yos/ /'jigs pa'i gad mos ri rab bsgyel/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i snying 'byin pa/ /dam tshig can la bdag bstod do//
261b3(rgyud 'grel): oM ma hA kA la ye hUM phaT/ mon? sran ge'u 'dzam bu ti/ /me tog bdug spos sha lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga sbyar gtor ma 'di/ /dam chur dmigs la dbul bar bya/ /hUM 'thung shig 'thung shig rdo rje'i chu/ /rdo rje'i chu ni 'thun nas
261b4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /bsrungs shig dam tshig chen po'i bka' / /dam las 'das nas tshig par 'gyur/ /hUM zung shig zung shig rdo rje ni/ /he ru ka dpal phyag na gnas/ /nag bo khyod kyi 'di zung la/ /bdag gis bsgo bnyan par gyis/ /bdag
261b5(rgyud 'grel): gis bsgo ba ma nyan na/ /nag po khyod kyang nyams par 'gyur/ /oM ma hA kA la ya sha sa na/ u pa ha ri Ni/ a Sha a paSh+Ti/ ma ka lo/ a aM i daM rad na tra ya/ a pa ka ri NaM ya ti phra ti dz+nyi sma ra si/ tA da/ i dang Sh+Tan/
261b6(rgyud 'grel): dgra bo kha kha khA hi khA hi/ dgra bo mA pa mA ra/ dgra bo g+hih+Na g+h+rih+Na dgra po ban d+ha ban d+ha/ dgra bo ha na ha na/ dgra bo da ha da ha/ dgra bo pa tsa pa tsam d+hi na mi ke na/ dgra po ma ra ya hUM phaT/ thun gyi spags la 'di nyid bzlas/ /
261b7(rgyud 'grel): ras sam shing shun dag la ni/ /dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /'brub khung nang du gzhug par bya/ /hUM 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyis/ /bsten pa bsrung par zhal bzhes pa/ /nag po khyod ni yin pa ste/ /gdug pa char gcod
262a1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /ral pa dag po gyen du g.yengs/ /steng gi lha tshogs 'jigs par byed/ /spyan bsgrad ljags khri la che ba gtsigs/ /bar gyi gdon tshogs brlag par byed/ /g.yas kyi gri gug
262a2(rgyud 'grel): gnod sems can la sdang/ /g.yon pas gdug pa'i snying khrag zhal du gsol/ /zhabs brdabs gnod seMs can gyi lus ? byed/ /gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la smod pa dang/ /bla ma brnyas byed sems can 'tsho/ /bdag
262a3(rgyud 'grel): gis bsgo ba kun khug la/ /ling ga 'di la myur du chug /'di yi sha zo khrag la 'thung/ /rus pa klang pa don snying ?/ /rigs rgyud rtsad nas chod la shog /mdza' bo kun dang myur du phrol/ /bdag gis bsgo ba nyan par gyis/
262a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis bsgo bam nyan na/ /nag po khyod ni nyams par 'gyur/ /de bas las rnams myur du bsgrubs/ /yungs dkar yungs ni gzir rnams/ /dug dang khrag ni bsres byas la/ /gong gi sngags kyis thun rdzas brag /de
262a5(rgyud 'grel): nas phur bu'i gdab las ni/ /mi bsad mtshon nam seng ldeng la/ /nag po 'khros pa'i skur byas te/ /bskyed bstim byas la gnas bcur ni/ /dgra bgegs bkug nas gdab par bya/ /hUM las byung ba'i nag po che/ /
262a6(rgyud 'grel): thung la sbom pa'i gsus khyim can/ /'od zer bskal pa'i me dpung bzhin/ /rnam pa kun tu 'bar mdzad pa/ /dug gsum bsreg byed phur pa mchog/ ha na ha na ki la ya/ /da ha da ha ki la ya/ ba tsa ba tsa ki la ya/ /d+hi na mi ke na ki la ya/
262a7(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs sbyi bor ka li ya/ /kha kha khA hi ki la ya/ /ma ra ma ra ki la ya/ /g+h+rih+na g+h+rih+na ki la ya/ /ban d+ha ban d+ha ki la ya/ /ha na ha na ki la ya /da ha da ha ki la ya/ /pa tsa ba tsa ki la ya/ /d+hi na mi ke na ki la ya/ /
262b1(rgyud 'grel): oM ma hA kA la ki la ya/ /dgra bgegs mang ya? hUM phaT/ ces pas gnas bcur gdab bar bya/ /dgra bgegs rdul bzhin brlag par bsam/ /lus ni thal ba'i phung por bsam/ /rnam shes mi bskyod zhing du 'phang/ /nag po
262b2(rgyud 'grel): chen po'i sbyin sreg ni/ /hom khung gru gsum sgo can la/ /rdo rje'i ra bas bskor ba ni/ /rdo rje'i mnga' gzhu ldan par bri/ /nag la rtsubs pa'i shing rnams dang/ /dur khrod shing rnams brtseg? par bya/ /dbus su nag po chen po bskyed//
262b3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi gnas nas spyan drangs la/ /bstim la mchod pa rnam lnga 'bul/ /ling ga thun dang bsreg rdzas ni/ /dgra bgegs kyi ni dbang po lnga/ /rnam shes tshogs brgyad bsams nas ni/ /nag po chen po'i zhal du 'bul /zhal gdabs?
262b4(rgyud 'grel): mche ba rab gtsigs pa/ /ljags la me 'bar zhal du bsregs/ /argaM sbrengs la bstod pa bya/ /dgra bgegs rtsad nas brlag 'dod na/ /mi bsad mtshon nam gri gug gis/ /sngags bzlas ling ga drag du gtubs/ /sbyin sreg byas
262b5(rgyud 'grel): la mnan pa bya/ /mtshan ma brtag pa 'di lta ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon rmi ba dang/ /dag pa'i dge slong rmi ba dang/ /hor gyi bcas chen rmi ba dang/ /yul gyi rgyal po rmi ba dang/ /mi nag khyi nag rmi ba dang/ /grig gnon lta bu byung
262b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang/ /thog dang ser ba 'bab pa dang/ /tshom sgra 'ur rtig 'byung ba dang/ /de dag nag po chen po'i rtags/ /bshas rar btsud dang khyu bzung dang/ /khra yis byi la dred pa dang/ /ri dwags rgyar btsud brda ded ni/ dgra
262b7(rgyud 'grel): bo khug pa'i rtags su bshad do/ /khras bsad khyis bsad mis bsad dang/ /mi sha zos sam gdos chen ni/ /rang gis rtsad nas bton gyur pa/ /de dag rmi lam gsod pa'i rtags/ /khri gug yu ba rdo rje can/ /thod khrag zhal
263a1(rgyud 'grel): du gsol rmis na/ /srog rtag yin pas kha sbyor dbye/ /dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /slob dpon shi ba rmi pa dang/ /phyag mtshan chag gam dkyil 'khor la/ /mi nag pa 'khros
263a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rmi ba dang/ /nag pos 'gyod lugs byed pa dang/ /de rnams dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags/ /a mrita dang chang phung dang/ /bsur chen dud pa bshos bu ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dam tshig bskang// //
263a3(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa gang du bya ba ni/ /klu'i yul du mnan pa na/ /mdze yis 'chi bar the tshom med/ /btsan gyi yul du mnan pa na/ /gzer thabs 'chi bar gdon mi za/ /gnyan gyi yul du mnan pa na/ /lhog pas nges

263a5(rgyud 'grel): cing bstim te/ gu gul nag po la sogs drag bo'i rdzas kyis bdug cing/ mgon bo nag po la gtad par bya ste/ hUM/ khyod ni tshe len nag po ste/ /sdang ba'i dgra bo las ngan 'di/ /tshe len nag po khyod la gtad/ /

263a7(rgyud 'grel): ni mgon po nag po ste/ /sdang bai dgra po las dan 'di/ /mgon po nag po khyod la gtad/ /sdang ba'i dgra po myur du sgrol/ /sdang dgra srog 'phrog ma gyur na/ /srog snying nga yis gtad ni bzung/ /bcol ba'i las
263b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di grub par mdzod/ /dpal nag po chen po'i srog gi spu gri'i bsgrub thabs/ bram ze mchog srid kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// ? //bla ma mal gyi khyad chos lags so// athii // */ /dpal rdo rje nag po chen po'i sbyin sreg bram ze

263b6(rgyud 'grel): lag sha gcod byed/ /khrag gi rgyun yang 'jib par phyed/ /dkon mchog gsum khro bla ma brnyas/ /'tshams med la sogs byed rnams kyi/ /de rnams mgor gnas til tsam za/ /de ltar gsal bar bsams nas ni/ /
