264a1(rgyud 'grel): mon sran gre'u dang dzam bu ti/ /me tog bdug spos sha lnga dang/ /bdud rtsi lnga sbyar gtor ma sbyin/ /oM ma hA kA la ya/ /sha sa na sa ha ri ne/ /e a pash+nyi ma hA ka lo ya//mi b+ha ta h+ra tan+t+ra ya a
264a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ka ri naM ya ti pra ti dza sma ra si ha i daM duSh+Ta ba tsa pa tsa/ /de ni me ke na hUM phaT/ yang na sngar bshad sngags kyis sam/ /yang na bsad ba'i sngags kyis dbul/ /'bum ma ma bye ba sa ya'o/ /me ni nag la gru gsum pa/ /
264a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs can byung na grub pa yin/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir sbyin sreg rim/ /bdag gi 'di ba rtsams bsod nams kyis/ /'gro rnams sgrib pa byang gyur nas/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /sbyin sreg cho ga sha thag
264a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //la li ta badzra dang/ gyi ljang dpu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /dpal rdo rje nag po chen po'i gtor ma'i cho ga bram ze mchog srid kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so//
264a5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la bi laM bi d+hi/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i gtor ma'i cho ga /dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan nag o chen po dang/ /bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ /sems can
264a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phan bya'i phyir/ /nag po'i gtor ma bshad par bya/ /yaM las rlung dang raM las me/ /a las thod pa'i snod nang du/ /go ku da ha na dang ni/ /bi mu shu ra ma rnams bsams/ /steng du a las nyi dkyil 'khor
264a7(rgyud 'grel): de stengs gri gug hUM gis mtshan/ /de las 'od zer 'og du 'phros/ /rlung gi me sbar bdud rtsi skol/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar por bsgyur/ /gri gug hUM gis 'od zer gyis/ /ye shes bdud rtsi gzhug par bya/ /yi ge
264b1(rgyud 'grel): gsum mam yang na ni/ /rgyud gsungs sngags kyis byin brlabs la/ /rtsa ba'i sngags ni gsum ma ma lnga/ /yang na bdun gyis nag po mchod/ /bstod pa la sogs ci nus bya/ /thun 'tshams dag gam thun zhabs la/ /
264b2(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i mchod ba ci nus bya/ /'dod pa'i don kun gsol btab pa/ /yi ge brgya pa ci rigs mngon/ /las la sbyor tshe dmigs pa dgug /gri gug gtubs la thod par gtan?/ /gsol bar bsam zhing bsang sngags
264b3(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /smod pa dag kyang ci rigs bya/ /gang zhig mos gus byed rnams la/ /mdo tsam bdag gis bstan pa yin/ /dge ba 'di mos sems can rnams/ /bar du gcod las rgyal gyur gcig /dpal nag po chen po'i
264b4(rgyud 'grel): gtor ma'i cho ga slob dpon bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //dpal 'gang ba'i rdo rje dang/ /gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur pa'o// 'dir sbyan 'dren bstod pa mchod 'bul bskad gso dang bcas pa gcig deng snying pa la yod/ /
264b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stong tra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po la bstod pa/ /dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM dpal ldan mgon po rdo rje nag po ni/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gyel brjid pa'i rtags//
264b6(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mthing nag chos nyid mi 'gyur rtags/ /stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs dpa' pa'i rtags/ /rus pa'i rgyan drug mdzes par byed ba'i rtags/ /'ong 'bar rin chen dpal 'byor rtsol ba'i rtags/ /rin chen gos
264b7(rgyud 'grel): chen dar nag sgeg pa'i rtags/ /khrag zhag thal chen dur khrod rol ba'i rtags/ /dug sbrul rgyan gyis brgyan pa 'jigs byed rtags/ /gri gug dam nyams dbyings su sgrol ba'i rtags/ /thod khrag zag med bde la rol pa'i 
265a1(rgyud 'grel): rtags/ /gaN+De khro tshogs spro bsdu byed pa'i rtags/ /bzhad pa'i nyams dgu khams gsum dbang bsdud rtags/ /zhi thug dgra bgegs dbyings su sgrol ba'i rtags/ /bcu gsum rtags ldan
265a2(rgyud 'grel): bcu gsum sa brnyes rtags/ /sku gsung thugs ldan rdo rje nag po bstod/ /bram ze blo ldan mchog sred kyis dpal nag po chen po la rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta sh+ra ta ka ra warma dang/
265a3(rgyud 'grel): gu ru yon tan shi las gu ge tho ling du bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stod tra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i bstong pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa dang dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal
265a4(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i/ /hUM las byung ba'i nag po che/ /zhal gdangs mche gtsigs gang mo sgrogs/ /'jigs byed khyod la mngon par bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun la bsnyen kur rtags/ /mgul
265a5(rgyud 'grel): pa zod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /bgegs rnams ma lus tshar gcod pa'i/ /mgon po khyod la mngon par bstong/ /sku mdog khro tshul ston pa ni/ /mkhyen gsal dbyings su gcig pa'i rtags/ /thung zhing spom la
265a6(rgyud 'grel): brjid pa'i sku/ /thugs rje sdang mig gzigs la bstod/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen du 'bar/ /thugs rje zhi khro phyogs bcur 'phro/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas na gri /'gro drug thugs rjes sgrol la bstod/ /
265a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa ban d+ha khrag dang zhag/ sha chen lnga dang sman ldas bkang/ /dug gsum ma lus zhal du gsol/ /sku gsum srin po'i gzugs 'dra stong/ /'od dpung dug lnga srog pa'i me/ /khro gnyer smin ma rabs bskyod
265b1(rgyud 'grel): cing/ /ljags 'gril khros pa phrin las mdzad/ /hUM sgrogs phad spro khyod la bstod/ /mcho gtsigs lce la me stag 'phro/ /brkyang bskum 'ur med thug chem ni/ /thugs rjes zhing khams ma lus g.yo/ /thugs
265b2(rgyud 'grel): rjes sna tshogs sprul la bstod/ /gtum chen khro bo mang 'phro ba/ /'gran zla med pas che ba la/ /phrin las rgya mtsho lhun gyis grub/ /khams gsum kun 'dul khyod la bstod/ /phra men tshogs rnams skrag par byed/ /
265b3(rgyud 'grel): ha ha ? chen gtum la bzhad/ /zhal nas khrag ni 'dzag pa ste/ /dkon mchog gsum skyong khyod la bstod/ /bla ma dang ni theg chen dang/ /sems can kun la 'tshe byed pa/ /skad cig yud la brlag 'gyur ba/ /nag
265b4(rgyud 'grel): po chen po khyod la bstod/ /bstod pa'i phreng ba bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta la li ta badzra dang/ /bod kyi lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /bram ze mchog sred
265b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis zhal mthong dus dga' nas bstod pas/ mgon po mnyes nas zhal 'dzum mdzad do/ /de nas phrin las bcol ba'i bstod pa mdzad do/ /zhal gzigs kyi bstod pa'o// //nag po chen po'i bstod pa bzhugs so/ /
265b6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mahA kA la stod tra/ bos skad du/ nag po chen po la bstod pa/ hUM las rnams kun byed mgon po nag po'i sku /dmar nag me'i 'od kyis kun nas bskor/ /phyag g.yas gri gug
265b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bar ba bsnams pa ni/ /dam nyams dgra bo'i srog rtsa dmar po gcod/ /g.yon pa thod pa dgra bo'i khrag bkang gsol/ /shangs nas rlung byung 'jig rten rlung nag 'tshub/ /zhal nas khrag 'dzag 'jig rten nang kyis 'gongs
266a1(rgyud 'grel): spyan rtsa dmar pos 'jig rten sdigs par byed/ /sku gsung thugs kyis stong gsum zil gyis gnon/ /mon pa po mo thams cad dbang du sdud/ /'jig rten lha srin thams cad dbang byas nas/ /
266a2(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa nyams pa'i dus kyi bya ra mdzad/ /dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba 'di bzhes la/ /thugs dam rgyud bskul bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod/ /nag po chen po gtor ma'i dus su bskul ba/ slob dpon b+ha wa lhas
266a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa/ gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stod tra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po la bstod pa/ chos dbyings rnam dag zhi ba'i rang bzhin las/ /thugs
266a4(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dbang gis 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing/ /sgyu ma'i chos la shes rab dbang bsgyur bas/ /'khor ba mi spong zhing khams skyong ba'i bdag /rab 'jigs dur khrod ma mo'i dkyil 'khor nas/ /khro gtum mi zad nag
266a5(rgyud 'grel): po chen po ni/ /hUM skyes dus mdza' i sprin phung 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /stag lpags sham thabs thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan/ /spyan gsum dmar zhing ldags? 'gril mche ba gtsigs/ /rab 'bar dbu skra ser po khyen?
266a6(rgyud 'grel): du brdzes/ /gdug pa'i phyag g.yas gri gug 'bar ba bsnams/ /phyag g.yon dpa' bo'i thod par bdud snying gcod/ /rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i nga ro'i sgras/ /ri dang sa gzhir bcas pa'i rgya mtsho g.yo/ /
266a7(rgyud 'grel): gdug pa'i klu dbang phung sgra 'byin byed cing/ /lce gnyis mche gtsigs brjid pa'i brgyan du byas/ /khrag dang bcas pa'i mi mgo lnga bcu dang/ /rgyu ma'i thag pas phreng brgyus mgul na 'chang/ /g.yer khas brgyan
266b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhabs gnyis sem bral mnan/ /dbu skra gyen rdzes sbrul gyis bcings pa ste/ /mi skyod rdo rje'i cod pan mdzes par mdzod/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro byin rlabs mchog gi gtso/ /khrag gi mnga' bdag ma cho gas dbang du bsdudn/ /
266b2(rgyud 'grel): 'bar byed dus mdza' i me yis kun nas bskor/ /dbang dang dam tshig la gus sgrub pa pos/ /nag po chen po'i gsang sngags rjes dran na/ /sngon gyi thugs na ma dbang gis 'phrin las mdzod/ /mgon po mchog khyod thugs
266b3(rgyud 'grel): rje'i bdag nyid can/ /byams pa'i zhal ston bdag la brtse dgongs nas/ /dngos grub rgya mtsho'i rlabs can bdag la stsol/ /bla ma mai tri pas mgon po zhal gzigs dus bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
266b4(rgyud 'grel): la li ta badzra dang/ lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stong tra/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po la bstod pa/ dpal gyi rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hUM/ phyogs bcu kun nas
266b5(rgyud 'grel): dus gsum bde gshegs kyi/ /phrin las las grub dri med bstan pa dang/ /chos ldan skyes bu skyong bar bka' bsgos pa'i/ /dam bcas ji bzhin bsgrub mdzad mgon po bstod/ /rab 'jigs sku ni dus mdza' i sprin spung
266b6(rgyud 'grel): ltar/ /dam nag 'jigs rung pho nya glog stong 'phro/ /sa gsum g.yo mdzad sa ga'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po khyod la bstod/ /spyan gsum rab 'bar srid gsum zil gyis gnon/ /mche ba bzhi gtsigs
266b7(rgyud 'grel): bdud bzhi rtsad nas gcod/ /dbu skra smar dmar ser gzi brjid 'bar/ /ye shes me dpung rab 'bar mgon po bstod/ /phyag gnyis zangs gri thod khrag gan d+he bsnams/ /gdug pa tshar gcod chos sgra chen sgrogs/ /dur khrod
267a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang phyug dur khrod rgyan kun 'chang/ /dpal ldan stobs 'chang sku yi dbang phyug bstod/ /gsung dbyangs zab cing chos kyi sgra snyan gyis/ /zhi bas sgrol ba'i sems can smin grol mdzad/ /hUM phaT ma ra ya sogs
267a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs rung sgras/ /gdug pa 'dul mdzad gsung gi dbang phyug bstong/ /mkhyen pa chos sku'i dpal rab mngon bgyis dang/ /brtse bas gdul bya srid mtsho las sgral phyir/ /bstan pa'i gru chen spel zhing bsrungs ma
267a3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad/ /don gnyis mthar phyin thugs kyi dbang phyug bstod/ /srid zhi'i yon tan tshogs kyis 'byor ldan zhing/ /bstan pa yon tan 'byung gnas rgyas par mdzad/ /sgrub pa yon tan tshogs kyis 'byor mdzad
267a4(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /rin chen yon tan rgya mtsho khyod la bstod/ /rab zhi chs don bsgrub mdzad 'gro ba rnams/ /nyer zhi'i dpal la 'god mdzad phrin las can/ /bstan pa rgyas mdzad tshe dang dpal 'byor tshogs/ /rab tu rgyas
267a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad ma hA kA la bstod/ /'gro rnams dbang gyur dbang bzhi'i 'byung gnas khyod/ /bla ma'i dbang mdzad dbang gi phrin las can/ /drag shul mngon spyod las kyis dgra bgegs tshogs/ /drag pos sgrol mdzad ma
267a6(rgyud 'grel): hA kA la bstod/ /ston mchog bla ma sku khams bzang ba dang/ /bstan mchog dam chos dar zhing rgyas pa dang/ /sgrub mchog bsgrub gnyis phun sum tshogs pa dang/ /don mchog sku bzhi grub pa'i phrin las mdzod//
267a7(rgyud 'grel): ces bstod do/ /slob dpon a b+ha yas zhal gzigs dus bstod pa/ paN+Di ta sh+ra ta ka ra warma dang/ gu ru yon tan shi las gu ge tho ling du bsgyur ba'o// //hUM/ sngon tshe bde gshegs pho brang spyan snga
267b1(rgyud 'grel): ru/ /bstan pa bsrung phyir nag po chen po la/ /rjes 'thun phrin las khyad par gang bsgo ba/ /dam bcas phrin las mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon pa'i bka' nyan 'khor gyi tshul mdzes shing/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir
267b2(rgyud 'grel): mi gzad gzugs 'chad ba/ /byams dang snying rjes 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/ /nag po chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bstan la rab dga' mthu stobs bsam mi khyab/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed tshar gcod? cing?//
267b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam 'phrul gaN+Di phyag gi dbus na bsnams/ /nag po chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu ma mi mgo phreng pa'i do zhal 'dzin/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis zangs gri rnon po bsdams/ /g.yon pa'i phyag na thod pa khrag bka' 'dzin/
267b4(rgyud 'grel): nag po chen po khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sngon tshe bde shegs spyan sngar khas blangs te/ /bstan pa bsrung dang 'gro la phan gdags phyir/ /dam bcas mi 'da' dam tshig rjes dgongs la/ /gsol gdab las mdzad bdag don
267b5(rgyud 'grel): yongs rdzogs mdzod/ /dpal nag po chen po la bstod pa 'di ni bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa'o// //*/ /nag po chen po la bstod pa bzhugs/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA kA la stod tra/ bod skad
267b6(rgyud 'grel): du/ nag po chen po la bstod pa/ hUM/ bde dga' rgya mtsho kun ster zhing/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i gzhal med khang/ /legs skyong nag po chen po ni/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs 'chad khyod la bstod/ /zla b stong gis spras pa
267b7(rgyud 'grel): yi/ /mtshan mo 'dzam gling nam mkha' ltar/ /khyod sku mthing nag brjid pa la/ /sed rus phreng bas brgyan mthod nas/ /'jig rten 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /srin po rnams kyi snying rab 'gas/ /bdud dang log 'dren dpa' bo
268a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ /mtshon cha bor nas phyogs bcur bros/ /sbrul gyi chun pos bkris pa'i thabs/ /drag po'i gom stabs bskyod pa ni/ /stong gsum rlung gis 'tshub pa yi/ /mtsho rlabs bzhin du
268a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu g.yo/ /lhun po 'jigs pas bros pa dag /bskyod bar ma nus bzhin du 'dir/ /rgya mtsho gnam du 'bros pa ltar/ /dog pa nyid las ring du 'phags/ /nags tshal me tog bcas pa'i shing/ /yib bar 'dod
268a3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhin du 'gyel/ /'brug stong sgra yang sgra min ltar/ /byed po'i gtum sgra gang mo dag /stong gsum 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /rna par nyan cing stongs par byed/ /kun nas zhi thugs spros bral yang/ /bstan
268a4(rgyud 'grel): pa bsrung dang bdag gi don/ /bsgrub phyir dam bca' ma bsnyel bar/ /rngam 'khrug gtum pas thugs bskyed la/ /bdud dang bgegs kyi snying khrag sha /chem chem gcod byed srin po yi/ /gzugs 'chang bka' 
268a5(rgyud 'grel): stong pho nya gying/ /'dir gshegs drag po'i phrin las bsgrubs/ /zhes pas bstod pa bya/ /paN+Di ta spyan chen pos dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du bstod pa mdzad pa rdzogs so// //gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur pa'o// //
268a6(rgyud 'grel): hUM b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan lha mo mi pham srid gsum bdag /rang don bsgrub phyir rnam thar gsum gzhol yang/ /snying rje'i dbang gis gzhan don rjes thob cing/ /shes rab sna tshogs dag gis 'gro don mdzad/ /dpal ldan
268a7(rgyud 'grel): lha mo sku mdog char sprin mdog /mtshan mo nag mo shin tu gtum ba'i gzugs/ /shin tu ring cing ked rus gzugs can ma/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i sku/ /ral ba gyen 'greng lan bu gcig
268b1(rgyud 'grel): tu 'khyil/ /skra gseb sbrul dang thod pa'i phreng thogs can/ /rna lhag me tog dar nag cod pan can/ /khrag gi chang gis ra ro spyan rtsa dmar/ /mi ro rengs pa khang pa cug? mche ba bzhi/ /rnam par gtsigs shing khrag la shin tu
268b2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes/ /snyan g.yas sbrul gyi mgul las dril bu yis/ /gdug pa btul nas tshangs pa'i sgra sgrogs ma/ /snyan cha g.yon na seng ge ral ba dmar/ /dpa' bo khams gsum seng ga'i sgra sgrogs ma/ /phyag bzhi g.yas kyi dbang
268b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri 'dzin/ /'og ma dud chen rak+ta dmar 'khyil zhing/ /g.yon gyi dang po shag ti mtshon cha 'dzin/ /'og ma tri shul mgul na ba dan 'phyar/ /shag ti ral gri mtshon gyis bcad pa yis/ /lha ma yin gyi mgo sogs do shal
268b4(rgyud 'grel): byas/ /glang po che yi ko rlon stong g.yogs byas/ /smad ni ba glang ko rlon dras pa la/ /phyed ni re lde ser pa sham bu dkris/ /klu yi dbang po gzhibs pa'i rkyen bcings can/ /zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog mdzas ba dag gi rgyan
268b5(rgyud 'grel): khrag dang zhag gi thig las tshom bur bris/ /bong bu gzhon nas mtshan mo dur khrod nyul/ /bong bu'i rmig pa glog gi shugs can ma/ /khams gsum skad cig tsam la bskor bar byed/ /skad cig dud dang 'brug gi sgra lta bu/
268b6(rgyud 'grel): ma? mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du sdud/ /lho phyogs gshin rje'i pho brang dag na gnas/ /dam pa'i sa na gzugs sku gnyis 'dzin zhing/ /ting 'dzin dbang thob gzugs khams gnas su byon/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs
268b7(rgyud 'grel): phyag byas pa/ gzhan la dbang bskur 'dod khams pham mthar byon/ /dbang phyug chen po'i sku la dbyes 'khrel ma/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su byon ba'i tshe/ /lha rnams dbugs 'byin brgya byin phyag byas ma/ /sku mchog
269a1(rgyud 'grel): ri rab rtse la 'gran pI tshe/ /lte ba'i thad ka'i phyogs su nyi zla 'phyar/ /rgyal chen bzhi sogs lha rnams phyag byas ma/ /rgya mtsho'i gting nas me 'bar mtsho skem nus/ /sa 'og dbang po
269a2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi phyag byas ma/ /lha mo khyod kyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan las/ /bdud dang gshin rje'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'dud/ /ma mo srin po'i tshogs rnams rngam zhing rgod/ /dam sri'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing dam
269a3(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud/ /tsi ta rin chen gur phub gzhal yas khang/ /nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor rtsigs pa'i ga'u 'bar/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dug gi bcud sdus nas/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim mdzad ma/ /dug gi rlangs
269a4(rgyud 'grel): pas nag po'i phyogs rnams kyis/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rnams slong mdzad ma/ /ma cig nad kyi bdag mo'i dam la 'dud/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sman gyis bcud 'dus nas/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la thim
269a5(rgyud 'grel): par mdzad/ /sman gyis slangs pas dkar po'i phyogs rnams kyis/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nang rnams sel mdzad ma/ /bdud rtsi'i sman gyis rgyal mo'i dam la 'dud/ /gang zhig khyed la dang nam bas byams/ /de phyir
269a6(rgyud 'grel): ma cig na dag sman gyi gtso/ /rgyal ba shAkya thub ba'i spyan snga ru/ /bdag gis dngos nas 'khor ba ji srid bar/ /dkar po'i phyogs rnams nang dang sdug bsngal sogs/ /zhi bar bya dang cho dang bsod nams spel/ /nag
269a7(rgyud 'grel): po'i phyogs rnams 'gugs shing dbang du sdud/ /smo 'bog bsad la sogs pa'i las rnams kyis/ /bstan pa bsrungs ba'i las 'di myur du bgyid/ /'di las 'das na rgyal ba'i bka' bslus pas/ /dus gsum rgyal
269b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rdo rjes mgo 'gems so/ /de ltar rgyal ba'i sgyan sngar khas blangs nas/ /khas blangs bzhin du dam tshig rjes dgongs la/ /dam tshig bzhin du phrin las myur bsgrubs mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdag dang bdag gi 'khor
269b2(rgyud 'grel): bcas la/ /khyod kyi zhal nas bdud rtsi'i cher phob la/ /nang dang sdug bsngal tshogs rnams zhi bar mdzod/ /tshe dang dbang thang longs spyod rgyas bar mdzod/ /zing zing longs spyod 'bru'i phung po dang/ /rin chen rkang 'go
269b3(rgyud 'grel): phyugs rnams 'phel bar mdzod/ /bla ma smod cing dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod/ /bdag gi dge la bar gcod byed pa yi/ /sdad ba'i dgra dang gnod pa'i bgegs la sogs/ /khyod kyi khong nas dug gi brlangs phyung la/ /
269b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dub rnam bzhi'i nad kyis khong nas slongs/ /don snying lnga yi khong khrag skyug du chug /bag gzhi sa la lhung nas sdebs su chug /las ngan 'khor bcas brang chen brdung du chug /smre sngags cho nges gnam du 'bod du
269b5(rgyud 'grel): chug /gcan zan la sogs mkha' lding ltas ngan thong/ /khyod kyi sngon gyi dam bcas rjes dgongs nas/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /bram ze mchog sred kyis mdzad pa'o// //
269b6(rgyud 'grel): dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod ba bzhugs/ /*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI de wi ka li stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): bskal ba me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil
269b7(rgyud 'grel): na/ /rlung nag tshub mar 'khyil pa'i pho brang na/ /ma cig 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ /bdud kyi yum mchog gshin rje'i lcem gcig ma/ /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo mthu mo che/ /nag mo za byed rngam pa'i mche ba can/ /
270a1(rgyud 'grel): mthing nag gcer bu khrag gi ral pa can/ /khyod kyi sku mdog nag mor bstan pa ni/ /don dam dbyings las g.yo ba med pa'i rtags/ /ral pa g.yas nas g.yon du 'khyil ba ni/ /mkha' 
270a2(rgyud 'grel): las sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed pa'i rtags/ /dbu skra lan bu gcig tu 'khyil ba ni/ /skye med don dam gcig tu rtogs pa'i rtags/ /ral pa'i seb nas me stag 'phro ba ni/ /thugs kyi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed pa'i
270a3(rgyud 'grel): rtags/ /thod pa'i phreng bas dbu la bcings pa ni/ /thugs kyi sprul pas 'gro don mdzad pa'i rtags/ /g.yon gyi snyan nas seng ge 'phyo ba ni/ /dman btsun thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i rtags/ /g.yas nas sbrul?
270a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi gdeng ka 'phyo ba ni/ /zhe sdang ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags/ /snyan cha dril bu g.yer kha 'khrol ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kun la snyen skur mdzad pa'i rtags/ /sbyan rtsa dmar zhing sdang mig bgrad pa ni/ /srid gsum
270a5(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor bya ra mdzad pa'i rtags/ /zhal ni drag po'i hom khud gdangs pa ni/ /bstan pa bshig pa'i ru tra sgrol ba'i rtags/ /rno gdug mche ba zur gsum gtsigs pa ni/ /bsgral ba'i zhing bcu'i sha la rol ba'i
270a6(rgyud 'grel): rtags/ /zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sku la gsol ba ni/ /yang dge chos nyid don dang ldan pa'i rtags/ /glang chen ko rlon rnam par dkris pa ni/ /'jig rten 'di na che btsan che ba'i rtags/ /lre ba'i dkyil nas nyi ma shar ba ni//
270a7(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho gting nas skems pa'i rtags/ /spyi bo'i gtsug na zla ba rgyas pa ni/ /khams gsum ma rig mun pa sel ba'i rtags/ /zhabs las dbang gi lcags sgrog 'khrol pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab zung du
270b1(rgyud 'grel): 'brel pa'i rtags/ /phyag g.yas ral gri 'bar ba bsnams pa ni/ /dam nyams dgra bgegs srog rtsa gcod pa'i rtags/ /gnyis pa thod rlon dmar chen bsnams pa ni/ /srid gsum sha khrag zhal ? pa'i rtags/ /g.yon
270b2(rgyud 'grel): pas mdud rnon pa dan 'phyar ba ni/ /dam nyams ma lus rtsad nas gcod pa'i rtags/ /gnyis pas tri shu rtse gsum bsnams pa ni/ /khams gsum nyon mongs rdul du rlog ba'i rtags/ /bong bu gra? dmar phyir phyogs zhon pa
270b3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ /log par lta ba'i sems can sgrol ba'i rtags/ /srin po'i ya 'gal snga ru byas pha ni/ /srin yul lar ka spu ri 'joms pa'i rtags/ /srin po'i ma 'gal phyi ru byas ba ni/ /bdud dang srin po zil gyis gnon pa'i
270b4(rgyud 'grel): rtags/ /sbrul nag chun pos gong smed byas pa ni/ /zhe sdang gdug pa'i bgegs rigs 'joms pa'i rtags/ /rus sbal nag po'i gdu bus brgyan pa ni/ /klu bdud nag po dam la btags pa'i rtags/ /bdud kyi khram
270b5(rgyud 'grel): bam snga shar btags pa ni/ /dam tshig nyams pa khram la 'debs pa'i rtags/ /nad kyi rgyal pa phyi sor btags pa ni/ /bstan pa shig rnams la nang kha 'bebs pa'i rtags/ khong bu'i tshang ra mig gis brgyan pa ni/ /
270b6(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum dgra bgegs rnams las rgyal ba'i rtags/ /don dam bcud kyi rtags su zhag gi zo ris dang/ /thugs rje chags pa'i rtags su khrag gi thig les brgyan/ /'dul byed phrin las rtags su thal chen tshom
270b7(rgyud 'grel): bus brgyan/ /phrin las kun khyab rtags su ma mo 'bum gyis bskor/ /ma 'dud 'bum phrag pho nyar khye mdzod la/ /sgrub mchog bdag gi dgra bgegs khrid la shog /ma cig kha nas me 'bar mtsho skems ma/ /lag da'i?
271a1(rgyud 'grel): rab rdo char 'bebs mdzad ma/ /mthu stobs bdag mo ma cig re ma ti/ /bdag gis bcol pa'i las rnams grub par mdzod/ /bdag gis btsun par lha mo khyod la bstod/ /khyod gyis bdag la dngos
271a2(rgyud 'grel): grub bstsal du gsol/ /dpal lha mo la bram ze mchog sred kyis rtags kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o// //la li ta badzra dang gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri kA li de
271a3(rgyud 'grel): ? stong tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' i lha phran rnams kyis bstod zer ba'ang snang lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ ma bcos chos sku bde ba chen po ni/ /srid dang zhi bar mi gnas mnyam nyid dang/ /sku gsung thugs dang
271a4(rgyud 'grel): yon tan 'phrin las mchod /dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mo khyod la bstod/ /sku'i dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam/ /mya ngan mi 'da' 'thun par snang ba nyid/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan cha ma cig re ma ti/ /'gro ba'i
271a5(rgyud 'grel): gnyen gcig ma la bdag bstod do/ /chos sku mkha' ltar dag ba'i shes rab ma/ /longs sku bde chen rmad byung thabs tshul gyis/ /ma rungs gdug pa can rnams tshar gcod pa'i/ /mi bsnyel thugs rje can la bdag
271a6(rgyud 'grel): bstod do/ /dman pa mi 'dor rtags su bong bu phyibs/ /lha'i lhar gyur lha min skrag mdzad ma/ /sbrul sku'i rdzu 'phrul stong gsum khyab par nyul/ /bstan pa'i gnyer mdzad ma la bdag bstod de/ /dpal ldan lha mo mi 'gyur
271a7(rgyud 'grel): thugs rje can/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i mchod gtor 'di bzhes la/ /rnal 'byor bdag gi 'dod pa'i don rnams bsgrubs/ /bstan pa'i dgra bgegs ma lus med par mdzod/ /ces lha ma srin gyis bstod pa/
271b1(rgyud 'grel): la li ta badzra dang gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI de wi kA li stong tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ srid gsum zil non 'dod
271b2(rgyud 'grel): khams dbang phyug ma/ /'jig rten gtso la rtag tu gus phyag 'tshal/ /ma rnams nang na khyod nyid mchog yin te/ /'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la bstod/ /bzhin mdzes yid 'ong lta bas mi ngoms pa'i/ /yon
271b3(rgyud 'grel): tan sna tshogs kun gyis lus rab brgyan// spyan mdzes utpal sngon po'i mdab ma mdzes/ /bsod nams ye shes snang ba'i dra bas brgyan/ /nor bu rin chen rin thang med pa bzhin/ /dang bdag pad mo khyod la bsngags pas
271b4(rgyud 'grel): kyang/ /sems la gsla ba thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /lha mo dgos 'dod 'grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag ye shes gya nom bkra shis 'dud/ /pad ma lta bu shin turnam par dag /lus mdog rab mdzes kun
271b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis lta bas mos/ /yon tan rgya mtsho gter la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dri med ye shes 'od zer rab mdzes pa/ /dran pa rnams kyi nang du mchog tu 'gyur/ /mthu stobs rdzu 'phrul yon tan rtsal mnga' bas/ /bdud rigs
271b6(rgyud 'grel): glang po'i glang chen 'gems la 'dud/ /'di ltar gcan gzan mchog gyur seng ge ltar/ /bstan pa dri med yul 'khor skyong la 'dud/ /de ltar sngags shing bstod pa'i dge ba 'dis/ /kun mkhyen mchog la kun nas gnas
271b7(rgyud 'grel): par shog /ces drang srong ke'u tri las bstod pa/ la li ta badzra dang/ gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI de wi kA li stong tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo
272a1(rgyud 'grel): la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ na mo badzra DA ki ni b+hya/ b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na/ /rlung nag tshub mang 'khyil ba'i pho brang nas/ /ma cig 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma
272a2(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog sngo nag char sprin lta bu la/ /thod skam dbu brgyan snyan g.yon seng ge 'phyo/ /snyan cha g.yas pa sbrul gyi gdengs ka can/ /spyan gsum dmar zlum zhal gdangs mche ba gtsigs/ /'jig pa'i lha mo khyod
272a3(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag g.yas ral gri thod khrag bsnams pa yis/ /dam nyams ma lus sgrol zhing rol ba ste/ /g.yon pa mdung dang du mtshon dgra bgegs sgrol/ /lha mo rab 'jig khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sku
272a4(rgyud 'grel): stong zhing lpags sbrul nag ska rags can/ /sku smad ba glang ko rlon re ldes dkris/ /stong gsum nyul byed bong bug dmar phyibs/ /srin poa'i ya 'gal rda ru? khram baM btags/ /gong smad sbrul nag nang rgyal dgra la gtor/
272a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod gtor 'di bzhes dgra bgegs sgrol la shog /ces bla ma mai traM bas lha mo zhal gzigs dus su bstod pa/ /la li ta badzre dang/ lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //
272a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI de wi kA li stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo la bstod pa zhes bya ba/ dpal ldan bla ma dam pa dang/ /he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa rab tu rgyas mdzad phyir/ /ye
272a7(rgyud 'grel): shes dbyangs las rang byung dpal ldan ma/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyur dpal ldan ma/ /srid gsum bdag pos phyag byas lha mo bstod/ /gdug pa skrag mdzad shin tu ring ba'i sku/ /nam mkha' i mdog can sprul pa'i
272b1(rgyud 'grel): gza' skar 'phro/ /khro gnyer smin ma rab bsdus mche ba gtsigs/ /bdud bzhi tshar gcod dpal ldan lha mo bstod/ /dug lnga byang chub lam mdzad bong bu phyibs/ /thabs shes zung 'brel zhabs gnyis lcags sgrog mdzes//
272b2(rgyud 'grel): nyi zla rab? rgyas khrag zhag thig les brgyan/ /bde mchog 'byung gnas dpal ldan lha mo bstod/ /sku gsum sgrib med spyan gsum glog ltar myur/ /khams gsum skyabs mdzad dar nag ko rlon can/ /re lde'i na bza' 
272b3(rgyud 'grel): sdan pa'i lha mo bstod/ /chad med phyag bzhi thod khrag mtshon cha'i tshogs/ /rnam thar bzhi'i rang bzhin bsnams par mdzad/ /bsdu dngos rnam bzhis srid na rgyun mi 'chad/ /pha rol phyin drug rgyan ldan lha mo bstod/ /
272b4(rgyud 'grel): srid pa'i mtsho skems ye shes me dpung 'bar/ /ma rung 'dul phyir dug sprul seng ges brgyan/ /gdug pa bsgral phyir khrag gi rgya mtshor bzhugs/ /mgo rlon ngo shal 'chad ba'i lha mo bstod/ /gsung dbyangs zhi drag chos
272b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra 'gro ba 'dul/ /thugs zab mkhyen brtses srid zhi'i dam la sgrol/ /yon tan gzi brjid nyi ma 'bum ltar 'bar/ /phrin las kun 'grub dpal ldan lha mo bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun dngos dpal ldan bla ma yi/ /bstan
272b6(rgyud 'grel): pa dpal 'byor kun nas rgyas pa yis/ /'gro kun theg mchog lam la 'god pa dang/ /bsgrub po don gnyis bsgrub pa'i phrin las mdzod/ /dpal ldan lha mo la a b+ha yas zhal gzigs dus bstod pa/ paN+Di ta sh+ra
272b7(rgyud 'grel): ta ka ra warma dang/ gu rub yon tan shi las gu ge tho ling du bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /rgya gar skad du/ sh+rI da? wi kA li stod tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan lha mo nag mo la bstod pa zhes
273a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan lha mo dpag par dka' ba khyod/ /thabs kyi cho 'phrul nam mkha' mdza' la spyod/ /byang chub sems dpa' i sprul pa khyod nyid la/ /sgo gsum dang ba'i sems kyis phyag
273a2(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal lo/ /khyod ni bdag gis mchod par mi 'tshal yang/ /kun gyi dngos grub dam pa thob bya'i phyir/ /mkha' la 'dod pa'i yon tan char 'bab pa'i/ /mchod pa'i tshogs 'dis dbang po rgyas gyur cig /
273a3(rgyud 'grel): lha? mo khyod ni dge sdig spang po ste/ /bdag gi lus ngag sems kyi sdig pa'i tshogs/ /ma lus khyed kyi mdun du bshags par bgyi/ /thugs rje'i thugs kyis sgrib pa sbyang bar mdzod/ /khyod kyi khyad par yongs su 'phags
273a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad bdag don phun sum tshogs/ /dga' thub phrag dog med pa'i spros pa 'di/ /rjes su yi rang khyod kyi rgyud la 'bul/ /'di ltar yon tan ldan pa'i sku mdog ni/ /nag mo bzang mo 'jigs
273a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthu stobs kyis/ /phyogs bcur dus kun 'gro ba'i don mdzad par/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshul du bskul bar mdzod/ /yang dag yon tan khyod kyi sku mchog gis/ /gdug pa 'dul phyir bstan pa bsrung ba'i
273a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ /ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs bar du ni/ /mya ngan mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol ba 'debs/ /'di ltar phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang/ /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yis/ /dge ba 'di yis
273a7(rgyud 'grel): ngan song stongs gyur te/ /'gro kun tshogs rdzogs byang chub chen por bsngo/ /dpal ldan lha mo la nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig can gyis yan lag bdun du bstong pa rdzogs so// //paN+Ti ta snying phreng
273b1(rgyud 'grel): can dang/ lo tsA ba gyi ljang dbu dkar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //*/ /las mkhan gyi bstod pa bzhugs so// //hUM/ dpal ldan bka' nyan nag po gnod sbyin sku/ /zhal gdangs mche gtsigs sha dang khrag
273b2(rgyud 'grel): la dga' / /sbyan bgrad skra brdzas rdo rje'i thod gdengs can/ /sdigs pa'i gri gug 'dzin pa phyag 'tshal lo/ /ha ha'i gad rgyangs dgra snying spang gyis 'debs/ /thod pa'i phreng bas brgyan cing zhing lpags gyon/ /log 'dren
273b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dul zhing dgra bo'i gshed ma byed/ /sha dang khrag gis mchod kyis dgyes par mdzod/ /dpal ldan 'jigs su rung ba'i phrin las kyis/ /gdug pa tshar gcod bdud dang mu stegs 'joms/ /bstan la rab dga' mthu
273b4(rgyud 'grel): stobs bsam mi khyab/ /gsang sngags skyong ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsngags shing las la bskul gyis dpung bskyed la/ /nyes legs stangs zung dam tshig rjes kyang chod/ /bka' gsang rmang du byung ba'i chos 'khor
273b5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /dgra bgegs rdul phran tsam yang med par mdzod// //hUM/ mgon po'i bka' nyan nag mo gnod sbyin mo/ /dpal 'bar brjid pa'i gzugs 'dzin drug gtum ma/ /khyol rngam pa'i zhal bsgrad
273b6(rgyud 'grel): mche ba gtsigs/ rkang tshil za byed nag mo khyod la bstod/ /thod pas brgyan zhing byi ru'i lan tshar can/ /gdug pa tshar gcod g.yas pa spu gri 'dzin/ /dar nag na bza' gsol ba'i dbang mo che/ /sdigs pa'i phyag rgya can
273b7(rgyud 'grel): khyod mchod cing bstod/ /rdam pa'i pha? ro 'brug stong ldir ba'i sgras/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du bsdud/ /dur khrod nyul zhing snying khrag dron mo 'thung/ /dgra bgegs rdul du rlog la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pho nya mang po
274a1(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'i 'phro 'du yis/ /gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor skyong mdzad ma/ /bdag dang dge ba'i phyogs la gnas pa rnams/ /bu sdug bzhin du rtag tu bsrung du gsol// //hUM/ dpal
274a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan phrin las kun rdzogs pu tra khyod/ /sku mdog mthing nag me yi 'phro 'du can/ /rngam pa'i stabs kyis 'gying zhing shang lang bsnams/ /gying chen gdug pa 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab 'jigs dpa' la rnga ma
274a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i zhal gdangs shing/ /glog ltar 'khyug pa'i ljags 'dril mche ba gtsigs/ /klad khrag bsres pa gsol zhing spyan rtsa dmar/ /skra brdzes thod phreng can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgo bo'i do shal dang nag na bza' 
274a4(rgyud 'grel): gsol/ /yon tan lhun rdzogs khams gsum dgra las rgyal/ /'jigs byed chen po dpa' bo'i gang stabs kyis/ /sprul pas 'gro don mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lam la gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams/ /bdan
274a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i stobs dang dad pa'i nus mthu yis/ /gsang sngags phyogs 'dzin dgra lha khyod bstod kyis/ /rje btsun bdud las rgyal ba dgyes par mdzod/ /bsang ba'i sha dang sbyang ba'i dza gad dang/ /bsgral ba'i khrag dang
274a6(rgyud 'grel): dam rdzas sna tshogs kyis/ /dam tshig can khyod mchod kyis chos 'khor skyongs/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i las 'di myur du bsgrubs// //hUM/ 'jigs byed dbyings las bzhengs pa'i sku mchog ni/ /zhal
274a7(rgyud 'grel): gcig phyag gnyis rngam pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /dgra bgegs tshar gcod rno dkar mche ba gtsigs/ /ro drug ma chags gsol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan rtsa bsgyur zhing gzigs mdzad thod phreng can/ /yon tan
274b1(rgyud 'grel): stobs rdzogs ral pa gyen du brdzes/ /phrin las rnam bzhis gdug pa tshar gcod phyir/ /phyag na dam shing 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mdog nag dus mdza' i me ltar gzi brjid 'bar/ /dur khrod brgyan dang cha lugs ldan pas
274b2(rgyud 'grel): sgeg/ dar dang stag gi gos gyon mchog tu dpa' / /gtum chen b+ha tra khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mu stegs 'dul mdzad dam nyams gshed ma khyod/ /dgra snying spar bas 'debs shing las la brtson/ /nyams pa gang yin sgrol
274b3(rgyud 'grel): la sha khrag zo?/ /bstan pa bsrung ba'i phrin las brtson par mdzod// //b+hyo:sngon tshe bsang sngags rdo rje theg pa yi/ /bstan pa bsrung par dam bcas ral gcig ma/ /nag mo bzang mo dam tshig ldan ma
274b4(rgyud 'grel): khyod/ /dam tshig rdzas kyis mchod cing phyag 'tshal lo/ /srin po'i cha lugs 'jigs pa'i sku mchog las/ /nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid 'bar/ /bdud kyi lcam mo dung gi mche ba can/ /dgra bgegs rtsad nas
274b5(rgyud 'grel): gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag g.yas gser gyis spu gri 'dzin zhing sdigs/ /g.yon pa rgyu ma zhal du gsol zhing bzhad/ /khams gsum dbang bsdud spyan gsum so sor gzigs/ /nag mo thod phreng can la phyag 'tshal
274b6(rgyud 'grel): lo/ /za 'og gos gyon mtshan mo dur khrod nyul/ /nag mo ral pa g.yengs pa'i sprul pa yis/ /ma mo mkha' 'gro sha za dbang du bsdud/ /dur khrod gtso mo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags rdo rje 'dzin pas khyod
274b7(rgyud 'grel): bstod kyis/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrungs cig ral gcig ma/ /dgra bgegs rdul? du rlog cig kha 'bar ma/ /dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i phrin las grub par mdzod// //b+hyo(rgyud 'grel): rnam dag tshad med
275a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi'i rang bzhin las/ /thabs la mkhas pa sgo skyong khro mo'i sku/ /bran g.yog mngag pa pho nya 'phro 'du yis/ /'gugs 'dren 'ching sdom mdzad pa'i 'phrul mo che/ /seng ge'i gdong can so
275a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig srid gsum za/ /lcags kyu 'dren cing thod rlon phreng ba bgrang/ /seng ge stag dang bya nag mang po'i tshogs/ /byams pas log 'dren 'gugs pa khyod la bstod/ /gzig gi gdong can dur khrod khrag ldag ma/ /zhags
275a3(rgyud 'grel): pa thod pa 'dzin cing las la brtson/ /gzig dang spyad mo mkha' lding bya yi tshogs/ /thugs rje legs par 'dren mdzad khyod la bstod/ /dom gyi gdod can khams gsum sa le gzigs/ /lcags sgrog sgron me bsnams pa'i
275a4(rgyud 'grel): mthu mo che/ /glang chen dom dang mkha' lding sprul pa'i chogs/ /dga' bas log 'dren 'ching mdzad khyod la bstod/ /dred kyi gdong can sde brgyad kha lo bsgyur/ /tho ba dang ni lcags kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /dred mo g.yag dang
275a5(rgyud 'grel): mkha' lding pho nya'i tshogs/ /btang snyoms chen po don mdzad khyod la bstod/ /kun kyang ma mo mkha' 'gro nyi zla'i spyan/ /'jigs tshul che la thabs mkhas thugs rje che/ /khaM khaM tshig tshig sha dang khrag la dga' / /'jigs
275a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ? can khyod mchod cing bstod/ /ces pa 'khor gyi bstod pa/ slob dpon chen po bram zer mchog sred kyis bstod pa mdzad pa/ paN+Di ta sh+rata ta ka ra warma dang/ lotsA ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// //
275a7(rgyud 'grel): hUM/ gnod sbyin nag po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /dar men ga sha sku la gsol/ /phyag g.yas gser gyi gri gug bsnams/ /chos 'khor bsrung ma khyod la bstod/ /gnod sbyin nag mo chen mo khyod/ /phyag gnyis spu gri
275b1(rgyud 'grel): thod khrag bsnams/ /gser gyi rgyan chas rab sgeg pa'i/ /mkha' 'gro chen mo khyod la bstod/ /sngon tshe rdo rje 'tshang dang ni/ /slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang/ /pad+ma'i rgyal po thod phreng dang/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug pas
275b2(rgyud 'grel): skya pa/ /kun dga' snying po la sogs pa'i/ /bla ma rnams kyi bka' bzhin du/ /dam tshig bzang po rjes dgongs la/ /bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis bsrungs/ /gnod pa'i dgra bgegs rdul du
275b3(rgyud 'grel): rlog? /rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor bcas kyi/ /ji ltar bsams pa'i don rnams ni/ /chos bzhin bsgrub pa'i las mdzod cig/ //hUM mon bu pu tra gnas nas bzhengs/ /men gyi ga sha sku la gsol//
275b4(rgyud 'grel): sher? shing seg shar phyag na bsnams/ /mon pu pu tra khyod la bstod/ /mon bu b+ha tra stag klag bkra/ /dar gyi ral kha sku la gsol/ /spu gri rnon po phyag na bsnams/ /mon bu b+ha tra phyag na bsnams/ /sbu gri mo ni chen mo ma/ /
275b5(rgyud 'grel): nag mo chen mo kha 'bar ma/ /gser gyi spu gri phyag na bsnams/ /nag mo khyod la bstod pa 'bul/ /bud med nag mo brgya/ gshegs kyi shul yang 'dren/ g.yas kyi ru 'dren pa/ stag chas brgyan pa brgya/ g.yon gyi du
275b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bren pa/ nyan thos dgra bcom brgya/ slad kyi rjes 'brad ba/ ban d+he nag po brgya/ 'khor bcas kun la bstod pa 'dul/ /slob dpon mchog sred kyis mdzad pa'o// //dpal ldan lha mo dud sol ma'i rjes gnang bzhugs so/ /
275b7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan lha mo'i sgo nas gtor ma'i rjes gnang bya bar 'dod bas/ gnas khang yid dang mthun par/ maN+Dal dang mchod gtor tshogs kyi yo byad 'tshogs par
276a1(rgyud 'grel): bshams la/ rang nyid bstan bde ba la 'dug nas dgyes pa rdo rje 'am/ /gdan bzhi'i mngon rtogs sgom/ yi dam gyi gtor ma btang ba'i rjes la/ lha mo'i mchod gtor brgyas par btang /
276a2(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyis mchod nas/ slob mas maN+Dal phul/ lag pa me tog dang bcas pa la/ slob dpon gyi slob ma la/ mdun 'di na dgyes pa rdo rje 'am/ rdo rje gdan bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rtan gzhal yas khang/
276a3(rgyud 'grel): brten ba lha dang bcas pa bzhugs pa yin pas/ gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol/ rdo rje rwa ba'i nang rol/ dur khrod chen po brgyad kyi shar phyogs nag po drag po'i khul na khyed rang 'dug par bsgoms/ mdun gyi nam mkha' 
276a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di na phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rtsa ba dang/ brgyud par bcas pa'i bla ma dang yi dam gyi lha tshogs chos skyong ba'i bsrungs ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams sprin phung stibs ba bzhin
276a5(rgyud 'grel): du thibs se bzhugs bar bsams la/ mos pa dang gus pa bgyis shig byas la/ lha mo'i gtor ma de slob ma'i mgo thog tu bzhag la/ lha mo dud pa'i sol ba ma 'khor nag mo 'bum sde'i tshogs dang bcas pa khyed rnams
276a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ slob ma 'di zhes bya ba'i lus ngag yid gsum la sku gsung thugs gsum gyis byin gyis rlobs snyam du bsams la/ mos pa dang gus pa'i sgo nas bla ma yi dam chos skyong bsrungs me dpal lha mo dud pa'i sol ba ma
276a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyi mgrin gcig tu/ pa shis pa 'di khyed rang rnams la brjod par bsoms shig byas la/ slob ma shes pa do dam smra ba'i sang+ge? yis/ /nyon mongs srid pa'i nyes pa skye ba'i sa gzhom phyir/
276b1(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor cho gas nyon mongs g.yo ba gcod pa'i phyir/ rnal 'byor don dam rgyal ba nyid du 'grub gyur cig /ces brjod pa'i brjod la/ dpal ldan lha mo mi pham srid gsum dbang gis bstod pa tshar gcig brjod/ gtor ma
276b2(rgyud 'grel): slob ma'i lag tu gtad nas/ dur khrod bdag po tshar gcig brjod la/ dpal ldan dud pa'i sol ba ma 'khor nag mo 'bum sde'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la mchod pa dang/ bstod pa dang/ gtong ma la sogs pa phul
276b3(rgyud 'grel): nas/ bdag gi slob ma ming dus 'di zhes pa gtad kyi/ ji srid gnas kyi bar du/ 'di'i lus ngag yid gsum la khyed kyi sku gsung thugs kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnyan po bsrungs/ dkon mchog
276b4(rgyud 'grel): gi mche ba phyung gcig /bla ma dam pa'i 'phrin las sgrubs shing /sems can gyi bde skyid spel gcig /khyad par duAng slob ma 'di zhes bya ba la sdod grogs dang/ bsrung ba dang/ skyabs pa dang/ sba ba dang/ byin gyis
276b5(rgyud 'grel): brlabs pa chen po mdzad du gsol/ /nang dang/ gdon dang/ rkyen dang/ bar du gcod pa thams cad zhi ba dang/ bsam pa'i don thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub cing/ tshe dang/ dpal dang/ 'byor ba la sogs ba zla ba yar
276b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzhin du rgyas pa'i 'phrin las mdzad du gsol/ /khyed rnams kyis kyang dus 'di nas bzung nas/ sangs rgyas ma thob kyi bar du/ chos skyong ba'i bsrungs ma yin pas/ mchod bstod bsgom bzlas rgyun ma chad
276b7(rgyud 'grel): par mdzod cig /ces brjod lha mo dang dam tshig bsre ba'i phyir/ 'theb kyu gcig dang/ ma da na hub gcig byin/ bka' bsgos pa bzhin 'grogs nas stong grogs byed par bsam mo/ /gtor ma sa gtsang sang btang/
277a1(rgyud 'grel): smon lam dang bsngo bas rgyas gdab/ dkon mchog gsum dang yi dam gyi bkris brjod/ /dpal ldan lha mo'i rjes gnang/ slob dpon chen po zhe sdang rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
277a2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mgon zhal bzhi ba'i bstod chen bzhugs so// //hUM/ dpal ldan mgon po nag po che/ /dbang phyug chen po srid gsum bdag /mche ba rtsegs shing mchu 'phyang ba/ /shugs chen byis pa'i lus can la/ /dril bu'i
277a3(rgyud 'grel): sgra sgrog 'jigs par byed/ /shin tu drag po'i 'phreng bas brgyan/ /dgra bgegs gcod pa'i dpa' bo ste/ /ming gi rnam grangs mang po can/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i sdang mig gis/ /khams gsum skrag mdzad khyod la bstod/ /
277a4(rgyud 'grel): khro rgyal dor stabs tshul du bzhugs/ /klog stong 'khyug 'dra'i ljags 'dril zhing/ /g.yon pa gter gyi bum pa thogs/ /g.yas na mdung dang gri khug 'dzin/ /'jigs su rung ba'i 'gyogs pa can/ /lag pa g.yon pa thod
277a5(rgyud 'grel): khrag gsol/ /tshangs skud mi mgo'i 'phreng bas brgyan/ /sa bla sa 'og sa stengs nas/ /k+ShiM k+ShiM 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog ? pa/ /srin po'i gzugs brnyan rngam pa'i sku/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'od zer 'bar/ /ha Sha
277a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gri ba'i sku la bstong/ /spo Ta la ni chen po na/ /dpal ldan nag po chen po bzhugs/ /te se gangs kyi zhing skyong mdzod/ /zhal bzhi sngon po nyis brtsegs g.yas/ /g.yon gnyis dmar ljang khros pa'i zhal/ /ha ha'i gang
277a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyangs 'brug sgra sgrog /hUM hUM sgrog pa'i dpal khyos kyis/ /srid gsum lha srin ma lus pa/ /thams cad 'dar zhing skrag par byed/ /dmag dpon chen po zhal bzhi pa/ /las su sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung/ /zas su dgra
277b1(rgyud 'grel): dgegs sha khrag rus/ /za byed khro bo khyod la bstod/ /dngos grub thams cad rtsol ba'i lha/ /rang bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang/ /rgyal ba'i spyan sngar khas blangs pa'i/ /sngar gyi skad du go bar gyis/ /gang gis go bar
277b2(rgyud 'grel): byed ces na/ /sha chen zan dang me tog spos/ /chang phung sha khrag gtor ma 'di/ /khyer cig zo zhig dam tshig can/ /khyad phyogs wa tri can na bzhugs/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dbang byed cing/ /rang gi yum dang gnyis med sku/ /
277b3(rgyud 'grel): mthu? stobs can la bdag bstod de/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar ni/ /dam bcas zhal gyis bzhes pa yi/ /dpal ldan mgon po khyod kyis ni/ /tshul bzhin sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor dang/ /bdag la thugs rjes dgongs mdzod la//
277b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi mthu rtsal chen po yis/ /bdag la sdang ba'i dgra bgegs rnams/ /de dag khyod kyis myur du song/ /bdag gi sems la ci 'dod pa/ /de dag khyod kyis myur du sgrubs/ /b+hyo/ g.yung mo gtum mo srin mo dang/ /sing ga la
277b5(rgyud 'grel): gnas rnal 'byor ma/ /dmar dang ljang ser khros pa'i zhal/ /gri gug thod 'dzin yab la 'khyud/ /phrin las rnam bzhi sgrub byed pa'o/ /yum chen bzhi po khyed rnams kyang/ /dam rdzas gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /rgyob rgyob sdang ba'i dgra
277b6(rgyud 'grel): la rgyob/ /sod sod gnod pa'i dgra bgegs sod/ /sreg sreg bar chad thams cad sregs/ /chod chod rnal 'byor dgra bgegs rnams/ /rigs rgyud rtsad nas chod la shog /hUM hUM k+ShiM k+ShiM 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin can/ /dpal ldan yab
277b7(rgyud 'grel): yum 'khor bcas ma lus rnams/ /'dir gshegs brgyan pa'i gtor ma 'di bzhes la/ /bcol pa'i las rnams myur du grub par mdzod/ /rnal 'byor bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ /byang chub ma thob par du bsrung ba dang/
278a1(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu longs spyod rgya chen ldan pa dang/ /'jig rten 'dir yang tshe rings nang med cing/ /'khor g.yog rigs rgyud dpal la sogs pa yis/ /dngos grub thams cad bdag la rtsal du gsol/ /rnal 'byor
278a2(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag dam pa'i chos sgrub pa'i/ /rtag tu stong grogs gnyan po mdzad du gsol/ /dmag dpon chen po zhal bzhi pa'i bstod pa sho lo kha nyi shu pa zhes bya ba bram ze rin chen rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
278a3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las dzA ba ri pa'i gsang sgrub rgya gzhung gsang sgrub dpa' gcig sA ba ri pa'i lugs/ sha ba ri pa'i lugs bzhugs so/ /rgya gar skad du/ a d+hiSh+Tha na ma hA ka la sa d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlabs pa nag
278a4(rgyud 'grel): po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ /dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar bde ba rgyas byed pa'i/ /dpal ldan thugs rje'i bdag po mchog /spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po'i sgrub
278a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs bri/ /dang po dang pa rab brtan nas/ /byang chub mchog tu sems skyed de/ /rang nyid he ru kar skyed la/ /de rjes stong pa nyid du bsgom/ /bla ma sangs rgyas can kun mchod/ /bstod dang bshags pa la sogs bya/ /
278a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngo zhing tshad med bzhi po bsgom/ /de rjes stong pa nyid du bsam/ /stong pa'i sngang las e bsam te/ /de rjes hUM las rdo rje'i brag /sna tshogs mdog can raM? las ni/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de stengs su/ /g+ha ni shel gyi mdog 'dra
278a7(rgyud 'grel): las/ /byi na ya ka brdal pa'i steng/ /hUM las nag po 'jig par byed/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rngam pa'i sku/ /g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar bas te/ /dbus mthing stag gi bgas pas bsgril/ /rin chen zhabs gdub sbrul
278b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan/ /phyag g.yas gri gug phreng ba dang/ /Da ma ru ni drag tu 'khrol/ /g.yon pa thod pa mdud rtse gsum/ /de bzhin zhags pas dgra bo 'dzin/ /drag po'i zhal las mche ba gtsig/ /spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /?
278b2(rgyud 'grel): ba sind+hu ra yi g.yu rung 'khyil/ /mi skyod spyi bor bzhugs las byin gyis brlobs/ /gnas gsum lha bsam ye shes sems dpa' bstim/ /dbang bskur nas ni ri bdag so sor bsam/ /brtan par gyur nas rang gi mdun/ /
278b3(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan khro mo dza li ni/ /g.yas pa gri gug thod khrag g.yon/ /sku mdog nag mo 'jigs byed ma/ /g.yas su k+Sho tra pa li ma/ /Da ma ru g.yas sdig 'dzum g.yon/ /sku mdog du ba'i mdog can no/ /g.yon du Ta
278b4(rgyud 'grel): kI ra tsa seng/ /g.yas ba rtse gsum sdig 'dzum g.yon/ /rgyab tu mahA ka li ni/ /dmar nag g.yas pa gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pa thod khrag zhal du rdzubs/ /rus pa'i rgyan ldan gcer bu mo/ /gar thabs keng rus gdan la bzhugs
278b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshe gtsigs spyan gsum khros pa'i zhal/ /gtso bo dang ni dus mnyam skyed/ /las kyi lha mo bzhi po ni/ /gdug pa can kun 'gugs byed cing/ /bzung nas gtso bo la stobs phyed/ /sngags kyis bzlas pa de rjes tsam/ /oM sh+rI mahA ka
278b6(rgyud 'grel): la si thi tha na ma ma hUM hUM phaT/ /rtsa ba'i sngags su bstan pa ni/ /oM badzra mahA ka la k+ShiM k+ShiM Ta big nan/ /bi na ya ka hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ /gtso 'khor nye bsnyen sngags su bstan/ /oM ma hA ka li dza li ni hUM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ka li mi
278b7(rgyud 'grel): k+She tra pa la hUM hUM phaT/ oM rad Ni Ta ki rA tsa hUM hUM phaT/ oM mahA ka li ni sha truM mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT/ 'khor gyi sngags su bstan pa yin/ /lha la mnyes pa'i gtor ma ni/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga/ /ka pa lar blug byin brlabs te//
379a1(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan shing las gtso 'khor rnams/ /byon pa rnal 'byor mdun du ni/ /sgra dang bcas pas byin pa la/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'dis 'bul bar bya/ /oM sh+rI badzra ma hA ka la ye sha sa naM/ a pa ka ri naM/
379a2(rgyud 'grel): ya ti ga ti dzA sma ra si ta d+ha i dan duSh+Ta/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ mA ra mA ra/ grih+n agrih+na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ di ni me ke na mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gtso 'khor rnams kyis gsol par bsam/ /
379a3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar rtags dang rab ldan pas/ /bsgrub pa'i las la sbyar ba ni/ /sngags la sham bu gdags par bya/ /de nas bsad pa'i las bya ba/ /sngags la ya dang ya gdags bya/ /sbyin bsreg byas la mnan par bya/ /gtor ma
379a4(rgyud 'grel): steng nas mnan la bzhag /rtags byung skyes pa'i tsi ta ru/ /nag po chen po'i snying po dang/ /'khor dang bdud rtsir bcas la gzhug /dar nag gis gtums mchan khung gdags/ /skabs su lag pas bzung byas la/ /
379a5(rgyud 'grel): bsad pa'i sngags kun bzlas par bya/ /bdag gis nag po chen po yi/ /sgrub thabs byin gyis rlob pa 'di/ /brtsams la dge ba gang yod pas/ /dpal ldan nag po'i zhal mthong shog /byin gyis brlabs pa nag po chen po'i sgrub
379a6(rgyud 'grel): thabs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal ldan dzA ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// athii //g+hu a/ rgya gar gyi bla ma a ta ya badzra dang/ lo tsA ba tshul khrims mgon gyis bsgyur pa'o// //

279b1(rgyud 'grel): rab/ brtson 'grus seng ge/ tshul khrims 'bum/ rgyal mtshan 'bum/ byams pa dpal bzang po/ bsgrub chen chos 'byung rin chen/ gdan sa pa kun dga' dpal bzang po/ nges bdag la'o// //bal po'i
279b2(rgyud 'grel): paN+Ti ta de ba pu rnam ti dang/ lo tsA ba 'gar chos kyi bzang pos kyang bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab ces byams pa gsung ngo/ /'di'i bka' yig mchog sgrub kyi bka' chung pa dang 'thun par mdzad// //
279b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las/ nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa klu byang gis mdzad pa'o// //rgya gar skad du/ a d+hiSh+Tha? na ma ma hA kA la gu ya sa d+ha naM na ma/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen po'i
279b4(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas gsang sgrub byin brlabs can/ /ri bo dben pa dur khrod du/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum dmar nag las/ /pad+ma 'dab brgyad chos 'byung
279b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /rang byung sa ni gyur? yis byug /mtshan ldan thod pa ka pa la/ /me long pad ma chos 'byung dang/ /li khri gur gum g+hi wang dang/ /rang byung sin d+hu rgya skyegs kyis/ /chos 'byung kha sbyar 'khor lo bri/ /lam du 'bras can rkun
279b6(rgyud 'grel): 'brum dang/ /ka ra sprang rtsi chang gis bran/ /nya sha dkar gtor bzang du bsham/ /rang nyid dpal ldan nag po che/ /zhal gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /zhabs gnyis bgegs mnan gzir ba yi/ /nag po stag gi
279b7(rgyud 'grel): sham thabs can/ /phyag drug sbrul dang dus pas brgyan/ /g.yas gsum gri gug phreng ba dang/ /Da ma ru ni rab tu 'dzin/ /g.yon gsum gsum thod kha TwaM kha/ /zhags pa bsnams shing drag po yi/ /zhal can mche ba rab tu brtsigs//
280a1(rgyud 'grel): dpral ba sin d+hu ra yis byugs/ /lha shing tsan dan bseb na 'gying/ /'khor du ma mo brgyad kyis bskor/ /kun kyang kha dog nag mo la/ /lag na gri dug? thod phrag bsnams/ /ro yi gdan la
280a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i tshul/ /khro mo'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /gsang ba'i sngags ni 'bum cho bzlas/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+ShiM Ta big nan/ /bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ /ril bu mig sman mkha' spyod dang/ /rkang 'gyogs
280a3(rgyud 'grel): bum pa mchil lham dang/ /sa 'og rig 'dzin gang 'dod pa/ /dpal ldan nag po chen pos bster/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag po chen po'i gsang pa'i sgrub thabs 'phags pa klu byang gis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

280a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag bla ma rin chen la byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /u u u/ oM badzra ma hA kA la k+ShiM k+ShiM tra big nan/ /bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT phaT/ u ne u ne u ne/ h+ri h+ri hir/ dza dza na wa shaM ku ru aM gu sha dza dza/ bya rog gi srog rgyud
280a7(rgyud 'grel): le lu bco lnga pa'o// //*/ /phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las mi bskyod pa la brten nas bgegs sel thabs bzhugs so// //gu ru na mo/ mi bskyod pa'i bgegs sel 'di la/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngon du song
280b1(rgyud 'grel): nas/ rang yi dam gang byed du bsgoms la/ mdun du gzhal yas khang pad+ma 'dab bzhi/ 'khyams phyogs mtshon/ phyi rdor ra dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba/ pad+ma'i lte bar rin po che'i khri phun sum tshogs pa/ de'i steng du skad cig gis
280b2(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod ba sku mdog ser po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas rdo rje g.yon dril bu bsnams pa/ dbu la rigs lngas mtshan pa/ sku gzi mdangs dgrag dang ldan pa/ thugs byin brlabs dang ldan pa/ zhal 'dzum bag dang ldan pa/
280b3(rgyud 'grel): de'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros/ /'og min stug po bkod pa nas/ rdo rje 'chang dang bla ma rnams spyan drangs/ mi bskyod pa la bstim/ mchod pa bzhi rdzogs su phul/ gsol ba gdab/ bshags pa bya/ bla ma'i thugs kar pad ma
280b4(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gcig bsam/ de'i lti bar h+ri dmar ser gcig bsam/ de'i mdza' mar gu ru h+ri ces pa'i yig 'bru ser pos 'khor ba la dmigs pa gtad la bzlas pa bya/ /gsol ba gdab bo/ /slob ma gzhug pa ni/ sngon 'gro gzhan/
280b5(rgyud 'grel): dang 'dra/ maN+Dal dbus su bla ma gsal gdab slob ma'i spyi bor byon par bsam/ slob ma'i gnas gsum du yi ge gsum bsaM/ de nas dpral bar oM dkar po las/ bdud rtsi dkar po byung/ slob ma'i spyi bor babs/ bum dbang
280b6(rgyud 'grel): thob 'dre/ mgrin pa'i A(rgyud 'grel): mgrin par gsang dbang/ thugs ka'i hUM ser po las 'od zer bde ba'i rang bzhin ser po babs/ snying gar shes rab ye shes/ bla ma'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge dkar dmar mthing gsum las/ bdud rtsi
280b7(rgyud 'grel): dkar dmar gsum byung/ slob ma'i dbu ma'i nang nas mar zhugs/ lte bar sleb dbang bzhi pa thob/ rtsa mig thams cad bde pa'i rang bzhin gyis gang/ bde stong du ngo sprad dbang gi rgyal po rang gi sbyi bo na mar zhugs/ rang lus skad
281a1(rgyud 'grel): cig gis mgon por bskyed/ de'i thugs kar/ shes pa 'phyon bla ma ser por bsgom/ yid mi dga' zhing 'phyon bla ma dmar por bsgom/ /bams? 'dus langs shing/ dgongs phyogs bsngod snying mi 'dod
281a2(rgyud 'grel): pa byung na/ sku mdog sngon por bsgom/ gsol ba gdab/ dmigs pa gsal ba gal che/ lta sgom nyams su blang/ rang rgyud 'jam zhing bgegs mi 'jug pa'i gnad yin/ bsnyen pa skyel ba'i dus lha sku mi gsal bar gyur na/
281a3(rgyud 'grel): nam byed kyi dus su thun zhabs thams cad la/ bla ma'i thugs ka nas 'od zer 'phros/ 'gro ba sems can thams cad 'od du zhu bar bsam/ stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can du nyams su blangs/ rang lus lha sku snang stong du nyams su blang/
281a4(rgyud 'grel): thun mgo thams cad du bla ma la gsol ba 'debs pa gal che/ rdzogs rim ni mgon po'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge bla mar bsdu/ rang lus bla mar gsal bar sgom/ bla ma'i gnas gsum gyi yi ge thugs ka'i hUM la bsdu/ hUM
281a5(rgyud 'grel): nad la thim/ na da thig le la/ thig le stong pa nyid la thim/ sems ma bcos pa'i ngang la bzhag /gsal stong dang bla ma dbyer mi phyed par sgom/ bsngo ba bya/ bkra shis brjod/ mi bskyod pa la brten nas mgon po'i
281a6(rgyud 'grel): gegs sel bla ma gnang sgyur/ dpal ldan sha wa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //mgon po'i bka' gang byed kyang gser gyi maN+Dal shin tu gal che'o// //na mo gu ru/ mthar thug snying po'i don rtogs
281a7(rgyud 'grel): nas/ mkhyen gnyis yon tan rab rgyas pa/ /mchog gsum bla ma'i bkra shis shog /snod bcud dag pa'i bde chen po/ /snang stong zhal sbyor lhan cig skyes/ /phyi nang gsang ba mchog gi lha/ /sku gsum yi dam bkra shis
281b1(rgyud 'grel): shog /bzhi yi de nyid mngon du gyur/ /lam shes ngo bo nyid med cing/ /rnam mkhyen gsang ba bsam mi khyab/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bkra shis shog /slu med rgyu 'bras slab bya phra/ /lhag bsam dge ba rgya chen po/ /smin
281b2(rgyud 'grel): grol zung 'jug zab pa'i lam/ /theg gsum dam chos bkra shis shog /snyen pos bstan pa dur smrig 'dzin/ /kun la phan sgrub rgyal ba'i sras/ /sgo gsum gsang sngags rnal 'byor 'chang/ /rigs gsum dge 'dun bkra
281b3(rgyud 'grel): shis shog /khro gtum rdzu phrul mthu stobs 'chang/ /phrin las kun bsgrub bstan pa skyong/ /'khor bzhi dpa' bo'i bkra shis shog /'jig rten khams na ma lus pa/ /'od gsal chen po'i bkra shis shog /gnas 'dir bde legs
281b4(rgyud 'grel): 'phel gyur cig /mgon po'i bkra shis yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/ /dpal sha wa ri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //phyag drug ye shes mgon po'i chos skor las/ mgon po dmar po'i tshe bsgrub bzhugs sho?/ na mo gu ru/ mgon po dmar po'i tshe
281b5(rgyud 'grel): bsgrub kyi zhal gdams ni/ bdag bskyed gang mos su bskyed ba'i mdun du chos 'byung dmar po gnyis rtsegs/ de'i phyir gzhal yas khang gru bzhi 'khyams phyogs mtshon dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa/ de'i dbus su g+haM dmar po las
281b6(rgyud 'grel): tshogs bdag dmar po/ de'i steng du hUM dmar nag/ de las 'od zer 'phros/ gdug pa can thams cad tshar gcad/ tshung 'dus hUM la thim/ hUM mer gyis zhu ba las/ yid bzhin nor bu'i mgon po sku mdog dmar po zhal gcig phyag
281b7(rgyud 'grel): drug pa/ zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor thabs su bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon dang po gnyis gri thong bar pa gnyis tshe'i bum pa 'dzin pa/ tha ma gnyis DA ma ru dang dril bu bsnams pa/ rgyan cha lugs gzhan rnams mthun pa/ gnod
282a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bzhi/ lha mo gtsang ris/ dam can rgya mtsho rnams bskyed la/ ye shes pa spyan drangs/ dam tshig pa la stim/ gsol ba gdab/ yig rgya bzlas/ bshags pa bya/ de nas mgon po'i thugs kar
282a2(rgyud 'grel): hUM dmar nag gi mdza' mar/ oM badzra ma hA kA la k+Shi ratna gu ru hUM ces bas bskor ba la dmigs la nyer gcig bzlas/ bsnyen pa gzhan rnams kyang bya/ sku gsung thugs kyi gsol ba gdab bo/ /slob ma gzhug pa ni/
282a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon 'gro rnams tshar ba dang/ dngos gzhi ni maN+Dal dbus su mgon po gong bzhin gsal gdab/ mgon po'i spyi por mi bskyod pa sngo skya/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu bsnams pa bsgom/ de'i thugs ka nas 'od
282a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phros/ rgyud pa'i bla ma spyan drangs bstim/ mi bskyod pa yang mgon po la bstim/ dbyer med du bsam/ de nas mgon po'i dpral bar oM dkar po/ mgrin par A dmar po/ thugs kar hUM dmar po/ dkyil 'khor gyi
282a5(rgyud 'grel): dbus la bzhi nges nas rang gi sngags kyi sgra dang bcas pas slob ma'i spyi bor byon/ lta sgom spyod pa snang stong zung 'jug tu ngo sprad/ de nas mgon po'i dpral ba'i oM dkar po las/ 'od dkar po byung/ slob ma'i spyi bor thim bum
282a6(rgyud 'grel): dbang thob/ lus kyi dri ma dag /mgrin pa'i A(rgyud 'grel): dmar po las/ 'od dmar po byung/ gsang dbang thob/ ngag gi dri ma dag /thugs ka'i hUM dmar nag /snying gar thim/ yid kyi dri ma dag /shes rab ye shes kyi dbang thob/

282b1(rgyud 'grel): par spyi po dmar zhugs/ snying ga'i hUM dang dkrug 'dres pas/ skad cig gi phyag drug par sgrong bskyed/ de nas thugs ka'i hUM gi mdza' mang rtsa sngags kyis bskor ba la dmigs ba gtad/ hUM las 'od zer dpag tu med pa 'phros/

283b3(rgyud 'grel): skar dus tshod bzang po la/ /nang gtor phyi gtor btang nas kyang/ /gsol ba gdab cing bden pa ba dang/ /phyi nang gsang gsum rten rnams bca' / /brten gtor rgyun gtor rten rnams bca' / /de nas 'tshams bcad maN+Dal bya/ /bdag
283b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid sems bskyed lhag lhang bai/ /mdun du b+h+ruM las gzhal yas khang/ /de nang thod mkhar me rlung dbus/ /hUM las bskyed pa'i lha mo ni/ /sku mdog nag la shin tu bsgeg /zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma/ /zhal gnyis btsan dkyil

283b7(rgyud 'grel): nag mo gcer bu ral pa can/ /g.yas pas mi snying g.yon b+han d+ha/ /dur khrod chas brgyad bong bu bcibs/ /de rgyab rigs bzhi'i lha mo ni/ /dkar ser dmar ljang bod bu bcibs/ /g.yas pas rang rtags g.yon b+han d+ha/ /de rgyab
284a1(rgyud 'grel): phra men brgyad po yang/ /seng stag spyang ki cung ka dang/ /pag gdong dur byo bya rog bya rgod gdong/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis gri dang thod pa 'dzin/ /dur khrod chas brgyad drel nag rkang gsum bcib/ /de rgyab

284b5(rgyud 'grel): rbad?/ a ka ri sems sa lu shis na li rbad/ kha d+has tsa mi la b+hyo rbad 'u rbad khrag ra rbad myos te bslo bshas ti kaM /bsnyen bsgrub las sbyor thun sngags so/ /de ltar bsgrub pas bsgrub bya ste/ /sod pa'i rtag mtshan thon pa dang/
