286a7(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod bdag po srin po'i gzugs/ /khaM nag ral pa gyen du rdzes/ /ma mo 'bum gyis 'khor gyis bskul/ /bsong byad las mdzad ki la ya/ /lang ka'i grong khyer 'jom mdzad pa/ /'jig byed dka' thub thod phreng can/
286b1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer mang po 'phro 'du bas/ /gdug pa rlag mdzad ki la ya/ /nyi ma lta bur dmar ba'i can/ /'od zer sngon po 'khrug cing 'phro/ /smin ma'i khro gnyer gyen du bzlog /bdud tshogs bsreg mdzad ki la ya/ /rnam? ba ha ha cher
286b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrags pa/ /ri rab brdul phran bzhin du gtor/ /stobs chen byang chub sems dpa' ste/ /nyon mongs dgra 'joms ki la ya/ /khams gsum dbang du bsdud mdzad pa/ /dug gsum brdul du brlag mdzad cing/ /grong khyer
286b3(rgyud 'grel): sum brtsegs 'jigs byed pa'i/ /log 'dren bsong byed ki la ya/ /dur khrod mkha' 'gro pho nya'i tshogs/ /dgra bgegs ma lus gsong byed pa'i/ /nag po chen po'i zhal du btab/ /bskrod byed dgra bsod ki la ya/ /oM ma
286b4(rgyud 'grel): hA ka la ki la ya kha hi kha hi/ ki la ya/ mA ra mA ra ki la ya/ g+h+rih+na g+h+rih+na ki la ya/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha ki la ya/ ha na ha na ki la ya/ da ha da ha ki la ya/ pha tsa pha tsa ki la ya/ de na mi gi na ki la ki la ya hUM phaT/ che ge'i snying la
286b5(rgyud 'grel): ki la ya/ de ltar blo ldan phur pa yis/ /gdug pa can gyi gnas bcur gdab/ /nag po chen po'i phur ba gdab pa phreng sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //gal te de la rtags med na/ /nag po chen po'i srog phung
286b6(rgyud 'grel): tsams/ /phur pa bdag pos dbu mnan la/ /'gril zhing zhe sdang khro thabs su/ /gong bzhin byas la 'di yang brjod/ /dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na/ /bdag gi bsgo ba ma nyan na/ /bdag gi khyed la gtor ma ci byin pa/ /
286b7(rgyud 'grel): khyed kyi lus kyi bdud yin te/ /lus nyag tshal par 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu dmyal bar 'gro/ /de bas las rnams myur du bgyis/ /khA hi khA hi ki la ya/ /dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na/ /bdag gi khyed la bzlas pa ci
287a1(rgyud 'grel): byas pa /khyed kyi ngag gi gnad yin te/ /khyed kyi yang du ma gur 'gyur/ /re ma de bas/ ma ra ya ki la ya/ dam bcas? bzhin du ma byas na/ /bdag gi ting 'dzin ci bgyis pa/ /khyod gyi
287a2(rgyud 'grel): snying gi gnas yin te/ /khyed kyi snying yang lags par 'gyur/ /de ma thag tu dmyal bar 'gro /de pas las rnams myur du mdzod/ /g+h+rih+na g+h+rih+na sa ma ya/ oM mahA ka la ya sa ma ya/ duSh+Ta kha kha sa ma ya/ khA hi khA hi sa ma
287a3(rgyud 'grel): ya/ de ni mi ge? na sa ma ya/ ces dam skrag cing/ srog phur gyis gdan du bsnun cing brdeg go /de las rnams myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dpal nag po chen po phur par sgrub pa slob dpon bram ze ? mtshogs ? mdzad pa
287a4(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs so/ /'di'i brgyud pa ni bram ze mchog sred ? la shar? nas? sangs rgyas bston pa yan? gzhan 'dra/ /phyag drug ye shes mgon po chos skor? las mgon po dbang gi rgyal po'i sgrubs dang? bkang gnyis? bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sh+ri ma hA kA la sa d+ha na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nag po chen
287a5(rgyud 'grel): po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ dpal dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang thob dam tshig ldan pa yi/ /yid dang mthun pa'i dben gnas su/ /mthun pa'i rkyen rnams tshogs pa dang/ /bde ba'i stan 'dug skyabs 'gro
287a6(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /sems bskyed tshad med bzhi bsgoms nas/ /swa b+hA wa yi stong par sbyangs/ /e las chos 'byung mthing kha'i nang/ /dmar po pad+ma nyi ma dang/ /bgegs kyi rgyal po'i gdan la ni/ /rdo rje hUM dang gri gug oM/ /de las
287a7(rgyud 'grel): 'od 'phros don gnyis byas/ /tshur 'dus yongs su gyur pa las/ /dbang gi rgyal po sku mdog dmar/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum dang po gnyis/ /gri thod bzung nas yum la khyud/ /bar gnyis lcang te'u rtse gsum 'dzin/ /
287b1(rgyud 'grel): 'og gnyis lcags dkyu zhags pa bsnams/ /dbu skra spar smin ma ser/ /? lnga'i dbu rgyan dang/ /rlon pa lnga bcu'i do shal byas/ /sbang du gsang yum mkha' 'gro ma/ /chags pa'i nyams can sku mdog dmar/ /phyag
287b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis gri thod? ya ba pa stob/ /phyag rgya lnga ldan yab la khral/ /yab la sprul rigs lnga yi rgyan/ /'od dpag med kyi spyod paN 'chang/ /mdun du(rgyud 'grel): mahA kA la dmar/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yas su k+She Ta pA la ni/ /du kha
287b3(rgyud 'grel): lcang ti'u sdig 'dzub can/ /rgyab du dzi na mi tra ni/ /nag po gri gug thod pa can/ /g.yon du tra ki ra dze ser/ /rtse gsum dang ni sdig 'dzub 'gying/ /thams cad khro bo'i chos kyi rgyan/ /dam can rgya mtsho'i tshogs kyi skor/ /ye
287b4(rgyud 'grel): shes me dpung klong na bzhugs/ /kun gyi gnas gsum oM A hUM/ /'od kyi ye shes spyan drang nas/ /dza(rgyud 'grel): hUM ba hos bgugs zhugs cing/ /mnyes par bzhugs pa'i sa bon las/ /'od 'phros dbang gi lha tshogs bskul//
287b5(rgyud 'grel): mchod nas gsol gdab dbang bskur bas/ /rang rigs bdag pos dbu la brgyan/ /yab yum thugs khar nyi mar hUM/ /oM badzra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+Shi Ta bi gnan bi na ya ka hUM hUM phaT b+hu ma gu ye swAhA/ /'od zer dmar po snod
287b6(rgyud 'grel): bcud khyab/ /'gro ba'i nad gdon sdig sgrib sbyangs/ /brtan g.yo thams cad dbang du bsdus/ /bdag nyid lhar gsal drung du lhags/ /dad cing gus pas bdud par bsam/ /de ltar rtse gcig ting nge 'dzin gyi/ /zhag bdun
287b7(rgyud 'grel): rgyun chad med par bzlas/ /dngos su zhal ston rmi lam du/ /bstas dang mtshan ma ci rigs 'byung/ /thun 'tshams mchod pa bzhi rdzogs dang/ /spos sbyor zhi ldan gtor ma dbul/ /mgon po'i nang sgrub rje mi tri pa la bdag
288a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyung po rnal 'byor gyi zhus pa'o// athii //*/ /mgon po'i rgyu dus brtag pa bzhugs so// //bla ma mgon po dbyer med phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di ni mgon po rgyu ba'i dus so/ /dus gnyis
288a2(rgyud 'grel): las yang ngo'i zla ba dang/ /mar ngo'i zla ba'o/ /yar ngo'i tshes pa bcu gsum la nam gung rgyu de/ kha shar du ltas la bya'o/ /tshes brgyad la srod dang tho rangs rgyu ste/ kha nub tu lta'o/ /tshes bcu la bsrod la rgyu ste/ /kha
288a3(rgyud 'grel): byang du lta'o/ /bcu dang bco lnga la skye rengs shar nas rgyu ste/ kha nub du ltas la bya'o/ /mar ngo'i nyi shu gnyis la nyi ma nub pa la rgyu ste/ kha nub du lta'o/ /nyi shu la srod la rgyu ste/ kha byang du lta'o/ /phur pa gdab pa
288a4(rgyud 'grel): dang thod pa mnan pa dang/ khrag zor 'phangs pa thobs pa'i dus ni/ dbang phyug chen po skyed gdong nag po dang/ lha mo dbu ma dang gnyis/ zla ba bcu gnyis pa la skye 'gro srang la 'jal zhing ? bas de'i dus su byas na
288a5(rgyud 'grel): thebs tshe/ spyir zlar ba'i tshes bcu la 'khor bstan ma bcu gnyis dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs che'o/ /'bring po'i tshes bcu drug la 'khor bdud bzhi dang bcas nyul bas thebs so/ /tha chungs gi nyi shu gnyis lam
288a6(rgyud 'grel): bdud dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs so/ /dbyar zla ra ba'i tshes brgyad la 'khor gza' chen brgyad dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs so/ /'bring po'i tshes bcwo lnga la 'khor klu drug dang bcas nas nyul bas thabs so/ /tha
288a7(rgyud 'grel): chungs la rigs lnga yab yum dang ma mo thams cad ltad mo la yangs bas mi bya/ ston zlar ba'i nya gsum ka 'khor ma mo dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs so/ /'bring po'i bcu bdun nas gnam stong gi bar 'khor rgyu skar
288b1(rgyud 'grel): gyis byas nas nyul bas theb so/ /tha chungs kyi tshes brgyad nas stong gyi bar du 'khor lha chen po brgyad kyis byas nas nyul bas thebs so/ /rgun zlar? ba'i tshes bcu gsum nas bcu drug gi bar du 'khor gnod sbyin dang bcas nas
288b2(rgyud 'grel): nyul bas thebs so/ /'bring po'i nyi shu nas stong gi bar du 'khor gshin rje dang bcas nas nyul bas thebs so/ /tha chungs kyi nyi shu dgu la lha srin yongs kyi kha lo bsgyur nas sems can la rtsis 'debs byed cing srog bdud
288b3(rgyud 'grel): pas thebs so/ /drag po'i las kyi phur bu 'debs pa dang/ thod pa gnon pa dang/ zor 'phen pa dang/ hoM spor ba dang/ ser ba 'bebs pa cho gar song song byar mi rung byas na phur pa btab kyang snang/ thod pa gnan kyang rdzas
288b4(rgyud 'grel): 'grul/ thor 'phangs kyang khrag mdzad/ ngan sngags zlas kyang rlung 'dang/ lha mo sgrubs kyang don med/ log nas sngags pa rang phungs pas mi bya'o/ /drag po'i las gang byed kyang mi rung/ phyir zlog pa'i dus ni/ spyi zlar ba'i
288b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu bdun dang bcu dgu la byas na zlog /'bring po'i tshes gcig dang nyi shu brgyad pa bzlog /tha chungs kyi gnam stong la log /dbyar zlar ba'i tshes gnyis dang lnga la zlog /'bring po'i drug la ldog /tha chungs gi tshes bcu gcig
288b6(rgyud 'grel): la ldog /ston zla ra ba'i nyi shu la ldog /'bring po'i tshes gsum la ldog /tha chungs kyi tshes gnyis la ldog /rgun zlar ba'i tshes bcwo brgyad la ldog /'bring po'i nyi shu la ldog /tha chungs kyi nyi shu bdun la ldog /de rnams
288b7(rgyud 'grel): su drag po'i las gang byed kyang log 'dren gdug pa can gnod pas rang gi srog la gnod do/ /rang ting nge 'dzin dang ldan yang/ bu dang chung ma dang/ phyug la log te/ sngags pa tshe thung ba dang/ bag ba ngan ba dang/ dbul bar 
289a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba'i kyon de lta bu 'ong pa yin no/ /slob dpon 'jam dpal gshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //'thu rtsal thogs pa med par shog/ //
289a2(rgyud 'grel): */ phyag drug ye shes mgon pa'i chos skor las sha wa ri dbang phyug gi mdzad pa'i byin brlab nag? pa'i bsgrub thabs zhes pa'i las mthub can bzhugs so// //rgya gar skad du/ sa thi s+tha na ma hA kA la swa ra na ma/ bod skad du/ byin gyis brlab pa
289a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i nag po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ myur mdzad spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhabs bdug dang bcas byin ya ka mnan/ /nag po chen po stag gi sham thabs can/ /phyag drug sbrul gyi rgyan gyi rnam par/
289a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyan/ /g.yas pa 'phreng ba bar pa gri gug 'dzin/ /tha ma Da ma ru ni drag tu 'khrol/ /g.yon pa thod pa dang ni mdud rtse gsum/ /de bzhin zhags pas bzung nas 'ching bar byed/ /drag po'i zhal ? mtshan rnams
289a5(rgyud 'grel): lar gtsigs/ /spyan gsum drag po'i dbu skra gyen du 'bar/ /dbral par sind+hu ra yi legs par byug /rin chen thod rka ma lnga yi dbul brgyan/ /spyi bo mi bskyod pa yi dbu la brgyan/ /khrag 'dzag mi mgon? lnga bcu'i
289a6(rgyud 'grel): do shal can/ /sna tshogs bar ma nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor steng/ /ye shes me dpung 'bar pa'i dbus nas bzhengs/ /shing la byin nas gtor ma len par dmigs/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la pas rdo rje rigs kyi lha yin k+Shi k+She? tA par/
289a7(rgyud 'grel): na na bin ya ka hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ bsnyen par sngags po/ oM sh+ri badzra ma hA ka la k+Shi k+Shi Ta yA ha na ha na/ de ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ pA k+Sha bA k+Sha /ru ti ra maM sa ha ra staMs/ g+h+ri hi da b+ha smi ku ru h+ri hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'phrin las sgrub pa'i sngags so// oM mahA
289b1(rgyud 'grel): kA la ma sha sa na/ a pa ? ri ri/ re sha a ba tsim hA ka lo ya/ aM? de na ra dan tra ya ya/ a pa ka ra naM/ a ti pra tig dz+nya sma ra si sarba duSh+Ta na b+ha li Sha kha kha hi khA nyi mA ra mA ra/ b+h+ri sna g+h+ri h+na/ ? ha na ha na/ de ha da ha
289b2(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa ba tsa/ de na me ke ni hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ lan bdun brjod la gtor ma sbyin/ /dpal ldan nag po tsha ba'i mchog /ye shes phyag drug bsgrubs 'dod las sbyong dus cho ga mo zhes lon pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pa yi 'di ltar bya/ /dben zhing nyams
289b3(rgyud 'grel): dga' i gnas mchog tu/ /dkyil 'khor las sbyor gy sngags so mnga' gang gru bzhi bya/ /'thas par byas la chag chag gdab/ /thig gdab sgro bzhi gru chang ldan/ /pho brang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'god/ /kha dog phyogs dang mthun par bya//
289b4(rgyud 'grel): sgor? khyam nag po nang khyim dmar/ /gru chad smug po mu khyud mthing/ /rtsibs mchen dkar po zhi bar bya/ /pho brang dbus su gtab gtor bca' / /shar sgor rdo rje lhor gri gug /nub tu thod pa ltag sprod lnga/ /bya bsgor rgyun gtor bzhag
289b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya/ /sha tshan gri khrag dag gi brgyan/ /mgon po'i spro sregs mar me bltams/ /bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ /ye shes lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms/ /dkyil 'khor paM las par ma 'dab brgyad /de steng raM las nyi ma'i
289b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor/ /de ? bla thogs bgegs ki rgyal/ /ban ya ka kha sgrub bsgyel?/ /de yi steng du hUM nag po/ /de las 'od 'phros las bzhi 'grub/ /tshur 'dus gri gug nag po yi/ /yub gser gyi rdo rjes byas/ /rno dpal thur la
289b7(rgyud 'grel): gtad pa'o/ /rdo rje'i lta bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor/ /de la bu gang ne ye 'dzin steng hUM 'thing nag pos mtshan/ /de las 'od 'phros don gnyis byas/ /tshur 'dus pa las dam tshig pa'i/ /mgon po gzhung bzhin bsgom par bya/ /zhabs
290a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis brkyang bskum bgegs chen gzer/ /rus pa'i zhabs gdub rgyal rigs klu/ /dkar khra'i sprul gyi brgyan pa'o/ /stag gi lcags pa'i sham thabs can/ /lto ba thur la 'phyang pa la/ /b+h+rung? zhing
290a2(rgyud 'grel): com? h+rags gel ba'i gzugs/ /gnag cing gzi brjid che ba la/ /mi mgo lnga bcu'i do shal can/ /dril bu g.yer khas brgyan pa'o/ /zhal sgrang mche gtsigs ljags 'gril zhing/ /ag tshoms ser nag smar can/ /shangs?
290a3(rgyud 'grel): rdog che zhing khro gnyer bsdus/ /spyan dmar gru gsum sdang mig gzigs/ /dam la gnas pa'i rtags kyi mchog /dpral par sin d+hu ra dag gi /thig le 'bar bas mtshan pa'o/ /dbu skra kham nag gyen la rdzes/ /sangs rgyas rigs
290a4(rgyud 'grel): lngas mtshan pa yi/ /thod rkam lnga yi dbu la brgyan/ /dmangs rigs nag khra'i sprul gyi bcings/ /mi skyod pa yi rgyas gtab cing/ /bram ze dmar khras mgrin pa snyan/ /rje rigs ser khras phyag gdub brgyan/ /g.yas gyi dang
290a5(rgyud 'grel): po thod 'phreng 'dzin/ /bar pa rdo rje gri gug 'phyar/ /tha ma thod pa ltag sprod lnga/ /dril bu g.yer khas brgyan pa'o/ /g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag gsol/ /bar ba kha Ti rtse gsum 'dzin/ /tha ma rdo rje lcags skreg gi /zhags pa
290a6(rgyud 'grel): dgra bgegs lus la 'debs/ /de yi thugs kar pad nyi'i steng/ /hUM nag 'bar bas mtshan par bsams/ /'od 'phros Da ma ru yi sgras/ /lho phyogs dur khrod bsil tshal gyi / /tshan dan sdong po'i steng dag nas/ /ye shes
290a7(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' spyan drangs te/ /dza:hUM baM hoM sa gnyis med stim/ /thugs kar sa bon hUM nag las/ /rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bskor par lta/ /phub ral can dang gri gug per/ /dpal ldan lha mo la sogs pa'i/ /bka' sdod las
290b1(rgyud 'grel): mkhan phyogs bzhir bgor/ /gang bcol 'phrin las sgrub par bsam/ /de nas bdag gi sngags bzlas pas/ /gtso bo'i thugs ka'i gsang ba'i sngags/ /gyen du phung ? zhal nas 'thon/ /bdag gi zhal ? dngos grub thob/
290b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs ka nas thon thugs kar thim/ /thugs dam brgyud bskul 'gal me yi/ /'khor lo'i tshul gyi sngags bzlas pas/ /sngags las ?  las ? yi 'ong/ /'phros nas las bzhi byas bar lta/ /de ? bzhir brjod bya
290b3(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /thun mtshams dag tu gtor ma sngo/ /yi ge brgya pa nyams chags bskang/ /ye shes mi shes snga sor bzhag/ /sems can don du bsngo ba bya/ /bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor gyi/ /? chag nya pa 'dug spyod lam bzhis/ /
290b4(rgyud 'grel): dus dang yi ge'i grangs dang ni/ /rtags rnams ma rdzogs par du bklas/ /dus gyi snyen ba zla ba drug /yi ge'i dbye ba khrag gnyis te/ /grangs gi bsnyen pa 'bum tsho gnyis/ /rtags ni sgrub la brtson pa yi/ /lus ngag yid gsum
290b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yeng ba spangs/ /dmigs pa rtse gcig gsal par bzlas/ /bya nag lding dang khyis? nag 'khor/ /sngags pas chas gos nag po can/ /bran g.yog tshul du 'grogs byed cing/ /zas nor ster ba rmi ba'o/ /de dag khro zhing rgyags
290b6(rgyud 'grel): pa bar/ /bdag gi lang mo sna tshogs byed/ /mig log mchu med byed pa rnams/ /las mgon khros pa'i rtags yin pas/ /gtor ma btang zhing bshags pa bya/ /de la gtor ma'i man ngag ni/ /rin chen snod dang ka pa lar/ /
290b7(rgyud 'grel): 'bru nas 'bras khro sna gsum gyi zan gyi gang/ /gri sha gri khrag la sogs pa'i/ /rgyan gyis brgyan te chang gi bran/ /de nas sems bskyed yi dam bsgoms/ /swa b+ha wa yi sngags kyis ni/ /phyi nang snod bcung steng par bsam/ /skad
291a1(rgyud 'grel): cig tsam las snod kyi nang/ /raM las nyi dkyil de stengs su/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga nyid kyang/ /sa bon gsal bar gyur pa la/ /'og tu yaM dang ram nyid las/ /yaM las rlung byung raM las me/ /'bar te yig 'bru
291a2(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba las/ /'bru oM A:hUM gsum brjod pas ye shes kyi/ /bdud rtsi dpag med 'phel par bsam/ /de nas dam tshig mgron snyed de/ /ye shes sems dpa' sbyan drangs nas/ /bstims te bu la bsam nyes par bsam/ /
291a3(rgyud 'grel): hUM bde gshegs bla ma mgon dang bcas/ /ye shes phyag drug gtso 'khor dang/ /dam can mkha' 'gro tshogs rnams kun/ /bstan bsrungs 'phrin las sgrub don du/ /rnal 'byor bdag gi gnas 'dir gshegs/ /dungs
291a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis spyan 'dren kyi/ /thugs dam thugs rje'i dbang gi ni/ /da lta nyid du gshegs su gsol/ /oM badzra ma hA kA la k+Shi ces pa'i rtsa sngags lan bdun brjod/ /skar mda' lam du bzhugs shul gyi/ /gnas nas byon
291a5(rgyud 'grel): nas thim par bsam/ /hUM mnyam med mthu chen mo ltar 'bar/ /dgra bgegs ma lus thal bar rlog /thal byed gzhon nu 'jigs pa'i sku/ /'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ces pa sgo gsum gus pas phyag
291a6(rgyud 'grel): bcol/ /rtsa sngags bdun la b+ha ling gdags/ /gtso bo ye shes pa la dbul/ /las sngags bdun gyi 'khor la dbul/ /bstod pa bya zhing 'phrin las bcol/ /de yi dus gsum spos bsregs to/ /btsan dug yungs kar
291a7(rgyud 'grel): sgo kya gsum/ /gri khrag dang sbyar rim bu bya/ /yang na gu gul nag po dang/ /btsan dug yungs kar bu ram rnams/ /gri sha dag dang sbyar byas te/ /ril bu sran ma tsam byas nas/ /sol ba'i me la sregs par bya/ /lha rnams
291b1(rgyud 'grel): 'du zhing bgegs rnams bskrad/ /de las dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni man ngag dam pa'o/ /de nas gso ba'i las stan pa/ /'khor lo rtse thag bla phur rnams/ /bsrung bya'i go khrab rdo rje yin/ /'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyud
291b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ /lte bar rtsa sngags bsrung bya'i ming/ /mu khyud nang ma sgrub sngags te/ /phyi ma rten 'brel sngags kyi skor/ /rtsibs la hUM chen 'bar ba brgyad/ /rtsibs mchan rnams la las sngags 'god/ /mchod pa lnga bshams rab gnas
291b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /de nyid gang srung lus la gdags/ /bgegs kyis me dpung 'bar bar mthong/ /tshe yi thag pas bsrungs pa ni/ /dar ram g.yang mo lug gi sdu/ /legs par bskal te sum sgril bya/ /bsnyen sngags bsgrub pa las sbyor sngags
291b4(rgyud 'grel): steng? rtsa brgyan la sogs pa bzlas/ /sngags de rdo rje lu gu brgyud/ /gser gyi kha dog 'bar ba la/ /yig 'bru thams cad 'khril bar bsam/ /gus pa gsum la sku gsung thugs /sgoms te rab tu gnas par bya/ /gang bsrungs lus
291b5(rgyud 'grel): la btags pa yi/ /rdo rjer ba'i nang zhugs pas/ /lag 'dren bgegs kyis mthong mi 'gyur/ /bla yi gyur pa bca' thabs ni/ /lcags sam seng ldang smug po la /rab tshang khru gang yod pa la/ /rgya 'dud gnyis dang bcungs zhogs
291b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad/ /dpal gsum rtse mo rno bar bya/ /sku gsungs thuD kyi yig 'bru 'god/ /las sngags mgul du rtags nas ni/ /nag por mnga' gsol la/ /gang bsrung de yi sngas su gzugs/ /bgegs rnams skrag cing 'byer par 'gyur/
291b7(rgyud 'grel): gal te 'tshe zhing nyob? gyur na/ /zab mo du ba 'phro gcod sngags/ /dri bzang sman gyi legs bris te/ /rab gnas tshul bzhin byas la gdags/ /zla gtor brgya rtsa ma chag gtang/ /de yi khrag bcad bzhin du 'gro/ /oM na mo ma tri g+ha na se
292a1(rgyud 'grel): tse'u che'u? tar rdzo swAhA/ chad lhag med pa rab tu gces/ /tshar nas gtang rag dus su gtang/ /ming nyid chos skyong mdza' can gdags/ /gdug pa can gyi gnod byed la/ /dang po klung dang gtor ma sbyin//
292a2(rgyud 'grel): tshad med bzhi yi ting nge 'dzin gyi/ /chos bshad bden pa gdar bar bya/ /las ngan dbang gi sbog gyur na/ /drag sngags me yi 'khor lo 'di/ /las sbyor sngags kyi sham bur gdags/ /dus bzhi dag tu gzir bar bya/ /oM
292a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha/ ma hAr kha/ d+h+ra ka d+h+ra ki ni/ b+ha ra ma ra kha sra pre ta pra sa tsa ra ri/ /ha ra hUM phaT swAhA/ a b+hi pa ga mA ra ya/ ra ka sa phaT swAhA/ gdug pa 'jil byang sngags 'god 'di/ /sha ba ri ngas rab tu gsang/ /las ngan can gyi srid
292a4(rgyud 'grel): can la/ /mnan pa'i las kyis 'dul 'dod na/ /kham pa'i bum pa gsr ba gcig /sa dkar chos kis legs byug te/ /rgyal gsal dkor ba gang gnod pa'i/ /mtshan ma rtags la ling kha bca' / /de yi snying gar
292a5(rgyud 'grel): yi ge tri/ /dri rgod yag pa'i khrag gi bri/ /ye shes lha yi nga rgyal dang/ /phyag rgya bzhi yi sngags kyi dgug /lcags kyu lta bu'i 'od zer gyi/ /gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs nas/ /drangs te gnyis med bstims par bya/ /sgrub pa
292a6(rgyud 'grel): zhag gsum par mi bya/ /lir ga bum par bcug nas ni/ /de yi steng du dngul chu dang/ /dngul thal zangs dngar gan dang/ /'bras dang nas dang bra bo dang/ /yongs su bsngos te blug par bya/ /kham phor gsar pas kha
292a7(rgyud 'grel): bcad la/ /kha rgyan shu dag nag pos bya/ /lha khang mgon po'i zhabs 'og gam/ /mchod rten rnying po'i 'og tu mnan/ /yang na rgya gram lam du'o/ /de yi gsang sngags bstan pa ni/ /oM ka mi ni ra ta swAhA/ ka niraksha ni
292b1(rgyud 'grel): phaT/ taM b+ha na phaT/ mo ha ni phaT/ dang po zhig gcig chos skyong sngags/ /de nas man tra 'di nyid bzlas/ /gang gnod them bu bkag pa bzhin/ /'gro 'gyur the tshom med pa yin/ /bsreg pa'i ling ga dpal 'bar la/ /
292b2(rgyud 'grel): mchod gtor dpal bshos zor gtor rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du gnas su gtang/ /rten gsum bca' ba'i man ngag ni/ /sku rten lugs su blugs pa dang/ /'bur du gtong dang ris su bris/ /tshad ldan bla mas rab gams
292b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /gsung rten gsang sngags gsang yig la/ /thugs rten bde gshegs gdung la bya/ /las kyi bka' yi rten dag ni/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i spyi dgra gcig /g.yul lam pa chen na padme?  yi/ /skad cig tsam gyi sdog?
292b4(rgyud 'grel): gcang? pa'i/ /dri rgod chu krog ma reg pa'i/ /tsit+ta 'bar ba gcig la bya/ /srog rta dbu mar ring bsrel gzhug /g.yas su gsung rten gzhug par bya/ /g.yon du rin chen sna lnga dang/ /dri bzang sman dang spos kyi gar/ /dang sna
292b5(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi dril byas te/ /rgyun par mchan khung g.yon par bcang/ /sgrubs pa'i dus su dkyil stengs bzhugs/ /de yi lus dang grib ma bzhin/ /'phrin las rnam bzhi 'grub par 'gyur/ /gos dang gsang ba rnams gnyis
292b6(rgyud 'grel): la/ /mchog tu gso ba'i las la shis/ /bsad pa'i las mdza' gzhan du shes/ /rten gyi man ngag zab mo 'di/ /rmu rgod sems can 'dul dka' rnams/ /chos 'dod slob dpon mi 'dod pas/ /gdam ngag thob nas bla ma
292b7(rgyud 'grel): spong/ /dam nyams lag tu shor pa srid/ /snod med rnams la gsang bar bya/ /sbyor ba dngos gzhi 'jug gsum du/ /rtags 'di dag la yi rtan bya/ /phyi rtags nad rtags gsang ba'i rtags/ /khros pa'i rtags dang bzhi ru bshad/ /phyi
293a1(rgyud 'grel): rtags bsnyen sgrub byed pa'i dus/ /dkyil las 'od dang me stag 'gros/ /sgrub khangs thog chog bya rog lding/ /bon pa nag po glu len cing/ /? nag thogs nas 'phyar ba'ong/ /nang ? rtogs slob dpon chos
293a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chad cing/ /gdugs phub seng khrid sdong pa dang/ /phebs par smra dang lung ston dang/ /ban d+he mtshan ldan zas kyi gnod/ /byed par smin lta nye yang/ /gsang rtags mgon po rmi ba dang/ /dngos su zhal ston gri gug dang/ /tho dang
293a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phreng ? te ka la lar/ /rtse gsum zhags pa gter ba dang/ /stag seng mchod pa stong ba dang/ /shel ri mchod rten la 'jog cing/ /de la bskor ba byed pa dang/ /chos nor gter ston grub rtags so/ /a tsa ra nag po 'khrugs
293a4(rgyud 'grel): byed dang/ /ral gri'i char pa 'beb pa dang/ /bya nag lug nag 'thab pa dang/ /bud med nag mo khro zhing sgreg /mi sdug sna tshogs ston pa sogs/ /khros pa'i rtags yin bshags pa bya/ /dam rdzas dpung skyed bsnyen sgrub pa
293a5(rgyud 'grel): la/ /brtson 'grus drag pos 'bad bar bya/ /de ltar byas pas las 'grub ste/ /the tshom yid gnyis spang bar bya/ /chos skyong 'di yi khyad par ni/ /'khor la mi gnod rbad par 'gro /dkar po dang nag po klu bdud dang/ /btsan
293a6(rgyud 'grel): dang the'u dang rgyal po sogs/ /dgra bgegs rdul du rlog par byed/ /nag po chen po phyag drug pa'i sgrubs thabs/ dpal sha wa ri dbang phyug gis zhal mngon sum du gzigs nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //
293a7(rgyud 'grel): bla ma rgyud pa ni/ dpal sha wa ri dbang phyug /rje mi tri pa/ a nan ta badzra/ a b+hi 'dzug rta/ bla ma du gu pa/ las stod dkon mchog 'khor// //*/ /mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa'i sgrub thabs sdus pa bram ze chen pos mdzad pa bzhugs so//
293b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ a thiShU na ma hA ka la sa d+ha na na ma:/ bod skad du/ nag po chen po'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /paM las pad ma nyi ma'i gdan
293b2(rgyud 'grel): stengs na/ /bye na ya ka brdal ba'i thag / /nag po tshen po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /stag lpags dang ni rus pa'i rgyun gyis mdzes/ /sprul chen rgyan dang ral pa stong pa'i dang las thur dam las/ du 'phyang/
293b3(rgyud 'grel): srin po'i thod phreng rus pa nag po yi/ /thod pas dbu /hUM las gri gug gi spro bsdu las la rab tu brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas dkar g.yon ni dmar zhing spyan gsum pa/ /khros pa'i so gtsigs rab tu gtum pa'i mdog
293b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gri gug bar pa bgrang phreng ste/ /thams chos sgra Da ma ru/ /drag po khrol zhing gar stabs mdzad/ /g.yon pa thod pa dang ni mdung rtse gsum/ /de bzhin zhags pas dgra po 'dzin par byed/
293b5(rgyud 'grel): brkyang skum gar thabs mdzad pa'i zhabs bzhi rol/ /mi bskyod byin gyis brlob cing rgyab tu ma hA ka la ni/ /dmar nag g.yas pas gri gug 'dzin/ /g.yon pa thong khrag zhal du rdub/ /rus pa'i rgyan
293b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan gcer bu mo/ /gar stabs keng rus gdan la bzhugs/ /mche gtsigs spyan gsum khros pa'i zhal/ /gtso po dang ni dus mnyam bskyed/ /las kyi lha mo bzhi po yis/ /gdug pa can kun
293b7(rgyud 'grel): kun 'gugs byed cing/ /bzung nas gtso la stobs bar byed/ /sngags kyi zlos ba de rjes btsal/ /oM sh+ri badzra tsan d+ha ma hA kA la pra thi tha na ma ma hUM hUM hUM phaT / rtsa ba'i sngags su bstan pa
294a1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ /oM sh+ri badzra tsan d+ha ma hA ka la dza li khreM k+She tra big nan b+hi na ak+Sha hA na hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT / gtso 'khor nye snying sngags su bstan / oM
294a2(rgyud 'grel): mahA ka li ni hUM phaT / oM ma hA ka li khre ta pa la hUM hUM phaT / oM rad ni ta ki ra dza hUM phaT / oM ma hA ka li ni sha truM ma ra ya hUM phaT / 'khor gyi sngags su bstan pa yin /
294a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mnyes pa yi gtor ma ni/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga/ /ka pa la blugs byin brlabs te / tsan dan shing la gtso 'khor rnams/ /babs nas rnal 'byor mdun du ni/ /sgra
294a4(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pas byon pa la/ /gsang ba'i sngags 'das dbul bar bya/ /oM ma hA ka la sha sa nan / a pa ka ri sha ri shaM /a pas tsi ma hA ka liM paM i rtaM rad na tra ya A
294a5(rgyud 'grel): pa ka ri ni ya ti pra ti dza sma ra si tad taM / i daM duSh+Ta kha kha kha hi kha hi / ma ra ma ra / grih+na grih+na/ b+han d+ha ban d+ha / ha na ha na/ da ha da ha / pa tsa pa tsa/ di na
294a6(rgyud 'grel): mI ke na / ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT / gtso 'khor rnams kyi gsol bas sam / oM ma hA ka la so s+thi na tsa la nA ne / pu ra da ling ni/ dz+nyA ka ra na b+ha g+h+ruM ka na ni ra ba sa wu ra hUg
294a7(rgyud 'grel): ka hUM ka phem ka ra b+hi b+hi sha na / da pa di pi la d+ha ma ru e pa la sa ka ka la ha hi / oM ya nas na dzo ki ni na ya/ a ne de e tse lu la e na sa ni pra rnam wi sa wu ra this s+tha na ma /

294b2(rgyud 'grel): sham bur gdag par bya/ /de nas gsang pa'i las bya pa/ /gtso 'khor sngags la ma ra ya/ /bla mas bstan pa shes par bya/ /sbyin sreg byas la man dbang
294b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ /rab chod thod pa steng 'og la/ /gtso 'khor 'khor lo bris byas la/ /lte bar nag po'i ling ga bri/ /kha sbyar bar du ling ga gzhug /ro ras dril la
294b4(rgyud 'grel): mnan pa bya/ /yang na bde dam 'brub khung du/ /man ngag bzhin du mnan par bya/ /gtor mas steng nas mnan la bzhag /rtags byung skyes pa'i tsit+ta ru/ /

294b6(rgyud 'grel): su lag pas gzung byas la / /bsang pa'i sngags kun bzlas par bya/ /bdag gi nag po sgrub pa'i thabs/ /rang nyid byin gyis brlobs pa 'di/ /
